BONA ZULU - November 2007
NGISHO nabangasonti ebandleni likaMfundisi Vusi Dube bayamazi ngezingxoxo zakhe ezikhuthazayo azethula emsakazweni uKhozi FM - kanti abanye bamazi ngokufunda ingosi yakhe ephuma masonto onke kwelinye lamaphephandaba esiZulu. Kungenzeka ukuthi abanye bake bahlangana naye kwi-Annual Abstinence Walk (okuluhambo lomkhankaso wokukhuthaza ukuzithiba kwezocansi) okuhloswe ngalo ukuqwashisa umphakathi ngeHIV/AIDS.
Sixoxisana naye, uthe - "ngangingazi ukuthi nginobizo."
Namuhla ukhuthaza izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zabantu abanike ithemba ngisho noma bephila neHIV/AIDS.
UMfundisi uDube wazalelwa ePietermaritzburg kanti wakhula ekholelwa ekunikeni abantu ithuba empilweni.
"Yimina engimdala emndenini onabantwana abane. Sonke sakhuliswa ngaphansi kwesisekelo senkolo nokuyinto eyangenza ukuba ngifunde ukuba nethemba," kusho yena.
"Kwakuthi noma izinto zingasihambeli kahle ekhaya sihlalele ethembeni. Lokho kunginike amandla empilweni."
NgokukaMfundisi uDube, ukholo luyisisekelo sempumelelo yezinto esizifisayo.
"Kodwa iningi labantu linovalo lokuqala okusha ngoba licabanga ukuthi ngeke liphumelele. Uma ungakaze uphumelele, kusho ukuthi awukaze uqale lutho noma uzame okuthile," kusho yena.
Njengoba ezwana nokuqala izinto ezintsha, uMfundisi uDube nowakwakhe uTaki, ongudokotela wezokwelapha, bavula iCentre Of Hope Clinic ngo-2001.
Wahlangana noTaki ngo-1996 ngesikhathi le ntokazi isengudokotela esibhedlela saseMshiyeni eThekwini, kanti kumanje banamadodakazi amabili, uTehilah (8) noRuth (5).
"Abantu abeza emtholampilo wethu badinga umuntu ozobanika ithemba. Bayazi ukuthi iHIV ayelapheki ngakhoke badinga uthando kuphela."
Izinselelo
UMfundisi uDube uzibandakanye kakhulu ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukiswa komphakathi. Wayeyingxenye yeCare Centre ePietermaritzburg okuyinhlangano eyayizimele ikhuthaza amakhono, amasiko nezobuciko. nti lapho agcina khona ukufundisa.
Emva kwalokho wajoyina ibandla iDurban Christian Centre kwathi ngo-1998 wafundela ubufundisi.
"Lokho kwangivula amehlo ngabona ukuthi ngingawenza umehluko ezimpilweni zabantu," kuchaza yena.
"Esikoleni sokufundela ubufundisi ngaqala uhlelo lokondla abantu nolokulwa nobugebengu ngibanike nethemba. Emva kwalokho ngabona isidingo sokulwa neHIV."
Wabona ukuthi ithemba lisebenza kahle endaweni enika uxhaso. Ngo-2004 washiya ebandleni iDCC wavula elakhe ibandla. Usanda kuvula elinye futhi igatsha lalo eSobantu ePietermaritzbug.
"Ebandleni lethu sisebenza kakhulu nomphakathi yingakho nje ngabona isidingo sokuba ngivule iCentre Of Hope Clinic," kuchaza yena.
Le ndawo ihlose ukuhlomisa umphakathi ngolwazi mayelana neHIV ukuze uthathe izinqumo ngempilo yawo neyabathandiweyo bayo.
Enye yezinhloso zayo wukuphucula ukunakekelwa kwabagulayo kuhlonyiswe umphakathi ukuze ulwe nokubhebhetheka kweHIV.
Uhambo
Ukukholelwa kukaMfundisi uDube ekubalulekeni kokukhuthazwa komphakathi kwabuye kwenza ukuba aqale i-Annual Abstinence Walk.
Kulolu hambo, abantu abangu-30 osaziwayo namalungu omphakathi bathatha uhambo lwamakhilomitha angu-250 baye emiphakathini ehlukahlukene, bame ezinkundleni zemidlalo bakhulume nabantu abangu-20 000 ukuze kukhuthazwe intsha ukuba izithibe ocansini, ezidakamizweni nasotshwaleni ihlolelwe neHIV kusenesikhathi.
"Olunye uhambo olulandelayo luhlelelwe uMarch 2008 kanti luyosuka eMpangeni luye oPongola. Sihlose ukuhamba u-30-35km ngosuku," kusho uMfundisi uDube.
"Sigxila ekukhuthazeni ukwakheka kwezimilo nokubaluleka kwempilo.
"Asigxili kwi-AIDS kuphela kodwa sithinta nezidakamizwa nobugebengu."
Babuye baye ezikhungweni zemfundo nasemajele bafafaze ivangeli lethemba
"Kuyangithokozisa ukubona iziboshwa ezisuke sezizitshele ukuthi azamukelekile emphakathini zeluleka ezinye zisiza nabafuna ukuzibulala.
"Ngiyathokoza futhi uma ebandleni lami ngibona abantu ababedayisa ngomzimba," kusho uMfundisi uDube. [z]
'Ngemininingwane ngeCentre Of Hope Clinic, shayela ku-031-304-3734.
Indlela uMfundisi uDube afafaza ngayo ivangeli lethemba naduduza ngayo umphakathi...

BONA ZULU - November 2007

Yiba ngomangalisayo!
Lowo nalowo muntu ukulo mhlaba ukufeza injongo ethile, ukwenza izinto ezimangalisayo
KULE NYANGA mabili amagama engizokutshela wona: Yenza okumangalisayo! Angisho ukuthi yenza okumangalisayo ngoba unamandla okwenza lokho nje kuphela kodwa ngisho ngoba vele ungumuntu omangalisayo.
Ake ucabange lokhu, imbewu yofuzo lwakho yaphuma kweyizigidi ngezigidi ukuze ivundise iqanda esibelethweni sikamama wakho. Waba ngumnqobi ungakazalwa. Uphila emhlabeni omangalisayo kanti wadalwa ngumuntu omangalisayo UNKULUNKULU.
Indlela umhlaba ohleleke ngayo ingubufakazi bokuthi kunesidalwa esimangalisayo esenza lo msebenzi. ImiBhalo eNgcwele ithi singabantwana Bakhe. Okusho ukuthi wenake mngani wami ungumsuka wempilo omangalisayo.
Uma ubheka indlela esidalwe ngayo, kuyacaca ukuthi sisuka kude. Sithathe amagxathu sasungula izinto ezingashaqisa izinyanya zethu, njengokuya emkhathini. Kodwa phezu kwabo bonke lobu buhlakani, akekho umuntu oseke wakwazi ukufaka ama-cells emzimbeni womuntu njengoba lowo nalowo muntu enangu-70 billion emzimbeni.
Ngabe uyazi ukuthi phezu kokuba bengu-six billion abantu abaphilayo eMhlabeni, akekho onolibofuzo (DNA) noma izinsalela zeminwe ezinjengezakho? UMdali Ukudale ngokukhethekile ngoba kulo mhlaba akekho ofana nawe. Wehlukile nokuchaza ukuthi alikho inani ongathengwa ngalo!
Kunesizathu esenza ukuba sihluke kwabanye. UMdali Wayenenjongo ethile ngesikhathi Edala wena. Izinto ozithandayo nongazithandi zibalulekile ngoba ziyinkomba yokuthi kungani uphila.
Izinto ezikukhalisayo, ezikuthukuthelisayo noma ezikukhuthaza ukuba uvuke uzithathe ziyinkomba yezinkinga uMdali Ayefuna ukuba uzixazulule. Uyigugu ngezinkinga ozixazululayo futhi uyisinengiso ngezinkinga ozidalayo.
Iningi labantu liphilela ubumnandi, aliphileli ukufeza injongo ethile! Liphilela ukudla, izingubo, izimoto nezindlu. Lezi zinto zinhle ngoba uyazidinga ukuze uphile kahle.
Usuke ubusisekile uma unazo kodwa ubusiseka kakhulu uma usuthole okuzokukhuthaza kukwakhe. Akusiyo imali nempumelelo okwakha impilo enhle, amabhizinisi, izinhlangano namasonto - kodwa yizizathu eziphathekayo.
U-Henry Ford owaqhamuka neqhinga lokwakha imoto wayenesizathu ngesikhathi ekholwa wukuthi umuntu kufanele abe nemoto ngisho noma engenamali - lo mqondo wamfikela engenamali. Wagcina enze iModel T eyenza kwashesha ukuhamba.
U-Bill Gates owasungula iMicrosoft wayenogqozi lokwakha amakhomphyutha. Lolo gqozi waba nalo waze wathatha isinqumo sokuyeka ekolishi ukuze kufezeke iphupho lakhe - manje u-90% wamakhomphyutha usebenza nge-programme
yakhe.
Ngeke sonke sibe nemali nodumo kodwa singamangalisa empilweni yethu nasezintweni esizenzayo. Ungaba nguweta, unogada, umshayeli wemoto
noma umsizi wasezindlini omangalisayo noma ube ngudokotela, ummeli, usolwazi noma usopolitiki omangalisayo.
Abantu abenza uguquko emhlabeni akusho ukuthi bakhuthazwa wudumo nemali. Abakufunayo wukubamba iqhaza ezintweni eziphathekayo emhlabeni.
Ngake ngezwa umseshi ethi ayikho into emjabulisa njengokufaka izigebengu
ozankosi, nokuzwa umsindo wokuvaleka kweminyango
yejele sekuvalelwa isigebengu ukuze singaphinde sihluphe abantu. Lo mseshi unendima ayidlalayo empilweni yakhe ongasoze wayinqumela nani.
U-Mother Teresa wayenakekela abampofu nabagulayo. Ayekwenza wayengakwenzeli ukuthola udumo noma imali.
Kunoma yisiphi isimo ohlangabezana naso nakunoma yini oyenzayo, qiniseka ukuthi uyazimisela ushiye omaka bezinsalela zezinyawo
zakho empilweni. Yiba ngomangalisayo! [z]

Ngabe ingane yakho ine-dyslexia"
Lesi simo sizobambezela ingane yakho esikoleni kodwa futhi singanqobeka, nayo ikwazi ukuphila impilo efana neyabanye...
ESIKOLENI uDumisani (7) kwadingeka ukuba azabalaze ukuze akwazi ukumelana nezingane afunda nazo. Wayenenkinga ekufundeni kanti nakubhalayo kwakungafundeki. Abazali bakhe nothisha babedidekile ngalokhu.
Ngesikhathi eseneminyaka engu-9, uDumisani base bemthatha njengomfundi ongasheshi ukubamba ezifundweni futhi ongahlakaniphile.
Okubuhlungu wukuthi abanye bozakwabo ayefunda nabo ekilasini base bemgcona ngokuthi uyisi "domu."
Ngenhlanhla omunye wothisha bakhe owayemusha, waqaphela ukuthi uDumisani unenkinga yokungasheshi abambe ezifundweni nokuyinkinga eyaziwa ngokuthi yi-dyslexia. Ngosizo lwaloyo thisha bakwazi ukuba bayibone inkinga kaDumisani.
Kwathi lapho eselutholile usizo lochwepheshe, wakwazi ukuxazulula ubunzima ekufundeni.
"Uma i-dyslexia ingazange itholakale ukuze ilungiswe, ikhathaza lowo muntu impilo yakhe yonke," kusho u-Marj Arslanian wakwa-Audiblox, okuluhlelo oluyisipesheli lwemfundo olusetshenziswa umhlaba wonke ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga zobunzima ekufundeni.
Abaningi banenkinga ekufundeni nasekubhaleni, ekubeni ezimweni ezedlulele kuyenzeka bangakwazi kwanhlobo ukufunda nokubhala. Iningi lalaba bantu abaphethwe yi-dyslexia linenkinga nasesifundweni se-maths.
Isebenza kanjani
Uma uqaphela ingane ene-dyslexia noma umuntu omdala ungabona into efana nalena...
Amagama alula afana noRAT angaphambana abukeke njengoTAR. Noma u-WON ubukeke njengo-NOW.
Umusho ungaxoveka unganiki mqondo njengokuthi: The tactas on ethtam (the cat sat on the mat).
Ezinye izinhlamvu zamagama ziyaphanjaniswa. Ukwenza isibonelo, u-b no-d, uze uthole ukuthi igama elithi BAT selingelithi DAT kanjalo namanye amaningi.
Izinkomba nezimpawu
Ezinye izimpawu ezijwayelekile noma izinkomba ezichaza ukuthi ingane ine-dyslexia idinga usizo:
t Ukungabi nasiqiniseko ngesokunxele nesokudla nokugcina kunomphumela wokuxova izinhlamvu zamagama, amagama wonke noma izinombolo.
t Abantu abane-dyslexia banenkinga ngokulandelanisa izinto ngokuyikho. Ukwenza isibonelo: 1-2-3-4-5, noma uMsombuluko, uLwesibili, uLwesithathu. Kungenzeka bangakwazi ukuqonda noma ukukhumbula indlela lezi zinsuku ezilandelana ngayo.
t Ukufunda nokubhala ngendlela engajwayelekile kukhomba ukwedlulela kwesimo se-dyslexia nokubonakala ngokuba uwacabangisise amagama ungabi nasiqiniseko ngawo.
t Ukukhuluma emva kwesikhathi noma ukukhuluma okungavuthiwe. Ucwaningo lukhomba ukuthi kunokukhulu ukuxhumana phakathi kokungakhulumi kahle nokungakwazi ukufunda kahle.
t Ukufunda kancane okuhambisana nokungabaza.
t Ubunzima ekubhaleni.
Yini ongayenza
Uma usola ukuthi ingane yakho ine-dyslexia kubalulekile ukuba ukhulume nothisha wayo.[z]

BONA ZULU – April 2008
IBHIZINISI LAKHO YINTO ESIYIKHATHALELE - njengoba kusho abaxhasi beBONA Empowerment Club! Woza uzohlanganyela noMhleli oMkhulu kaBONA uForce Khashane uzizwele nochwepheshe abasukela kwezempilo kuya ekuphileni kahle besinika amacebo amahle kwi-forum yethu ngoMgqibelo mhlaka 5 April eRoyal Hotel eThekwini.
I-workshop yethu yeBake & Cook for Profit ngalo lolo suku iyosethulela izindlela ezingasiza ekuvuleni indawo yokudla kwesintu emphakathini wangakini.
Ukulwela impilo enhle kuya kukhula esikhathini sanamuhla kanti nabafundi bakaBONA bangaba yingxenye yalokhu kalula ngokuzivulela izindawo okunakekelwa kuzo izinzipho (nail bar), amasaluni ezinwele i-spa noma indawo yokujima noma babe abakhiqizi bemikhiqizo yezobuhle efana nokhilimu basezandleni, izinsipho, iziphuzo ezinika impilo noma amakhambi esintu.
Inhloso yeBONA Empowerment Club wukuhlomisa abafundi ukuze bazenzele imali. Umcimbi wangomhlaka 5 April wenzelwe ukudala ukuxhumana nokusebenzisana. UBONA ungathanda ukwamukela izinhlangano zomphakathi nezitokifela.
Kuzobe kunezindodla zemiklomelo, imihlomulo namathuba okuqeqeshelwa izinhlelo zomsebenzi.

QAPHELA
othanda imali yakho
Uyathandeka unomusa kanti uyazi ukuthi indoda iphathwa kanjani - inkinga yakhe wukuthi uyinyoka ejahe imali yakho. Nansi indlela yokubona - neyokubhekana - nowesimame oyingozi njengalona
AYIKHO into ebuhlungu njengokuhlangana, uthandane ubuye ushade nowesimame othanda imali yakho ngesilungu abambiza nge-gold digger. Inhloso yalolu hlobo lomuntu wesimame empilweni wukukuhlukanisa nemali yakho oyisebenza kanzima. Bamfanisa nomqwayizi kodwake lona uhlakaniphe kakhulu.
Uyathandeka, muhle kanti unawo wonke amaqhinga okuyenga indoda. Ungazikhohlisa uthi wena uhlakaniphe kakhulu ungakwazi ukubona umuntu onje kodwa ngeke uphunyuke uma esehlose ukukugila.
Okusempeleni uyakwazi ukukukhohlisa ashaye sengathi uyakuthanda kanti akunjalo.
Uzohleka wedwa kube sengathi uwine iLotto - kodwa yimali yakho asuke eyigaqele. Uma esekutholile akufunayo, uzokushiya nenhliziyo ebuhlungu.
Ukuze umbone kahle lo muntu, kufanele wazi ukuthi ubukeka kanjani nokuthi ucabanga kanjani.
Uma usumazi kahle uzombamba engakadali umonakalo omkhulu.
Abesimame abayilolu hlobo behlukahlukene - ukuba bayafana belizotholakala kalula ikhambi lokuqeda umkhuba wabo.
Asiqale ngabangesiyo ingozi kakhulu:
Umafikizolo womthandi wemali
Ubonakala kalula. Uthanda ukubukwa njengoKhanyisile Mbau kanti uzwana nobukhazikhazikhazi.
Uzwana nezinto ezibizayo - oPrada, Givenchy, Tom Ford, Louis Vuitton - akakwazi nokuwapela la magama kanti akanawo namandla okuthenga lezi zinto.
Okuhle wukuthi sisuke singeside isikhathi eqalile ukudlala lo mdlalo kanti usheshe akukhombise ukuthi uzwana nezinto ezibizayo - lokho ukwenza niqala ukubonana!
Uhlale ecabanga ukuthi kufanele umthengele okuthile njalo uma nindawonye.
Indlela yokuhlukana naye:
Nakuba lubonakala kalula lolu hlobo, ungahlali isikhathi eside kulona. Njengomuntu oqashwe ngokugcwele odedela nasemalini, uzothola ukuthi awunankinga uma ecela umenzele izinto ngoba nawe usuke uzitshela ukuthi kusemahlombe akho ukumenzela izinto njengendoda.
Ongakwenza wukumthengela i-airtime ka-R30 (umkhombise ukuthi unayo imali) ugcine ngalokho. Uma umkhumbuza izinto osumenzele zona njalo uma ecela ukuba umenzele into ethile, uzokuyeka angabe esakuhlupha.
Obukeka njengomuntu ozimele
Nalolu hlobo alusiyo ingozi kakhulu kodwa akulula ukulubona. Usebenza kahle, uhamba ngemoto enhle, uhlala endaweni yabadla kahle - kanti emehlweni ubukeka engumuntu ozimele.
Umqo-ndo alele kuwona owokuthi akacabangi ukuyikhipha ephaketheni lakhe imali yokukhokhela impilo yakhe ebizayo - ukhokha ngemali yakho.
Kuzoba sengathi uyena muntu wesimame okulungele kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi agcine eseveze izimpawu zokuthi uyinhloboni. Uzomuzwa ekhuluma ngobaba wakhe, umfowabo noma isoka lomngani wakhe elinekhono lokunakekela umuntu wesimame.
Wenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyawuthola umlayezo wokuthi indoda emadodeni yileyo enika intombi yayo imali.
Lolu hlobo luhlala lunethezeke lumamatheke uma uweta eseninika i-bill yokudla kwenu. Ngeke kumkhathaze ukuthi uphinde wacela wena ukuba umfakele u-petrol emotweni ngoba "i-ATM ikude kakhulu Baby" aphinde alindele ukuthi ufike ekhaya lakhe ulengise upulasitiki wakwaWoolworths!
Uma ungadanseli isiginci sakhe uzokujezisa ngokungakunaki akuncishe nocansi.
Indlela yokuhlukana naye:
Vula amehlo - uma eqale ngokuthi "ubaba unike umama umholo wakhe", mbambe lapho umtshele ngamalungelo abesimame.
Uzogcina eyekile ukukuhlupha ngoba ungumuntu ozazisayo. Uma eqhubeka efuna izinto, hlukana naye.
Ofuna imali ngomshosha-phansi
Lona ugabe ngokuhlakanipha nangobuhle kanti usheshe akushiye ungenalutho.
Akalungile neze - kanti kulula ukuthandana nalo muntu!
Noma yimuphi umuntu wesilisa ohlangana naye ufuna ukumlobola, ukumnika i-deposit yeRange Rover nokunakekela izingane zakhe.
Muhle kanti unekhono lokunakekela indoda. Uzomnika i-credit card yakho ngaphandle kokucabanga. Umbona ngokungabi nankinga yokusaphaza imali ukuthi uthanda imali yakho!
Uzosebenzisa i-credit yakho azikhiphe ngempelasonto aye eMpumalanga, athenge amapheya ezicathulo zase-Italy nokwezinwele kwaseBrazil.
Phezu kwalokho ngeke ube nenkinga. Uzophaphama eseyishaye wayivala imali yakho eseqala ukukuphathisa okwento engenamsebenzi. Uzoqhubeka abheke omunye ozomsiza ngemali.
Indlela yokuhlukana naye:
BALEKA! Uma ube neshwa lokuwela ogibeni lwakhe kuzodingeka ukuba uhlale kuyena noma ube ngusozigidi ozohlala enemali yokumsiza.
Ungalokothi wenze izenzo zobugebengu ngenhloso yokuthola imali yokufeza izidingo zakhe - akumnandi ukugqunywa eC-Max.
Ukhumbule ukuthi ngeke akulinde uma usuboshiwe. [z]

IMFLUWENZA ENGUBHUBHANE i-A (H1N1) 2009
NjengoNgqongqoshe Wezempilo, ngibhalela nina mayelana naloku kufa okushiwo ngenhla  ngenxa yezizathu ezimbili:  
ukunika ulwazi 2009 oluzonisiza ukubhekana ngqo nalesi sifo 
ukucela usizo lwenu nokuzimbandakanya kanye nokwehhovisi lakho elikhulu ekudluliseni kahle imiyalezo ebalulekile ngemfuluwenza i-A (H1N1)2009 ebhizinisini lakho kanye nasemphakathini owusebenzelayo. 
Igama elisemthethweni lesayensi lalesi sifo yi-Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) 2009.  Yaqala eMexico nase-United  States of America ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka.  Ekuqaleni yayaziwa njengomkhuhlane wezingulube (i-swine flue) ngenxa yokuthi kwabe kucatshangelwa ukuthi yaqala ngezingulube.   Manje sekuyaqondwa ukuthi umsuka wayo uvela kubantu nakuzinyoni.  Ngakho-ke, lokhu kufa akunalutho yokwenza nokudliwa kwengulube noma imikhiqizo yengulube.  Manje sekubizwa nje kalula njengemfluwenza engubhubhane  noma ibizwe ngegama layo elisemthethweni i-A (H1N1) 2009.
Kusukela ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka, le vayirasi isisabalele ngokushesha kumazwe ayi-166. E-Afrika, kuze kube manje le vayirasi isisabalalele emazweni ayi-16 kuphela.  Ngalesi sikhathi sokubhala le ncwadi, le vayirasi isisulele abantu    abayi-177 457 (abaqinisekiswe yizindlu zokuqhuba ucwaningo lwesayensi) emhlabeni wonke, phakathi kwabo osekufe abayi-1 457 abaqinisekisiwe. 
ENingizimu Afrika kuze kube yimanje, sesiqinisekise izimo eziyi-2 844 osekufe kuzo abantu abayisithupha.
Ngemuva komhlangano wesine weKomidi Lwesimo Esisheshayo owawubanjwe ngomhla we-11 Juni 2009, iNhlangano Yomhlaba Yezempilo (i-WHO) yaphetha ngokuthi ikhratheriya yokuthatha lokhu kufa njengobhubhane lomhlaba seyanelisekile futhi uMnqondisi-Jikelele, uDkt Margret Chan, usesigunyazile lesi simo njengoBhubhane ( izinga lesi-6).  Kalula lokhu kusho ukuthi loku kufa sekusabalalele emazweni akuzo zonke izindawo ze-WHO futhi lokhu kwenzeke ngokukhulu ukushesha. Kodwa-ke ngithanda ukugcizelela ukuthi  ukugunyazwa kohobhane akusho ukuthi ukufa kunamandla.  Lokhu kusho ukuthi kuyaqhubeka nokusabalalela yonke indawo.
Ngomhla wesi-6 ku-Julayi  i-WHO yachaza ukuqhubeka kwalolu bhubhane emazweni athintekayo kanye nakumazwe amasha njengokungavumeleki futhi okungavimbeki.  Ngenhlanhla, yize lokhu kunje, iphinde yasho ukuthi abantu abaningi abatheleleke ngevayirasi bazoba nezimpawu ezingconywana.  Yize  njengabasebenzi bezempilo, bomhlaba jikelele nabalapha ekhaya,  sikhathazekile ngokufa okuvelile kuze kube manje  (okungama-0,8% emhlabeni nama-0,2% abantu abesulelekile eNingizimu  Afrika).  Ivayirasi isulela abantu abaphakathi kweminyaka eyi-10 ukuya kwengama-29 – iningi labo ngabafundi noma ngabasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.
I-WHO yeluleke ngokuthi amazwe afanele agxile ekwehliseni umthelela walokhu kufa emiphakathini.  Ukwenza lokhu, ukuxhumana kahle kubalulekile.
Indlela yokusabalala
Lokhu kufa kusatshalaliswa yithonsi lokusuleleka ngokufa okungukuthi uma umuntu osulelekile ekhohlela noma ethimula bese wena uhogela umoya abawuthimulele noma abawukhohlelele. Ngisho noma ngabe bakhohlelela endaweni eqinile, wena  wabe usuhogela umoya olapho ungasuleleka).

amafinyila noma amakhala acinene

Abantu abaningi emhlabeni banalezi zimpawu ezingcono futhi abadingi noma ngabe yikuphi ukwelashwa okukhethekile.  Ngakho-ke, abantu abanezimpawu ezingcono kufanele belashwe njengoba kulashwa imfuluwenza ejwayelekile ngaphandle uma kunabantu abanalezi zimo ezilandelayo okufanele baye kothola usizo lokwelashwa ngokushesha noma ngabe banezimpawu ezingcono:
abantu abanokugula okubi kwenhliziyo noma kwamaphaphu 
abasimame abakhulelwe 
abantu abaphila ne-HIV ne-AIDS
abantu abanesifo soshukela (diabetes mellitus)

Ukuhlolelwa ivayirasi
Ukuhlolwa okusemthethweni kwenziwa isiKhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithelelanayo esiseGauteng esesivule uphiko eNtshonalanga Kapa.  Ukuhlolwa kuzokwenziwa ngesincomo sikadokotela.  Iziguli ezidinga ukwelashwa ohlelweni lukahulumeni lezempilo akufanele zicele ukuhlolwa kwasendlini yocwaningo lwesayensi.  Siyazi ukuthi yilokhu okwenzeka njengamanje emkhakheni wezempilo wangasese, kodwa akukhokona okufunwa yi-WHO. Odokotela kufanele belaphe izimo ezisolekayo ngokwamazinga okwedlulisa ulwazi (protocol) ahlinzekwe nguMnyango Kazwelonke Wezempilo.
Ukwelashwa
Ukwelashwa onelungelo lokuzikhethela kona yi-Tamiflu.  Ifanele inikezwe ngudokotela futhi inikwa labo: 
abanezimpawu ezingcono abukuzihla ezikhethekile njengoba zishiwo ngenhla
abanezimpawu ezingconnywana
abanezimpawu ezimbi
Ukwelashwa kukawonke wonke nge-Tamflu kuzoholela ekuqabeni kokulapheka uma kusetshenziswa lo muthi futhi kungenza ukuthi ungasebenzi nakulabo ongahlenga izimpilo zabo. 
Ukuvalwa kwezikhungo
Ulwazi olutholakale emhlabeni wonke ngukuthi ukuvalwa kwezikole nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, amamoli okuthenga nezindawo zokusebenzela akusebenzi  kusukela ekusabalaleni kokufa.  Kodwa, lokhu kudala ukuthikamezeka okukhulu enhlalweni.
Seluleka ukuthi  noma ngabe yimuphi umfundi, umfundisi  noma umsebenzi onezimpawu ezingcono ukuba ahlale ekhaya. Uma bebaningi abafundi futhi/noma abafundisi abaphuthayo, isikhungo esithintekayo kuzofanele sithinte uMnyango Wezemfundo, ozobe ngokuhlanganyela neziphathimandla zezempilo usululeka ngokufanele kwenziwe ukuqhubekela phambili.
Ukuphepha kwezempilo okujwayelekile  
Ngenxa yendlela lokhu kufa okubhebhetheka ngayo njengoba kushiwo phamphimbilini, lokhu kuphepha kwezempilo okulula okulandelayo kuyaphakanyiswa:
hlamba izandla ngensipho njalo
khohlela noma uthimulele kwiphepha eliyithishu noma emkhonweni wengalo yakho
ungakhohleleli ezandleni zakho noma ngabe sekwenjani, okungcono khohlela kwindololwane yakho
uma uphoqeleka ukuba ukhohlelele ezandleni zakho, ungathinti lutho olufana nezibambo zeziminyango, amafasitela, ingaphezulu lamatafula noma izitsha zokudla kuze kube usuhlambe izandla zakho ngensipho
Uma unezimpawu ezingcono, hlala ekhaya futhi nqanda ukuhlangana nabantu.
Ngifisa ukuniqinisekisa ukuthi ososayensi benza konke okusemndleni emhlabeni wonke besebenzisana ne-WHO ukuzama ukuthola ikhambi. Uma konke kuhamba kahle, ikhambi elifana naleli lingakhona ezinyangeni ezimbalwa. Kodwa, kunesindingo esikhulu kabi sekhambi nokukhiqizwa obukhulu bako bunganele – ubukhulu obungekho e-Afrika.
Ngifisa ukunibobonga ngesikhathi enibe naso sokufunda le ncwadi, futhi ngiphinde ngibonge ukubamba kwenu iqhaza okulindelekile ekudluliseni ulwazi nasekwehliseni imiphumela yalokhu kufa.

ESITHOMBENI KULINGISIWE
NGINEMINYAKA engu-45. Ingu-20 iminyaka ngishadile kanti nginezingane ezimbili esezikhulile. Inkinga yami wukuthi ngibona sengathi ngilubulele uthando emshadweni wami. Ngikhuluphele, angimuhle, anginamdlandla kanti sengimdala. Angikwazi ukumnika uthando umyeni wami noma ukuzenza ngibe muhle. Uma ngizibuka esibukweni angisithandi isimo sami.
Ngidinga usizo ngoba angifuni ukulahlekelwa wumyeni wami nakuba ekhombisa ukungabi nankinga ngami.
Ongemuhle, ePitoli
Kunezigidi ngezigidi zabesimame abazinyeza njengawe emhlabeni - bathi bakhuluphele, ababahle, abanamdlandla kanti babona sengathi badala. Okuhle wukuthi kukhona ongakwenza ngale nkinga. Akukho esingakwenza ngeminyaka yakho, kodwa uzokhululeka uma ulungisa okunye kwalokhu okubalile.
Okokuqala, vakashela udokotela wakho ukuze akuhlole.
Kungenzeka ukuthi ungena esigabeni sokunqamuka kwesikhathi sakho njengoba usukhulile. Kusho ukuthi ngeke usakhulelwa uma ungasayi ezinsukwini zakho.
Lokhu kwenzeka ngokwemvelo kumuntu wesimame kanti kwenza abe nolaka noma akhandleke ngokwengqondo abe nesithukuthezi. Udokotela angakusiza.
Ukukhuluphala kungenza uphelelwe amandla. Uma uzivocavoca umzimba wakho ukhipha amakhemikhali enza uphatheke kahle, okuyiwona enza uhlale weneme avuselele ukuzethemba kwakho nokulangazelela ukuya ocansini.
Ukuzinyeza akuthinti indlela obukeka ngayo kuphela kodwa kuthinta nesimo sengqondo yakho. Uma uzitshela ukuthi umubi, abantu bazokubona kanjalo.
Ngesikhathi abesimame bekhula, bayayemukela imizimba yabo ngisho noma benezici ezithile.
Shintsha ongakushintsha kanti uma ungenankinga ngezingalo zakho ezinkulu ungabi namahloni ngazo. Ubuhle bungaphakathi kuwena kanti yilobo buhle umyeni wakho abubonayo.
Mhlawumbe lesi yisikhathi sokuzama okusha empilweni. Wake wacabanga ukujoyina isitokifela noma inhlangano yabesimame?
Kuhle ngoba uyabona ukuthi ukungazethembi kwakho kulimaza uthando. Zethembe ushintshe ongakushintsha uziqhenye.
Ufuna imali yami kuphela
Sashada ngo-2001 kanti kwakukahle sisenonyaka sishadile. Manje ngineminyaka engu-30, nginengane eyodwa engayithola ngingakashadi kanti angithokozile neze. Umyeni wami akasebenzi kanti uthanda abantu besimame. Uze abakhulelise.
Isithunzi sami usehlisile. Izintombi zakhe ziyangidelela.
Ngiyasebenza kanti ngicabanga ukumdivosa ngoba uthi indlu engayakha ngemali yami eyakhe. Akasangithandi, uthanda imali yami kuphela. Engingakufuni kakhulu ngaye wukuthi uma sixabana ufaka nengane yami. Nginovalo lokuthi uzosibulala ngelinye ilanga. Ngisize...
Okhathazekile, Umzimkulu
Umyeni wakho akakuhloniphi kanti akukuhle ukuthi uhlale ungakhululekile ngenxa yakhe.
Qaphela njengoba esekusabisile. Ngabe ngeke akusize amalungu omndeni noma umfundisi wenu kule nkinga?
Ngibuza lokhu ngoba udinga abantu abasondelene nawe abazokhuluma nomyeni wakho bamtshele ukuthi ufuna nidivose.
Kungaba kuhle udayise noma uqashise ngendlu yakho uhlale kwenye indawo. (Mhlawumbe umqashi wakho angakuzamela isikhala kwenye indawo.)
Akukuhle lokhu akwenzayo njengoba ephehla uthuthuva ekhaya lenu - kodwa nawe kufanele uzicabangele. Izintombi zakhe ziyakudelela kanti anizwani. Ukuphepha kwakho kumqoka kakhulu kanti kuhle uthuthe usuke eduze kwale ndoda ungabe usaxhumana nayo.
Qina uthathe isinqumo ngempilo yakho. Uzozifaka kwenkulu inkinga uma uvuma ukuba akushintshise umqondo wakho akuyekise ukuba umdivose.
Thola neseluleko kwabomthetho njengoba umuzi wakhiwa uwena.
Ngicabanga ukuthi uyayazi manje into oyifunayo njengoba sekuphele iminyaka eyisithupha uphila impilo emuncu kanti kufanele ucabangele wena nengane yakho.
Usemncane, usothandweni
Ngiyintombazane eneminyaka engu-14 kanti ngifuna ukwazi ukuthi kuhle yini ukuthandana nomuntu ongaphansi kwami? Ngabe kuhle ukuthi owesimame azicelele uthando kowesilisa?
Ubona kanjani ukuthi lowo muntu ukuthanda ngempela?
Odidekile, Botswana
Ukuphendula umbuzo wakho wokuqala, akukho okubi uma intombazane ithandana nomuntu ongaphansi kwayo ngeminyaka. Uma wena nesoka lakho ningenankinga ngalokho, ngabe kubalulekile ukuthi abanye abantu bacabangani? Abantu bazokhuluma kanti kungenzeka kungakuphathi kahle ozokuzwa.
Ngabe owesimame angashela umuntu wesilisa? Njengoba uneminyaka engu-14 kulula ukuthi abantu badlale ngawe kanti bangakuthathisa okomuntu okhohlakele. Ungakumela lokho? Akekho umuntu oneminyaka engu-14 ongakumela lokho ngakhoke linda uze ukhule.
Ngeke kube lula ukuphendula umbuzo wokugcina ngoba usemncane. Uma intombazane esencane ithandana nomfana, izitshela ukuthi lolo thando "ngolweqiniso" - lokho kuphela uma lowo mfana esebone enye intombi noma uma intombi ithola elinye isoka.
Lokhu sikubiza ngokuthatheka. Ubona emva kokuthandana nabantu abambalwa ukuthi babengabalulekile njengoba wena wawucabanga.
Ngabe ngiyi-ATM yakhe?
Nginentombi ehlala ePitoli enezingane ezimbili eyazithola komunye umuntu. Sasixabana kakhulu sagcina sesihlukene. Uma kuphele inyanga iyangivakashela ifune imali ihambe. Sineminyaka emine sindawonye kanti angazi noma idlala ngami yini ngoba ngibona sengathi izifunela imali yami. Ngenzenjani?
Themba, Alexandra
Uma ungasathandani nale ntombi kusho ukuthi akukho okukweleta yona?
Kufanele kukukhanyele ukuthi kuwena ibona umuntu ozoyisiza ngemali ngisho noma ningaqhubeka nithandane.
Funda ukuthi "Cha!" uyitshele ukuthi ayihlukane nawe. [z]

Uma usothandweni, lesi yisikhathi esihle sokuluvuselela. Uma ungawedwana, hlale uvule amehlo ngoba uzomthola umaqondana ngokuzitholela umuntu omusha.
Uthando lwakho lubukeka luthembisa, ngakhoke qala manje wenze izinhlelo zekusasa nesithandwa sakho. Uma ungawedwana uzokuba sothandweni.
Vuselela uthuthukise uthando lwakho ngokuba nomoya wokumnakekela omthandayo. Kubalulekile ukuthokozela ubumnandi ndawonye.
Kunethemba lokugcwaliseka kwesethembiso, ngakhoke ungabe usachitha sikhathi ekwakheni uthando oluhle. Uma ungawedwana ungase umthole umaqondana.
Lesi kufanele kube yisikhathi senjabulo. Wena nesithandwa sakho kuzodingeka ukuba nithathe izinqumo ezibalulekile. Sheshisa izinto uma ungawedwana kodwa futhi kukhona ozikhipha naye.
Uthando nokuba ndawonye kungaba ngokwakho uma ungumuntu ongenamfihlo. Uma ungawedwana themba imicabango yakho ngoba ngeke ikudukise.
Yisikhathi sokuba ukhombise uthando olujulile. Nawe uzoluthokozela uthando uma udlala indima yakho ngokuyikho. Khombisa okukhulu ukuzinikela othandweni.
Imizwa yakho inamandla okukulawula nokuyinto enzima okungelula ukuyilawula. Ngakhoke uma ungawedwana, usukulungele ukuba sothandweni.
Uthando luyohlale luthokozeleka, ngakhoke lesi yisikhathi sothando lweqiniso. Khombisa okukhulu ukunakekela kumuntu wakho.
Ukuba ndawonye kwenu kuzoluqinisa uthando lwenu. Uma ungawedwana uzothola izinto ezizokusondeza konesifiso sokuzwana naye ngakwezothando.
Kuningi ongakwenza ukuthuthukisa uthando lwakho uma ungumuntu osothandweni. Uma ungawedwana, kukhona ongase akhombise ukuba nomdlandla kuwena.
Ukhombisa okukhulu ukunakekela ngokothando. Uthando onalo yilo oluyisisekelo esihle ongakhela kuso ubuhlobo baphakade nesithandwa sakho.

KUYISIFISO sikaMildred ukuvula isikole sokusika ingqephu ngelinye ilanga. Kodwa njengamanje, kumphatha kahle ukusebenzela ekhaya lapho ethungela khona.
Eminyakeni emithathu edlule uMildred Ngubane wafundiswa nguNellie Nyawo ukuthunga.
Ngaleso sikhathi uMildred owayesebenza njengomsizi wasezindlini wayefundela ukuthunga kanye ngesonto.
Kwathi lapho esefunde ukusika amaphethini nokuthunga, waqala ukuthatha ama-oda abantu uma engasebenzi - ukusebenza wakuyeka esenamakhasimende ayevame ukufaka ama-oda.
Akakaze abaswele abantu azobathungela nokuyinto emenza abe matasa kusukela ngo-9 ekuseni kuze kube ngu-5 ntambama.
"Unzima lo msebenzi kodwa ngiyawuthanda ngoba ngizimele," kusho yena.
U-Mildred uthunga imifaniswano yesikole, imvunulo nezingubo zomshado.
Endaweni ahlala kuyona udume ngokuthunga izimpahla ezinhle.
UKUQALA
Ungaqala ukufunda ukuthunga ngomshini ojwayelekile nokuyinto engabiza u-R600. Kodwa ukufunda ukuthunga ngomshini onezitishi eziningi kungenza ukuba ube namandla okuthunga okuningi ngokushesha!
Okunye okungakusiza wukuba nezikele zokusika, i-tape yokukala kanye ne-ayina loku-ayina izimpahla zakho.
Amanye amakhasimende afika nendwangu yawo kanti kungadingeka ukuba uzithengele nawe indwangu noma ube namasampula ayo ozowakhombisa amakhasimende.
INZUZO
Kusemqoka ukubala imali ozoyisebenzisela ukuthenga indwangu, oziphu, ukotini nokunye ngaphambi kokunquma inani lokudayisa okuthungayo.
U-Mildred uthi ungayithola inzuzo uma uthenga ngobuhlakani uthunge usheshise.
"Ngiyazithunga iziketi ezinhlanu ngosuku. Uma ngithunga isiketi esishibhile, indwangu ngiyithenga ngo-R50, ngithenge ukotini, uziphu nokunye ngo-R10," kuchaza yena.
"Okusho ukuthi ngisebenzisa u-R60 ngesiketi esisodwa, ngisidayise ngo-R120. Eziketini ezinhlanu ngithola inzuzo ka-R300.
"Uma ngithunge eziningi ngithola inzuzo engaphezulu kwalokho.
"Ukuthunga amabhulukwe kuthatha isikhathi kanti uma ngithunga wona aba ngaphansi kwamahlanu ngosuku!
"Abantu ngingabeluleka ngokuthi mabangabizi kakhulu ngabakuthungayo futhi bathunge okuyikhwalithi ukuze bahlale benamakhasimende.
"Ngithola inzuzo enhle ngezimpahla eziqashisayo, yingakho nje kukuhle ukuthunga izingubo ozoziqashisa. Izingubo zomshado ngiziqashisa ngo-R1 000-R3 000, kuye ngesibalo sezingubo umuntu aziqashayo.
UKUWUFUNDELA
Ukufundela ukuthunga kuncika esikhathini nasemalini onayo. Ziningi izikole ongafundela kuzona ukuthunga kanye ngesonto noma uthole isitifiketi noma i-diploma kwi-fashion design. Kufundele esikoleni esinegama elihle noma ozosizwa ngomngani wakho, ezikhungweni zomphakathi nasesontweni. [z]

hulumeni wase Ningizimu Afrika waqala ukuguqula eze- mihlaba (Land Reform) ngo 



1994. Uhlelo lokuguqula kwezemihla- ba (Land reform) luqonde ukulungisa ubudlova nokuphucwa kwemihlaba okwenzeka ngaphansi kwemithetho kahulumeni wobandlululo.



Sekuphele iminyaka elishumi manje uhulumeni enza uhlelo lokubuyiselwa kwemihlaba.Uhulumeni ukhuluma ngempume- lelo yaloluhlelo ngoba izicelo eziningi sezaphumelela. Isikhathi saloluhlelo, uhulumeni usephinde wasengeza kuze kube uku- phela konyaka ka 2007.



Umlando ubonisa ukuthi kudingeka siqaphele, ngokucubu- ngula nangokubhekisisa ezemihlaba eNingizimu Africa. Ange- ke sithathe izinto kalula. Leliphepha libheka ukuthi bathini abantu abafaka izicelo zokubuyiselwa imhlaba. Leliphepha ikubuka ukubuyiswa kwemihlaba ngasezingeni labantu abase- mazingeni aphansi hhayi abangaphezulu. Liyabhekisisa ukuthi uhlelo lokubuyiswa kwemihlaba luyabuletha yini ubulungiswa nokwelapheka kwamanxeba asendulo. Likhuluma ngezindaba zabantu base Roosboom nase Oakford, bese lisebenzisa le- zizindaba ukubuza imibuzo ebalulekile ngokunxeshezelwa.



IOakfordyipulazi  elingango  1100  Ha     maduzane  ne Verulum  ngaphakathi  komngcele  womkhandlu  waseThe- kwini.  Lathengwa eminyakeni elinganiselwa ko-1800 ngu- Mbhishobhi  Jolivet, uMbhishobhi  ongumKhatholika, okwathi emva kwesikhathi waletha amasistela eDominika   kulendawo ukwenza  umsebenzi  wokuphendula  abantu  bendawo. I  Oak- ford  Priory  yasungulwa.  Njengoba  kwakunjalo  nakwezinye iziteshi  zezimishini, ngokuhamba  kwesikhathi  abantu  ababe- hlala  kulendawo  banda, ngenxa  yokubakhona  kwemisebenzi



eduzane, nangokuzinikela kwabo ebukatholokeni.



Ngonyaka ka-1952 kwethulwa umthetho wokuhlalisa abantu ngobuzwe (Group Areas Act). Lomthetho wayithinta nenda- wo yase Oakford, ukususwa ngenkani kwenzeka ngo 1964 kuyaphambili. Ukususwa kwahlukanisa abantu base Oak- ford: Okungenani imindeni engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili yasuswa ngenkani emishini, abaningi baya eNdwedwe. Laba- ntu babelindele ukuthi Amasistela ayezobakhulumela, abasize kepha lokhu akwenzekanga.Eminye imindeni yasala endaweni, kepha besengcupheni bengenakuvikeleka bokuba nomhlaba.



Izihambi zabantu base-Oakford bafaka isicelo ngokulandela uhlelo lokunxeshezelwa kwemihlaba ngo-1996 no 1997. Emva kwesikhathi eside belindile, uhulumeni ngeRegional Land Claims Commission (RLCC) wakhokhela i Dominican Associa- tion yase Ningizimi Africa. Ngalokho ngo 2 April 2005 abantu ababesusiwe base Oakford bakwazi ukujabulela amalungelo abo okuba nomhlaba e-Oakford.Kunokuba bahlale kulomhlaba bakhetha ukuwusebenzisa ukwenza ibhizinisi, balima umoba.



Abantu abasala e Oakford, banikezwa nabo isithembiso sokuthola umhlaba. Ngo 1996, amaSistela avuma ukuthi ba- ngawuthatha umhlaba ababephila kuwona. AmaSistela enza isicelo kuMnyango weZemihlaba (Department of Land Af-









fairs, DLA) ukubasiza ukudlulisela amatayitela, nokuthi abantu abazothola umhlaba basizwe ukuthi bangawusebenzisa ka- njani kahle lomhlaba. Ngo January 2006, labantu bathola uku- gcwaliseka kwalesisithembiso sokuthola amatayitela, nakuba kube iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye belindile ukudluliselwa ko-









minyakeni yokuqala yawo 1900’s indoda emnya- ma yathenga umhlaba kuhulumeni endaweni 



kweLadysmith. Lendonda eyabe I yizemtiti yamema abanye abanjengayo ukuba bahlangane babeyinkampani ekuthe- ngeni futhi basebenzise lomhlaba. Lendawo yathuthuka nge- sikhathi njengomphakathi wamaKrestu, lapho kwakuvunyelwe amasiko athize esiZulu. Abanikazi nabaqashi ngokufanayo ba- kha imizi, izikole, izizinda zokuqeqeshwa, umtholampilo, iposi namasonto amaningi anjengawase: Sheshi, Khatholika, Weseli, Presbyterian, Zulu Congregational, Dutch Reformed kanye namanye amabandla ahlukahlukene azimele aseAfrika (aziwa phecelezi ngokuthi ama AICs). Ngaphandle kwalokho kwaku- nokulima okwakwenziwa futhi indawo yayibonakala njenge- ndawo yabamnyama abaphumelelayo nabanothile.



Kepha uhulumeni wabona lendawo njenge “chashazi eli- mnyama” (black spot), wabe usuqala ukuxoxisana naba- nikazi bomhlaba, iminyakana embalwa, uzama ukuba bazi- xoshe ngokwabo emhlabeni wabo. Nokho kwazicacela ukuthi lemizamo kahulumeni yabhuntsha engekho ofuna ukuhamba ashiya indawo yakhe. Kuthe uma kubonakala ukuthi lemiza- mo ayiphumeleli izikhulu zikahulumeni zabe seziqala ukuse- benzisa amaqhinga okukhulumisana nomphakathi ngendlela eyishaya ngapha iphinde iyishaye ngapha ziletha nemibiko e- ngeyikho ngenhloso yokudala uqhekeko.



Ngolunye usuku, ekuseni kusempondo zankomo, ngonyaka ka 1975, kwatheleka amaloli amasosha, kwatshelwa imindeni ukuthi ayiqoqe lokho engakuqoqa ingene emalolini. Lokho okwasala ngemuva kwaphenduka idili likamkhipheli emaso- sheni okunye kwacekelwa phansi. Imindeni yathuthwa nga- maloi yayolahlwa elokishini laseZakheni, kwelinye ohlangothi lweLadysmith, basebetshelwa ukuthi bahlale ezindlini zikatha- yela, ezakhiwe nakabi noma zinamanzi kepha zingenagesi, kwakungekho ndawo yemfuyo noma yokutshala ukudla. Lo- khu kufudukiswa ngenkani kwakusayisiqalo nje sokufudukiswa okuningi kwabantu base Roosboom,okwenzeka iminyaka emi- bili. Kokunye abantu bahamba beya emsebenzini uma bebuya bathola sekungekho lutho lapho kwakungamakhaya abo.



Labo ababexoshiwe bahlala Ezakheni kepha belokhu bela- ngazelela ukubuyela e-Roosboom- eyabe isiphendulwe ipulazi. Kuthe ekupheleni kweminyaka yo-1980, abantu baqala uku- zibuyelela e-Roosboom bezama ukwenza ngcono izimo zezi- mpilo zabo. Kwabesekufika nabanye ababengakaze bahlale e- Roosboom ngaphambilini. Ekuqaleni kweminyaka yawo 1990 abahlali baqala ukucela uhulumeni ukuba ababuyisele umhla- ba wabo, ngeminyaka yo-1994 ngaphezu kwenxenye yabahlali bokuqala babuyela emuva e-Roosboom.



Uhulumeni omusha waseNingizimu Afrika entsha indaba yase Roosboom wayibona njendaba yokuqala ye RDP eyimpu- melelo nayengaziqhenya ngayo. Kwabe sekwahlukaniselwa isamba semali esilinganiselwa ezigidini ezingama R26 million ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lendawo iyathuthukiswa. Kepha kwabo-



Ngo 1994 uhulumeni waphasisa umthetho obizwa ngokuthi i-Restitution Act No. 22 of 1994.



Lomthetho, ngokombono wawo, ufisa ukubuyisela amalungelo omhlaba kulabo abalahlekelwa yilamalungelo ngemuva kuka 19 June 1913, ngesikhathi kuphakanyiswa imithetho yokubandlulula ngokobuzwe abantu base Afrika.



Umgomo wawo ukugqugquzela ukuphathwa ngokulingana kwalabo abaphucwa imihlaba nguhulumeni, kakhulukazi abangenamihlaba ezindaweni zasemakhaya; ukubhekelela izinhlelo zokuthuthuka kulethwe bonke abathintekayo kulezicelo zomhlaba; ukugqugquzela ukubuyisana ngokunxephezela; ukuthela esivivaneni ukuze kube khona ukwabiwa ngokufanele kwamalungelo ezomhlaba.



Inqubo yalomthetho: ukugqugquzela ukulingana ebulilini; ubulungiswa nokulungiswa ngokufaneleyo; kuqaliswe ngezidingo zokuthuthukiswa kwemihlaba; ukubhekelelwa kwezidingo nokugqugquzelwa kwe Batho Pele.











nakalengathithi baba buncane ubufakazi obabubonakala ku- bahlali base-Roosboom balemali noma intuthuko. Ngokuha- mba kwesikhathi eminye imiNyango kahulumeni yaletha e- zinye zezidingo zomphakathi.



Ngenxa yakho konke lokhu osekwehlela abantu base base- Roosboom basukuma bazibambela ngokwabo ngokuthatha lezinyathelo ezilandelayo:



Abanikazi nabahlali sebaziphindelela emhlabeni wabo eku- qaleni kweminyaka yo 1990, baphinda bafaka isicelo nge- minyakyo 1993 sokubuyiselwa umhlaba wabo nokuthola amatayilela awo. 



Bazakhela izinsiza ezithile endaweni. 



Bafuna nokuba uhulumeni alethe intuthuko nokulethwa lwezinkonzo, kuthi nokuguguleka komhlabathi endaweni kwelashwe (ngesikhathi indawo yenziwa ipulazi yasetshe- nziswa ngendlela engafanele, lokhu okwaba nemiphumela emibi emhlabathini). 



Babiza uhlelo olunjengo lweTRC ukubasiza ukuze baqonde ukuthi kwenzekani ngama 1970s, ikakhulukazi ukuthola ukuthi ubani owagunyaza ukuxoshwa kwabo. 



Banquba ukugwema ukwahlukana endaweni, futhi base- benze ndawonye nawowonke umuntu ohlala khona, kanye nabo labo abafika ngemuva kokususwa. 



Basungula iRoosboom Church Land Committee ukuxo- xisana nohulumeni. 



Sebeke babhala izincwadi bezithumela ezikhulwini zikahu- lumeni.

Imibuzo eyishumi yokubuza ngokunxeshezelwa kwezemihlaba

Njengezakhamizi  zaseNingizimu



Afrika, sidinga ukwazi, ngo- kucubungula nokubhekisisa



ngezemihlaba.



Ukusisiza sazi,sibhekisise,sicubungule,kunemibuzo ebalulekile eyishumiengabuzwaimiphakathiesendleleniyokunxeshezelwa. Uma uthatha indima esicelweni sokunxeshezelwa, kungakusi- za ukuhlangana nabanye abenza lesosicelo (noma abanye abantu abasemphakathini noma bengafaki isicelo) bese nibu- za lemibuzo njengomphakathi:



Uma sifuna ubulungiswa benziwe ngonya olwenziwa ngenxa yemihlaba, ingabe siqondene nomnyango ofanele? 



Ingabe uhlelo lokunxeshezelwa lungani empeleni? Ku- ngabe olokuphikisa ukungabikho kobulungiswa, noma olokuthola imali namandla? 



Kungabe ukuthola itayitela noma imali kuyoletha ubu- lungiswa kithi futhi kusinike ngokugcwele esalahlekelwa yikho ezimpilweni nasemphakathini wethu? 



Kungabe siyazi ngokugcwele ukuthi izimfuno zobani ezi- balulekile ekwenziweni kwesicelo somhlaba? 



Kungabe uhulumeni ne Regional Land Claims Commission Isibuka kanjani njengomphakathi? Kungabe singabalinga- ni, noma siyinamba ezibalweni nje? 



Kungabe siyazi ngokugwcele ngokubakhona kwesithe- mbiso sokulungisa isimo sethu, futhi sithathe amandla ezandleni zethu? Kungabe siyazi ngokugwcele ngokuba- khona kwesimo esingavumi ukuba siphikisane nokwenzi- wayo? Kungabe siyakholwa ukuthi singaphazamisa isicelo uma singaphathwa kahle? 



Ubani othola amandla, isimo nemali esicelweni esisifakile? Kungabe yithina ngempela esithuthukiswayo? Kungabe abampofu phakathi kwethu bayaluthola usizo? 



Uma I-Regional Land Claims Commission ikholwa ukuthi sekuphelile ngokudluliselwa komhlaba,kungabe bayovele bahambe nje? Kungabe silindele okungaphezulu kweta- yitela noma imali kuhulumeni, kungabe lokho okulinde- lwe kuyikona ngempela? 



Uma sibuka izindaba zabanye abafake izicelo, kungabe ukunxeshezelwa kubanga ukuxabana nokuhlukana, noma kuyasiza ukwakha umphakathi? Kungabe ukukhokhelwa kuyathuthukisa impilo yomphakathi? Kungabe abantu bayamelana nobumpofu? 



Kungabe ukuphindela emhlabeni wethu kuyaletha ubunye nentuthuko, noma kuletha ukuxabana kubantu? 





Ungenzani ngokunxeshezelwa kwezemihlaba  Manje?



Ukunxeshezelwa kwangempela akusikho okomhlaba. Uku- nxweshezelwa kwangempela kungubulungiwa obenziwa empilweni: Ukuzazi, ukuzigqaja, umphakathi, umndeni, u- mlando nokubanendawo. Umphakathi ungafinyelela kanjani ekunxeshezelweni kwangempela? Lezi ezinye zezindlela:



Asithathe iqhaza sijabulele ukuthi singobani! Asiyibo aba- fake izilelo, kepha siyizakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika. 



Asiqale manje ukusebenzisa umhlaba, asithathe ikusasa lethu libe sezandleni zethu. 



Sinelungelo lonke ukufuna ubulungiswa, izimpendulo ezi- ningi zivela kubantu – banamandla okuzikhulula bona. 



Labo abakhishelwe ngaphandle kufanele bahlale bebu- mbene, bahlanganisele izinsiza futhi bazihlele kahle. Ba- memane bamele ukuguqulwa kwezemihlaba kwange- mpela Ukuguquka kwezemihlaba kwangempela kuyamu- kela lokhu abantu abahlangabezane nakho nomlando wa- banganamhlaba futhi kwabiwe izinsiza ngokufanele uku- letha uguquko kulokho abantu abakudinga ngempela, hayi lokhu okufunwa osomabhisinisi. 



Hlonipha amalungelo abantu. 



Asiziqonde ukuthi singobani. 



Yakhani ubudlelwano nihlanganyele ndawonye – ninga- sebenzi ninodwa.

Ukubhema kubeka ababhemayo engcupheni yokuthola izifo eziningi. Isexwayiso ebhokisini singafundeka kanje: "kwenyusa amathuba okuphathwa isifo senhliziyo noma umdlavuza," kodwa lokho kungenxa yobuncane bebhokisi. Uhlu lwezexwayiso lukhulu kangangoba ludinga ibhokisi elikhulu.
Ngabe ukubhema kwenzani empilweni yakho"
I-Nicotine ne-tar yizona zinto ezimbili ezibulalayo.
I-Tar: Ukubhema kugwayi ongena-filter kuno-five billion particles nge-cubic millimetre. Uma lokhu sekuhlanganiswa kungadala isigaxa esi-brown esinamfukayo esaziwa ngokuthi i-cigarette tar.
Amanye amakhemikhali akwi-tobacco tar amataniswa nokuqubuka komdlavuza.
I-Nicotine: Isidakamizwa esikhubaza umqondo - kanti ingubuthi uma isiningi.
Ukubhema kwehlisa iHDL, okungamafutha abalulekile kwenyuse amathuba okuqala kwamahlulu egazi okungaholela ekuphathweni i-stroke.
Ungaphathwa futhi amaphaphu, umphimbo, umlomo, isisu, isinye, izinso namanyikwe.
Uma ukhulelwe kukhubaza ukukhula kwengane kanti kungaholela ekubeletheni isikhathi singakafiki, ekufeni komntwana ubeletha noma kuphuphume isisu.
Ukuhogela intuthu kagwayi yikona okungumbulali omkhulu. Ine-DDT (esetshenziswa njengento yokubulala izinambuzane), arsenic, formaldehyde ne-carbon monoxide.
Lokhu kuxhunyaniswa kakhulu ne-pneumonia yezingane, i-sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS), isifuba somoya, ukuphathwa yizindlebe ezinganeni.
Kwabadala kungadala i-asthma, stroke, i-cardiovascular, umdlavuza nobunzima ekuphefumuleni.
Yini ongayenza ukuze ushintshe"
Uma ungumzali:
uYiba yisibonelo esihle ngokungabhemi.
uUma ubhema, bonisana nezingane zakho ngomzabalazo wakho wokuzama ukuyeka.
uZichazele ngobungozi bako.
uKhumbuza izingane zakho ngokubiza kwawo nokuhlukumeza impilo kwawo.
uIningi labantu liqala ukubhema ngoba lithi liqeda i-stress - fundisa izingane zakho ezinye izindlela zokumelana nengcindezi.
Uma ubhema:
uQonda ukuthi ugwayi uyisidakamizwa nokuthi ngeke kuze kube lula ukuwuyeka. Zilungiselele ukubhekana naleyo nselelo.
uUma kunzima ukuwuyeka yehlisa isibalo sowubhemayo kuze kube awusabhemi nowodwa.
uZithokozise noma nini lapho ufeze isifiso sakho.
uThola izindlela ongaqeda ngazo i-stress - ukubhukuda noma ukugijima.
uQala ukuzivocavoca - kuyasiza.
uUyazi uma uvame ukubhema - ukwenza isibonelo nekhofi noma isiphuzo - uzame ukugwema lezi zimo. Ukwenza isibonelo, suka etafuleni ngokushesha emva kwesidlo.[z]

Unathi Nkayi
indaba nguDOUG GORDON
Usanda kujoyina ithimba leMetro FM elisakazela abalaleli ababalelwa ezigidini eziyisithupha kanti uhlelo lwantambama ulushayela noDJ Glen Lewis...
Nakuba Unathi esezakhele igama kwezokusakaza, indodana yakhe iyohlala isemqoka kakhulu empilweni yakhe.
BONA ZULU - June 2007
NAKUBA ethokozisa izihlwele eziningi ohlelweni lwantambama kwiMetro FM, kodwa Unathi Nkayi ngumuntu ozithobile. "Ngisemusha lapha. Umthetho wokuqala wempumelelo wukuba uvale umlomo wakho udlale umculo."
I-Metro FM igubha iminyaka engu-21 selokhu yaba semoyeni kulo nyaka kanti iyakwazi ukuheha abantu abanamakhono. Ngonyaka odlule kwaba nguDJ oyisihlabani sodumo lwe-hip-hop uBad Boy T okumanje useshayela uhlelo i-breakfast show. Manje sekuyintokazi eneminyaka engu-28 Unathi Nkayi okumanje i-albhamu yakhe yesibili iphrojuswa yithimba labeKalawa eselikhiqize izihlabani ezifana noBongo Maffin, Mafikizolo noMahoota.
Ngokusho kwakhe, okuyiyonanto ayeyibhekile kwiMetro, wuhlelo lwantambama ngesikhathi ephuma enyuvesi yase-Eastern Cape eminyakeni eyisishiyagalombili edlule.
Ukwazile ukufeza iphupho lakhe kusukela ekushayeleni uhlelo lukamabonakude lweSABC 1 iCastle Loud waphinde washayela uhlelo lwangezimpelasonto noRudeBoy Paul kwiYFM ngo-2002.
"Kwakunzima ngisaqala. Babengangithokozeli ngikwiTV futhi bengitshela ukuthi: 'Ungazenzi usiyazi uma usemoyeni.'"
Osaziwayo kule ndima bebelokhu beqaphele indlela aqhuba ngayo Unathi - abantu abafana no-Glen, Fresh, Bob Mabena nomkakhe uZandile Nzalo, RudeBoy Paul nesoka lakhe uDJ Thomas 'Bad Boy T' Msengana.
Oyisikhulu sezomculo kwiMetro uLeo Manne ukholwa wukuthi Unathi ngumuntu omfanele ngempela umsebenzi wakulesi siteshi.
Kungenzeka abe ngomunye wabanamakhono amangalisayo eGoli, kodwa ukuziphatha kwakhe emphakathini nokuziphatha kwakhe ekhaya yikho okufana ncamashi nenqubo yezinkolelo i-96.4 FM ezimele, kusho uManne.
"Into esemqoka kimina yindodana yami," kusho Unathi.
"Yebo, njengamanje sengisebenza esiteshini sokusakaza esisodwa noThomas, kodwa futhi asibonani njalo phakathi nesonto.
"Uhamba ekhaya ngo-4.30 ekuseni eyolungiselela uhlelo lwakhe lwasekuseni i-breakfast show mina ngihambe emva kwezikhathi zamalantshi sengiyohlangana noGlen.
"USinako uneminyaka emibili nohhafu, kimina uyikho konke ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinto," kusho Unathi.
"Ngenza konke ukuzinika isikhathi sami sokuba ngibe naye."
Nakuba Unathi esekugwemile ukuba sezintweni eziyindida iminyaka emihlanu ngesikhathi sodumo lwakhe kwiYFM, ukuya kwakhe kwiMetro sekumenze walandelwa abamaphepha eGoli.
Isibonelo salokhu kungenkathi kubikwa kwelinye iphepha langesonto ukuthi wabanjwa ngosuku lwamaLungelo abantu iHuman Rights Day emgwaqweni ehamba ngesivinini esingu-186km/h.
Wachazwa futhi njengomuntu owakhala izinyembezi ecela uxolo ukuze angaboshwa.
Imenenja yakhe uLupi Ngcayisa, wayichitha le mibiko njengombhedo.
"Yebo, wabanjwa ehamba ngejubane, kodwa hhayi ngo-186km/h."
"Uma ungacabanga Unathi ekhala ecela uxolo ngabe nawe uhlanya njengalo muntu owakhipha lolu daba ephepheni."
Unathi ukhula ngokukhulu ukushesha kulo nyaka, nokuyinto athi izobonakala nasemculweni wakhe.
Ukubhala nokuqoshwa kwe-albhamu yakhe yesibili esitebeleni sabeKalawa esiseMidrand kuyigxathu elikhulu kuleli bhizinisi lakhe lezikaqedisizungu njengokujoyina kwakhe isiteshi sokusakaza esidlala umculo we-pop.
"Ngizethemba kakhulu manje. Izingoma zami zizwakala kahle kanti namagama akuzona acace kahle.
"Ngithokozile. Kukhona izingoma ezisesitayeleni ezifana nethi Give Me My Heels kanti kukhona futhi nalezo ezinomlayezo.
Ingoma ethi Amadoda, ikhuluma ngamadoda angafuni ukukhula, aqamba amanga, angamagwala nafuna ukuhlala enabukeliswa njengezingane." [z]

Owokusikwa kwengqephu!
indaba nguGRACE KHUZWAYO
izithombe nguBRETT FLORENS
Kuningi okwenzekayo kwezengqephu kunokuthungwa kwezingubo…
IMBONI yezokusikwa kwengqephu inokuncintisana okukhulu nakuba inamathuba amaningi kulabo abanothando kuyona - ezintweni ezifana nokusika amaphethini, ukwenza izingubo nokuthunga.
UWanda Ndaba uneminyaka engu-22 kuphela, kodwa usengumthungi ongumsiki wengqephu nomnini webhizinisi elisimeme.
Emva kokuphothula i-diploma yeminyaka emithathu kwi-fashion design, imisiko yakhe yathakaselwa kakhulu embukisweni wengqephu ngomunye wabanini bezitolo ezimbili zezimpahla zokugqoka, waze wafaka ama-oda ezitolo zakhe (loyo mlisa).
Njengamanje uWanda unehhovisi ne-workshop eThekwini kanti useqashe abasebenzi abangu-6 ukuze akwazi ukumelana nama-oda ezitolo nawamakhasimende akhe.
Uchunge lwezimpahla zakhe lwe-Avalanche lubandakanya amasudi, amahembe, izikhindi namabhulukwe amade.
Ibhizinisi lakhe liphathelene nokuthunga njengoba evakashelwa amakhasimende amaningi asuke efuna ukuba awenzele amasudi nezinye izinto zokugqoka.
UWanda uthunga izimpahla zabesilisa nezabesimame kodwa ugxile kakhulu kwezabesilisa.
“Umama wami no-anti bangabasiki bengqephu, ngakhoke ngangibabuka benza umsebenzi wabo ngisakhula.
“Ngazitshela ukuthi nami ngifuna ukwenza okungaphezu kwabakwenzayo. Wumsebenzi onokuncintisana okukhulu, kodwa impumelelo yiyonanto engizimisele ngayo.
“Akufanele uhlale ucabange ukuthi amathuba azozizela, kufanele usebenze kanzima ukuze akuvulekele.”
Into eyaba yinselelo enkulu kuWanda kulo msebenzi wakhe, wukuthola i-oda lokuthunga amasudi omshado abesilisa ababengu-9. “Abanye balabo bantu babevela phesheya.
“Nganginamasonto ayisithupha kuphela ukuba ngiwaqede,” kusho kukhumbula uWanda.
“Kodwa ngawaqeda ngesikhathi nabo bawathokozela sengiwaqedile.”
Amathuba omsebenzi
Okuningi kuncika ekuqeqeshweni.
“Abafundi asebephothule izifundo zesikhashana bangaba abasizi kuma-design studio noma ama-pattern-maker noma ama-sample maker embonini yefeshini,” kusho uMonique Rolando weLinea Academy eThekwini.
“Labo abaphothule iziqu kwi-fashion design basethubeni lokuba ama-designer, merchandiser, buyer, stylist, noma izintatheli zefeshini noma bangene ngokwabo kuleli bhizinisi.
“Ukuthungela ekhaya ngezinye zezinto ongazenza nakuba ungeke ukwazi ukumelana nengcindezi yomsebenzi mhlawumbe kuze kudingeke uqashe ozokusiza.
“Qala ngokufunda kwabanye, njengokusebenza nabo e-design studio noma embonini yezefeshini noma yokuthengisa.
“Uma usuthole ulwazi oludingekayo usuzethemba, usungazimela ngokwakho. Zinikele ube nothando lwento ofuna ukuyenza.”
Kufanele ube ngumuntu onjani
Kufanele ube ngumuntu okwaziyo ukuzisungulela izinto, ukwazi futhi nokuzimaketha. Amakhono amahle kwezamabhizinisi nawo angakusiza.
“Kulo msebenzi kuyasiza ukuba nekhono. Kufanele-nje uzimisele,” kusho kweluleka uRolando.
Imali ongayihola
Imali yehluka kakhulu. Ongumsiki wama-pattern angathola cishe phakathi kukaR3 500 noR4 500 ngenyanga.
Oyi-junior designer angaqala phakathi kukaR5 000 noR6 000 ngenyanga kukhuphuke kuye kufike phakathi kukaR12 000 noR25 000 kwi-designer enesipiliyoni,
i-merchandiser noma i-buyer. [z]

NJENGOBA ukuphela konyaka sekusemome, kuhle ubheke emumva uziseshe. Hlehla njengenkunzi
uyothatha amandla okuqhubekela phambili.
Bafowethu nodadewethu, ngiyazi ukuthi abanye benu kumanje bazongena esigabeni sokukhula, mhlawumbe kumanje bayaqala esikoleni samabanga aphakeme.
Akusho lutho ukuthi ulaphi, wenzani nokuthi uneminyaka emingaki. Luselude ukhalo ngaphambi kokuqeda ukufunda nangaphambi kokuqala impilo.
Kokuhlosile - mhlawumbe uzimisele ngokwenza ngcono esikoleni, ngokuba nemali ucebe noma ngokushada ube nezingane? Noma uzimisele ngokudlalela iBafana noma ukuba ngumculi? Ngisho ngabe iphupho lakho lincane noma likhulu kangakanani, kodwa indlela yokulifeza yinye. Isihlabani somdlali webhola nowemidlalo yeshashalazi, umuntu onemali, nengane yesikole ephasa kahle - bonke bafinyelela lapho bekhona ngendlela efanayo. Awudingi ukukhalipha okwedlulele ukuze ufinyelele lapho nabo bekhona. Nakhu okufanele ukwenze...
Qhakambisa izifiso namaphupho akho ukubhale phansi.
Lokhu kucacile, kodwa bangaki abakwenzayo? Ukubhala phansi ngozimisele ukuphumelela kukho, wuphawu lokuqala olukhomba ukuthi uzofinyelela kanjani lapho.
Lokhu futhi kuzokwenza amaphupho akho abukeke eyiwo, ngaleyo ndlela, kube lula ukubambelela kuwona. Kuzame lokhu uzobona.
Zibuze uziphendule
Endleleni yakho yempumelelo, baningi ozohlangana nabo abangeke bakukhuthaze. Abanye babo bazokuhleka ngokuzinikela kwakho kokwenzayo. Ngakhoke ungadikibaliswa yibona. Bhukula ubambelele ezinhlosweni zakho ozibhale phansi.
Zibuze ukuthi ngabe lokhu okufunayo yikho uqobo? Noma ukukhethe ngoba ukhohlisa abantu?
Ngabe ufuna ukuba ngummeli ngempela - noma udokotela - noma ukwenza lokhu ohlale ukubona kwiTV ukuthande?
Ufuna ukwehlisa isisindo somzimba ukuze uzizwe uphatheke kahle - noma ngoba mhlawumbe isoka lakho likwesabisa ngokukushiya?
Usuke uzichithela isikhathi sakho uma ungazibekeli imigomo ezokwenza ukuba ukhuthazeke.
Qhuba ngokwezinhlelo zakho.
Ukuthi ufuna ukwehlisa isisindo somzimba noma uzimisele ngokuba nemali, lawo akusiwo amaphupho. Lezi yizifiso. Izifiso ziba amaphupho uma wenza uhlelo ozoqhuba ngalo ukuze uphumelele. Lolo hlelo lunamaphupho abalulekile. Esikhundleni sokuthi uthi ufuna ukuba mncane ngomzimba, ithi ngizokwehla ngo-10kg ngoFebruary 1, 2009. Lokhu yinto ezwakalayo enika umqondo.
Okulandelayo, bhala izinto odinga ukuzenza ngokulandelana kwazo ukuze uphumelele kuleyo nhloso yakho. Ngale ndlela ngeke nakancane uphambuke emigomweni yakho.
Kwenze kube lula.
Njengamanje usunezinhlelo zokuphumelela ezinhlosweni zesikhathi eside, nasezindleleni ozofinyelela ngazo kuleyo mpumelelo.
Ukuphumelela kuncike ekubekezeleni nasekusebenzeni kanzima.
"Uma inhloso yephupho lakho inkulu, kuvamile ukuba kungabi lula ukuphumelela nokuyinto ebuhlungu," kusho omunye wochwepheshe bezengqondo.
Akulula ukugibela iladi elingenazo ezinye izitebhisi. Uma uhlanganisa ndawonye lezo zitebhisi ezikhona, kulula ukufinyelela phezulu.
Amaphupho anamuhla kufanele uwasusele kulawo amakhulu.
Qala ngokubalulekile.
Ngawo wonke lawa maphupho, kufanele ubone ukuthi yikuphi okufanele uqale ngako. Lokhu kuyakusiza ukuba ugweme ukubamba izinto eziningi ngesikhathi esisodwa, kukusize ukuba ugxile kokubalulekile kuqala.
Zihlole
Njengezivivinyo zasesikoleni (noma enyuvesi), lezi yizindlela zokuhlola ukuthi uqhuba kanjani - ngakhoke udinga ukulokhu uzihlola njalo ukuthi uyakwazi yini ukwenza amaphupho akho afezeke.
Uma ungaphumelelanga kufanele uvuke uzithathe uqine. Bhukulela ukwenza ngcono ngesikhathi esizayo, usebenze kakhulu kunakuqala. Chitha amahora amaningi phambi kweTV kunakuqala.
Khumbula, ukungaphumeleli akusho ukuthi uyisahluleki. Akusikho ukuzama okukwenza ube yisahluleki.
Azi okuningi.
Izinhloso namaphupho akho kuzoshintsha ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Kuhlele ngendlela ezokhombisa ukukhula ngokomqondo. Ongasenalo uthando kukho, kushiye.
Zethembe
Gxila emaphusheni ozimisele ukuwafeza, nendlela ozowenza ngayo. Ngabe lokhu kusho ukuthini?
Okokuqala, uma ungakwazi ukukhahlela ibhola, mancane amathuba okuphumelela kulo mdlalo. Uma ibhola libalulekile kuwena, funda kuqala ukulidlala kahle.
Okwesibili, lezi zindlela zizokusiza kozimisele ngakho.[z]

U-Henry Cele ungumqemane kanti uphezu kwamalungiselelo okudlala komunye umdlalo...
UGOGO owayelima ensimini endaweni esogwini oluKwaZulu-Natal wethuswa yisililo somzukulu wakhe owayenamasonto ayisithupha ezelwe. Wacabanga ukuthi kwakungenzeka ukuthi wayeselambile efuna ukudla.
Kwathi uma ingane ikhala ingathuli, ugogo waya ekhaya eyobheka ukuthi ngabe kwenzenjani.
Wathola umzukulu wakhe ngaphansi kwesihlahla sikagwava. Wazibuza ukuthi ngabe indodakazi yakhe ikuphi"
UGogo wathatha umzukulu wambeletha kodwa lutho ukubonakala umama wengane. Kwagcina kubonakele ukuthi ngeke esabuya.
Lowo mfana kwakunguHenry Cele - kanti wakhula engabazi abazali bakhe.
Akazi ukuthi wazalwa nini kanti ngokukagogo wakhe wazalwa ngesikhathi sempi yamaZulu namaNdiya ngo-1949.
Ukulahlwa kwakhe abazali kungenzeka ukuthi kwaba nomthelela ekudumeni kwakhe njengoShaka ekubeni engahlobene nomndeni wasebukhosini baKwaZulu. Uma abalandeli bakhe bembingelela ezitaladini zaKwa-Mashu lapho ehlala khona bathi, "Sawubona Shaka!"
UHENRY CELE usedlale indawo yeNkosi uShaka kaningana kusukela aduma edlala ochungeni lweSABC TV oluthi Shaka Zulu. Ngaleso sikhathi wayesevele ezakhele igama njengomdlali webhola oqavile owayedume ngoBlack Cat Cele.
Emva kweminyaka ezisebenzela namaqembu entsha ebhola, manje ungomunye walabo abaqokwe yiHhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal ukuze baphucule umdlalo webhola ezindaweni ezisemaphandleni ingakaqali imidlalo ka-2010.
"Kuboshelwe thina zinkunzi ezaziwayo!"
Umzimba wakhe usesimweni esihle kanti uzilolonga ngokuzimisela njengamadoda angaphansi kwakhe ngeminyaka. Lokho uzokubona uma esedlala eThekwini naseGoli njengoShaka kwiBayede Shaka!
UKUSEBENZISA kukagogo wakhe imithi kwenza ukuba abantu bamnuke bathi ungumthakathi kanti ngenxa yalokho ugogo wabaleka nomzukulu balibhekisa eSydenham, ngaseBerea eThekwini.
"Wasebenzela umndeni wamaNdiya kanti sasihlala endaweni eyayingaphansi kuleli khaya. Kwakuhlala kumnyama endlini emini nasebusuku. Ngangisemncane kodwa ngangikwazi ukuma ngiqonde ngaphakathi endlini."
Kwathi uma ugogo wakhe esephelelwa amandla okusebenza, baxoshwa kuleli khaya. Ugogo kaHenry washona uHenry eneminyaka engu-12. Wayefunda uStandard 2 ezimisele ngokuqhubeka afunde.
Wakhombisa ukuba nethalente emdlalweni webhola edlala eqenjini labasebancane kuSomtseu Road eThekwini.
"Kwangikhanyela ngaleso sikhathi ukuthi umngani wami omkhulu kufanele kube ngubuchopho bami ngafunda ngaze ngafika kuStandard 6."
U-Henry waqhubeka wabekezela wafunda ngeposi waze wafika kuStandard 8. Kwaba yisifiso sakhe ukufundisa izingane zakhe kanti indodana yakhe isingumcwaningi-mabhuku ofunde wagogoda, indodakazi ingu-land surveyor kanti enye inebhizinisi layo lokupheka.
KODWA kukhona okunye okubuhlungu ngempilo kaHenry. "Indodana yami angiyiboni kalula kanti indodakazi yami encane isanda kuqala ukungivakashela," kuchaza uHenry.
"Ngesikhathi siqala ukubonana ngangigcine ukuyibona isencane. Kodwa kwasheshe kwangikhanyela ukuthi yigazi lami leli.
"Ufana nami,' Amagama engawasho kuyona lawo, 'kodwa wena umuhle.' Yangidabukela ngoba ngangihlala ngedwa kodwa ngathi kuyona, 'Ngiyazi ukuthi ungithanda ngenhliziyo yakho yonke. Sobabili siyazi ukuthi uyohlale uyindodakazi yami.'"
U-Henry unentombi kanti uthi uyangabaza ukuphinda ashade njengoba esedivose kabili.
Unkosikazi wakhe wesibili wafaka isehlukaniso yena engekho eyodlala efilimini eNamibia.
Izingane zabo zabuyela ngakumama wazo uHenry wasala nesitolo ayesakhele unkosikazi wakhe ekhaya.
"Abazali bami bahlukana ngisemncane kakhulu ngakhula ngaphandle kwabo. Ngangingafuni ukuthi lokho kwenzeke ezinganeni zami."
"Umhlaba ugcwele umona kanti kufanele siqaphele. Ngingumuntu odumile nogqamayo esixukwini ngenxa yobude bami. Abangani bami abahlali nami. Ungathi ngazalwa nokuthile okuthe xaxa. Lokho kuthanda ukuba ngumthwalo onzima kimina."
ABANTU abathembekile kuyena ngabalandeli bakhe. Kusukela ezinsukwini lapho ayesadlala khona ibhola edume ngelikaBlack Cat Cele kuze kube yimanje lapho esebizwa khona ngeleNkosi uShaka, abalandeli bakhe abakhohlwa wukumbingelela, bamlandele bamenze azizwe ethandwa.
Kungenzeka ukuthi mhlawumbe sasingeke senzeke isigameko esamehlela eGoli ukuba wayengadumile.
"NgangiseGoli ngesikhathi uKansas City owayenguDJ exhumana nami ekuRadio Zulu ethi: 'Abasesibhedlela saseMurchison bazama ukuxhumana nawe. Kukhona indoda egulela ukufa kuleso sibhedlela ethi ingubaba wakho kanti akekho umuntu ongayingcwaba ingakafiki indodana yayo eyayithola emshadweni ukuze iyikhulule.'
"Angizange ngikukholwe lokho. Kodwa leyo ndawo yayiseduze kwalapho ugogo ayehlala khona... Kwadingeka ukuba ngiluthathe lolo hambo.
"Ngafika eseshonile kodwa kwangikhanyela ukuthi kwakungubaba ngempela. Kwaba sengathi ngibuka isithombe sami.
"Wayeselale esibhedlela isikhathi esingangenyanga."
"Ngesikhathi ngifihla ubaba ngamtshela ukuthi siyohlangana kwelizayo." [z]
Izimfihlo zikaShaka Zulu mayelana nemali
U-Henry wadlala ibhola ngesikhathi abadlali bebhola beqala ukuba bakhokhelwe eSA kanti usakhumbula ngesikhathi ecelwa ukuba adlalele amaqembu amakhulu ezohola u-R5 ngesonto.
"Lokho kwangenza ngazizwa ngingumuntu ocebe kakhulu. Kodwa ngaleso sikhathi izinto zazibiza kahle impilo ilula kunalokhu eyikho."
Ngesikhathi eqala ukudlala indawo kaShaka, waholelwa uR25 000 ngokudlala kulolo chunge. Njengoba ayeseyimfunda kulo msebenzi akakwazanga ukuthola isabelo enzuzweni eyayenziwa yilo mdlalo. Kodwa wathola isifundo ngokushesha wayiphatha kahle imali ayeyithola.
"Ngathola ukuthi izimpahla zokugqoka ezinhle engangizibona zigqokwe abantu ababedlala kwiTV zazithathwa egumbini elalihlala izingubo! Labo engangibahlonipha babehlala ezindlini ezazinamagumbi amane noma emijondolo. Babengenayo into ephathekayo.
"Ngathola isifundo sokuthi akufanele ngisaphaze imali ngethemba lokuthi ngisazothola enye.
"Ngayonga ngayibeka ngagcina sengithola imadlana engcono ngokudlala kuma-movie amancane kunaleyo engangiyithola kuShaka Zulu."

Ukuphuza emsebenzini
INKINGA: Njengemenenja emsebenzini, kuye kudingeke ukuba ngibhekane nabasebenzi abatholakala bephuzile. Umqondisi wenkampani uye athi mabaxoshwe kodwa mina angihambisani nalokho. Ngenzenjani-
ISELULEKO SOFEZELA:
Ngokukhipha isinqumo sokuba kuxoshwe umqashwa, umqondisi wephula iBasic Conditions Of Employment Act (BCEA) neLabour Relations Act. Imininingwane mayelana necala elenziwe ngumqashwa kumele iphenywe kahle, kubhalwe incwadi emethwesa icala anikwe nenothisi yokuba eze ecaleni lokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe.
Kumele kwenziwe uphenyo oluqondile futhi lwenziwe umuntu onolwazi ngokuqulwa kwamacala ozothola nokuthi umqashwa wayephuze ngempela yini.
Lokhu kudinga umuntu ozohlolisisa kabanzi ukuthi umuntu okusuke kuthiwe ufike emsebenzini edakiwe ubebuphuze nini lobo tshwala.
Kungenzeka umqashwa afike emsebenzini enuka utshwala kodwa ebe engazange abuphuze ngalelo langa, noma kube wukuthi utshwala abuphuzile bebungeqile ku-0.05% oyisikalo esigunyaziwe umuntu angasiphuza. Umuntu ophenya udaba olunjengalolu kumele athole nokuthi isimo umqashwa atholakale ekusona besingawuthikameza yini umsebenzi awenzayo.
Kumele kubhekwe isimo somqashwa sisonke - ngabe unuka utshwala- Ngabe ukhuluma into engaqondile- Uma konke lokhu kungacaci kahle, umqashwa usengahlolwa igazi noma kuhogelwe iphunga lakhe kodwa uma evuma ukuba kwenziwe lokho futhi kube khona nomuntu ozoba wufakazi.
Uma kungukuthi umqashwa wavuma esivumelwaneni sakhe sokuqashwa ukuthi lezi zinto zingahlolwa, ngeke akwazi ukwenqaba. Uma kwenzeka enqaba, akufanele ukuba aphoqwe.
Kumele kwenziwe okufanayo futhi uma kusolwa ukuthi umqashwa usebenzise izidakamizwa. Uma umqashwa enza umsebenzi wasengadini, icala lakhe lisingathwa ngendlela efanayo nelomuntu oshayela i-forklift.
Kufanele kuqoqwe izitatimende zofakazi eziqondile umqashwa aqondiswe izigwegwe. [z]
Senze yonke imizamo yokuqiniseka ukuthi isiyalo enisitholayo siyiso. Kodwa konke okuthinta lolo hlobo lwecala kudinga ukucubungulisiswa, ngakhoke aboPhiko loFezela iScorpion Legal Protection (Pty) Ltd, abethimba elimele ukucubungula amacala nabakwaBONA nabashicileli bephephabhuku labo, ngeke babekwe icala ngokulahlekelwa kwaloyo oyosebenzisa lesi siyalo ngenye indlela.

Bafika ekuseni ngovivi bavule opulasitiki abamnyama bokufaka izibi. Obani laba? Baphila kanjani? Kwenziwa yini ukuthi baphile impilo enje? UBONA uvakashele abaseSA abaphila "ngezibi..." Indaba nguDon Makatile, izithombe nguMatia Komako
NJALO ekuseni ngoMsombuluko abantu abahlala eMindalore, indawo yabadla izambane likapondo esentshonalanga yeGoli bakhipha imigqomo yabo yezibi ukuze iqoqwe amaloli kamasipala aqoqa izibi.
Kodwa kuyaye kuthi lapho ingakathuthwa le migqomo, kubonakale amadoda nabesimame, kokunye basuke behamba nezingane zabo, bevula imigqomo befuna okulahliwe abangakusebenzisa.
Yinto esesiyijwayele eSA lena ngosuku lokuthuthwa kwezibi. Abanye basitshela ukuthi kuyenzeka bathole nezingubo. Bathola namabhodlela kabhiya angenalutho abangawadayisa - abiza 50c lilinye ebhodlela-sitolo.
Kodwa abakugada kakhulu yizinsimbi ezingasasebenzi - ungathola imali enhle ngazo uma uzidayisela labo abasebenzisa izinsimbi. UNomakhaya Mbulaleko waqala ukuphila le mpilo emva kokudilizwa emsebenzini ngenxa yobuthaka bempilo yakhe.
Kwadingeka ukuba ancenge abomndeni wakhe ekhaya e-Elliotdale ukuba bathathe izingane zakhe ezine kweziyisithupha bamkhulisele zona. Izingane zakhe ezimbili ahlala nazo emjondolo eSoul City ziyafunda kanti uNomakhaya uchitha cishe usuku lonke ebheka izibi emadolobheni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane zakhe ziyaya esikoleni.
"Ngibheka izimpahla isonto lonke ngizidayise ngoMgqibelo," kuchaza yena. "Ngenza lokhu ukuze izingane zami zilale zidlile."
Amanani ezimpahla zakhe uwazi kahle - i-kilogram lamabhodlela epulasitiki angamalitha amabili angenalutho ulidayisa u-60c, isisindo esifanayo samakani eziphuzo namabhodlela obisi akudayise u-50c.
"Ngiyayithola impuphu namakhandlela njengoba indawo esihlala kuyona ingenagesi."
Kuyenzeka athole amatoho, kodwa ubuthaka bempilo yakhe buyamthikameza. I-ID yakhe wayithola emva kwesikhathi afaka isicelo sayo.
Yafika igama lakhe lingabhaliwe kahle kodwa uthi ngeke ayishintshe. "Kungenzeka ngiphuze ukuyithola," kusho yena.
Enye yezindawo ezintsha ebatholisa inzuzo yindawo yaseSaratoga eseMindalore.
Iphunga alisamhluphi. Eliqandula ikhanda namuhla elenhlanzi ebolile. Akufunayo yizinto angazidayisa kanti uzilayisha ebhaleni aliphiwa yinsizwa yaseDutywa.
U-ISAAC MOKOENA uneminyaka engu-38 kanti kufanele ukuba ngabe wenza umsebenzi ongcono angaziphilisa ngawo kodwa ukuhlushwa kwakhe yisifuba kwenza ukuba angawutholi umsebenzi.
Kodwa ufunga uyagomela ukuthi ngeke ahambe ecela kubantu.
Kwezinye izindawo izibi zikhishwa ngeMisombuluko, kwezinye zikhishwe ngoLwezibili, ngoLwezithathu noma ngoLwezine. "Okusho ukuthi kuphela izinsuku ezine ngifuna izibi," kusho yena.
"Kokunye ngiyawuthola u-R30. Ngiyaluthola ubisi nobhanana, ukudla odokotela abathi kufanele ngikudle."
Uhamba ibanga lika-10km esuka eKagiso, afike izibi zingakathathwa abanye abantu noma amaloli.
Wayeseqoqe amakesi amabili amabhodlela kabhiya ngesikhathi abakwaBONA bexoxisana naye!
"Ngizothenga insipho yokugeza namuhla," kusho yena ngentokozo.
Abambisene naye kulo msebenzi nguBoesman Mmega oneminyaka engu-65, othi ulinde ukuthola imali yakhe yempesheni aseyibhalisele. "Lokhu kungcono kakhulu kunokungatholi lutho. Kuyalixosha ikati eziko," kusho yena ephawula ngomsebenzi wabo wokufuna izibi.
UMmega ufunga uyagomela uthi ngeke antshontshe.
UVusi Dlamini ubalwa "kwabadla kahle" kuleli bhizinisi. Uyawenza u-R150 ngokusho kwakhe. "Ngifuna izinsimbi kuphela."
"Kusasa ngizobe ngikwenye indawo."
KULO msebenzi kumqoka ukuba nebhala. Kodwa u-Abram Ditsi oneminyaka engu-34, okhubazekile, usebenzisa inqola yasesuphamakethe.
"Ngenza phakathi kuka-R30 no-R60 ngosuku," kusho yena.
Isandla sakhe sangakwesokudla sanqamuka ngesikhathi kuqhuma into ethile ebheka angakudayisa lapho kulahlwa khona izibi ngo-1988.
Kubantu abanjengo-Ohaletse Bakgethi, obamba amatoho, izibi zenze ukuba agqokise ingane yakhe nabashana bakhe.
"Ngivame ukuthola izingubo ezinhle," kusho yena. "Zidinga ukuwashwa noku-ayinwa kuphela."
USombi Ndlovu (35) washonelwa umyeni wakhe wamshiya nezingane ezintathu. Usizwa yilo msebenzi ukuze anakekele umndeni wakhe.

Umsebenzi oba- lulekile
UMSEBENZI womuntu ongu-plumber ngobalulekile kanti ubandakanya ukufakelwa nokulungiswa kwamapayipi, amathange amanzi nokunye okuningi okusiza ekugcineni nasekuphakeleni umphakathi amanzi. Labo abango-plumber bangazithola sebenza imisebenzi efana nokufakela ama-jacuzzi aphambili kuya ekufakeleni amapayipi ezindlu zomphakathi.
Umsebenzi omuhle - wanoma ngubani
Umsebenzi aqala wawukhetha uNomusa Shezi owobuthishela. Emva kokuqeqeshelwa wona, akubanga lula ukuthola isikhala sokufundisa. Izifundo ayegxile kuzo isiNgisi neBiology.
"Zazingekho izikhala zokufundisa kodwa imali ngiyidinga. Ngabona ukuthi kufanele ngizisungulele ibhizinisi lami. Ngaleyo ndlela ngavakashela abezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi eMkhandlwini weTheku ngiyofuna izeluleko.
"Ngangingafuni ukwenza into eyenziwa abantu bonke, ngaleyo ndlela ngenza ucwaningo ngathola ukuthi kunesidingo esikhulu sabantu abango-plumber - futhi bengekho abesimame abango-plumber.
"Ekhaya ngakhula nodadewethu abathathu nomfowethu oyedwa. Ubaba wayevame ukuthi, 'awukho umsebenzi wabafana nowamantombazana - wonke umuntu kufanele asebenze.'"
"Ngasuka ngaqonda kumuntu ongu-plumber owufundele lo msebenzi ngamcela ukuba angivumele ngimsize ngaphandle kwenkokhelo ukuze ngifunde umsebenzi. Ngempela wangivumela.
"Ngawufunda kwathi emva kwalokho ngahamba ngayoqeqeshwa ekolishi eThekwini. Emva kokuphumelela ngenza i-industry trade test ngakwazi ukusebenza njengo-plumber oqeqeshiwe."
Uzenzela imali
Ngo-2001 uNomusa wasungula ibhizinisi lakhe.
Inkampani yakhe wayiqamba ngokuthi yiMasisizaneni. Ekuqaleni wayesiza umphakathi wangakubo ngemali ephansi ewukhangisa lo msebenzi ngokuba abhale izikhangiso azichome khona emphakathini.
"Abanye abantu, ikakhulu besilisa babemangala ukubona owesimame ongu-plumber," kusho uNomusa ehleka. "Babethi: 'Ngabe uyakwazi ngempela ukwenza lo msebenzi"'"
Ithuba elihle likaNomusa lamqhamukela ngesikhathi ethola umsebenzi wekontileka ngaphansi kwabeMetro Water.
"Kwakudingeka ukuba ngiqashe i-bakkie ukuze ngikwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wami. Ngo-2003 ngathenga eyami iveni." Kumanje useqashe ababili abamsizayo.
Imisebenzi yakhe yehlukahlukene - kusukela ekukhandeni amapayipi ompompi abavuzayo kuye ekufakeleni amamitha nasekumbeni imigwaqo kulungiselelwa ukufaka amapayipi amasha.
"Ngingathanda ukwenza umsebenzi wokuba wu-plumber ngiwenzele uhlelo lomsebenzi olukhulu lokwakhiwa kwezindlu," kusho yena.
Amathuba
"Sikhulu kakhulu isidingo salabo abango-plumber abaqeqeshiwe eSouth Africa," kusho uJohn Mitchell ongumqondisi noyisikhulu se-trade test ngaphansi kwabe-Inala Training And Development eThekwini.
"Umuntu ongu-plumber oqeqeshiwe angazikhethela ukwenza lo msebenzi esiza umphakathi noma awenze ezimbonini zemisebenzi noma abe ngumuntu oqashelwe ukulungisa lapho konakele khona.
"Iningi liqashwa ngokushesha emva kokwenza i-trade test kanti abanye baba nenhlanhla yokuyosebenza phesheya."
Izidingo eziphuthumayo kulo msebenzi, yimoto eyiveni, amathuluzi nomuntu ozokusiza.
Kufanele ube ngumuntu onjani
Kudingeka...
lUkuthokozele ukusebenza ngezandla;
lUngawenqeni umsebenzi onzima njengokumba imisele yamapayipi;
lUngabi nendaba nokungcola, ngisho nokusebenza emathoyilethi imbala;
lUzimisele ngokuhamba uyosebenza ngaphandle, ngaphansi kwanoma esinjani isimo sezulu;
lUbe ngumuntu okwaziyo ukuzicabangela azisungulele izinto;
lUbe nosizo olusezingeni lochwepheshe.
Ongakuhola
Ukuhola kwehlukene. Uma uzobiza ngehora, ungaqala mhlawumbe ku-R12 lapho usawufundela umsebenzi kuya ku-R50 ngokuthola isipiliyoni. O-plumber abaqeqeshwe ngokugcwele abaziqhubela awabo amabhizinisi bangabiza noma yimalini kusukela ku-R150 kuya ngaphezu kuka-R300 ngehora nokuncika endaweni noma embonini abasebenzela kuyona.
Ukuqeqeshwa
Uhlelo lokuqeqeshelwa lo msebenzi lusingathwe ngabe-Construction Industry Education And Training Authority (CETA) kulabo abafuna ukwenza lo msebenzi.
tStage 1. Ukufundela lo msebenzi e-technical college egunyazelwe lo msebenzi ukuze uthole isitifiketi se-N2 kwi-building science and plumbing theory.
tStage 2. Ukuqedela izifundo ze-46 Practical Plumbing Training modules ekolishi eligunyaziwe. Lokhu kungathatha cishe amasonto angu-12.
tStage 3. Isikhathi esisukela ezinyangeni ezingu-18 uwenza lo msebenzi uqeqeshwa.
Konke lokhu yizona zinto eziyisidingo ukuze ukwazi ukwenza i-industry trade test.[z]

GETTING INVOLVED
Njengoba izibalo zeziphathimandla zikhomba ukuthi liyehla izinga lobugebengu, iningi labantu baseMzansi aliboni kanjalo - abantu abasazihluphi ngokubika ngobugebengu ngoba bakholwa wukuthi amaphoyisa ngeke abasize ngalutho. Kodwa ikhona indlela esingalwa nabo ngayo futhi sinqobe... indaba NguGAVIN FOSTER
UBUGEBENGU bulibulele leli lizwe, kodwa singakwazi ukuyinqoba le nkinga uma abantu abanjengami nawe bebambisana ekulweni nayo. Izinhlaka zababhekele ukuphepha kwezakhamuzi endaweni (neighbourhood watches), ama-community policing forums nama-community safety forums zingasebenza ngokubambisana ekwenzeni ukuba impilo yezigebengu ibe nzima zikhuthaze namaphoyisa okufanele ukuba avikele abantu.
Uma kukhulunywa ngabaqaphi bendawo kusuke kuvumelene abantu abahlala endaweni ngokuthi akuqaphelwe abantu ababukeka besolisa. Baxhumana bodwa babuye bathinte namaphoyisa, amavolontiya enza lo msebenzi aphume umkhankaso wokuhlola izitaladi kusihlwa ukuze izinswelaboya zingazenzeli umathanda.
Uma kukhona oya eholidini, omakhelwane bamgadela umuzi wakhe umphakathi ugade nezimoto ezisolisayo ezilokhu zibonakala zizulazula endaweni, kuthathwe nama-number plates azo, lolo lwazi ludluliselwe nakwabanye.
Uma bebamba izigebengu, mabazidlulisele emaphoyiseni zijeziswe ngendlela efanele - mabangaziphatheli umthetho.
AmaCommunity Policing Forums (CPF) yizinhlaka ezinamandla athe xaxa kunababheki bendawo kanti uyancomeka umsebenzi awenza ezindaweni ezinjengaseWestern Cape.
AmaCPF, okufanele ngokomthetho axhaswe yileso naleso siteshi samaphoyisa, anekomiti elakhiwe amalungu omphakathi, amaqembu ezenkolo, amaqembu entsha, amaqembu ezemidlalo, yizinhlangano zamatekisi, amakhansela nosomabhizinisi abasebenza bebambisene nesiteshi samaphoyisa neziphathimandla ezisebenza kuleso siteshi.
I-CPF ihlangana kanye ngenyanga ibonisane ngokwenzeka endaweni.
Kudingidwa izihloko ezithinta ubugebengu nezinto ezibhebhezela ubugebengu njengokungakhanyi kukagesi emigwaqweni namashibhi angekho emthethweni kwenziwe nezincomo ukuze kuqedwe izinkinga.
Okuhle kakhulu ngeCPF wukuthi ibheka ngisho nokusebenza kwamaphoyisa uma kunemihlangano, kutshelwe iziphathimandla uma amaphoyisa engaziphethe kahle, engawenzi kahle umsebenzi noma engawugcini umthetho.
I-CPF ivame ukumela bonke abaqaphi bendawo abasebenza nesiteshi samaphoyisa ababambisene naso.
I-Community Safety Forum (CSF) wuhlaka olusanda kwethulwa olusebenzela endaweni ebanzi kuneCPF - ingasebenza endaweni esizwa yiziteshi zamaphoyisa ezinhlanu kuye kweziyisithupha kanti igxila kakhulu ekulweni nobugebengu.
NgoMay ngonyaka odlule, uCharles Nqakula onguNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha nokuVikela wathi izinhlangano ezintsha zizosebenzela ezindaweni ezisabalele kunabaqaphi bendawo namaCPF.
Zizosebenza neminyango kahulumeni njengowezaseKhaya ukuze kuqashelwe izifika-namthwalo ezingena kuleli ngokungemthetho, basize abezokwaKhiwa kweziMilo ohlelweni lokufakwa kweziboshwa eziphuma emajele emphakathini, basebenze noMnyango wezobuLungiswa ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi umphakathi uyawazi futhi uyawaqonda amalungelo awo.
Kukhona okubuye kulubhedise lolu hlelo. Maningi amaphoyisa akhohlakele angawenzi kahle umsebenzi wawo kodwa angaphansi kwalolu hlelo. Uma engabambisene nabantu abenza okusemandleni abo ukuthi iSA ibe yindawo engcono, ngeke itholakale imiphumela encomekayo. [z]
BONA ZULU July 2008
Ukuqala
Xhumana nesiteshi samaphoyisa esiseduze uthole ukuthi kulezi zinhlaka esizibalile lukhona yini asebenalo (ukuze ungachithi isikhathi sakho usebenzele phezu kwento evele isikhona). Uma lukhona, thola izinombolo zocingo ubathinte ucele ukuba yingxenye yalo.
Qala ngeCommunity Safety Forum uye kwiCPF nabaqaphi bendawo, ngaleyo ndlela uzothola ukwesekwa ukhomishana weSAPS noMnyango wezaseKhaya neminye iminyango kahulumeni. UNgqongqoshe uNqakula wakhipha nesethembiso sokuthi amaCommunity Safety Forums aziwayo azoxhaswa ngemali ukuze abe namahhovisi awo. Buza ngalokhu ubahluphe uma ungalutholi usizo.
Khetha abantu abafanele ozobabeka ezikhundleni. Qoka abantu abanolwazi ngalo msebenzi kunokuthola okusazodingeka ukuba ubaqeqeshe. Uma ufuna amaphoyisa ozosebenzisana nawo, xhumana nalusizo anesikhathi enza lo msebenzi.
Ningakuvumeli ukuphelelwa wumdlandla uma seniqalile ukusebenza. Abantu bavame ukuqala izinto ngomdlandla bagcine sebekhathele.
Uma isiteshi samaphoyisa enisebenzisana naso singabambisene nani, xhumanani noMnyango wokuPhepha koMphakathi nokuXhumana ozonisiza ukuze izinto zenzeke . Bhalelani abaphethe kwiSAPS nibhalele nasemaphepheni uma nibona ukuthi imizamo yenu ayishaywa mkhuba. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uma amaphoyisa ebambisene kahle nani, watsheleni nincome ningawafihleli.
