UKUDAYA izinwele kungaba yingozi... Kuphuma izinyo njalo uma ukhulelwe...Uphathwa yisilungulelo... Sesifikile isikhathi sokwazi okuliqiniso nokungamanga ngokukhulelwa...
" Ukudaya izinwele kungaba yingozi.
IQINISO! Ucwaningo lososayensi lukhomba ukuthi ukudaya izinwele ikakhulu uma unezinyanga ezintathu ukhulelwe kungaba yingozi.
Lokhu kwenzeka uma udayi ufakwe wangena esikhumbeni. Isikhumba simunca amakhemikhali akudayi angene egazini lakho. Lawo makhemikhali adlulela enganeni.
Uma udaya izinwele, sebenzisa udayi emva kwezinyanga ezintathu ukhulelwe udaye nge-vegetable dye engenawo amakhemikhali.
" Ukudla okuphuzi nokusawolintshi kungenza ingane izalwe ine-jaundice
AMANGA! Ukuba phuzi kwesikhumba sengane akudalwa wukudla okudla ukhulelwe.
Lowo mbala usuke usegazini lengane. Wenziwa wukuphela kwama-cells amadala kodwa isibindi sisiza ngokuwuqeda lowo mbala. Uma ukhulelwe, yisibindi sakho esenza lo msebenzi enganeni.
Uma ingane izalwa, kungathatha isikhathi ukuthi isibindi sayo siwenze ngendlela efanele umsebenzi. Kungenzeka kubonakale umbala ophuzi esikhumbeni sengane emva kwezinsuku ezimbili izelwe noma osukwini lwesihlanu uma ingane izalwe kungakabi yisikhathi.
I-jaundice ayinabungozi kodwa kudingeka ukuba uye kudokotela ngoba uma imandla kakhulu angakusiza yelashwe.
Akuvamile ukuthi kuze kudingeke ukuba yelashwe kanti okusemqoka wukuyincelisa ibele njalo ingane ukuze ibe namanzi anele emzimbeni.
Kuthatha amasonto amabili ukuthi i-jaundice iphele enganeni ezalwe ngesikhathi sayo kanti kwezalwe ngaphambi kwesikhathi kuthatha izinyanga ezimbili. Isibhedlela singasebenzisa indlela yokwelapha ebizwa nge-phototherapy lapho ingane ibekwa khona endaweni ekhanyisiwe ukuze umbala ophuzi egazini layo uphumele emchamweni.
" Kuphuma izinyo njalo uma ukhulelwe
IQINISO! Kusemqoka ukunakekela amazinyo ngesikhathi ukhulelwe ngoba ama-hormones angenza izinsini zakho ziphathwe yizifo ezinjenge-gingivitis kalula. Ungahlushwa amazinyo uma unalezo zifo agcine esephumile.
Waphathe kahle amazinyo akho: yengeza i-calcium ekudleni kwakho udle i-yogurt noshizi. Xubha amazinyo uwahlanze ngentambo yawo okungenani kabili ngosuku.
"Uphathwa yisilungulelo uma ingane inezinwele
AMANGA! Ngokwezempilo, isilungulelo sichazwa njengokushisa okuba kwi-oesophagus okudalwa yi-acid esesiswini esuke ingene emphinjeni.
Uma ukhulelwe isilungulelo siba mandla kakhulu ngoba ingane ithatha indawo eningi esiswini i-hormone yokukhulelwa ebizwa nge-progesterone yenze ukuba i-valve ephakathi kwesisu ne-oesophogus ingasebenzi kahle. Ngaleyo ndlela kuba lula ukuba i-acid esesiswini iye emphinjeni.
Ukudambisa isilungulelo: cela usokhemisi wakho akunike ibhodlela leGaviscon, umuthi wesilungulelo ongawuthenga ophephile kwabakhulelwe.
Okunye, gwema ukudla kakhulu noma ukulala emva kokudla.
"Isikhumba sakho siba sihle uma ukhulelwe
AMANGA! Okwenzeka komama abakhulelwe akufani.Kungenzeka isikhumba sakho sishintshe ngenxa yoguquko kuma-hormones. Abanye omama baba nezinduna uma bekhulelwe kanti ziphela uma sebebelethile. Kungenzeka ube nama-stretchmarks isikhumba sibabe, kanti abanye omama ababi nankinga uma bekhulelwe.
Siza isikhumba sakho: phuza amanzi kakhulu usebenzise isiswakamisi ebusweni nasemzimbeni.
Uma ubuso bakho bomile, izindlala ezibizwa nge-sebaceous glands ziwukhiqiza kakhulu uwoyela ovala iziqu zoboya ube nezinduna kanti uma isikhumba sakho singaswakeme ngokwanele kwesingezansi, singoma sibe nama-stretchmarks sibabe.

Kuyisibusiso ukushiya ingane nomkhulu nogogo uma umama nobaba besebenza. Kodwa ngabe uyazi ukuthi ingane ingasizakala kangakanani enkulisa"
UKUBHALISA ingane enkulisa ewenza ngendlela egculisayo umsebenzi kungadla ephaketheni kodwa ngeke uyikhalele leyo mali. Inkulisa ingayisiza ingane yakho...
1: Ithola abangani
Ziningi izifo ezingatheni ingane engazithola uma ifunda enkulisa. Kodwa enkulisa izohlangana nezingane ezizalwa emindenini ehlukahlukene. Enkulisa kuxoxwa izindaba ithole nabangani.
2: Ihloma ngekhono lokufunda
Zonke izingane ziyakudinga ukuba sekilasini ngaphambi kokuqala isikole. Ingane ngeke ilesabe ikilasi uma iqale ngokufunda enkulisa, ngeke ikuxwaye ukushayelwa imithetho nguthisha kanti izokhululeka uma inezinye izingane.
3: Amakhono okuphila
Enkulisa izingane zihloma ngekhono lokuxhumana nezinye. Zifunda ukwenza izinto ngokuzimela zifunde nokuba nozwelo kwezinye - kusemqoka kakhulu lokho!
Zibuye zifunde nokwabelana nabanye abantu zizwakalise imizwa yazo.
4: Ukunyakazisa umzimba
Iningi lezinkulisa linemidlalo elungele odado. Leyo midlalo isiza ngokwakha amakhono anjengokusebenzisa isandla neso, nokuyinto engasiza ingane ekwenzeni izinto ezinjengokufasa izicathulo.
5: Kumnandi!
Enkulisa kukhona izinto zokudlala okungenzeka ungabi nazo ekhaya. Enkulisa izingane zifunda ngokudlala kanti ayikho into eziyithokozela njengaleyo.

UKUPHATHWA yikhanda kuyinto ejwayelekile kunoma ngubani. Kodwa uthi bewazi ukuthi u-60 percent wabaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-16 uphathwa yikhanda" Izinhlungu ziyafana kwabancane nakwabadala. Kodwa ngabe le nkinga idalwa yini"
Ukukhandleka
Izingane nazo ziyakhandleka ngokwengqondo kodwa-ke izizathu ezenza lokho kuzona zihlukile kwezabadala. Ukuthuthela ekhaya elisha noma ukuqala kwesinye isikole kungazikhandla kanti okunye okungazikhandla wukudlula emhlabeni kwelungu lomndeni noma ukufa kwesilwane esifuywa ekhaya.
Uma ungumzali kubalulekile ukuba ukhulume nezingane ngokuzikhathazayo.
I-Migraine
Izingane ziyaphathwa yi-migraine. Akekho onolwazi lokuthi idalwa yini kodwa lolu hlobo lwekhanda kwabanye luba mandla kakhulu kwabanye lube kahle kanti umsindo, amalambu akhanya kakhulu nephunga kuba yimbangela yalo.
Ukugula
Ukuphathwa yikhanda kungaba wuphawu lwesinye isifo. Yi-meningitis, izifo ezihambisana namagciwane nezinye izifo okungaba yimbangela yokuphathwa yikhanda. Umuntu ophethwe yikhanda angaba nenhliziyo encane noma ashise kakhulu.
Ukuvakashela kudokotela
Izinhlungu zingaba mandla kakhulu noma zibekezeleleke. Bonana nodokotela uma ingane ihlale ikhala ngokuphathwa yikhanda.
Konke kwaqala mhla uthishanhloko wenye i-primary school ethatha isinqumo sokushintsha i-menu ye-tuck shop yesikole. Esikhundleni sikashokoledi, ama-chips, iziphuzo ezihlohlozayo nokudla okungenamsoco kwadayiswa ama-sandwich nokokubamba umoya okunempilo. Abafundi babonakala bephapheme ekilasini emva kwalokho bangakhombisa zimpawu zokukhathala.
Nawe ungakwenza lokho ekhaya. Qiniseka ukuthi ingane yakho iphatha umphako onomsoco zonke izinsuku. Ngaleyo ndlela ngeke kudingeke ukuba ithenge engakudla esikoleni.
Okunye ongakwenza wukucela kuthishanhloko ukuba kudayiswe ukudla okunempilo esikoleni.
Ukudla okungenamsoco izingane ezikudlayo kunokuningi okwengezwe kukona, kudayiwe, kunezinongo nama-preservatives. Imbangela yokuthi ukudla kwazo kube nazo zonke lezi zinto esizibalile wukuthi kusuke kwenzelwa ukuba kunambitheke izingane zikuthande. Kufanele kubuye kuhlale isikhathi eside nokuyisizathu esenza kube nama-preservatives avimbela ukubola. Ukudla kwezingane kunoshukela nosawoti owengeziwe okuyizinto ezingadingeki ezinganeni ezisakhula.
Mama, ngiphethwe yikhanda...

Udumo nokubonga
UWINNIE MASHABA nomyeni wakhe bavuka ekuseni ngovivi ngo-4:30 basuka eLimpopo balibangisa eGoli. UMam uDeborah Fraser kwakukhona lapho ayezocula khona kungekudala kodwa wazinika isikhathi salolu suku.
UNtokozo Mbambo ufika uphethwe wumkhuhlane kangangoba kufanele aphumule embhedeni, kodwa naye ufikile ukuzoxoxa nabakwaBONA.
Phezu kokuba matasa bonke laba besimame bakwazile ukubamba isikhathi sokubonana nathi kule ndawo yaseZoo Lake.
UWinnie ubukeka ezikhululekele ematekini akhe e-All-Star, eshaye isiketi esihusha phansi nejakhethi efudumele nesigqoko. UNtokozo waqhamuka efake ama-slippers antofontofo ehamba nomyeni wakhe naye oyilungu leJoyous Celebration uNqubeko Mbatha. UMam' Deborah naye wayemuhle.
Yini ngempela eyenza lezi zingqungqulu zomculo woKholo zisunduze izulu nomhlaba ukuze zibe lapha? U-August yiNyanga yabesiMame, bazimisele ngokuhlonipha abesimame abasezimpilweni zabo, abesimame baseSA nezinselelo ezibenze baba yilokhu abayikho namuhla.
Nazi izindaba zabo...
UDABA OLUPHAMBILI
Izintokazi ezintathu zakuleli ezingabaculi bomculo woKholo zisitshela ngezinselelo eziphumelele kuzo nokuthi zibahalalisela kanjani abesimame abazifake ugqozi!
NTOKOZO MBAMBO
"Ngiziqhenya ngokuba ngowesimame enginguye"
KWABANINGI, uNtokozo Mbambo (24) uyisibonelo esihle sokuthi owesimame ongumAfrica kufanele abe njani. Uziphatha ngenhlonipho nangendlela enesithunzi.
Ushade nongumqondisi wezomculo kwiJoyous Celebration futhi odlala upiyano uNqubeko Mbatha - noWinnie Mashaba waphawula ngokuthi uMrs Mbatha "usemusha kodwa indlela akhuluma ngayo kuyakhombisa ukuthi ngumuntu wesimame ozithandayo nozihloniphayo."
UWinnie wengeze ngokuthi ulitusa kakhulu ithalente likaNltokozo ngoba uma esesteji wenza okungaphezu kokuthokozisa abalandeli: "Uma ecula, kufana nokuthi uyashumayela. Unaleso siphiwo sokuphendulela abantu kuNKULUNKULU."
Uvumile ukuthi uyazithanda futhi uyazihlonipha: "ngingumuntu enginguye, ngenza engikwenzayo nokuyinto engizinikele kuyo."
Umama wangifundisa ukuthandaza nokuba ngibe ngowesimame ozihloniphayo."
Umama wakhe uNonhle Mbambo uphinde abe yimenenja yakhe yezomculo. Njengoba abazali bakhe babecula eqenjini lomculo nonguphrojusa nongumculi uMthunzi Namba, uNtokozo waba nethuba lokuba yingxenye yokucula bukhoma kukaMthunzi eseneminyaka engu-13.
Nakuba wayenamahloni esaba, kodwa umama wakhe wayehlala naye phansi amkhuthaze athi: "Mntanami, wubizo lwakho lolu. Vumela UNKULUNKULU Asebenze ngawe."
Wayeneminyaka engu-16 ngesikhathi eba yingxenye yeJoyous Celebration 6 okokuqala ngqa. Umsebenzi wakhe wokucula waqala kahle kakhulu ngesikhathi ekhipha i-albhamu yakhe ethi Bambelela nayecula yedwa kuyo ngonyaka olandelayo u-2002 - kodwa i-albhamu yakhe yesibili, ethi Keep On Believing, yaze yaphuma emva kweminyaka emihlanu ngo-2007.
"Ukulinda kwami kwaba yisikhathi esinzima njengomuntu wesimame nomculi. Kwangithatha isikhathi eside ngizifune ukuthi ngingubani nokuthi yini eyayiLindelwe WUNKULUNKULU ngami."
Washada nesithandwa sakhe uNqubeko Mbatha ngo-April ngonyaka odlule nokuyinto athi ngesinye sezinqumo ezinhle ake azithatha.
"Ngikujabulela kakhulu ukushada naye.
Sizwana kahle kakhulu, ungumuntu olungile."
Okwamanje abakabi nezingane njengoba besagxile emisebenzini yabo - kodwa uNtokozo uthi usekubheke ngabomvu ukuba ngumama.
Uma ethole indodakazi, uthi uyoyifundisa ukuzithanda njengaye hhayi ukuba idlale abantu nokungabi nokuzethemba.
Ngesikhathi esho lokhu, simbuzile
ukuthi ngabe yena
wake waba nokungazethembi noma nokuzinyeza ngenxa yobungako bomzimba wakhe.
"Ngangingakuthokozeli ubukhulu bomzimba wami njengoba ukuba mncane kuyinto enhle kwabaningi," kusho yena.
"Nsuku zonke UNKULUNKULU Uhlale Engitshela ukuthi ngimuhle. Ngiyazi ukuthi kufanele nginciphe ngizithande futhi," kusho yena.
WINNIE MASHABA
"Umama wangenza ngaba engiyikho namuhla!"
UNABALANDELI abaningi eSA nasemazweni angomakhelwane, kodwa ukube akubanga ngenxa kamama wakhe ongasekho ngabe asilibonanga ikhono likaWinnie elimangalisayo.
Ngesikhathi omama abaningi babekhuthaza izingane zabo ukuba zibe ngothisha nabahlengikazi, umama kaWinnie u-Enicah Mashaba wamnika ithuba lokuthola udumo.
"Umkhulu wami uJudas Mashaba nguyena owokuqala ukuqaphela ikhono lami lomculo. Wayelokhu ethi kubantu 'le ngane iyoya kude njengoBrenda Fassie'," kusho uWinnie ehleka. "Kodwa umama wami nguye owakwenza konke kwafezeka".
"Ngamtshela ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngifuna ukucula esteji. Esikhundleni sokungishumayeza ngesikole, ngasese wangifunela umuntu owayezongisiza ngifeze iphupho lami."
Umama kaWinnie wathola inombolo yomculi uSolly Moholo wamtshela ngendodakazi yakhe enekhono.
Ngelinye ilanga uSolly washaya ucingo esho ukuthi uzokube eseGaPhasha eSteelpoort eLimpopo lapho uWinnie nomama wakhe babehlala khona ngaleso sikhathi.
"Wayedlala kwenye indawo kodwa wazinika isikhathi sokuza ekhaya wangicela ukuba ngicule - ngavele ngaculela phezulu".
Emva kokujoyina inkampani yokuqopha kaSolly - iSolly Moholo Productions, waqopha i-albhamu yakhe yokuqala i-Exoda 20, eyakhishwa ngo-2000. Yathengisa yafinyelela ezingeni legolide ithengisa amakhophi angaphezu kuka-30 000.
I-albhamu yakhe ka-2006 ethi Thola Ngoaneso, yathengisa ngaphezu kwamakhophi angu-150 000. Waqokelwa umklomelo weKora ngo-2005 nowamaSAMA ngo-2007 kanti kulo nyaka uqokelwe oweBest African Traditional Gospel.
Kafushane, uWinnie (28) ngomunye wabaculi besimame bakuleli bomculo woKholo abahlonishwayo namuhla - kodwa akafuni ukuthatha lonke lolo dumo.
"Umama wami nguyena muntu wesimame obaluleke ukubedlula bonke empilweni yami," kusho yena.
"Wayeyimenenja emakhazeni ezidumbu, engumholi woPhiko lwabesiMame kwi-ANC endaweni yangakithi.
Kwabanye besimame abamkhuthaza singabala abaculi uYvonne Chaka Chaka, Mam' Ebony (oshade nomculi kamaskandi uHash' elimhlophe) nonguNgqongqoshe wezangaPhandle uMaite Nkoana-Mashabane.
"Ngiyayithanda indlela abaqine ngayo empilweni. Bayabahlonipha abayeni babo nemindeni yabo kanti bangisiza ukuze ngibe ngowesimame ongcono bangenza nganeqholo lokuba ngowesimame wakuleli."
UWinnie naye wethemba ukuthi uzoqhuba ngale ndlela ekhaya lakhe. Washada ngo-2007 kanti umndeni wakhe ubandakanya indodana yomyeni wakhe eneminyaka engu-8 nodadewabo kaWinnie omncane (14) nomfowabo (11).
UWinnie akumkhathazi ukungabi nezingane zakhe njengamanje. "Ngazitshela ukuthi yonke into inesikhathi sayo. Ngingumuntu namuhla ngenxa yokuba ngumama kulezi zingane. KuluHlelo lukaNKULUNKULU - kungakho ngingafuni ukuzikhathaza ngezinye izinto," kusho yena.
I-albhamu yakhe yakamumva iJoang Kapa Joang ekhishwe ngoFebruary kulo nyaka, kumanje ukuthengiswa kwayo sekubange ezingeni le-platinum.
DEBORAH FRASER
"Ngabhukula ngalwa!"
UMCULI womculo woKholo uDeborah Fraser ukhonze ukuncokola, ukufaka ubucwebe, kanti futhi unendlela yakhe ehlukile yokugqoka.
Impilo yakhe ingaphendulwa ibe yiziqephu zempilo engubukhazikhazi yomdlalo iGenerations.
Izingane ezimbili azithola engakashadi nobuhlungu bokudivosa - phezu kwakho konke lokho, usabahlanyisa abalandeli bakhe.
Lo mculi uyagcizelela ukuthi naye ungumuntu nokuthi uKholo alusho ukuba msulwa.
Yikho lokho okuchazwa yingoma yakhe Abafundisi Abarongo kwi-albhamu yakhe yakamumva ethi Umsamariya.
"Angazi ukuthi kungani kubekhona abantu abazibiza ngabefundisi kodwa izenzo zabo zixosha abanye abantu emasontweni. Labo yibona bantu UNKULUNKULU Abafunayo. UJesu wafela izono zethu. Sonke siyefana emehlweni Akhe."
UDeborah Fraser (42) maduze nje uzobonakala emdlalweni weTV othi Hola Mpintshi.
Ngo-1996 washonelwa yindodana yakhe yokuqala ebeletha. Izwi lakhe livele lishone phansi uma ekhumbula ukuthi wayethokoze kanjani ezokuba ngumama. "Emva kokuziphatha kahle isikhathi eside, ngangicabanga ukuthi sekuyisikhathi esifanele, kodwa kwangaba njalo," kusho yena ngobuhlungu adlule kubona.
Ekugcineni wabeletha uNkosana (oneminyaka engu-9 manje) no-Aaliyah (onengu-7 manje), kodwa kuyena uDeborah, impilo ayimhambelanga kalula.
"Ngikhumbula kahle, ngathola u-Aaliyah ngonyaka engakhipha ngawo i-albhamu yami yokuqala. Ngangimatasa ngingenalo nethuba lokukhulisa izingane zami, kodwa isikhathi esincane engangisithola ngangisichitha nazo ngizama ukuzifundisa konke engingazifundisa kona."
NgoMusa kaNKULUNKULU, izingane zakhe zakhula kahle kanti njengamanje sezihlala naye. Usethathe nendodana kamshana wakhe enguNoah wazohlala nayo futhi uyakuthanda ukuba ngumama - nakuba "ngisiqinisa isandla ngingazwani nento engasile," kusho yena.
Ngo-2007 uDeborah wayecabanga ukuthi useyitholile intokozo nobaba wezingane zakhe ngesikhathi ehlangana nomfundisi waseNigeria uSockey Okeke.
Uthando lwabo lwajika lwaba nokuhlukumeza kwaphetha ngokuba uDeborah adivose u-Okeke.
Ukholwa wukuthi iNyanga yabesiMame yisikhathi esihle sokucobelelana nabanye besimame ngezinto adlula kuzo aphinde abeluleke.
"Ngingumculi womculo woKholo, abantu bayangazi futhi bayangithanda - balindele lukhulu kimina kodwa futhi nami ngingumuntu," kusho yena.
"Ubuhlungu buya enhliziyweni kimina njengoba kwenzeka noma kubani."
Ngomshado wakhe uthe: "kwakuyisikhathi esibuhlungu nesokukhathazeka kodwa engikuthandayo wukuthi ngacela UNKULUNKULU ukuba Abambe isandla sami Ahambe nami.
"Isizathu esenza ngikhulume ngokuvuleleka ngomshado wami wukuthi ngiyazi kunabantu abamthandayo uDeborah abazongilandela ngisho ngabe sekunjani. Ngisho ngabe ngenza into ephambene, bacabange ukuthi iyiyo. Angikufuni lokho. Okunye okubaluleke kakhulu, ngifuna nabanye besifazane bazi ukuthi akufanele bahlalele ukuhlukunyezwa emakhaya belokhu bezitshela ukuthi kuzolunga!
"Uma umuntu ekuncinza, nawe ungamncinza noma uvele uhlale phansi ukhale. Mina-ke angisiyo ingane elokhu ikhala, ngalwa ngokuba ngiye endaweni engangingeke ngizwe ubuhlungu kuyo."
Engomeni ethi, Bengithi Ngizo Bekezela (I Thought I Would Endure) usitshela ngokuthi wayecabanga ukuthi kunethemba lomshado wakhe, kodwa lingekho nokuthi uthando lweqiniso aluhlukumezi.
Siyethemba abesimame bakuleli bazokhuthazeka kule ndaba enzima yale ntokazi.[z]

Abantu bakithi
U-Sensei Thulani udlala izindawo eziyingozi ezithombeni, kanti kumanje usefundisa abanye ukwenza lo msebenzi oyingozi wokulwa
indaba nguMCEBISI ZULU
(izithombe zithathwe kwezika-Sensei Thulani)
U-SENSEI Thulani Ndlovu nguye owasungula iDimensional Stunt School eCape Town, nokuyisikole sokuqala ngqa e-Africa esigunyazelwe ukuqeqeshela ukudlala izindawo eziyingozi emafilimini.
Ukuzibandakanya kwakhe ezindaweni ezineziqhumane nokuliwa kuzo kwaqala enza unyaka wesithathu we-national diploma yakhe (yokuba ngumdlali wezobuciko) ayeyenza eNatal Technikon. Ngaleso sikhathi wayesevele engumdansi futhi esebe ngushampeni waseNatal izikhathi ezintathu kwi-kyokushinkai karate (kwezomkhalambazo).
Esenza umdanso wahambela emazweni aphesheya afana neGermany ne-India ngaphansi kwezinhlelo zamazwe zokucobelelana ulwazi nokuyinto eyamzuzisa esikhulu isipiliyoni ngakwezobuciko.
Kwathi ngo-1994, wahambisa iCV yakhe ku-John Stead, ongumdidiyeli wefilimu eluchunge kwiTV iSinbad TV, eyayithwetshulelwa kuleli ngaleso sikhathi.
UNdlovu bamqasha waqala lapho-ke ukuzibonakalisa kwezamafilimu nakwezemidlalo yeTV ikakhulu emidlalweni ekhombisa izinto eziyingozi.
ENYE yezinto eziyinselelo kakhulu ngokuba ngumlingisi wezindawo eziyingozi, wukuba uzenze lezi zindawo uphindelela.
Lokhu kudinga kokubili - ukuba ngumqemane ngokomzimba nokuba nekhono ekudlaleni. U-Sensei Thulani unakho kokubili kanti kuze kube yimanje usebonakale kumafilimu nasemidlalweni yeTV engaphezu kwengu-30, edlala izindawo ezithile eziyingozi noma engumdansi.
Kule midlalo namafilimu singabala iLord Of War (okwakukhona kuyo uNicolas Cage), King Solomon’s Mines (enoPatrick Swayze), Forgiveness (eno-Arnold Vosloo), Pirates Of The Plains (Tim Curry) namanye amaningi.
Enye yakamumva asanda kuzibandakanya kuyona ngethi Goodbye Bafana emayelana noNelson Mandela, nethi Spoon egxile kakhulu ekubhekeni umonakalo wobugebengu kubantu baseSouth Africa.
Namuhla iningi lophrojusa likhetha ukuthwebula amafilimu alo eSouth Africa, ikakhulu endaweni yaseCape Town kunakwamanye amazwe.
Izizathu zalokhu wukuthi khona ehlobo izinsuku zinde, isibhakabhaka sisuke sikhanya bha nezindawo zokulala zisuke zibiza kancane ekubeni nendawo yakhona yinhle - izintaba, ulwandle, amabhishi, izivande zewayini nezakhiwo zezitayela ezehlukene.
NGENXA yalokhu, sekunesikhulu isidingo salabo abaqeqeshelwe ukudlala izindawo eziyingozi, kodwa futhi ngokwakhe u-Sensei Thulani uthi imizamo yokuphumelelisa lokhu yayingenele wabona kunesikhulu isidingo sokwakhiwa kwesikole sokuqeqeshelwa lo msebenzi ezinhlakeni zobuciko obehlukene.
Ephawula ngaleli thuba, wazibophezela ngokwakhe ekusungulweni kwesikole salolu hlobo iDimensional Stunt School eyavulwa ngonyaka ka-2002.
Lesi sikole sihlose ukunika labo abanekhono abangumqemane ngokomzimba ababesezindaweni ezazingenamathuba phambilini, ubuciko obusezingeni eliphezulu kulo msebenzi ukuze bakwazi ukuzibandakanya embonini yezamafilimu neyemidlalo yeTV.
“Siyishayela elikhulu ihlombe imizamo yeDimensional Stunt School yokuhlangabezana nalesi sidingo esinqala ngakwezobuciko,” kusho uMartin Cuff wabeCape Film Commission.
Abafundi bathola ukuqeqeshwa amasonto angu-12 ngezindlela ezehlukene zokudlala izindawo eziyingozi, izindlela zokuphepha, ukukwazi ukusebenzisana nozakwenu, ukuziphatha lapho senidlala, izindlela zokugingqika, ezokulwa nezokuphatha izikhali ngendlela ephephile.
Indlela abaphatha ngayo u-Sensei Thulani abanye abafundi lapho beziqeqesha ingeyobungani, ayesabisi - kodwa inzima futhi iyingozi. Ungaphezu komqeqeshi; kubona uyisibonelo esihle nomuntu obakhuthazayo.
Uzichaza njengo “baba wekhaya” kanti umdlandla wakhe nomfutho uthi kungenxa yokwesekwa ngunkosikazi wakhe abambisene naye futhi kwezamabhizinisi uMalika.
“Umzimba ngiwubona uyithempeli,” kusho yena. “Iyona ndlela esizwakalisa ngayo okungaphakathi kwethu nokuyiyonanto wonke umuntu ayiqonda kahle.” Akwethusike ukuthi kungani akhetha ukusebenza ngale ndlela nokuba akwazi ukudlulisela lokhu kwabanye ngethemba lokuthi nabo bazokwazi ukukwedlulisela kwabanye.[z]

amhlophe
INHLAMA YESINKWA ESIMHLOPHE
Le nhlama ungayisebenzisela ukwenza olofu besinkwa esimhlophe noma ama-
rolls ame ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene, ufake ama-fillings noma ama-toppings amaningi.
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 45 imizuzu
Kuphuma ulofu owodwa
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
* I-Glaze
* 1 iqanda
* 15ml (1 isipuni) amanzi
* ibinzana likasawoti
1. Inhlama. Endishini, sefa ufulawa, ushukela nosawoti. Faka i-yeast yodwa eceleni. (Usawoti akufanele uhlangane ne-yeast ngoba ubulala izikhukhumalisi ezikwi-yeast.)
2. Ebhodweni, ncibilikisa imajarini, faka ubisi ugovuze kube ntukuntuku. (Izinga lokushisa elilungele i-yeast ukuze ikhukhumale ngu-27°C. Ayikhukhumali uma kushisa kakhulu.
3. Vula isikhala phakathi nendawo kufulawa, faka ingxube yobisi. Hlanganisa kuthambe inhlama. Faka ufulawa uma inhlama isimanzi.
4. Thululela inhlama ebhodini elivuvuzelwe ngofulawa, udove imizuzu engu-10.
5. Mboza nge-clingwrap egcotshisiwe. Beka endaweni efudumele ukuyeke kukhukhumale ngokuphindaphindiwe.
6. Endaweni evuvuzelwe ngofulawa, phinda udove inhlama. Mboza nge-clingwrap egcotshisiwe ukuyeke kukhukhumale imizuzu engu-10.
7. Yenza inhlama ibe ngulofu noma ama-bread rolls.
8. I-Glaze. Kujeke, shaya amaqanda, amanzi nosawoti. Brasha i-glaze enhlameni. Mboza nge-clingwrap uyeke inhlama iphindaphindeke.
9. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200°C imizuzu engu-45. Kupholise.
BREAD ROLLS
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 20 imizuzu
Kuphuma angu-12
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
1. Landela iresiphi yenhlama emhlophe kuze kufike ku-Step 5.
2. Yenza ama-rolls angu-12 alinganayo. Endaweni evuvuzelwe ngofulawa, ndlala uphisi ngamunye wenhlama ube yibhola, mbambatha ngeminwe ukuze indawo engaphansi ishelele. Beka ethreyini lokubhaka eligcotshisiwe, cindezela uyeke kukhukhumale ngokuphindwe kabili.
3. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200°C imizuzu engu-20.
AMA-Toppings
Vuvuzela i-sesame seeds noma i-black poppy seeds ngaphezulu emva kokucwebezelisa nge-glaze. Uma ufuna ama-rolls ayisitayela sasePutukezi sebenzisa isikele usike okumise okukanxantathu ngaphezulu kuma-rolls ukubhuqe kufulawa.
Portuguese Loaf
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 20 imizuzu
Kuphuma olofu ababili
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
* ufulawa wokubhuqa
1. Landela iresiphi yenhlama emhlophe kuze kufike kuStep 5.
2. Endaweni evuvuzelwe ngofulawa, hlukanisa inhlama kabili, kwenze kumise okombhonxo. Ungakakumbozi, vula ngesihloko sommbese izikhala ezintathu noma ezine ezimise okukanxantathu uzivundlise ngaphezulu, wenze iphethini yo-nought neyeziphambano. Bhuqa ngofulawa.
3. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200°C imizuzu engu-20.
Olive Loaf
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 35 imizuzu
Kuphuma olofu ababili
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
* 100g ama-olives aqotshiwe akhishwe izinhlamvu
Glaze
* 1 iqanda elishayiwe
* ibinzana likasawoti
* 30ml (2 izipuni) amanzi abandayo
1. Landela iresiphi yenhlama emhlophe kufike kuStep 4.
2. Hlukanisa inhlama ibe ama-portion amane alinganayo. Sebenzisa i-rolling pin enofulawa undlale i-portion ngayinye imise okombhonxo olugqinsi olungu-25mm. Cindezela ama-olives enhlameni.
3. Goqa inhlama, ucindezele amachopho. Beka ethreyini lokubhaka eligcotshisiwe, amachopho owacindezele abe ngaphansi.
4. I-Glaze. Kujeke, shaya iqanda, usawoti, namanzi, brasha kulofu. Kubeke endaweni efudumele kuze kuphindaphindeke kabili.
5. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200˚C imizuzu engu-35. Mbambatha i-crust ngommbese. Uma ulofu usulungile uzozwakala sengathi awunalutho. Kupholisele kwi-wire rack. [z]

INDLELA YOKUBONA UKUTHI UQHUBA KANJANI
Kulolu shicilelo sicubungula izinto ezinhlanu okumele uzibheke uma ufuna ukuthola ukuthi inkampani yakho iqhuba kanjani – ukhuphule nenzuzo yakho. Lokhu kuthathise okweresiphi ofaka kuyona izithako ngezikalo ezithile uma ubhaka ikhekhe. Yile “resiphi” ezosikhombisa ukuthi inzuzo sizoyenza kanjani. Manje ake sibheke “izithako” zethu:
1 UKUKHANGISA: Uchitha isikhathi esingakanani uma ufuna amakhasimende amasha? Yimiphi imizamo oyenzayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayanda abantu abezwa ngemikhiqizo yakho? Ukutshela abanye ukuthi abatshele abanye ngayo kuyasiza kodwa kungalilimaza ibhizinisi lakho uma ulinda abanye abantu ukuba kube yibona abakhuluma ngemikhiqizo yakho. Impumelelo ilele ekutholeni amasu amahle okwazisa abantu ngemikhiqizo yakho. Enye yezindlela ezinganakiwe futhi engabizi kakhulu yokwenza lokho eyokucela amakhasimende akho akuyalele abantu ongabatshela ngemikhiqizo yakho.
2 UKUSHINTSHA: Le ndlela ayivamile ukusetshenziswa abanamabhizinisi amancane. Ukubheka ukuthi bangaki abantu abashintsha umwondo bangagcini ngokubona noma ukuzwa ngomkhiqizo wakho kodwa bagcine ngokuwuthenga kuyindlela enhle yokubona ukuthi uwukhangisa kanjani. Enye indlela yokwenza lokhu wukufaka indali kuleyo naleyo ndlela okhetha ukukhangisa ngayo. Uma abantu bethenga lokho okusendalini uzokwazi ukuthi iyiphi indlela yokukhangisa ekusebenzelayo. Kungenzeka, ukwenza isibonelo, uthole ukuthi ukukhipha amapheshana kungcono kunokukhangisa ephephandabeni lomphakathi.
3 AMAKHASIMENDE: Laba bantu yibona abathenga baphindelele. Bayakusiza bakukhangisele imikhiqizo yakho ngokutshela abanye ngayo. Qiniseka ukuthi ubabonga ngokubanika isaphulelo esiyisipesheli uma bethenga okwesithathu. Akubizi ukugcina ikhasimende elithokozile kunokuhlala ufuna amasha.
4OKUTHENGIWE: Enye indlela yokubheka ukuthi uqhuba kanjani eyokuthola ukuthi ikhasimende ngalinye lithenga ngamalini. Ungakwazi ukukhuphula lelo nani elithenga ngalo. Ukwenza isibonelo, ama-cupcakes akho wadayise nokokusula umlomo okuyisipesheli. Amakhasimende akho azocabanga ukuthi athola okuningi ngemali yawo athenge kakhulu.
5IMALI OYITHOLAYO: Bheka imali oyithola ungakazisusi izindleko zakho. Lokhu ukwenzela ukukhuphula imali oyithola inyanga nenyanga, kodwa qaphela – maningi amabhizinisi ajaha ukubheka imali ayitholile kunokubheka inzuzo ayenzayo. Maningi amabhizinisi enza imali enkulu kodwa inzuzo ingabikhona, qiniseka ukuthi ubheka izindleko
zakho zonke.
Lluwellyn Diedericks

“Ikhwaya yethu idume ngokunyakazisa izihlwele,” kusho uKenny Shivambu, uthisha ofundisa umculo owasungula le khwaya ngo-2005.
“Ngathola ukuthi akukho okwakwenziwa ukuze kuvunjululwe, kuthuthukiswe ithalente elisemculweni eLimpopo. Ngabona kungcono ukuthi ngisungule uhlelo lomculo,” kuchaza yena.
Embonweni wakhe uKenny wasekwa ngumasipala waseMopani neMunghana Lonene FM.
Umnyango wezobuCiko namaSiko wawuthanda umbono wabo wanikela ngo-R1 million kulolu hlelo.
Ngo-2006, kwahlolwa ababezocula kulesi sifunda kwatheleka intsha engaphezulu kuka-400 izozama inhlanhla.
“Emva kokuchitha amahora amaningi silalele abaculi, sakhetha abangu-30,” kusho uKenny. Ezinyangeni ezingu-12 ezalandela kwaba nama-workshop okuqeqesha abaculi. Babefundiswa ngokucijwa kwamaphimbo, ukunyakaza esteji, ukusebenzisa izinsimbi zokucula, ukuziphatha nokunye.
“Sasebenza kanzima nangokuzinikela kulolongwa abaculi,” kusho uKenny, owawina umklomelo esabhidisa ikhwaya yaseRitavi Primary School, eNkowankowa Township ngaseTzaneen.
Izinsizwa ezingu-12 nezintokazi ezingu-18 ezicula kwiGo Explo zihola nyanga zonke zihlangane masonto onke zizilolonge.
I-albhamu yabo yokuqala bazoyikhipha ngo-April bahlukaniselane imali ezotholakala.
“Lolu hlelo luguqule impilo yethu. Ikusasa lethu liqhakazile ngenxa yalo,” kusho uThalitha Ndlovu ongumculi. [z]

BONKE osomabhizinisi abaphumelelayo benza ucwaningo ngaphambi kokuqala ibhizinisi. Lolo cwaningo lwenza balihlelele kahle ibhizinisi labo. Ngaleyo ndlela ibhizinisi ngeke liphumelele okwesikhashana nje kodwa liyohlala likhona. Yilolo cwaningo olubizwa ngocwaningo lwebhizinisi.
Kuyini ukwenza ucwaningo ngebhizinisi?
Uma wenza ucwaningo ngebhizinisi ubheka lona, amakhasimende alo, ongancintisana nabo nokunye. Ukucwaninga kusiza ngokukunika ulwazi lokuthi abantu bafunani noma bafuna ukuthengani. Ukucwaninga kukubeka endleleni eya ebhizinisini eliyimpumelelo.
Qala ngokwenza ucwaningo emphakathini wangakini ukuze uthole ukuthi abantu badayisani nokuthi yini abangayidayisi. Xoxisana nabantu uzwe ukuthi badingani. UDANSELA INJABULO
Yini embi nge-ballet? NgokukaTumi Mokgope ayikho into embi - kanti uzimisele ngokushintsha indlela abantu abawuthatha ngayo lo mdanso ngokucabanga ukuthi yinto ‘yabamhlophe’… indaba nguDiane Coetzer, izithombe nguVanessa Grobler/Homegrown
U-ITUMELENG Mokgope ngomunye wabadansi bakuleli abanesiphiwo esimangalisayo kwi-ballet. Okunye akwenzayo wukwethula izifundo kulabo abathintwa yisifo se-AIDS ngezindlela ezehlukene nokuyinto ayenza njalo ngamasonto.
Endaweni yaseDiepkloof eSoweto, uTumi wenza umsebenzi oncomeka kakhulu eRena le Lona Creative Centre for Aids Orphans. Ufundisa umdanso we-ballet ezinganeni zeminyaka esukela kwengu-6 kuya kwengu-16.
Akuwona neze umsebenzi olula kumuntu odansa emazingeni aphezulu emhlabeni.
“Ungumuntu olungile onobubele okwaziyo ukunakekela abanye abantu kanti futhi ungomunye wabadansi abambalwa abazimisele ngokwedlulisela ulwazi lwabo emphakathini,” kusho ongumqondisi wabeSouth African Ballet Theatre uKaren Beukes.
UTumi wakhulela e-Acornhoek edolobheni azalelwa kulona i-Lowveld.
Emva kwalokho, umndeni wakhe wathuthela eSoweto - kodwa uTumi wayechitha isikhathi sakhe samaholidi eLowveld.
Umfowabo kaTumi uyi-tour guide kanti ujwayele ukuletha amaqembu abavakashi eLowveld. “Sonke sisaxhumene nale ndawo ekubeni nezimpande zethu zikuyona,” kusho uTumi.
UTumi uvumile ukuthi ukhathele yimpilo yasedolobheni. “Abantu base-Acornhoek bangabantu abazithobile nabazibeke phansi. Akudingeki size sigqoke kakhulu uma silapha. Ngiyawuthanda umoya onjalo.”
Uphumele obala ngezinselelo okwadingeka ukuba abhekane nazo emsebenzini wakhe wokuba ngumdansi we-ballet.
“Umdanso we-ballet ukwenza uzihloniphe futhi ukunike nenselelo yokuhamba, yokukhuluma neyokuba yilowo muntu abantu abaningi abangamqondi nokungelula ukumqaphela,” kusho yena.
“Abaningi i-ballet bayithatha njengento ‘yabamhlophe’.”
UTumi ulinganise indlela amaMasai ezweni laseKenya ama ngayo nagxuma ngayo njengendlela efanayo neyeminyakazo yomdanso we-ballet nokuthi kuyathokozisa ukubona indlela lokhu okuxhumana ngayo.
Isimo uTumi ayebhekene naso empilweni yakhe nesamhlukumeza kakhulu emoyeni yiso esamholela ekutheni aze azibandakanye nomdanso we-ballet.
“Ngadutshulwa emlenzeni ngesikhathi sitelekela ubandlululo ngeminyaka yo-1980 udokotela wangitshela ukuthi kufanele ngihlale nginyakazisa umlenze wami ukuze uqine,” kusho yena.
“Ngenhlanhla nginesihlobo esisemdansweni esabuka sabona ukuthi i-ballet ingangisiza ngomlenze wami. Okunye okwalandela lapho kungumlando.”
UTumi waqala ukuzakhela igama ngokuba azibonakalise njengomunye wabadansi abamnyama abanempumelelo emangalisayo eSouth Africa. Uthi abantu badinga ukushintsha ukucabanga kwabo ukuze bakwazi ukuzisondeza kwi-ballet.
“Kungani abantu bakhonze ama-cellphone namakhomphyutha ngaphandle kokuzibuza ukuthi okwabamhlophe noma okwabaseMelika kodwa bagxeke i-ballet?” kusho kubuza yena.
UTumi wayeyilungu elaba ngumsunguli weSoweto Dance Theatre ngokubambisana noLucky Diale, Carly Dibakwane, Ellington Mazibuko kanjalo nongasekho uJackie Semela.
Empumelelweni yakhe singabala nomfundaze awuthola ngo-1996 wokuyofunda unyaka owodwa esikoleni somdanso esidume umhlaba wonke iRambert Dance School eWest London.
Ngesikhathi esesePlayhouse Dance Company eThekwini, uTumi wenza umdanso ayewudansa yedwa nokungumdanso ayehlonipha ngawo okaMadiba ubaba uNelson Mandela. UTumi lo mdanso wamwinisa imiklomelo emibili ye-Vita Awards.
Kodwa kule nsizwa akusikho ukuthola imiklomelo okubalulekile. Kumphula umoya ukuzwa izindaba ngobunzima bezingane zaseRena le Lona Centre nokuyinto esimkhuthaze ukuba azisize zibone ukuthi yena yini aseyizuzile ngomdanso we-ballet - injabulo, ukukwazi ukuzisungulela izinto, ukuzihlonipha kanye nomsebenzi osukhombise enkulu intuthuko kulesi sikhathi seminyaka engamashumi amabili. Ngithanda ukuchitha isikhathi sami ekhishini kanti futhi ngilithanda ngoba livulekile ngiyakwazi ukukhuluma nabangivakashele ngibe ngipheka.

Kule minyaka edlule bengiqoqa ifenisha yesimanjemanje efanele le ndawo. Kodwa efenisheni enginayo eningi bengiyenzelwa abantu kubandakanya netafula lase-dining room ne-coffee table. Zonke izimpahla ozibona kule ndlu zakhethwa yimina.
Ukuhlala la kuyangijabulisa kodwa kukhona umuntu osanda kuntshontsha isipele sokhiye bami wabakhipha ngewindi, wavula ngabo wantshontsha ikhomphyutha ne-phone. Ngenhlanhla ngangingekho ekhaya! Yilokho okuba yinkinga uma uhlala wedwa kanti nomsebenzi engiwenzayo uyangihambisa. Isoka lami livakasha kathathu ngesonto kanti ngethemba ukuthi lo nyaka ngowokugcina ngihlala ngedwa - lokho kusezinhlelweni zami!
Njengamanje ngidlala emidlalweni yeshashalazi emibili edlala eMarco Polo Theatre eSandton.
Ngijwayele ukubuka iTV ngibe ngisebenza kwi-laptop yami. Ayisali ingilazi yewayini uma ngiziphumulele.
Njengamanje ngibhala incwadi enamaresiphi ami esengike ngawazama. Kungenzeka isihloko sayo sithi There's A Diva In Your Kitchen kodwa angikathathi sinqumo.
I-couch engaphambi kwe-coffee table inezincwadi namaphephabhuku okupheka angikhuthazayo. Ngihlala kuyona uma ngibhala izingoma ze-albhamu yami ye-jazz engizoyikhipha. Angikaze nganeliswe wukwenza into eyodwa.

EKUQALENI kwalo nyaka, izwe lonke lakhungatheka ngokuthunjwa kwengane eneminyaka eyisithupha uMichaela Ganchi owayedlala ekhaya likagogo nomkhulu wakhe e-Eldorado Park, eGoli. Isidumbu sakhe satholwa ngosuku olulandelayo. Umlisa wendawo uRoland Jones (27) waboshwa wabekwa icala lokuthumba, ukudlwengula nokubulala.
Amaphoyisa asanda kunxusa abafana abancane endaweni yaseGermiston ukuba baqaphele emva kokuthunjwa kwezingane ezimbili - eneminyaka engu-11 nengu-16.
Zazingaphandle kwesitolo esidayisa ama-computer games ngesikhathi umlisa oneminyaka eko-20 eqonda kuzona. Wafike wazitshela ukuthi uzozinika ama-computer games uma zihamba naye. Zamlandela kwayiwa endaweni yokulahla udoti, nokuyilapho azama khona ukuzidlwengula ezikhombe ngesibhamu.
Zombili zakwazi ukubaleka, kanti ngokwabombutho wabeSAPS, indlela ezayichaza ngayo le ndoda yafana ncamashi nosolelwa kokuningi ukuthumba okwenzeka kule ndawo.
Izingane zethu aziphephile ngisho ngabe zidlala engadini.
Yini engenziwa"
Singazivikela kanjani izingane zethu "ezingozini zabantu abangaziwa""
"Esikhundleni sokuba sifundise izingane zethu ukwesaba abantu ezingabazi, kufanele sedlulise imiyalezo eyakhayo," kusho uDkt Daniel Broughton, oyi-paediatrician nowayengumqondisi wabe-US National Center For Missing And Exploited Children.
Kuyiqiniso ukuthi asizimisele nakancane ukuba izingane zethu zihambe zesaba bonke abantu ezihlangana nabo - lokhu kubi njengakho ukwethemba kakhulu. Khumbula futhi ukuthi kuyayidida ingane ukuba itshelwe ukuthi ingakhulumi nabantu engabazi kodwa ibone umama nobaba bezikhulumela ngokukhululeka nabantu engabazi zikhathi zonke.
Ukuqonda izindlela ezifanele zokuzethula noma ukuzazisa kungasiza izingane zikwazi ukubona ukuziphatha okungekuhle uma mhlawumbe umuntu ezingamazi ezama ukuzenza umngani wazo lapho abazali bazo bengekho eduze.
"Kubalulekile kakhulu ukuba abazali bangasebenzisi ukwesaba njengethuluzi lokufundisa. Asifuni izingane zikhule zicabanga ukuthi wonke umuntu omdala angazilimaza," kusho omunye wochwepheshe wezokwelashwa kwengqondo.
Indlela yokuziphatha
UKenneth Wooden, onguchwepheshe wezokuphepha kwezingane nokunguye owasungula uhlelo lwe-Child Lures Prevention, uthi kufanele kugxilwe endleleni yokuziphatha, hhayi nje yohlobo lomuntu.
Lokhu kwakha umqondo. Labo bantu abagila le mikhuba ezinganeni bazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi izingane zihlale zitshelwa ukuthi zingalokothi zikhulume nabantu ezingabazi. Lokhu sekwenze lezi zigila-mkhuba zithole ezinye izindlela zokwenza izingane zikwazi ukuxoxa nazo.

Into ongayenza wukugijima uyolanda umuntu omdala.

BONA ZULU - July 2007
u
Abantu ongabazi abasiyo ingozi enkulu
Njengoba kudingeka ukuba izingane ziqaphele "ingozi yomuntu ezingamazi," into ebuhlungu wukuthi izingane zibhekene nengozi enkulu kubantu ezibaziyo ikakhulu kunalabo ezingabazi. Kulula ukuba zihlukunyezwe wumuntu oyisihlobo noma umngani osondelene kakhulu nomndeni, umuntu ezimthembayo.
Izibalo emhlabeni jikelele zikhomba ukuthi cishe amaphesenti angu-85 ezingane ezithunjiwe zazingamthathisi okomuntu ezingamazi umuntu osuke ezithumbile.
Ezigamekweni cishe ezingamaphesenti angu-65 lapho kusuke kutholakale ingane ifile nomenzi walokhu atholakale, kuyacaca ukuthi ingane ayizange lowo muntu imthathe njengomuntu engamazi.
Abazali badinga ukulalela futhi bayihloniphe nemizwa yabantwana babo.
Izingane zidinga futhi ukwazi ukuthi azikudingi ukuqatshulwa, ukuthintwa noma ukugonwa ngisho ngabe yisihlobo noma cha uma zingafuni.
"Lokhu kuzihlonipha kungaholela ekutheni nazo zizihloniphe futhi zikwazi ukuba zithi cha ngaphandle kokwesaba," kusho uDkt Daniel Broughton.
UKenneth Wooden uthi kungakuhle futhi abazali baxwayise izingane ngokuthi "zingakuvumeli ukuthintwa abantu ezingabazi ezindaweni zangasese," nokuthi kufanele zitshele omama noma obaba bazo uma kukhona obathinta kulezi zindawo.

BONA ZULU - July 2007
Ezinye izeluleko zokuphepha...
Izingane kufanele zitshelwe ukuba zingasho kubantu abasuke beshaya ucingo ukuthi zizodwa. Kufanele zithi umama noma ubaba usebhizi ngeke akwazi ukuzobamba ucingo, uzomshayela.
Xwaya abantu ongabazi abasezindaweni ezifana nezindlu zomphakathi zangasese noma izindawo zokudlala abangase bafune ukudlala nengane yakho nabangani bayo.
Izingane kufanele zazi amagama azo, ikheli nenombolo yocingo. Izingane ezindala kufanele zazi izinombolo zabazali zasemsebenzini.
Uma izingane zikude nekhaya, kufanele zibe nabangani, zitshele nabazali ukuthi zikuphi zikwazi futhi ukuthi "cha" esimweni esibukeka siyingozi.
"Azikho ezinye izindlela zokuphepha okumele zifundiswe ezibhekele ngqo nokuthunjwa, kanjalo nezingozi ezihambisana nakho," kusho uDkt Broughton.
"Esikhundleni salokho ukuphepha kumele kufundiswe njengento ehlale isemqondweni ukuze izingane zifunde ukuzethemba nokuzimela."

IMFULUWENZA ENGUBHUBHANE i-A (H1N1) 2009
NjengoNgqongqoshe Wezempilo, ngibhalela nina mayelana naloku kufa okushiwo ngenhla  ngenxa yezizathu ezimbili:  
ukunika ulwazi 2009 oluzonisiza ukubhekana ngqo nalesi sifo 
ukucela usizo lwenu nokuzimbandakanya kanye nokwehhovisi lakho elikhulu ekudluliseni kahle imiyalezo ebalulekile ngemfuluwenza i-A (H1N1) 2009  enhlanganweni yakho yezemidlalo.
Igama elisemthethweni lesayensi lalesi sifo yi-Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) 2009.  Yaqala eMexico nase-United  States of America ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka.  Ekuqaleni yayaziwa njengomkhuhlane wezingulube (i-swine flue) ngenxa yokuthi kwabe kucatshangelwa ukuthi yaqala ngezingulube.   Manje sekuyaqondwa ukuthi umsuka wayo uvela kubantu nakuzinyoni.  Ngakho-ke, lokhu kufa akunalutho yokwenza nokudliwa kwengulube noma imikhiqizo yengulube.  Manje sekubizwa nje kalula njengemfluwenza engubhubhane  noma ibizwe ngegama layo elisemthethweni i-A (H1N1) 2009.
Kusukela ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka, le vayirasi isisabalele ngokushesha kumazwe ayi-166. E-Afrika, kuze kube manje le vayirasi isisabalalele emazweni ayi-16 kuphela.  Ngalesi sikhathi sokubhala le ncwadi, le vayirasi isisulele abantu    abayi-177 457 (abaqinisekiswe yizindlu zokuqhuba ucwaningo lwesayensi) emhlabeni wonke, phakathi kwabo osekufe abayi-1 457 abaqinisekisiwe. 
ENingizimu Afrika kuze kube yimanje, sesiqinisekise izimo eziyi-2 844 osekufe kuzo abantu abayisithupha.
Ngemuva komhlangano wesine weKomidi Lwesimo Esisheshayo owawubanjwe ngomhla we-11 Juni 2009, iNhlangano Yomhlaba Yezempilo (i-WHO) yaphetha ngokuthi ikhratheriya yokuthatha lokhu kufa njengobhubhane lomhlaba seyanelisekile futhi uMnqondisi-Jikelele, uDkt Margret Chan, usesigunyazile lesi simo njengoBhubhane ( izinga lesi-6).  Kalula lokhu kusho ukuthi loku kufa sekusabalalele emazweni akuzo zonke izindawo ze-WHO futhi lokhu kwenzeke ngokukhulu ukushesha. Kodwa-ke ngithanda ukugcizelela ukuthi  ukugunyazwa kohobhane akusho ukuthi ukufa kunamandla.  Lokhu kusho ukuthi kuyaqhubeka nokusabalalela yonke indawo.
Ngomhla wesi-6 ku-Julayi  i-WHO yachaza ukuqhubeka kwalolu bhubhane emazweni athintekayo kanye nakumazwe amasha njengokungavumeleki futhi okungavimbeki.  Ngenhlanhla, yize lokhu kunje, iphinde yasho ukuthi abantu abaningi abatheleleke ngevayirasi bazoba nezimpawu ezingconywana.  Yize njengabasebenzi bezempilo, bomhlaba jikelele nabalapha ekhaya,  sikhathazekile ngokufa okuvelile kuze kube manje  (okungama-0,8% emhlabeni nama-0,2% abantu abesulelekile eNingizimu  Afrika).  Ivayirasi isulela abantu abaphakathi kweminyaka eyi-10 ukuya kwengama-29 – iningi labo ngabafundi noma ngabasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.
I-WHO yeluleke ngokuthi amazwe afanele agxile ekwehliseni umthelela walokhu kufa emiphakathini.  Ukwenza lokhu, ukuxhumana kahle kubalulekile.
Indlela yokusabalala
Lokhu kufa kusatshalaliswa yithonsi lokusuleleka ngokufa okungukuthi uma umuntu osulelekile ekhohlela noma ethimula bese wena uhogela umoya abawuthimulele noma abawukhohlelele. Ngisho noma ngabe bakhohlelela endaweni eqinile, wena  wabe usuhogela umoya olapho ungasuleleka).
Izimpawu Zesifo 
Izimpawu zaloku kufa zingehlukaniswa izinhla ezinkulu ezintathu:
ezingcono
ezingconywana 
nezimbi
Izimpawu ezingcono:  
amafinyila noma amakhala acinene
ukukhohlela 
imfiva
ubuhlungu bezinyama 
ukungazizwa kahle umzimba wonke
Abantu abaningi emhlabeni banalezi zimpawu ezingcono futhi abadingi noma ngabe yikuphi ukwelashwa okukhethekile.  Ngakho-ke, abantu abanezimpawu ezingcono kufanele belashwe njengoba kulashwa imfuluwenza ejwayelekile ngaphandle uma kunabantu abanalezi zimo ezilandelayo okufanele baye kothola usizo lokwelashwa ngokushesha noma ngabe banezimpawu ezingcono:
abantu abanokugula okubi kwenhliziyo noma kwamaphaphu 
abasimame abakhulelwe 
abantu abaphila ne-HIV ne-AIDS
abantu abanesifo soshukela (diabetes mellitus)
Izimpawu ezingconywana zimbandakanya izimpawu ezingcono nezinye:
ukuphelelwa ngumoya
ubuhlungu esifubeni
ukuhlanza okunganqamuki
Ukuhanjiswa yisisu nezimpawu zokuswela amanzi
Izimpawu ezimbi zimbandakanya izimpawu ezingcono nezingconywana kanye nezinye
ubunzima bokuphefumula (ukungakhoni ukuphefumula)
izindebe eziluhlaza, ulimi noma ezinye izingxenye zomzimba
isiyezi esikhulu nokuquleka
Noma ngabe ngubani onezimpawu ezingconywana noma ezimbi kufanele afune aphinde athole ukwelashwa ngokushesha.
Ukwanda kokufa kuzifundazwe

Ukuhlolelwa ivayirasi
Ukuhlolwa okusemthethweni kwenziwa isiKhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithelelanayo esiseGauteng esesivule uphiko eNtshonalanga Kapa.  Ukuhlolwa kuzokwenziwa ngesincomo sikadokotela.  Iziguli ezidinga ukwelashwa ohlelweni lukahulumeni lezempilo akufanele zicele ukuhlolwa kwasendlini yocwaningo lwesayensi.  Siyazi ukuthi yilokhu okwenzeka njengamanje emkhakheni wezempilo wangasese, kodwa akukhokona okufunwa yi-WHO. Odokotela kufanele belaphe izimo ezisolekayo ngokwamazinga okwedlulisa ulwazi (protocol) ahlinzekwe nguMnyango Kazwelonke Wezempilo.
Ukwelashwa
Ukwelashwa onelungelo lokuzikhethela kona yi-Tamiflu.  Ifanele inikezwe ngudokotela futhi inikwa labo: 
abanezimpawu ezingcono abukuzihla ezikhethekile njengoba zishiwo ngenhla
abanezimpawu ezingconnywana
abanezimpawu ezimbi
Ukwelashwa kukawonke wonke nge-Tamflu kuzoholela ekuqabeni kokulapheka uma kusetshenziswa lo muthi futhi kungenza ukuthi ungasebenzi nakulabo ongahlenga izimpilo zabo. 
Ukuvalwa kwezikhungo
Ulwazi olutholakale emhlabeni wonke ngukuthi ukuvalwa kwezikole nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, amamoli okuthenga nezindawo zokusebenzela akusebenzi  kusukela ekusabalaleni kokufa.  Kodwa, lokhu kudala ukuthikamezeka okukhulu enhlalweni.
Seluleka ukuthi  noma ngabe yimuphi umfundi, umfundisi  noma umsebenzi onezimpawu ezingcono ukuba ahlale ekhaya. Uma bebaningi abafundi futhi/noma abafundisi abaphuthayo, isikhungo esithintekayo kuzofanele sithinte uMnyango Wezemfundo, ozobe ngokuhlanganyela neziphathimandla zezempilo usululeka ngokufanele kwenziwe.
Ukuphepha kwezempilo okujwayelekile  
Ngenxa yendlela lokhu kufa okubhebhetheka ngayo njengoba kushiwo phamphimbilini, lokhu kuphepha kwezempilo okulula okulandelayo kuyaphakanyiswa:
hlamba izandla ngensipho njalo
khohlela noma uthimulele kwiphepha eliyithishu noma emkhonweni wengalo yakho
ungakhohleleli ezandleni zakho noma ngabe sekwenjani, okungcono khohlela kwindololwane yakho
uma uphoqeleka ukuba ukhohlelele ezandleni zakho, ungathinti lutho olufana nezibambo zeziminyango, amafasitela, ingaphezulu lamatafula noma izitsha zokudla kuze kube usuhlambe izandla zakho ngensipho
Uma unezimpawu ezingcono, hlala ekhaya futhi nqanda ukuhlangana nabantu.
Ngifisa ukuniqinisekisa ukuthi ososayensi benza konke okusemndleni emhlabeni wonke besebenzisana ne-WHO ukuzama ukuthola ikhambi. Uma konke kuhamba kahle, ikhambi elifana naleli lingakhona ezinyangeni ezimbalwa. Kodwa, kunesindingo esikhulu kabi sekhambi nokukhiqizwa obukhulu bako bunganele – ubukhulu obungekho e-Afrika.
Ngifisa ukunibobonga ngesikhathi enibe naso sokufunda le ncwadi, futhi ngiphinde ngibonge ukubamba kwenu iqhaza okulindelekile ekudluliseni ulwazi nasekwehliseni imiphumela yalokhu kufa.

nguCHRISTINE HAMMANN
BANINGI abantu abadidekayo uma kukhulunywa ngokuzivikela elangeni ikakhulu kwabanebala elinsundu. Khumbula ukuthi ukonakala kwesikhumba kunomthelela ekushwabaneni kwaso kanti nomdlavuza wesikhumba uyanda njengoba amazinga okushisa eya ngokuya ekhuphuka. Kusemqoka kakhulu esikhathini samanje ukunakekela isikhumba.
Imisebe yelanga
I-SPF (Sun Protection Factor) efakwa kokokuvikela isikhumba elangeni ikuvikela emisebeni yelanga ebizwa ngokuthi yi-UVA ne-UVB.
Imisebe yelanga eyande kakhulu eye-UVA kanti ingangena onqenqemeni olumboze amafu nasentweni eyingilazi. Le misebe iba khona usuku lonke kanti iba mandla ngisho nasebusika.
Imisebe ye-UVB ihlobene nokusha kwesikhumba, iba mandla entwasahlobo, ehlobo nasekwindla kanti ishisa kakhulu ekuseni nantambama.
Ikhambi
Sebenzisa okokuzivikela elangeni okungenani okuneSPF ka-15 evikela isikhumba kulezi zinhlobo zombili zemisebe yelanga. Ushaye phansi uma ucabanga ukuthi isikhumba sakho esinsundu singavikeleka lapho ufake iSPF kancane noma ungayifakile nhlobo! Nakuba isikhumba esinsundu sine-melanin eningi esivikela ekushisweni yilanga, lokho akusho ukuthi imisebe ngeke isilimaze.
Isikhumba esinsundu naso siyaba nomdlavuza kanti utholakala usudale umonakalo omkhulu.
Kuliqiniso ukuthi imisebe yelanga ihlala ikhona uma ilanga liphumile kanti kufanele usivikele isikhumba.
Ongakukhetha
Ungayisebenzisi iSPF engaphansi kuka-15. Ikuvikela ku-93% kuphela wemisebe yelanga ye-UVB. Okunye, asikho isidingo sokuba uthenge okuneSPF ka-30 (ekuvikela ku-96%). I-SPF enesibalo esithe xaxa inamakhemikhali amaningi angasizi kanti ibiza kakhulu.
Khumbula ukuthi imisebe yelanga iyangena kwezinye izindwangu kanti kungenzeka kudingeke ukuba okukuvikela elangeni ukugcobe nangaphansi ezimpahleni zokubhukuda.
Kusemqoka nokuvikela izinwele elangeni ngoba nazo zonakala njengesikhumba. Ziyaphuka zome ngokwemvelo kanti ilanga lizomisa kakhulu.
Ubuso bunakekele ngendlela onakekela ngayo umzimba wakho. Owesimame ubonakala ngezandla, umqala nesifuba ukuthi uneminyaka emingaki kanti lezi zinto azibukeki kahle uma zishiswe yilanga!
Umthetho okufanele uwugcine - phatha iSPF yakho uma uhamba uyisebenzise njalo! [z]

Inkinga ngabaqashile
Ngiqashise ngendlu emzini wami. Oqashile kwaphela unyaka ekhokha kahle. Njengamanje sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu engakhokhi. Ngiyazi ukuthi ngokomthetho kudingeka ukuba ngilandele izinyathelo ezifanele uma ukhipha oqashile. Ngicela usizo lwakho kulokhu.
AS, Soweto
lUma uqashisela umuntu indlu noma ikamelo, nenza isivumelwano se-letting and hiring. Oqashisa ngendawo kuthiwa yi-"lessor," ekubeni oqashile kuthiwa yi-"lessee."
I-lease noma okuvunyelwene ngakho kungabhalwa phansi noma kuxoxiswane ngakho. Zombili lezi zivumelwano zamukelekile ngokusemthethweni uma kukhona ikontileka enivumelana ngayo. Lokhu kubalulekile, ngoba umuntu oneminyaka engaphansi kwengu-21 ngeke akwazi ukuthatha ikontileka ngaphandle kosizo lomzali noma lomuntu okunguye ombhasobhile.
Uma umuntu efuna ukuncika kwikontileka ye-letting noma ye-hiring, kufanele kube khona ubufakazi bokuthi kwenziwa ikontileka ye-lease nokuthi kuleyo kontileka kukhona okukodwa kwalokhu okulandelayo:
mIsivumelwano salowo oyi-lessor "sokunikezela ngento" koyi-lessee. Odabeni lwakho "into" yikamelo. Lapha indlela lokhu okwenzeka ngayo ngoyi-lessor enika oyi-lessee okhiye, kusho ukuthi umnika amandla okulawula ngabo.
mIsivumelwano kwabavumelanayo lapho oqashayo kuzokuba ngokwesikhashana. Igama elithi "okwesikhashana" lisetshenziselwa ukukhombisa ukuthi ubunini abushintshi nokuthi indawo iyohlale kungeye-lessor.
mIsivumelwano sokuba i-lessee ikhokhe irenti.
Kunezindlela zokubhekana nezinkinga zoqashe kuwe. Uma ufuna imali oyikweletwayo, mthumelele incwadi emphoqa ukuba akukhokhele - uma irenti ingakhokhiwe, kufanele umthumelele amasamanisi.
Uma oqashile, egcizelela ukuthi imali wayikhokha, kufanele akhiphe ubufakazi balokho.
Uma ufuna ukuthatha izinyathelo zomthetho zokwesulwa kwesivumelwano, khipha ubufakazi bokungakhokhwa kwerenti nobelungelo lokwesula isivumelwano.
Esivumelwaneni esenziwa ngomlomo, awukho umthetho wokusesula. Ongakwenza wukubekela oqashile eyakho imithetho nemibandela.
Lokhu kusho ukuphoqelela ukuba irenti ifike kuwena ngosuku oluthile. Uma ehluleka ukukhokha, mbhalele enye incwadi nokuyilapho wesula khona isivumelwano.

BONA ZULU - October 2005
KWAVULEKA umnyango wegaraji sazithola sesijamele izimoto ezimbili ezingamaBMW. Enye yazo ine-number plate ethi "Arthur," enye ithi "Cry 999."
Kuchaza ngokusobala ukuthi inkosi ye-kwaito isekhaya.
"U-Arthur akafuni ukuba abantu abaningi bazi lapho ehlala khona ngoba udinga isikhathi sokuba yedwa kanti futhi ungumuntu oyiqikelelayo impilo yakhe yangasese," kusho omunye wabasizi bakhe ngesikhathi esingenisa endlini.
"Ngiyanicela ningasho ukuthi uhlala kuphi."
Kwaba khona uhleko - wabe eseqhamukile u-Arthur Mafokate.
"Siyazama ukuyenza imfihlo indawo engihlala kuyo," kusho yena. "Kodwa uzomangala ukuthola ukuthi bangaki abantu abaziyo."
U-Arthur uhlala ndawana thile eMidrand. Ngaphandle kwale ndawo, kukhona nomunye umuzi awuphendulile wawenza istudyo sokuqopha - kwaba khona namagumbi okulala.
"Leyo ndawo ngeyalabo baculi abathanda ukusebenza ebusuku noma labo abangenazo izinto zokuya emakhaya emva kwama-shows asebusuku," kuchaza u-Arthur.
Cishe nsuku zonke uya ekhaya lakhe, aye estudyo nalapho kuhlala khona abazali bakhe nokuyindawo eseduze.
"Umama wami uyangiphekela ngakhoke kufanele ngiyolanda ukudla kuyena," kusho yena.
Umama wakhe uyazazi izidingo zokudla kuka-Arthur. "Ukudla kwami akufanele kube namafutha kakhulu noma ushukela ngoba ngiphathwa ama-ulcer," kusho yena.
Ekhaya indawo ayithandayo u-Arthur ikamelo lakhe lokulala. "Iyona ndawo enhle engithanda ukuba kuyona," kusho yena. Kodwa akasivumelanga ukuba sithathe izithombe zekamelo lakhe ngisho nokulunguza ngaphakathi. Ekameleni lami akungeni noma ngubani, ngisho nozakwethu imbala," kusho yena.
Uma engekho ekameleni lakhe lokulala, uzomthola esendlini enkulu. Namuhla kudlala isigqi se-albhamu yakhe yakamuva ethi Sika Lekhekhe.
Kodwa okusithathe kakhulu yizithombe ezibaziweyo - zabesimame nezezingane.
Uzithola emaphaseji, obondeni nangaphansi kwamatafula anengaphezulu eliyingilazi elibonisa okungaphansi.
Sabala ezabesimame eziyisishiyagalolunye nezezingane eziyisikhombisa.
"Izingane yizona zingelosi zami ezingibhekile," kusho u-Arthur.
Waphinde wasikhombisa izithombe ezibaziweyo ezimbili zabesimame abathwele izinkamba. "Ziyisikhumbuzo sokuthi abesimame babeyinakekela kanjani imindeni yabo beyokha amanzi emfuleni."
Namuhla u-Arthur uvakashelwe yindodakazi yakhe u-Owami ofana ncamashi nomama wakhe uQueen Sesoka.
"U-Owami uvamile ukungivakashela," kusho u-Arthur. U-Owami (3) uyakujabulela ukuhlala noyise. Njengamanje usethathe indawo yokuphuzela (bar) esemzini kayise njengoba esendlale amathoyizi akhe khona phansi.
"Uyathanda uma sifakela imibala ezithombeni ndawonye," kusho u-Arthur. "Ukubukela izinhlelo zeYo-TV naye kunginika lokho kuphumula."
Ngokushesha u-Owami waqala wacula: "He's got the whole world in His hands..."
Nakuba emncane kangaka kodwa izwi lakhe lihle.
Ngaphandle kwezinhlelo zezingane noma uMuzi Wezinsizwa, ohlekisa u-Arthur, uyathanda futhi ukubuka ezemidlalo.
"Ngingumthandi wezemidlalo," kusho yena. Ubukela yonke imidlalo.
"Kodwa ibhola yiwona mdlalo engiwuthandayo," kusho yena emamatheka.
Ngabe yiliphi iqembu olilandelayo"
U-Arthur waphefumulela phezulu wathi: "YiSundowns, Kaizer Chiefs, Orlando Pirates...iwona wonke. Elaphesheya engilithandayo yiBrazil."
U-Arthur uthe wayethanda izingubo ezibizayo kodwa manje usezigqokela ama-jeans.[z]
KWESOBUNXELE: U-Arthur nendodakazi yakhe u-Owami. Le ntombazanyana eneminyaka emithathu ifana ncamashi nomama wayo uQueen Sesoka kanti iyasithokozela isikhathi esichitha noyise.

Izingane ezizalwe zingenasisindo zingaba nesifo sendlala, zingazenzi izinto okumele zizenze ngesikhathi, zigule, zikhubazeke zife nokufa. Ekukhuleni kwazo ziba sengozini yokuphathwa yisifo sikashukela, i-high blood pressure, isifo senhliziyo ne-stroke.
Ukuqala kahle kuyawenza umehluko
Ngenhlanhla, kukhona ongakwenza ukuze uthole umntwana onesisindo esikahle.
Xukuzwa. Kusemqoka kakhulu lokhu ikakhulu kwabesimame abanezifo ezinjenge-asthma, ushukela ne-high blood pressure. Ukuziphatha kahle ungakakhulelwa kwehlisa izinga lokuphathwa yizifo.
Njengoba umsoco nokuba nesisindo esikahle kunomthelela ekukhuleni kombungu nasesisindweni ingane ezalwa naso, kusemqoka ukudla okunomsoco nokuba nesisindo esidingekayo. Ungawayeki ama-vitamin ne-folic acid.

Ochwepheshe bayavumelana ngokuthi ubisi lwebele lunika izingane ezizelwe wonke umsoco eziwudingayo, ikakhulu izingane ezizalwe zingenasisindo esikahle okumele zincele izinyanga ezine kuya kweziyisithupha. Ezemisebenzi
Owokuba wumkhandi kagesi
UMphikelwa Vezi ebheka i-DB board. Ukuxazulula izinkinga ngenye yezinto ebalulekile oyidingayo uma ungumuntu osebenza ngogesi.
SAXOXISANA nomkhandi kagesi uMphikelwa Vezi ngesikhathi ebheka inkinga kagesi kwenye yamasuphamakethe eThekwini.
Kungani wakhetha lo msebenzi-
Ngisemncane ngazifundisa mina ukukhanda izinto. Emva kwesikhathi ngasebenza engadini kodwa futhi ngihlale ngikhandela umqashi wami izinto ezisebenza ngogesi. Ngangisesesikoleni wangikhuthaza ukuba ngiqhube izifundo zami.
Ngangizithanda nezobuciko kodwa ngakhetha ugesi. Ngosizo lomqashi wami ngakwazi ukuphothula izifundo zeminyaka emibili e-technical college eLadysmith.
Yimuphi umsebenzi wakho-
Ngisebenzela inkontileka ekhandela inxanxathela yamasuphamakethe ugesi. Ngikhanda ngisethe kahle izinto zikagesi bese ngisombulula nezinye izinkinga.
Yikuphi okuhle ngawo-
Ukukwazi ukuzenzela umsebenzi wami nowasekhaya ngaphandle kokukhokhela umuntu okhanda ugesi!
Izinselelo-
Wumsebenzi ongakuniki isikhathi sokuphumula.
Kukhona okwesabisayo ngawo owake wedlula kukho-
Yebo, ngikhumbula ngesinye isikhathi ngikhanda i-DB board kwenye isuphamakethe nokwathi lapho ngiqeda ukususa uthuli kwenye yezinsimbi, ngabanjwa wugesi kwamnyama esitolo sonke.
Ngavaleka amehlo cishe imizuzu emihlanu - yiyo into eyangethusa kakhulu.
Yiziphi izinhloso zakho ngalo msebenzi-
Okwamanje ngifundela ilayisensi yokuxhuma izintambo zikagesi ukuze ngiqhube izifundo zami noma ngiyosebenza phesheya.
KUFANELE UBE NGUMUNTU ONJANI
Kufanele ube ngumuntu othanda ukukhanda nokwaziyo ukusebenzisa izandla zakhe futhi onganqeni ukusebenza amahora amade, abhekane nezinselelo nezinkinga.
AMATHUBA OMSEBENZI
Akhona kubantu abaqeqeshiwe abasebenza ngogesi ngaphansi kwezinkontileka, ezimbonini zemisebenzi, kuhulumeni nasezimbonini ezizimele. Iningi labantu abasebenza ngogesi elinamalayisensi lizivulela awalo amabhizinisi kagesi.
IHOLO
Okuningi kuncika emazingeni emfundo nasembonini okhethe ukusebenza kuyona. Ukwenza isibonelo, umuntu osanda kuqeqeshwa, angaqala ngemali cishe engu-R5 000 kuya kwengu-R6 000 ngenyanga noma kwengu-R15 000 noma ngaphezulu ezikhundleni zokuphatha, noma uma uziqhubela ibhizinisi lakho.[z]

Akakhohlwa lapho ephuma khona
nguFORCE KHASHANE
KWAKUKHONA isikhathi lapho abangani bakhe babemgcona bethi uzacile, kodwa namuhla uTuks Senganga ungaze ucabange ukuthi yisikhondla soqobo. Lokho kungenxa yeMafoko A Me (“My words”), nokuyiyo ethole indawo ezinhliziyweni zabaningi abathandi bomculo bakuleli yaphendula lo mculi we-rap waba ngomunye wosaziwayo abaphambili kwezomculo.
“Indlela abakhombisa ngayo abantu bezwe lethu ukuyithakasela i-albhamu yami yokuqala iMafoko A Me, ingenza ngizithobe kakhulu,” kusho uSenganga. “Ngiyakwazi ukumelana nezinselelo, kodwa angizange ngikulindele ukuthi ingathengisa ifinyelele ezingeni legolide ezinyangeni eziyisishiyagalombili ekubeni kuyi-albhamu ye-hip-hop.”
Okunye okwamthusa uSenganga, ogama lakhe langempela nguTumelo Kepadisa, kwaba amagama esiTswana athatha ngisho abalandeli bakwezinye izindawo ezweni lethu, nokuyilapho isiTswana singakhulunywa kakhulu njengase-Eastern Cape, Mpumalanga, naseLimpopo.
Lo mculi oshaya i-rap waseMafikeng bamqamba bathi nguSenganga esikoleni ngoba wayemncane ngomzimba. “Babecabanga ukuthi bahlakaniphile,” kuchaza uTuks. “Leli gama lichaza umuntu owondlekile oyisigora ekubeni mina ngangizacile ngimncane.”
Ukuze kungazweli ukumgcona kwabo, uTuks walamukela ngenjabulo. Kodwa abangani bakhe babengakaqedi. Elithi “Tumelo” lalilide kakhulu bengalithandi. Bamqamba ngendlela yabo bathi ngu “Tuks.”
Nakhona futhi wazama ukubehlisa ukumgcona kwabo ngokuba ashaye sengathi uthokozile ngaleli gama elisha.
Indawo yesifunda saseNorth West iyikhaya futhi kuPresley Chueneyagae, odlala emdlalweni owawina i-Oscar uTsotsi – kanti eyodwa yezingoma zikaSenganga iyezwakala kuleli filimu. Lokhu kuyinkomba yokuthi lo mculi uya kude.
Lapho ehamba khona ushaya ngemoto yakhe ebomvu iMini Cooper ayithenga ethakasela ukuwina owe-best rap artist kumaSAMA akamumva. “Manje angisahambi ngonyawo nokwenza kube lula ukuba ngifinyelele kuma-interviews,” kusho lo mculi.
Nakuba uTuks okumanje uphezu kwe-albhamu yakhe yesibili ekhombisa impumelelo futhi ehlala endaweni yabezambane likapondo enyakatho yeGoli kodwa akakhohliwe lapho ephuma khona. Noma yisiphi isikhathi asitholayo usisebenzisa ngendlela eyiyo ngokuba avakashele abangani nodadewabo eMafikeng.
Wawuthanda umculo eseneminyaka engu-9 ngesikhathi ebhala ingoma yakhe yokuqala. Ekuhambeni kwesikhathi waba ngomunye wabasungula iqembu iBonsai. “Emva kwalokho ngacula ngedwa,” kusho yena. Le nsizwa isike yaba yingxenye yama-albhamu ezihlabani ezifana noZola, Bravo noMorafe.
“Angizithandi izingubo ezibizayo nezicathulo,” kusho yena. Akuthandayo yisitambu, umdokwe no-morogo![z]

Ayikho
indawo enjengekhaya
U-Linah "Ebony" Ngcobo weMuvhango nomyeni wakhe odume ngelikaHashi Elimhlophe bakhula behlala ezindlini ezifulelwe ngotshani. Njengamanje indlu eniyibonayo ngemumva eyizitezi ezimbili ukuphakama ngumuzi wabo. Kodwa uMama
u-Ebony ukholwa wukuthi umndeni wakhe yiwo obalulekile ekhaya lakhe
SEKUPHELE unyaka ngihlala kuleli khaya. Ngalithanda ngoba lisendaweni ephephile. Mina nomyeni wami sihamba kakhulu, ngakhoke kuyasikhulula ukwazi ukuthi umuzi wethu nabantwana baphephile.
Enye into engibuye ngiyithande ngaleli khaya wukuthi linendawo evulekile ngaphakathi - ekubeni siyabathanda abantu, sivame nokuba nezifundo zeBhayibheli. Asilakhanga silisusa phansi. Njengoba ubona nginomndeni omkhulu, kudingeke ukuba kubekhona izindawo esizinwebayo. Sekuphele izinyanga ezinhlanu zonke silinweba. Kuyangithokozisa ukucabanga ukuthi lizobukeka kanjani lapho seliphelile. Ngiyathanda ukuhlobisa ngezibuko nomsebenzi wezandla wobuciko bakwelase-Africa.
Izinto ezinhle engihlobise ngazo ngazithenga ekuhambeni kwami eThekwini, eZimbabwe naseTanzania - kuningi engisakufuna.
Nakuba izingane zami ezimbili ezindala uNathi (26) noNtombi (24) sezishadile zingasahlali nathi, ezinye zisavakashile, ziyoze zibuye uma sesiqede ukunweba umuzi.
Kungenzeka ukuthi oJabu (21) noVusiwe (20), ezinye izingane zami ezimbili, bakutshele ukuthi angizwani nento ebhedayo. Ngingabafakazela ngoba ngihlala ngifuna ukwazi ukuthi bakuphi.
Ikamelo engilithanda kakhulu kuleli khaya yikamelo lami lokulala. Nakuba sisalilungisa, ngithanda ukuziphumulela kulona nomyeni wami.
Mina nomyeni wami siphila le mpilo oyibonayo. Singabangani, siyadlala sincokole - ngiziqhenya kakhulu ngaye.
Akusikhathazi ukuvulela abanye abantu ikhaya lethu noma ukushuthwa izithombe.

SISEKHAYA NO-BONA
UNathi (ogqoke ijakhethi emhlophe) noNtombi (ofake iduku elimnyama) abasahlali ekhaya, kodwa uJabu (ofake ijezi eliluhlaza) noVusiwe (owenze i-fringe) bazoba namakamelo abo.
U-Linah uhlobise ngombala omnyama nomhlophe endlini yakhe. Imifanekiso ebaziwe yowesilisa nowesimame yathengwa eTanzania.
U-Linah uthanda ukugcwalisa izikhala ezisendlini ngokwase-Africa.
Laba bashadikazi babeka izinto ezibalulekile empilweni yabo kuleli khosomba eliyisipesheli.

BONA April 2008
Sikhulume ne
‘nkosi yebhola’
Iningi labantu kumanje lithi akukho noyedwa kubadlali banamuhla abadlala eSA abanekhono elingaqhathaniswa nelalesi sihlabani. Namuhla leli qhawe liphila ngesondlo sabakhubazekile kanjalo nangeminikelo… indaba nguPeter Mashala
LELI qhawe uLucas “Masterpieces” Moripe lalinekhono elimangalisayo ebholeni kangangoba abalandeli babembiza nge‘nkosi yebhola’. Namuhla le ‘nkosi yebhola’ ayikwazi ngisho ukuhamba. Kumanje le ngqalabutho eneminyaka engu-60 iselulama emva kokuhlaselwa yisifo sohlangothi eminyakeni embalwa eyedlule, kanti ibhekene nesimo esinzima.
Okubuhlungu kuleli qhawe wukuthi phezu kokuzinikela kwalo ebholeni, namuhla akukho ngisho noyedwa wabaphathi bebhola abanendaba naye - nabanye abadlali asebathatha umhlalaphansi.
“Ngesikhathi ukudlala kwakho kuseseqophelweni eliphezulu, wonke umuntu uyakukhonza - uma leso sikhathi sesidlulile, bangabi nandaba nawe,” kusho uMoripe.
Njengamanje uMoripe uhlala endlini eklayekile enopende ongasakhanyi e-Atteridgeville. Uhlala khona nabashana bakhe nodadewabo abancane ababili. Kunamanye amakamelo asefakiwe abantu abarenta kuwona.
Ukuhlaselwa kwakhe yisifo sohlangothi kwenza idolo lakhe lakwesokudla elakhubaza ukudlala kwakhe laqhubeka lamhlupha njengoba esengumuntu ozihlalela kusofa asizwe abomndeni nabangani.
Ngaphandle komndeni wakhe, uMoripe usathola ukuxhaswa nokwesekwa ngumphakathi neqembu leMamelodi Sundowns nokuyiqembu angumlandeli walo wokuqina.
Umqhudelwano webhola owaqanjwa ngenhloso yokumhlonipha - iLucas “Masterpieces” Moripe Goodwill Games wasungulwa ngonyaka ka-2000.
“Iqembu leSundowns yilo kuphela abaxhasi balo mqhudelwano kanti minyaka yonke uPatrice Motsepe ungemukelisa isheke,” kusho uMoripe.
“Kunamanye amaqembu ama-amisha adlala kulo mqhudelwano nokuyilapho abawinile bethola R100 000.”
Kusayothatha isikhathi ukuba sibe nomdlali oyofana noMoripe kuleli - kusho omunye wababhali bezebhola.
UMoripe waqala kwi-Huns Sporting yase-Atteridgeville.
“Umdlali wePretoria Callies uPatrick “Let Them Dance” Molala wangibiza ukuba ngizobasiza ukuze bawine kuma-play offs ePepsi Cola. Lapho sashaya iMamelodi CCP ngo-3-1 kumafayineli sathola indawo kwiNational Professional Soccer League (NPSL).”
Waqokwa njengeNugget Sportsman Of The Year ngo-1970 eneminyaka engu-16. “Lokho kimina kwakuseyisiqalo sokufika kodumo. Ngaphinde ngaba yiCitrus Board Sportsman Of The Year iminyaka emithathu ilandelana.”
Waqokwa njengeNPSL Footballer Of The Year eneminyaka engu-19 ngo-1972.
“Ngamenywa ukuyodlala kwiWolverhampton Wanderers e-England isikhathi esingangenyanga,” kusho yena.
UMoripe wadlala emidlalweni ka-1974 phakathi kweSouth Africa All Black XI neBritish XI e-Orlando Stadium.
“Nakuba sehlulwa ngo-3-2, kodwa sakhombisa ukuthi ibhola lakuleli lizothuthuka.”
Washaya igoli lokuqala, waphinde wakha elesibili - abantu baqala bambiza nge “nkosi yebhola’.
Emva komdlalo wase-Orlando, uMoripe wacelwa ukuba ajoyine iqembu laseHong Kong i-Caroline Hills Football Club (CHFC).
“Ukudlala phesheya kwafana nokufezeka kwephupho,” kusho yena.
“Nakuba ngangithokozile, kodwa nganginakho ukukhathazeka. Okunye okwakungikhathaza wulimi - ekufikeni kwami ngathola ukuthi kunabanye abadlali abathathu basePitoli. Emva kwesikhathi, sajoyinwa wuJimmy ‘Grieves’ Mthombeni wamaZulu,” kusho yena.
EHong Kong uMoripe washaya amagoli angu-25 ngesizini eyodwa.
Ngesizini eyalandela, uMoripe waphinde wajoyina iCallies kodwa ngeshwa leli qembu ladliwa yizembe. Ngaleso sikhathi uMoripe wayeseqale ukuhlushwa yidolo esecabanga ukuthatha umhlalaphansi.
Emva kwalokho wajoyina i-Orlando Pirates. “Ngenxa yedolo, kwadingeka ukuba ngiyishiye iPirates emva kwesizini eyodwa.”
Njengamanje kunezingxoxo zokuhlongozwa kokuqanjwa kwenkundla iSuper Stadium e-Atteridgeville ngaye. Uma uMkhandlu kaMasipala waseTshwane uzamukela izimfuno zikaMoripe, kusho ukuthi uzothola umuzi omusha nemali engu-R1 million ngokusetshenziswa kwegama lakhe.[z]

UMA ubona uphawu oluthi "For Sale" ngaphandle kwekhaya lakho - qaphela. Kungenzeka ukuthi amasela awugade ngeso lokhozi umuzi wakho. UNonhlanhla unomuzi kanti amaqola aseke amenza isilo sengubo. Uhlala nomyeni wakhe nabantwana babo ababili eningizimu yeGoli.
"Ngolunye usuku ngiphuma emsebenzini ngabona uphawu oluthi 'For Sale' onqenqemeni lomgwaqo ngaphandle komuzi wethu," kusho yena.
"Ngamangala ngoba umuzi wethu sasingawudayisi, ngathatha lolo phawu ngalulahla."
Ngosuku olulandelayo wabona olunye lubekwe lapho bekubekwe khona olokuqala. Lolo kwakungolwenye inkampani ehlukile kweyayibhalwe kolokuqala kanti uNonhlanhla wafikelwa ngumcabango wokuthi mhlawumbe kukhona iphutha elenzekile. Walulahla.
Ngosuku olulandelayo kwabekwa olwesithathu uphawu kungolwenye inkampani. Nalo walulahla.
Emva kwesikhashana, wafika ekhaya wathola ukuthi kugqekeziwe. Kwantshontshwa izimpahla zabo zemali eshisiwe.
"Kwasikhanyela ukuthi la mabhodi ayelokhu ebekwa ngaphandle komuzi ayesho ukuthi izigebengu zingangena kalula ekhaya lethu," kusho uNonhlanhla.
Odayisa izindlu esaxhumana naye wathi inkampani yakhe ivame ukulahlelwa amabhodi okukhangisa. "Manje sesiyazi ukuthi aphelelaphi," kuqhuba yena.
Khumbula ukuthi abasebhizinisini lokudayisa izindlu akufanele babeke amabhodi athi "For Sale" eduze komuzi womuntu bengazange bathole imvume yokwenza lokho kumnikazi walowo muzi.
Uma umuzi wakho udayiswa, ungavumeli muntu ukuba angene ekhaya ngaphandle kokuxhumana nabadayisa izindlu!
Amakhaya amaningi asene-intercom emasangweni kanti uFayzel Kader oyimenenja enkampanini yonogada egada imizi uthi izigebengu ziyathanda ukwenza umsebenzi wazo endaweni ehlala abantu kanti ziyayisebenzisa ne-intercom ukuwubheka kahle lowo muzi.
"Zicindezela i-buzzer kaningana ukuze zithole ozoziphendula. Uma kungekho muntu ophendulayo, lowo muzi uyagqekezwa."
Wabuye wathi iposi elishiywa ebhokisini leposi libuye libe wuphawu izigebengu ezilugadayo.
Elinye iqhinga ezilisebenzisayo elokubeka amabhodlela angenalutho onqenqemeni lomgwaqo kubuye kubekwe neli-green eliwuphawu lokuthi umnini muzi uhambe ngo-8 ekuseni waya emsebenzini. [z]

UKUBA yisihlabani wumsebenzi kule ntandokazi yeTV uS'Thandiwe Kgoroge. Njengoba edlala indawo kaSiyanda emdlalweni Isidingo ugqoka izingubo zakhe zefeshini ephambili - kanti nokuzalwa kwengane yakhe yesithathu kule nyanga kuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo.
US'Thandiwe oneminyaka eko-30 ushade noTony Kgoroge ongomunye wabaqondisi bemidlalo yeshashalazi bakuleli abaphambili kanti emva kokuchitha iminyaka eyisikhombisa kwiGenerations (uS'Thandiwe) usekubheke ngabomvu ukudlala izindawo eziphambili kumabonakude nakuma-movie nokuba nomndeni omkhulu - nokuzibandakanya kakhulu kwezamabhizinisi.
"Ngaphatheka kabuhlungu ngishiya kwiGenerations ngoba kulapho ngaqala khona emidlalweni kamabonakude kanti kwase kusegazini kimina ukudlala indawo kaZoleka noZinzi," kusho yena.
"Iminyaka eyisikhombisa yisikhathi eside kakhulu umuntu edlala indawo eyodwa. Ngase ngizimisele ngokuqhubekela phambili. Nginomyeni ongithandayo nomndeni wami kanti nasekhaya kuhamba kahle ekubeni nelebuli yami yezefeshini nayo iyacathula iyakhula.
"Indawo abangethembisa yona emdlalweni Isidingo kwakungelula ukuba ingiphuthele - eye-accountant esebenzisa izimali ezishisiwe nezombusazwe ukuze izakhele umcebo.
"Ophrojusa bakuthokozela ukusebenzisa ukukhulelwa kwami kulo mdlalo, kanti imibono yabo ngoSiyanda iyahambisana nami: ungowesimame ozimisele ngokuthola yonke into."
Manje njalo phakathi nezinsuku ngo-6.30 ntambama, uS'Thandiwe kuyamthokozisa ukukhombisa ukuthi uSiyanda angenza noma yini ngenxa yembungculu eyisigelekeqe emdlalweni Isidingo kodwa futhi kube khona akuzuzayo.
Ngisho no-Barker Haines (Robert Whitehead) uyakuthokozela ukuhilizisana kwabo e-boardroom okungukushintsha izindlela ezimbi zokuziphatha.
Ngesikhathi uSiyanda esebhukula encintisana naye, izinhlelo zakhe zokuthuthuka, ziyazedlula ngisho ezikaBarker.
"UBarker onomqondo onzulu kwezamabhizinisi nokuyinto uSiyanda ayifunayo, ukuthandana kwabo kulawulwa nayinto eyedlula ngisho ucansi - imali," kuchaza uS'Thandiwe.
Isigubo nesithunzi sikaSiyanda sihambisana ncamashi nesalabo abathathwa njengabaphumelele empilweni yoqobo namuhla abagqoka izingubo zakhe zefeshini kanokusho yePoetry Museum.
US'Thandiwe waqala ngokuba aqashe i-rail yokuphanyeka izingubo zakhe zefeshini esitolo esincane sezingubo zikanokusho eDoornfontein, emva kwalokho wasizwa yizeluleko zabangani bakhe abanjengoSechaba Mogale weLoxion Kulcha wase evula esakhe isitolo endaweni yaseMelville. Kumanje unochwepheshe womsiki wengqephu amqashile kanjalo nosebenza ngobuhlalu.
Baningi osaziwayo emkhakheni wezokungcebeleka asebake bazigqoka izingubo ezinelebuli yakhe ezinemibhalo yamavesi ezinkondlo zakhe kusukela zaqala ukuba khona ngoDecember 2004.
"Okwamanje sifana nabantu abasacathula, kodwa ngenza konke okusemandleni ukuba umsebenzi welebuli yami uthuthuke uye ufinyelele ezingeni lokuthengiswa nakwamanye amazwe," kusho uS'Thandiwe.
Uzimisele futhi ukuzakhela igama eHollywood. Ngaphambi kokuba ajoyine Isidingo ngehlobo nyakenye waphuthelwa yindawo efilimini ethi Tsotsi, nokuyilapho ayezodlala njengowesi-mame ocebile, ingane yakhe eyantsho-ntshwa ngomunye weqembu lezigelekeqe ezisencane.
"Siyefana kokuningi nalo muntu wesimame. Uma isela lingantshontsha ingane yami ngingaliqalekisa," kusho kuvuma yena.
"Umngani wami uNambitha Mpumlwana nguye owathola leyo ndawo kanti uyidlala kahle kakhulu."
Okwamanje yena noSiyanda kufanele babelethe umntwana ngokomdlalo kanjalo nangokwempilo yoqobo.
"Enginganitshela kona wukuthi uBarker akusiye uyise!"
Ubaba kaS'Thandiwe ngumfundisi. US'Thandiwe wazalelwa e-Ohio eMelika ngesikhathi abazali bakhe beyofunda khona. Yena emva kwesikhathi wafunda esikoleni semfundo ephakeme eCanada.

Gcina ibanga eliyilo uma ulandela enye imoto!
Ngebanga elingu-100km/h imoto elingene enamabhuleki akahle ingathatha 163 metres ukuze ime. Uma wenyusa ijubane ngamakhilomitha angu-30 kusho ukuthi ibanga lokuma lingenyuka ngomunye u-100 metres - nokungubude benkundla yebhola. Ngebanga elingu-140km/h leyo moto ingama ebangeni elingu-301 metres. Lindela ukuhlale uvika ingozi emgwaqweni, ngoba ngeke uthembele kumabhuleki akho zikhathi zonke.
Landela enye imoto ngebanga elifanele - ukusondela kwenye imoto kakhulu ngeke kukusize usheshe ufike lapho uya khona, kodwa kungakwenza ungafiki.
Ungakuvumeli lokhu kwenzeke kuwena ngalesi sikhathi samaholidi...
NGESIKHATHI uJackson Mathebula ethenga imoto yakhe yokuqala wayengubaba wendodana eyayineminyaka emibili. Namuhla leyo ndodana yakhe isishadile ingubaba wabantwana abathathu kodwa uMathebula nanamuhla usahamba ngayo leyo Toyota Stout yakhe enkulu e-brown ayithenga ngo-1965.
Kule minyaka engu-40 eshayela le-bakkie yakhe uMathebula, uthi akakaze abandakanyeke engozini - noma athole ithikithi lokuhamba ngesivinini esikhulu.
Uyaziqhenya ngoba akakaze ashayele i-bakkie yakhe ephuzile noma ayinike omunye umuntu. Ijubane elikhulu asake ahamba ngalo wu-80 km/h.
"Ijubane liyabulala," kusho uMathebula. "Uma kudingeka ukuba ngiye kwenye indawo, ngiye ngihambe kusenesikhathi, ukuze ngingajahi ngizibeke engcupheni yokuba sengozini."
UMathebula, ongaphuzi futhi ongabhemi nguyise wezingane ezingu-12 oneminyaka engu-75. Wathenga i-bakkie yakhe emva kokuvula isitolo sakhe sokuqala endaweni yaseDan ngaseTzaneen ngo-1964. Namanje usayisebenzisa ukuqhuba ibhizinisi lakhe noma uma ehambisa iqembu lakhe lebhola emidlalweni.
Le Toyota yakhe ethembekile useke waya ngayo eGoli, ePitoli, ePolokwane, eMusina ngisho naseNelspruit eMpumalanga.
"Imoto yakho kufanele uyisevise njalo, ungavumeli ukuba omunye umuntu ayishayele ngoba imoto eshayelwa abantu abaningi ayihlali isikhathi eside.
"Imigwaqo yethu isiphenduke inkundla yomjaho wezimoto," kusho yena. "Izimoto zigijima kakhulu kanti nabashayeli abakwazi ukubekezelelana. Kunabantu futhi namuhla abashayela bedakiwe.
"Kungakho sinezingozi ezingaka - ijubane notshwala yizona zinto ezidala izingozi kakhulu," kusho yena. [z]
Neville Maakana/NewsFirst

Ngabe yini oyenza emva kokudideka komqondo wakho" Uhlanganisa enye intsha edideke njengawe utshale umoya wokuba nenze izinto ezingasile ezizodala uthuthuva esikoleni.

Okubalulekile wukunqanda umkhuba wazo.
Uma kunodlame esikoleni ofunda kusona kungekho sinyathelo osithathayo ukunqanda lokho kusho ukuthi nawe uyahambisana nalo.
Kufana nabantu abangayingeni eyokuvota ngesikhathi sokhetho - isenzo sabo sichaza ukuthi abanandaba nokuthi ubani obusa izwe. Labo bantu abalisebenzisi ilungelo labo lokukhala uma izinto zingahambi kahle (ngoba bakhethe ukungabi yingxenye yokuthathwa kwezinqumo ngokungavoti).
Uma ungayingeni eyokulungisa izinkinga, akufanele ukhale uma abahlukumezi sebehlukumeza wena.
NgokukaFat Charlie labo bantu bangcole ngaphezu kweziqhwaga! Nasemalokishini, abantu abathanda ukubonakala namaqembu ezigelekeqe bangcole ngaphezu kwawo.

ISELULEKO SOFEZELA:
Kufanele kukudumaze lokhu. Kuyenzeka esimweni esinjengalesi ukuthi umqashwa abone kufanele ukuba akhushulelwe kwesinye isikhundla noma kukhethwe yena esikhundleni sokuba kuqashwe omunye umuntu.
Ngeke ukhushulelwe kwesinye isikhundla uma kungekho sigatshana esivumelwaneni sokuqashwa kwakho lapho umqashi ethembisa khona ukuthi uyokukhuphulela kwesinye isikhundla uma kunesidingo.
Khumbula ukuthi ibhizinisi elomqashi kanti unegunya lokuqasha umuntu amthandayo.
Kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi kufanele ayishaye indiva imigomo ye-Labour Relations Act ethi kufanele alandele imithetho efanele uma eqasha.
Umqashi kufanele enze okufanele uma eqasha - uma kungenjalo, usuke ephula imithetho ye-Labour Relations Act.
Umthetho uthi umqashi kufanele aqinisekise ukuthi uqasha umuntu ozowenza kahle umsebenzi.
Kufanele aqhathanise ikhono lomuntu ofake isicelo somsebenzi nelomuntu amqashile.
Kuvame ukuba kusuke umsindo mayelana nesinqumo esithathwa ngumqashi ngoba lowo nalowo ofake isicelo somsebenzi ubona kufanele ukuba kuqashwe yena. Kuleso naleso sicelo kufanele kubhekwe obonakala engawenza kahle umsebenzi.
Ngeke kube lula ukuthi sikunike owethu umbono ngoba asinayo imininingwane yalowo othole umsebenzi futhi asazi ukuthi umqashi umqashe phezu kwaliphi iphuzu.
Kodwa ekugcineni, kusemahlombe omqashi ukuqasha lowo muntu amfunayo. [z]

Ukugcotshwa kukaMongameli – 2009
Masigubhe ukugcotshwa kukaMongameli omusha wezwe lethu! 
Izigidi zabaseNingizimu Afrika zabamba iqhaza okhethweni lwamhla zingama-22 kuMbasa kowezi-2009. Ngokuvota, abantu baseNingizimu Afrika babambe iqhaza ohlelweni lwentando yeningi lokukhetha uMongameli omusha wezwe. Njengoba sesiyazi imiphumela yokhetho, sekuyisikhathi sokuba kugcotshwe uMongameli omusha. 
Kuyini ukugcotshwa kukaMongameli?
Ukugcotshwa kukaMongameli kuwumgidi osemthethweni oyinkomba yokuqala kwesikhathi esikaliwe sokusebenza kukahulumeni omusha. Ngalolu suku, uMongameli omusha ufungiswa yiJaji Jikelele laseNingizimu Afrika. OMongameli bakwamanye amazwe, oHulumeni nabamele oHulumeni bakwamanye amazwe bayawethamele lomcimbi osemqoka. Kuba nomculo, nemigidi yesintu emcimbini wokugubha usuku. 
Kuyokwenziwa nini ukugcotshwa kukaMongameli? 
Kulo nyaka, uMongameli uyogcotshwa ziyisi-9 kuNhlaba kowezi-2009 kusukela ngele-11 ekuseni e-Union Buildings ePitoli.
Lubaluleke ngani lolu suku? 
Ngalolu suku sigubha okuzuzwe yizwe lethu ngokwentando yeningi kanjalo namalungelo kanye namathuba esiwathola eNingizimu Afrika ebuswa ngokwentando yeningi, engacwasi ngokobuhlanga nangokobulili. Lolu wusuku esingabumbana ngalo njengesizwe ukuqhubeka nokwakha iNingizimu Afrika esingaziqhenya ngayo. 
Ungaba kanjani yingxenye yokugubha ukugcotshwa kukaMongameli? Iziteshi ezimbalwa zikamabonakude nezemisakazo ziyosakaza bukhoma ukugcotshwa kukaMongameli mhla ziyisi-9 kuNhlaba kowezi-2009 – ubobeka indlebe!
Kuneminye imicimbi ehleliwe emiphakathini eyehlukene ezweni lonke – yiba yingxenye yayo! 
Uma udinga imininingwane ngomcimbi osendaweni yangakini, shayela ku 1020 (inombolo engakhokhelwa uma ushaya ocingweni lwasendlini).  
Sibumbene ukuphucula izimpilo sindawonye!
