Umzabalazo wabaseZimbabwe
Umbiko ngezwe elinezinkinga
Okwenziwa abesimame ngenhloso yokulwa nezenzo zikaMugabe…
indaba nguNICOLE ITANO/featurenet.co.za
BABENGAPHEZULU kwekhulu abesimame ababebuthene epaki elimaphakathi neHarare ngosuku lokhetho lwephalamende olwalungoMarch 2005 eZimbabwe. Babecula bekhulekela ukuthula. Ngisho nokuhlangana kwabantu bekhuleka kuyicala kuleli lizwe elise-Africa eseningizimu elibuswa ngesandla sensimbi…
Ababekhuleka bathelekelwa amaphoyisa ayehamba ngamaLand Cruiser abafaka ezimotweni ayehamba ngazo.
Ngalolo suku abesimame abangu-300, iningi labo okwakungomama nogogo, bagqunywa ejele kanti kubona abayisishiyagalolunye bashaywa kanzima kwadingeka ukuba balaliswe esibhedlela.
Phakathi kwabo kwakukhona noJenni Williams, owasungula iWomen Of Zimbabwe Arise, ebalwa ezinhlanganweni ezimbalwa ezidela konke zikhethe ukumasha ezitaladini ngenhloso yokukhala ngesimo esingesihle sezwe lazo.
“Abesimame yibona abahlukumezeka kakhulu ngenxa yezinkinga zaseZimbabwe kanti njengoba kuyibona abashayeka kakhulu, kufanele baphumele obala bakugxeke lokho,” kusho uWilliams, oseboshwe izikhathi ezingu-18.
“Sikhetha ukuboshwa sishaywe ngenxa yothando lwezwe lethu.”
Abesimame bayakhuleka, bamashe bakhiphe nezimbali ngeValentine’s Day ezinemilayezo ekhuthaza ukuthula kanti ugqozi baluthola enhlanganweni elwela amalungelo abantu eMelika nasemibhikishweni eyayiphikisana nobandlululo eSouth Africa.
Bathi yisiqubulo esithi “Wathint’ abafazi wathint’ imbokodo” esibamisa isibindi.
U-WILLIAMS waduma esakhulumela iCommercial Farmers Union of Zimbabwe yabamhlophe eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule ngesikhathi uhulumeni waseZimbabwe eqala ukudla amapulazi abalimi abamhlophe ewanika abamnyama.
Luningi uguquko oselwenzeke empilweni yakhe kule minyaka.
U-Williams useyisishoshovu enhlanganweni okwande kuyona abesimame abampofu abansundu.
Waqala ukusebenzela abalimi abamhlophe emva kokuba beqashe inkampani yakhe yezokuxhumana kodwa akathandi ukwenaba ngakwenza kwiWomen Of Zimbabwe Arise.
Wakhetha ukuhlala aqhubeke nomzabalazo kwelaseZimbabwe ngesikhathi iningi labamhlophe libaleka. Uyena kuphela omhlophe kwiWomen Of Zimbabwe Arise. Ngokusho kwakhe, yize noma emhlophe ngebala futhi enegama lesiNgisi, ezidalweni zakhe kukhona ezimhlophe nezingamaNdebele.
Umyeni wakhe wahamba namadodana abo amabili ebalekela isimo esasingagculisi kuleli lizwe kanti unethemba lokuthi izinto zizolunga umndeni wakhe ubuye.
“Ngihlabe ikhefu leminyaka emithathu ekubeni ngunkosikazi nomama,” kusho yena. Bekunzima kodwa umndeni wakhe uyameseka “Bayabona ukuthi silwela ukulungisa isimo kwelaseZimbabwe.”
EMVA kweminyaka emihlanu yokudlanga kodlame lwezombusazwe nengcindezelo, iningi labaseZimbabwe lisesaba ukugxeka uhulumeni phezu kokuba umnotho waleli lizwe ushona phansi kukhona nomkhankaso wokucekelwa phansi kwemizi yabantu eyimijondolo obizwa nge-Operation Murambatsvina oshiye abantu abalinganiselwa ku-700 000 bengenamakhaya izingane zangakwazi nokuya ezikoleni.
Isimo sezepolitiki eZimbabwe senza kungabi lula ukuthi abantu bazwakalise izikhalo zabo. Kunemithetho emisha enqabela abantu ukuba babambe imihlangano nephikisana nokugxekwa kukamongameli nabezokuvikela. Abashicileli bezindaba abazimele bavalwe imilomo kanti kunomkhankaso oxhaswe nguhulumeni olwa nabagxeka uhulumeni osufake ingebhe kwabaningi.
Njengoba lo mthetho kufanele usebenze kwabeseka uhulumeni nabamgxekayo ngokufanayo, ubukeka ucindezela kakhulu abezwakalisa izikhalo zabo ngohulumeni.
Lokhu kusetshenziswa njengendlela yokuvala imibhikisho nemihlangano yabo.
U-Arnold Tsunga, oyinhloko yeZimbabwe Lawyers For Human Rights emele amalungu eWomen Of Zimbabwe Arise enkantolo, uthi ngo-2003 no-2004 babengu-2 000 ababoshwa ngaphansi kwemithetho yengcindezelo.
Kodwa akukho noyedwa owashushiswa. Amalungu eWomen Of Zimbabwe Arise aboshwa ngoMarch agcina ephumile ejele emva kokwethweswa icala lokuphazamisa ukuhamba kwezimoto phezu kokuba umbhikisho wawo wawubanjelwe epaki hhayi emgwaqweni.
UTHABITA KHUMALO osenyunyaneni naye wake wahlukumezeka…
KwakunguMgqibelo ngoJuly ngesikhathi le ntokazi ilungiselela ukuvula umhlangano wabesimame abangamalungu enyunyana owawusehhotela eliseHarare. Kwangena idlanzana labantu lashaya ababesemhlanganweni.
Enye indoda yamshaya ngesibhakela ebusweni kwaphuma amazinyo. Kodwa lesi sishoshovu esilwela abasebenzi asizamanga ukubaleka noma ukufuna usizo.
UThabita useboshwe kaningana naye njengoJenni. Wake washaywa, wathunjwa ngabeseka uhulumeni, izingane zakhe zasatshiswa.
Abahlaseli bakhe wababona kodwa amaphoyisa amtshela ukuthi udaba lwakhe luthinta ezepolitiki akukho angakwenza ngalo.
UThabita uthi usazoqhubeka nomzabalazo.
“Alikho elinye izwe engilaziyo ngaphandle kwaleli. Ngizalelwe kulona. Ngifuna izingane zami zibe nempilo engcono,” kusho yena.
“Abesimame banesibindi. Kodwa siyazinyeza ngamandla ethu. Isimo saleli lizwe siyoshintshwa abesimame mhla babona ukuthi angakanani amandla abanawo!” [z]

'Uhulumeni ungenza lukhulu!'
Sixoxisane noJacob Zuma ngezinkomo, amakhosikazi, ubandlululo - nekusasa leSouth Africa
UJACOB ZUMA uyakuthanda ukufuya. Wakhulela emakhaya eNkandla KwaZulu Natal nokuyilapho azalelwa khona. Wayelusa izinkomo zikayise wafunda nokushaya induku. Isibalo sezinkomo zakhe sakhula saye safinyelela ku-100 kodwa zabuye zabhuqwa yisomiso.
"Leso somiso sangicekela phansi ngoba ngagcina senginezingu-30. Ngifuna ukuthenga ezinye ngoba ngiyalithanda iphunga lazo ngisho nelobulongwe imbala," kusho yena etshela abakwaBONA.
"Uma ngifika eNkandla, ngiye ngithi: nakhu engikudingayo!"
Maduze nje abe-KZN Taxi Owners Association kubikwa ukuthi bathengela uZuma ezinye izinkomo. Kwezwakala sengathi bamnika ezingu-18, kodwa yena uyayiphikisa le mibiko.
"Bangithengela ezingu-8 base bengihlabela ezine," kusho uMsholozi.
Baningi abakholwa wukuthi izindawo zasemakhaya kwezinye izingxenye zeKZN nezase-Eastern Cape azibhekelelwe kakhulu ngaphansi kombuso kaThabo Mbeki.
Njengamanje abantu bakulezo zindawo babeke amathemba abo kuZuma ukuba azithuthukise nokuyinto naye ayigcizelele ukuthi izokuba phambili ezinhlelweni zakhe uma engase abe ngumongameli wezwe.
Intuthuko
"Emasontweni amabili edlule ngangizihlalele khona emakhaya sikhuluma ngayo le ndaba," kusho yena.
"Abantu abasalimi. Kufanele sivuselele izinhlelo zokuphila ezindaweni zasemaphandleni.
"Kuningi esingakwenza enhlabathini ngenhloso yokuba sikhiqize okutshaliwe. Kungakhoke kufanele sikhuthaze abantu ukuba batshale. Abaningi bazimisele ngokuqala ukutshala ngoba indlala yokungasebenzi iyabaphoqa ukuziphilisa ngomhlabathi.
"Ngikholwa wukuthi uhulumeni kuningi ongakwenza. Ukuthuthukisa lezi zindawo kubaluleke kakhulu ekulwiseni ukungaqashwa. Abantu bathutheleka emadolobheni kwakheke nemijondolo eminingi. Kufanele sithole izindlela zokubhekana nalezi zinkinga," kusho uZuma.
UZuma usezakhele igama njengomxazululi ezindaweni ezinengxabano njengeyaseBurundi neyaseKZN.
Uphezu kwezinhlelo zokuxazulula ukungqubuzana kwezinhlanga ezahlukene ezindaweni zasemaphandleni uma kwenzeka eba ngumongameli wezwe.
"Asizange siyixazulule le nkinga kusukela ekuqaleni - ngoba sasithemba ukuthi izosombululeka ngokwayo," kusho yena.
"Sinabantu abahlala emapulazini, abasebenza khona kanjalo nabanini bamapulazi abangakaziniki isikhathi sokuba bayixazulule le nkinga."
"Umuntu ohlala epulazini uzitshela ukuthi njengoba esekhululekile, isimo sakhe sizoshintsha," kusho yena. Kodwa ngeshwa isimo somnotho sikhomba ukuthi lokho ngeke kwenzeke ngokushesha.
"Kufanele lungenelelwe lolu daba kutholakale nezindlela zokubhekana nalo ngempumelelo.
"Kufanele sazi ukuthi singabhekana kanjani nalokhu ngokomqondo. Sidinga isivumelwano esizosiza abaholi bezinhlangothi zombili bazi ukuthi bazobhekana kanjani nalolu daba."
Kodwa ukholwa wukuthi izigameko zakamumva zokucwasana ngokwebala njengesase-Free State University esaqoshwa kwi-video yinto engamukelekile nakancane.
Impumelelo

UBONNIE MBULI nozakwabo adlala nabo emdlalweni weTV, uNthati Moshesh noBrenda Ngxoli badlala izindawo ezimayelana nezinto ezenzekayo kubantu besimame empilweni.
IHome Affairs igxile kwabesimame abayisishiyagalolunye bemikhakha eyehlukene empilweni kanti bonke bakhuluma ngezimpilo zabo nangokuzabalazela ukuphila ngokocansi, ngokothando noma ngemisebenzi yabo.
UBonnie, owazakhela igama edlala indawo kaZandi emdlalweni iBackstage, uxwayise ababukeli balo mdlalo ukuthi indawo yakhe entsha kaNtombi izobethusa kakhulu futhi ibenze babone ukuthi impilo yakhe ayibambelele emidlalweni kuphela.
Selokhu ashiya kwiBackstage nakwiGaz’lam uBonnie useke wadlala emdlalweni oluchunge waseCanada wesizumbulu semali engu-R70 million nasefilimini yaseDenmark iZero Gravity.
UNthati ngomunye wabadlali abanekhono elimangalisayo oseke wazuza nomklomelo ophambili kwelaseCanada ngendawo ayidlala emdlalweni othi Human Cargo.
UBrenda ungowokuzalwa eTranskei kanti ngumuntu owathola ukuqeqeshwa enyuvesi. Emdlalweni iTsha Tsha udlala indawo kasomabhizinisi uMimi.
I-Home Affairs iqoshelwe endaweni yaseGoli kanti imayelana ngokwenzeka emphakathini - njengokuvakashela kwabesimame njalo emahhovisi abe-home affairs bezokwenza ushintsho ngokwezigigaba zempilo yabo.
UNthati udlala indawo kaThandeka, okungowesimame owaxoshwa kubo eseneminyaka engu-15 emva kokuthola umntwana.
Njengoba manje eseneminyaka engu-35, uphethe inhlangano ezimele (NGO) ngasophikweni lwezenhlalakahle - ngumuntu ongakaze ayibone ingane yakhe.
“Sehlukene kakhulu,” kusho uNthati. “Sobabili sineminyaka engu-35, kanti njengoThandeka ngakhulela emaphandleni KwaZulu. “Abangani abasondelene nomndeni wami babekhulelwa kungabi ndaba zalutho bajike bazithande izingane zabo, mina ngabona lukhulu ngokulahlekelwa yingane yami ngajike ngaxoshwa ekhaya.
“UThandeka akazange akuvumele ukucindezelwa yisimo sakhe kunalokho wazinikela ekufezeni izinhloso zomsebenzi wakhe wokunakekela inhlalakahle yomphakathi. Akanaso isikhathi sothando noma somndeni wakhe - uma indodakazi yakhe ifikile kuyenzeka bangakwazi ngisho ukubonana.”
UNtombi ungumsizi wasemabhanoyini ohamba umhlaba wonke - ulala nanoma yimuphi umuntu wesilisa afuna ukulala naye. Impilo yakhe ibuswa wukulokhu ehamba ethenga izimpahla zikanokusho nokuzidumisa emaphathini
Kodwa ngakolunye uhlangothi impilo kaNtombi ifana nefile kuBonnie Mbuli.
“Ngikuthokozela kakhulu ukudlala indawo yalo mlingiswa. Abesimame bama-uniform babukeka bengongcwelengcwele emphakathini kodwa ngaphakathi, abalungile,” kuchaza uBonnie.
“UNtombi isiphalaphala sentombi enhle, kodwa uma ufuna ukumazi kahle, ubobheka izenzo zakhe. Ungumuntu ongathokozile, ongenakhaya ongenakho ukuvikeleka nokuzethemba nokuyizinto okungelula ukuba uzibone ngoba zisithwe yimpilo engubukhazikhazi ayiphilayo.
Ngokwakhe ucabanga ukuthi umdlali osemusha ozokwazi ukuzakhela udumo kulo mdlalo nguBrenda Ngxoli.
UBrenda udlala indawo yomsubathi uVuyo Radebe, owasinda edlwengulwa abantu abaningi.
“Lena iyona ndawo yokuqala ephambili ukuba ngiyidlale kwiTV nokuyindawo engangikade ngifuna ukuyidlala. Ngidlala indawo yomuntu wesimame ongenandaba nempilo engubukhazikhazi,” kusho yena.
“Uphila cishe ngo-R10 ngosuku kanti nguye onakekela udadewabo omncane nokuyinto cishe eyenzeka kwabaningi besimame ezweni lonkana.
Abangophrojusa balo mdlalo bathi abafuni kubonakale sengathi abesimame yibo abasengozini yokwehlelwa yilezi zinto. Kodwa bafuna kubonakale ukuthi abesimame bazimisele ukubhukula kulo nyaka ka-2005 bakwazi ukuba bakhe ikusasa labo.[z]

Unyaka wokuqala wengane yakho
EZABAZALI
Kusukela uphuma nayo esibhedlela okokuqala seniya ekhaya kuze kuba wusuku lwayo lokuqala lokuzalwa, uzomangazwa yizigaba zayo zokukhula...
ZONKE izingane zikhula ngendlela yazo, ngakhoke ungaphatheki kabi uma ingane yakho uyibona sengathi ayikhuli ngendlela efanele. Ezinye ziyashesha kanti ezinye azisheshi. Kodwa lokhu uma kukukhathaza, kungcono ingane yakho uyise emtholampilo oseduze ukuba iyohlolwa.
Nanku umhlahlandlela wokufanele ukulindele onyakeni wokuqala wengane yakho...
EZINYANGENI EZINTATHU...
Ingane yakho ibicinekile ihleli esiswini sakho izinyanga ezingu-9, ngakhoke emasontweni ambalwa okuqala isingaphandle izolokhu ihleli ngendlela ebilokhu ihleli ngayo esiswini lapho uyisonge ngobhulankethi.
Kancane kancane, isizoqala yeluleke, ize ikhahlele, izelule.
Ekupheleni kwenyanga yokuqala ingane ingakwazi ukuphakamisa ikhanda layo kancane imizuzwana embalwa uma ilele ngesisu sayo. Izandla zayo zizovuleka zivaleke, iziyise ngasemlonyeni ibambe nezinto.
Izokwenza nemisindo ehlukile ithimule ikhale.
Uzohleka lapho ezwa izwi lakho, aphendule ikhanda lakhe abheke ngalapho kuqhamuka khona umsindo. Uzokhala lapho eshiywe yedwa, akhale ngezindlela ezahlukene zezidingo ezehlukene. Uzoqala futhi ahleke - lena yindlela axhumana ngayo nawe.
Ekubonayo: Ingane yakho izobuka ubuso ibuthi njo, amehlo ayo alandele izinto ezihambayo ibuke ngokumangala ukukhanya nobumnyama. Izokwazi ukuqaphela izinto ezijwayele nabantu abaqhele ngo-30cm. Kulapho izokwazi ukuqala ukusebenzisa izandla namehlo ngokuhambisana.
EZINYANGENI EZINE NEZINGU-7...
Ingane njengamanje isiyakwazi ukubamba izinto, izisuse kwesinye isandla iziyise kwesinye. Iyathanda ukwazi kabanzi ngezinto izandla zayo ezifinyelela kuzona... ngokuzifaka emlonyeni.
Iyazabalaza ukufinyelela ezintweni ezikude - ukwenza isibonelo njengokukhahlela ibhola libaleke lisuke eduze kwayo.
Useyakwazi ukudlala nokuzilalela ngomhlane abambe izinyawo zakhe nezinzwane akulethe emlonyeni.
Ingane yakho izoqala izigingqikele ezinhlangothini zonke lapho ilele ngesisu. Lokhu ekuqaleni kungamangaza ingane nomzali, nokuyisona sizathu okufanele ingane ingasali yodwa ingabhekwe muntu lapho isendaweni ephakeme.
Isisindo sekhanda le ngane yiso esisebenzayo lapho ingane izigingqikela kuze kube iyakwazi ukukhasa.
Njengamanje ingane yakho isiyalizwa igama layo noma uthi Cha! Iphimbo layo seliqalile ukuzwakala ekukhipheni o- "d," "b" no-"m."
Uzobe efunda lukhulu ngokusebenzisa izwi lakhe ekwenzeni imisindo ehlukene ukuze nawe umnake nokuyindlela yokuxhumana nawe.
Noma kunini kusukela ezinyangeni eziyisithupha, uzoqala aqhumise. Ngenhla nangenzansi emlonyeni ngaphambili kuqhuma amabili kuqala. Ngalesi sikhathi ingane yakho izokuba nokungazinzi, ikhale noma kwenzeke ibe nezilonda, izinsini ezibomvu. Izozwa ukweluma kwezinsini idinge ukuhlafuna noma yini.
Ezinyangeni eziyisithupha izobe isikwazi ukudla okuthambile kanjalo nokukugwinya. Ezinyangeni ezingu-7 izobe isidla kahle.
Ingane yakho ikhula ngokushesha isiqala nokukhombisa imizwa enjengokujabula, ukukhathazeka, ukudinwa, ukwesaba nokumangala.
Ekubonayo: Izokwazi ukwehlukanisa phakathi kwemibala eyehlukene ikwazi nokubona izinto ezikude. Isiyakwazi futhi ukulandela izinto ezihambayo ngamehlo.
PHAKATHI KWEZINYANGA EZINGU-8 NO-12...
Ngalesi sikhathi, ingane yakho izokwazi ukwehlukanisa "ukuphuma" "nokungena" iqale futhi ukuhlanganisa izinto ngokwengqondo namazwi nezithombe.
Kulesi sigaba ukuqonda kwayo amagama nolimi kubalulekile. Ibilokhu izama imisindo enzima. Izokwazi futhi ukuqonda amagama ajwayelekile afana no "dada'" no "gogo."
Uzozama futhi ukulingisa amagama aphinde akhombise ukuwezwa ngokuba asabele.
Kuze kube yimanje, ingane yakho isebenzisa isandla sayo sonke ukuze icoshe izinto - manje isizozama ukucosha izinto isebenzisa isithupha nocikicane.
Izoqala futhi ukuba ithinte izinto ngomunwe wayo ophakathi, ishayisane izinto ezimbili ndawonye, ikhiphe amathoyizi iwathululele phansi, ithathazele abantu.
Kusukela ezinyangeni ezingu-9, izoqala ukuthokozela ukudla ngeminwe, ifunde futhi nokuphuza enkomishini.
Kusukela ngalesi sikhathi, isiyakwazi ukuzilungiselela ukuma ngokubambelela ezintweni. Ezinye izingane kungenzeka zigaqe kusukela zinezinyanga ezingu-9 zikwazi futhi nokuhlala zingasekelwe.
Ezinye zikhonze ngisho ukushushuluza ngezinqe zisebenzisa izinyawo ukuze zidonseke.
Ekubonayo: Ingane yakho manje isizokwazi ukubona izinto ezincane (ngisho nemvuthu kukhaphethi), futhi yazi umehluko phakathi "kwaphezulu" "naphansi", "phakathi" "naphandle".
Onyakeni wokuqala, ingqondo yengane yakho izophindeka ibe nguhhafu kasayizi ophelele

8MARITZBURG UNITED
Lo mqeqeshi usewine izicoco zeligi ezine namaqembu amane ehlukene. Kuleli qembu uGordon Igesund kuzodingeka ukuba enze konke okusemandleni ukusiza leli qembu elisanda kukhushulelwa kulesi sigaba kuPSL.
U-Igesund wathatha indawo ka-Ian Palmer owaxoshwa emva kokuwina isicoco kwi-first division. Leli qembu le-Maritzburg yiqembu lika-13 lo mqeqeshi u-Igesund oneminyaka engu-52 aseke waliqeqesha ebholeni elikhokhelwayo kuleli.
9MAMELODI SUNDOWNS
UTrott Moloto wathatha izintambo zokuqeqesha ku-Igesund ngoFebruary. Lokhu kwaqala ngokuba abambe okwesikhashana. Wake waqeqesha neBafana. Ukuphumelela kwakhe kwiNedbank Cup kwamnika ithuba lokuqhubeka nomsebenzi wakhe kodwa futhi wazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi ikusasa lomsebenzi wakhe lilele ezandleni zomnini waleli qembu uPatrice Motsepe. UMoloto kuzofanele futhi abhekane nokugxambukela kukaTed Dumitru oseyi-technical director entsha yaleli qembu.
10MOROKA SWALLOWS
UJulio Leal nguye oseqeqesha leli qembu nokuzolenza lidlale ibhola laseSouth America njengoba kwenzeka eminyakeni engu-20 eyedlule lisaqeqeshwa nguMario Tuani. ULeal wahlala kancane kuMazulu ngo-2007. Ungumfowabo kaJairo Leal okumanje ungumsizi womqeqeshi kwiBafana Bafana.
11ORLANDO PIRATES
Umqeqeshi womDutch uRuud Krol ngomunye wabaphula irekhodi kwezebhola emhlabeni jikelele ngokuba abonakale kumafayineli amabili eWorld Cup.
UKrol waqala ukufika lapha eSA ngo-1995 engumqeqeshi wase-Egypt kanti useke wahlala kabili eqenjini leZamalek, wasebenza eBastia, eFrance, waba ngomunye wabaphathi kwi-Ajax Amsterdam. Lo mqeqeshi oneminyaka engu-59 waqala kwiPirates ngempumelelo yeCharity Cup.
12PLATINUM STARS
UMiguel Gamondi wabuyela kuleli ngoDecember wafike wahlenga leli qembu elase lilengela ehlathini. UMiguel ongowase-Argentine, emva kokuxoshwa yiSundowns wasebenza eMorocco emva kancane kokuwina isicoco seligi lapho ayesizwa khona nguNeil Tovey. UGamondi usezakhele elikhulu igama ekuqeqesheni.
13SANTOS
Emva kokukhethwa njengomqeqeshi weSantos ngoJanuary, wehlulwa emdlalweni wakhe wokuqala abaningi bathi ngeke ahlale isikhathi eside uDavid Bright owayengumkhuzi wezempi eBotswana. Wabamangaza ngokubeka leli qembu laseCape Town endaweni yesithathu phezulu nokwaba yinto eyaliphendlela indawo emqhudelwaneni wakwelase-Africa ngo-2009.
14SUPERSPORT UNITED
UGavin Hunt waqokwa njengoMqeqeshi weSizini emva kokuwinisa leli qembu isicoco seligi sokuqala ngqa. Lona futhi ngumklomelo lo mqeqeshi oneminyaka engu-44 awuthola ngesikhathi esekwiBlack Leopards. UHunt angingabazi ukuthi angenza umsebenzi omuhle nakwiBafana. Waqeqeshwa kakhulu kulo msebenzi njengoba aze athola nelayisensi yokuqeqesha ngaphansi kwe-UEFA ezikhokhela ngokwakhe izindleko zokuyofunda phesheya.
15THANDA ROYAL ZULU
Lo mqeqeshi ongowokuzalwa eSweden uRoger Palmgren ngomunye wabangu-8 abasemazweni angaphandle abakuPSL. Ngesizini yakhe yokuqala, leli qembu acishe ladliwa yizembe. UPalmgren phambilini wasebenza eSierra Leone naseNigeria.
16 WITS UNIVERSITY
Nakuba eseke wathola ukuhlonishwa njengoMqeqeshi weSizini kuPSL, uRoger de Sa akakaze awine indebe. Lomqeqeshi owake waba ngunozinti weBafana Bafana okuzothi kule nyanga abe neminyaka engu-44, waqala eqenjini leWits ngo-2001, emva kwalokho wadlulela kwiSantos ngaphambi kokubuyela eGoli ngesikhathi uBrian Joffe ethatha izintambo kuWits wase emheha ngemali enkulu yomholo zinyanga zonke. Ngesizini edlule leli qembu alidlalanga ngokugculisayo kangangoba laqeda kwisizini yePSL lingunombolo 12.[z]

Emva kwalokho owasithenga wangibopha ekhala ngokuthi owamdayisela isithuthuthu wathi kwakungesika-2002 wangasho ukuthi esika-1999.
Icala langilahla kwadingeka ukuba ngikhokhe inhlawulo ka-R2 300 nezindleko zecala.
Angingabazi ukuthi umngani wami akamtshelanga iqiniso umthengi. Ngifuna ukuba ayikhokhe le mali okwadingeka ukuba ngiyikhokhe ngaleli cala umngani wami abuyise naleyo engambonga ngayo. Ngabe ngingamvulela icala-
ISELULEKO SOFEZELA:
Ngokomthetho, kusobala ukuthi waqoka umngani wakho njengomuntu ozokudayisela isithuthuthu sakho.
Njengoba umngani wakho athi isithuthuthu esika-2002 kumthengi, kusho ukuthi wayeqamba amanga.
Uma uthola ikhophi yerekhodi lecala owavulelwa lona, njengoba kufanele ukuba kube njalo, kuzocaca ebufakazini obabuchitha wena ukuthi awumgunyazanga umdayisi ukuba akhulume amanga nokuthi wawungazi ukuthi ngeke asidayise ngokwethembeka isithuthuthu sakho.
Kuzobuye kucace nokuthi umthengi wazitshela ukuthi umdayisi umtshela iqiniso.
Uma usumvulela icala uzokwazi ukukhipha ubufakazi bokuthi akwenza wakwenza enolwazi lokuthi kungamanga kanti ngenxa yalokho umthengi wabona kungcono ukuba aluyise enkantolo lolu daba.
Kufanele ubuye ube nekhophi yencwadi owavulelwa ngayo icala ozoyethula enkantolo ukuze ube nobufakazi bezindleko okwadingeka ukuba uzikhokhe. Uma wasebenzisa ummeli ngesikhathi secala, kuzodingeka ukuba umngani wakho akhokhe nalezo zindleko owazikhokhela lowo mmeli.
Thola ikhophi yezindleko zommeli egunyaziwe noma umcele ukuba azofakaza ngemali owamkhokhela yona.
Uzomdinga ummeli kuleli cala. Uma akugculisa owamsebenzisa ecaleni lokuqala, cela ukuba akumele nakuleli. Kodwa uma unenkinga yokumthola sicela uxhumane nehhovisi loFezela eliseduze nawe ukuze sikusize sikutholele ozokumela.[z]

NGESIKHATHI uJonathan Butler eseyingane ehlanyisa abaningi lapho ayedlala khona kweloMzansi wakwelase-Africa, ukhumbula eqondwa ngowesimame kwenye yama-nightclub eThekwini ethi kuye, wena ngelinye ilanga ngiyokubona eCarnegie Hall, nokuyindawo ephezulu yezomculo eMelika.
"Ngangingenalwazi lokuthi usho ukuthini ngeCarnegie Hall," kusho uButler okumanje uneminyaka engu-47. "Ngesikhathi ngidlala eCarnegie Hall ngakucabanga sengise-stage lokho okwashiwo yilowo wesimame ngesikhathi ngiseneminyaka engu-7.
Kwakuyiminyaka yo-1970 ngezinsuku zebhendi iGolden City Dixies nemiklomelo yeSarie esasingayifanisa namaGrammy akuleli - kodwa futhi kwakuyisikhathi sobunzima, sobubha nengcindezi yokuba ngondle umndeni wakithi omkhulu ngisemncane."
Lo mculi ongumbhali wezingoma nomdlali wesiginci, umculo wakhe uwudlala ngezindlela eziningi njengeR&B, jazz fusion kanjalo nowoKholo. Isingili yakhe yokuqala kwaba ngeyokuqala ngqa yomuntu omnyama ukuba idlalwe yisiteshi sokusakaza sabamhlophe ngesikhathi sobandlululo lapha eSA nokuyiyo eyamtholela umklomelo weSarie.
Emva kwalokho kwalandela ukuqokelwa amaGrammy amabili.
Usuka kude
"Ngiphuma emndenini omncane lapho wawungekho ugesi, engekho amanzi, isitofu singaphandle," kusho uButler owayemncane kunazo zonke izingane ezingu-12.
"Ngisakhula emndenini wami, kwakukhona ubunzima ngoba kwakunezinsuku lapho kwakungekho khona ukudla imimoya iphezulu ngenxa yendlala."
Kusukela eneminyaka eyisithupha, wayesebenza njengelungu leqembu lomculo iGolden City Dixies, nokwakuyibhendi eyayihambela ezindaweni eziningi imtholisa imali ayeyinika umama wakhe ukuze ondle umndeni wakubo.
"Namanje ngisabondla," kusho yena.
Ikhono likaButler labonwa nguphrojusa waseBrithani uClive Caulder nokwathi lapho esemncane wasayiniswa ngaphansi kweJive Records, nokwadingeka ukuba ahambe aye eLondon ayohlala khona iminyaka engu-17 ngaphambi kokuyohlala eMelika lapho esehlala khona nonkosikazi wakhe nezingane zabo ezintathu.
Ukuzethemba
Ukuzethemba kwakhe kuyabonakala ngesikhathi exoxa ngama-shows akhe amabili abe nawo e-Artscape theatre eCape Town ngomhlaka 2 kulo February - emva kweminyaka engu-18 kusukela owayengumongameli wakuleli uFW de Klerk amemezela ukuqeda ubandlululo.
"Kwathokozisa kakhulu. Angikaze ngikubone ukuthokoza nokujabula abantu ababenakho bememeza becula bedumisa."
Hhayi ukuDumisa yena kodwa uNKULUNKULU.
Ukubuyela kwakhe eCape Town kwakuhambisana nezinto eziyizinkinga ezithinta isikhathi sakhe esedlule.
Ukuza kwakhe ukuzodlala kuleli ukuchaza njengento okwakuyinhloso acabanga ukuthi uNKULUNKULU kukhona Ayelindele ukuMbulela kona.
"Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ukubhekana nesimo somndeni wami. Ngaleyo ndlela kwadingeka ukuba ngibhekane kahle nalezi zimo zonke ngokulinganayo," kusho yena.
UButler ukholwa wukuthi abaculi abaqhamuka emphakathini ohluphekayo babhekene nobunzima bengcindezi yokungakwazi ukumelana nodumo.
"Yilo oluholela ekuweni kwabaningi, nakimina indlela yami ngisemncane yayihamba lapho," kusho yena.
Uthi kulokho wasizwa ikakhulu wukholo lwakhe eNkosini.
Isipho esiyigugu
Ngezikhathi zobandlululo uthi okwamvula amehlo yingesikhathi eya kwelinye isonto eGoli nokuyilapho kwakukhona abantu bezinhlanga ezehlukene bekhonza ndawonye.
"Lokho kwayishintsha inhliziyo yami - yingakho ngingenanzondo noma ukucasuka," kusho yena.
Umculo yisipho esiyisimangaliso uNKULUNKULU Amnika sona ukuze asebenze ezinhliziyweni nasezingqondweni zabantu. Njengoba esedayise ngaphezu kwamakhophi amarekhodi ayisigidi, uButler wakhipha ama-albhamu amabili ngo-2007 iBrand New Day neLive In South Africa, ukwengeza kwangu-13 edlule kusukela kwethi 7th Avenue, ayikhipha ngo-1977.
Nakuba udumo lwalumthokozisa esemncane kodwa uthi ulujabulela kakhulu manje ngoba luya luba ngcono usuku nosuku.
"Lamukeleni kancane kancane ukuze nikwazi ukulilawula kangcono kungafani nokulithola lonke ngasikhathi sinye," kusho yena eluleka abaculi abasebancane."[z]

nezimali zebhange
NGABE UNGOMUNYE wabantu baseS. Africa abakhala ezimathonsi ngezindleko zamabhange" Izinkulungwane zabantu baseS. Africa bazithola bempitshelwe ekhoneni, bephoqeka ukuba bavule ama-akhawunti asebhange ukuze kusizakale abanye abantu.
Funda ngalezi zimfihlo ngezimali ezibizwa amabhange ukuze ukwazi ukubuyisa amandla, unciphise izindleko zokubhenka. Nazo-ke...
Zithathe njengebhizinisi
Lokhu kusho ukuthi:
lHlaziya ngokucophelela unqume ukuthi yiziphi izidingo zakho zokubhenka: Ngokwenzenjalo ngeke uvume ukuxinwa ukuba uvule i-akhawunti ezokwenza ukuba ukhokhele izinto eziningi kunalezo ozidingayo.
lYazi uhlobo lwempilo oyiphilayo: I-akhawunti eshibhe kunawo wonke kungenzeka ingabi ngeshibhe kunawo wonke uma ungakwazi ukufinyelela emalini yakho ngaphandle kwezinkinga.
lHleleka: Amabhange amaningi ayakugcizelela ukuthi ikhadi lasebhange likwazi kanjani ukukunika inkululeko yokukhipha imali emishinini amahora angu 24 ngosuku. Kuyiqiniso lokho, kodwa thola ukuthi imishini yemali yasebhange lakho ikhona yini ezindaweni ovame ukuba kuzona. Ngaphandle kwalokho, ungazithola usukhokha imali yokusebenzisa iSASWITCH, evame ukwengeza okungenani uR5 ezindlekweni zokukhipha imali.
Uma une-FlexiSave noma i-ActiveSave Account yakwa-ABSA, khumbula ukuthi le mishini yasebhange esezitolo nasemagaraji, njalonjalo, ebhalwe ukuthi yesekwe u-ABSA ("supported by ABSA") izokukhokhisa R2,80 ngaphezu kwemali eyejwayelekile ekhokhelwa ukukhipha imali emshinini.
lKhumbula iminyaka yakho: Uma ungumfundi ongaphansi kweminyaka engu 24, bheka izaphulelo ongazithola emabhange ahlukahlukene njengoba amabhange ethanda kakhulu ukuheha amakhasimende asemancane ngethemba lokuthi azobambelela kuwo ungunaphakade.
Zikale
Ukuze uphathe i-akhawunti ngempumelelo kufanele uzazi ukuthi ungumuntu onjani ngasemalini. Zibuze ukuthi ingabe ungumuntu:
lOthanda ukuyiphatha bukhoma imali: Uthokoziswa ukuyizwa isentendeni yesandla sakho imali ngakho ukhetha ukuzikhokhela wena ama-akhawunti akho ngokheshe. Funa i-akhawunti okushibhile kuyona ukukhipha ukheshe:
uI-Postbank Smartsave ayikukhokhisi lutho ngokukhipha ukheshe kanti futhi nemali okwazi ukuyikhipha ayinkulu. Uma unale akhawunti ungakwazi ukusebenzisa ibhuku - ikakhulu maqondana nalabo abathanda ukubona izibalo phambi kwabo ngaso sonke isikhathi - kodwa kudingeka ukwazi ukufinyelela eposini kalula ngezikhathi elisuke livuliwe ngazo.
uI-FNB Smart Account ikuvumela ukuba ukhiphe ukheshi emishinini okukhokhwa kuyo ezitolo kanye nakuma-ATM amancane ngo R1,50 kuphela - kodwa isitolo okhipha kusona singakubekela umkhawulo wokuthi yimalini ongakwazi ukuyikhipha. Kungaya ngokuthi mngakanani ukheshi leso sitolo esinawo. Kwi-ATM eyejwayelekile ukhokha R6 ukukhipha ukheshi ongaze ufike emkhawulweni obekelwe ikhadi lakho.
uI-akhawunti yakwa-Capitec ikubiza R1,80 kuphela ukukhipha ukheshi wanoma yimalini ngesikhathi futhi uthola nezitatimende mahhala. Kepha yize noma leli bhange likhula futhi linezikhathi elivula ngazo ezingcono kunezawo wonke amabhange, alinawo amagatsha amaningi.
uI-Go! Account ikukhokhisa R2 kuphela ngokukhipha ukheshi ezitolo zakwa Pick 'n Pay, ikukhokhise R3 uma uzokhokhela impahla uphinde ukhiphe nokheshi.
uI-Mzansi Account ikukhokhisa cishe R4 kuya ku R5 ngesikhathi uma ukhipha imali emshinini, kuye ngokuthi yiliphi ibhange - kodwa uma ukhipha izikhathi ezingaphezulu kwalezi ezinhlanu ezivunyelwe ngenyanga uzokhokhiswa inhlawulo.
uI-Nedbank Transactor Account, eshibhile kunamanye ama-akhawunti oMzansi njengoba ikubiza R4,45 njalo uma ukhipha imali emshinini, ikunika into ebaluleke kakhulu, ithuba lokwenza ama debit order, iningi lama-akhawunti oMzansi elingakuvumeli ukuba uwenze okwamanje, ngaphandle kweyasePosini.
lUwumuntu wekhadi: Uthanda ubukhazikhazi obuhambisana nokukhipha i-credit card noma idebit card yakho futhi kuyakuthokozisa nokuthi awuhlali uphethe ukheshi omningi. Kodwa khumbula:
uUma usebenzisa i-debit card awukwazi ukusebenzisa imali engaphezulu kwaleyo onayo kwi-akhawunti yakho, kodwa ukhokhiswa imali ethile njalo uma uyisebenzisa - ngaphandle kwaseCapitec, lapho kumahhala khona lokhu. Amanye amabhange akukhokhisa phakathi kuka R1,50 no R4,90, kuye ngesikhungo esilikhiphile.
uAkufanele kube khona imali oyikhokhela ukusebenzisa i-credit card - kanti uma isitolo esithile sizama ukukukhokhisa, sicebe ebhange lakho.
uKunemali ekhokhelwa i-credit card ngonyaka. Amanye amabhange aseqale ukuheha amakhasimende amasha nawo asizakalayo, njengoFNB onikeza amalunga omndeni ikhadi lesibili mahhala. Uma ukhetha lokhu, khumbula ukuthi nonke kufanele nibambisane ekukhipheni iziliphu zokusebenzisa amakhadi ukuze ningazitholi senikhokha inhlawulo yokulisebenzisa ngokweqile ikhadi.
uGwema ukukhipha imali nge-credi card njengoba lokhu kuyinto engase ikubize imali enkulu. Uma kunesimo esiphuthumayo, khipha imali encane ukuze ungakhokhi imali enkulu.
lUwumuntu wamasheke: Uma uthanda ukukhokha ngesheke, qaphela...
uLena yindlela ebiza kunazo zonke yokukhokha, ngoba amasheke ayinkinga emabhange njengoba kudingeka athole imvume yokuwakhokhela futhi avimbele ubugebengu.
uUkukhokha ngesheke kuhamba kancane, njengoba isikhathi sokulinda ukuba likhokhelwe singathatha izinsuku ezingafika kwezingu 15.
uUma ucabanga ukuthi imininingwane yakho iphephile, cabanga futhi - inombolo yakho ye-akhawunti kanye nekhodi yegatsha lebhange lakho kubhaliwe eshekeni.
uIzitolo eziningi azisawemukeli amasheke ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu lobugebengu eS. Africa, ezinye zifuna omazisi - okungenye into engase ikulahlekele uma uhlale uyiphethe.
lUkhonze ukuqhafaza izinombolo: Selokhu kwathi nhlo uyayithanda inkululeko oyinikwa yi-ATM yokubhenka ngesikhathi esithandwa nguwe endaweni oyithandayo kanti futhi izinhlobo ezintsha zamaselula zaziwa uwena kuqala. Amabhange azama kanzima ukwenza ukuba amakhasimende kube yiwona azenzela umsebenzi wokubhenka, ukuze anciphise isibalo sabasebenzi nesamagatsha, kwehle nezindleko - kodwa cabanga ngalokhu:
uHlelela ukuba ama-akhawunti akho uwakhokhele emshinini. Lokhu kubiza ngokuthe xaxa kunokukhipha ukheshi, kodwa emva kokuya kanye ebhange uyokuhlelela lokhu, uyakwazi ukukhokha usebenzisa noma yimuphi umshini. Ayikho ingozi yokulahlekelwa ukheshi, yize noma kuzobe kusadingeka ukuba uligade ikhadi lakho.
uZama ukubhenka nge-internet. Ukwenza inkokhelo ngokuvamile kunezindleko ezilinganayo nalezo zokuyenza ngokusebenzisa umshini wasebhange, kodwa amanye amabhange akunikeza okunye okuthe xaxa njengezitatimende zamahhala kwi-internet. Ikhomphyutha esetshenziselwa ukubhenka nge-internet kufanele ibe nokokuyivikela ngokufanelekile, ibhange lakho lingakuchazela ngalokho.
uUkubhenka ngeselula. Cishe siphindaphindeke ka-20 isibalo sabantu abanamaselula uma siqhathaniswa nesalabo abane-internet ngakho-ke uyazibonela nawe ukuthi kungani kuthiwa amaselula ayikusasa lokubhenka ngaphandle kokuba uye ebhange lapha eS. Africa.
Bala izindleko zakho
Uma usuzazi ukuthi ungumuntu onjani ngasemalini, kudingeka ukuba ukhethe i-akhawunti ekufanele futhi ehambisanayo nendlela osebenzisa ngayo imali:
lBala izindleko ze-airtime yakho: Uma ufuna ukuthenga i-airtime, bala ukuthi kushibhile yini ukuyithenga kwi-ATM - noma ukuyithenga ngqo ngeselula. I-FNB Smart Account ikukhokhisa R1,50 ngokuthenga i-airtime kwi-ATM kanti i-ABSA FlexiSave ikukhokhisa R3. Kodwa ukukhipha uR250 emshinini wakwa-ABSA bese uyothenga i-airtime kuzokubiza R5,05. Okushibhe kunakho konke ukuyithenga nge-debit card yakwa-Capitec njengoba kuzokubiza 75c kuphela.
lHlanganisa: Khumbula futhi ukuthi uma ukhipha kaningi kwi-akhawunti yakho, uzokhokha kaningi. Ngakhoke uma ukhipha imali encane kaningi - ukwenza isibonelo, ukuze ukhokhele leso naleso sikweletu - kufanele ukhethe ibhange elizokukhokhisa kancane uma ukhipha ukheshi, noma elingezukukhokhisa lutho, noma ukhiphe isamba esisodwa esikhulu. Ngaphandle kwalokho, kushibhile ukukhokha izikweletu zakho usebenzise i-credit card noma i-debit card ehhovisi noma kwa-Easypay, nge-stop order uma i-akhawunti yakho ikuvumela lokhu noma ngesheke - futhi uyobe ungahambi uphethe ukheshi omningi.
lGwema ukukhokhiswa lezi zimali: Uma unenkinga yokungaholelwa njalo ngesikhathi, ungathola ukuthi uchitha imali eningi ngenhlawulo oyikhokha uma i-stop order noma i-debit order ingayitholi imali kwi-akhawunti - amanye amakhasimende akhokhiswa amakhulu ambalwa amarandi uma lokhu kwenzeka okungakufaka esikweletini esikhulu impela. Ngakho-ke bheka ama-akhawunti angeke akukhokhise kakhulu uma unale nkinga, njengeStandard Bank E-Plan ekukhokhisa R31,50 nje kuphela futhi engeqi ekukukhokhiseni le mali kabili kuphela ngenyanga, kanti iCapitec ingcono kakhulu ngoba ikukhokhisa R2 kuphela nge-debit order ebuyele emuva.[z]

I-Operation Dudula
Joyina impi yokulwa nomculo womgwinyathi
Usuke ungesiye umlandeli uma uthenga amaCD omkokotelo, ngoba lokho kusho ukuthi untshontshela izihlabani zakho uqobo
ESIKHULU: Uma uwuthanda umculo, ngeke uthenge amaCD omkokotelo kubantu abawadayisa emgwaqweni.
ZININGI izinhlangano ezisebenza ngomshoshaphansi ukukhiqiza amaCD omkokotelo bese ziwadayisa ngemali ephansi.
Emizamweni yokunqanda lobu busela, abaculi, ophrojusa nabanye abathintekayo embonini yezomculo, basanda kwethula umkhankaso i-Operation Dudula.
Njengegama lawo, lo mkhankaso uhlose ukukhipha lesi sihlava somculo womkokotelo.
Ingxenye yokuqala yeDudula yenziwa ngendlela yokuba kumashwe kuyokhucululwa umculo owumkokotelo ezitaladini nokuba kuqwashiswe umphakathi ngalokhu, ekubeni ingxenye yesibili yayibandakanya ukuqoshwa kweCD neDVD ngenhloso yokweseka lo mkhankaso.
Ingxenye yesithathu kuzoba wuchunge lwamakhonsathi kuqhutshekwe nokunxenxa abaculi abahlukunyezwe yile nkinga yokudlelwa amandla abo ngabanye abantu. I-SA ingelinye lamazwe angu-18 lapho umculo ongumkokotelo kunguwo odala ukulahlekelwa okungamaphesenti asuka kwangu-25 kuya kwangu-50 ekudayisweni komculo. Angaphezu kwamaphesenti angu-80 amaCD namaDVD angumkokotelo alapha eSA adayiswa eGauteng.
Ngo-2005 kuphela, angaphezu kwesigidi amaDVD, amaCD nama-games abanjwa ngabaphoqelela ukugcinwa komthetho.
URebecca Malope uthi kwathi lingakapheli isonto kukhishwe i-albhamu yakhe yakamumva ethi Umthombo, kodwa ayesekhona amakhophi omkokotelo ethengisa cishe R16.
Ongomunye wabaphathi beBula Records, uTshepo Nzimande naye ukuvumile lokhu. “Abaculi baziphilisa ngawo lo mculo abawenzayo. Ukukhiqiza nokudayisa ngokungemthetho akubakhokheli ngalutho abaculi.”
I-Nigeria kuthiwa yiyo ehamba phambili kulobu bugebengu emhlabeni njengoba inezizinda ezingu-8 okusuka kuzo amaCD namaDVD athunyelwa eSenegal, Ghana naseSA. [z]

UKUDLA kuhlale kumema nezimenywa ezingadingeki, okungamagciwane ukuba nawo eze emcimbini. Ukungenwa ngubuthi ngenxa yokudla okudlile, kudalwa amagciwane. Ubuthi yibo obenza uphendukelwe yisisu ugule.
Kungathatha kusukela emahoreni amabili kuya kwangu-48 ngaphambi kokuba uzwe ukuthi uyagula.
Izimpawu zalokhu zibandakanya ukucanuzela kwenhliziyo, ukuphalaza nokubanjwa amajaqamba esiswini.
Izingane, abantu abadala nalabo abanamasosha omzimba angaqinile ngokwanele bavame ukuba kube yibo abazwela kakhulu kulokhu kuhlaselwa wukugula njengoba bephelelwa
amanzi emzimbeni.
Kulabo bantu ukungenwa ubuthi ngokudla kungaba yingozi enkulu, ngakhoke kubalulekile ukuba welashwe ngokushesha.
Uma siphatha ukudla ngendlela enenhlanzeko, singakwazi ukuvikela abemindeni yethu ekugulisweni wubuthi bokudla.
Ongakwenza ukuze ukudla kungangenwa wubuthi
n Njalo geza izandla zakho ngaphambi kokuthinta ukudla. (Lena ngenye yezindlela ezingcono ekuvikeleni ukubhebhetheka kwamagciwane.)
n Qiniseka ukuthi umndeni wonke ugeza izandla emva kokubuya endlini yokugeza, emva kokuthinta izilwane ezifuyiwe, emva kokusebenza engadini nangaphambi kokudla.
n Geza izandla emva kokuthinta inyama ehlaza noma inhlanzi. (Izandla kufanele zigezwe ngensipho namanzi imizuzwana cishe engu-20.)
n Qiniseka ukuthi ugeza amakhabethe asekhishini ngamanzi ashisayo anensipho ne-bleach. Amabhodi oqobela kuwona kufanele ahlale ehlanzekile emva kokuwasebenzisa.
n Geza izitsha ngamanzi ashisayo. Khuhla osinki nemisele nge-bleach yokuhlanza izinto zasendlini. Izingubo nezindwangu, iziponji nezitsha kufanele uqiniseke ukuthi azinawo amagciwane ngokuzifaka izibulali magciwane cishe masonto onke.
n Ungakushiyi ukudla - noma yini engadonsa izimpukane, amaphela namagundane ngoba kuyingozi enkulu empilweni njengoba kuthwala amagciwane.
n Ukudla okuqandisiwe kufanele kubande kakhulu kanti futhi kufanele ubheke nosuku okufanele ukusebenzise lungakafiki.
n Kukhiphe iqhwa kusefrijini kunokuba ukukhiphele ngaphandle.
n Inkukhu iphekisise ukuze ubulale amagciwane. Ihlole nge-skewer noma ngommbese obukhali endaweni eseduze kwethanga; amajusi kufanele acwebe angabi nombala ophinki. Inyama yengulube ne-mince kufanele kuphekeke kahle ngoba uma kungenjalo, kuthwala amagciwane.
Ungalokothi...
n Ushiye ukudla emnyango isikhathi esingaphezu kwehora uma kushisa (emnyango).
Ukudla okubandayo kufanele kubande kakhulu, okushisayo kushise kakhulu. Khumbula ukuthi kuthatha isikhathi esingaphansi kwehora ukuba ukudla konakale uma ilanga lishisa kakhulu.
n Ucabange ukuthi ukuqandisa ukudla kubulala amagciwane. Uma ukudla konakele, ayikho into ongayenza ngako, kanjalo nezinongo nokhari.
n Ubeke imikhiqizo yamakhemikhali (efana nama-bleaches, izinto zokuhlanza endlini encane nokunye) endaweni eyodwa nokudla.
n Uthenge amathini okudla aboqokile noma ane-rust. Amathini abukeka equmbile angakufakela ubuthi.
n Ushiye ukudla okubolayo emotweni eshisayo.
n Usebenzise ipuleti elilodwa noma izitsha ezizodwa obuzisebenzisela inyama engaphekiwe, ungakaziwashi.
Indlela yokwelapha
Ukuphalaza noma ukuhanjiswa yisisu, yindlela yemvelo yokukhipha ukudla okonakele emzimbeni. Ezikhathini eziningi, kuthi lapho umzimba usukukhiphile ukudla okonakele, ogulayo aqale ukuba abe ngcono.
Uma uphelelwa amanzi emzimbeni, kufanele uphuze kancane kancane izinto eziluketshezi - amanzi, itiye elimnyama elingashubile kakhulu noma i-apple juice.
I-electrolyte solution ingakululamisa ngokushesha. Ungayithenga kunoma yiliphi ikhemisi noma uzenzele eyakho ngokufaka i-teaspoon kasawoti, isipuni sikashukela nelitha yamanzi abilile aphola.
Kudingeka uthole usizo lokwelashwa uma ukuhanjiswa yisisu kuthatha isikhathi esingaphezu kwamahora angu-24, noma uphalaza ngokwedlulele sekuthathe ngaphezu kwamahora angu-12.[z]
Phatha kahle ukudla
Ukudla kuba muncu ngokushesha ehlobo ngenxa yokushisa. Ngakhoke ungathathi amashansi - sebenzisa lezi ziyalo ukuze uvikele abomndeni wakho ekungenweni yizifo
nguGRACE KHUZWAYO
BONA - August 2005

Ezemisebenzi
IMBONI yamabhange isishintshe kakhulu kule minyaka eyedlule. Sezadlula lezo zinsuku lapho imenenja yebhange yayingabonwa.
Namuhla izimenenja seziyazibambela zisize amakhasimende nokuyinto eziyibeka phambili. Imisebenzi yasebhange isiyibhizinisi elinokuncintisana okukhulu kanti amabhange amakhulu anemikhankaso emikhulu yezokuthengisa neyezezimakethe eqhubekayo ukuze bathole amakhasimende amasha futhi bathembeke kuwo.
Indima yezamabhange ibanzi kanti ibandakanya, abantu, izinhlangano nabamabhizinisi. Imisebenzi eyenziwayo ibandakanya ama-credit cards, ama-akhawunti okonga nawamasheke, imali yokusiza ekuthengeni izimoto, imali-mboleko yezindlu, imali-mboleko yabafundi, nokusebenzisa ibhange nge-Internet.
UBONA uxoxisane nabanye babasebenzi ebhange lakwa-ABSA eThekwini abazinike isikhathi besitshela ukuthi kunjani ukuba yingxenye yezamabhange.
Oyimenenja jikelele uThemba Mathe usebe kule mboni yezamabhange iminyaka engu-18 kanti ziningi izinguquko asezibonile. “Ezinsukwini zakudala abantu babesaba ukuza ebhange bazobonana nemenenja yebhange.
“Manje amabhange asebonile ukuthi ikhasimende yinkosi. Njengebhange siyazama ukubhekela zonke izidingo kanjalo nokuvala igebe lezizukulwane.”
UXolani Mthembu uyimenenja yethimba lezabokuthengisa lamabhange angomahamba-nendlwana KwaZulu Natal. Waqala umsebenzi wakhe e-ABSA njengomabhalane emva kokuphothula u-matric wakhe ngo-1995.
UXolani wasungula uhlelo lwakhe lomsebenzi evakashela izikole ngenhloso yokufaka abafundi kwezamabhange. “Ngabona ukuthi kubalulekile ukufunda ngokusebenzisa ibhange kusukela ebuncaneni.”
Ukuzimisela nokuzinikela kukaXolani kwasheshe kwathela izithelo. Uhlelo lomsebenzi wakhe lokuqala lwaba yimpumelelo kangangoba manje usephethe ithimba labezokuthengisa elivakashela ezikoleni nasemabhizinisini KwaZulu Natal lithuthukisa umsebenzi webhange labo linike nosizo lwamabhange angomahamba-nendlwana.
Ongumabhalane wosizo lwamakhasimende uYolisa Bukaphi usebe embonini yezamabhange isikhathi esingaphansi konyaka. UYolisa wakwazi ukuba athole izifundo ze-industrial psychology ayezenza ngeposi. Umsebenzi wakhe ubandakanya ukusiza amakhasimende emibuzweni anayo. Lokhu kubandakanya ukufaka izicelo zama-bond, ama-credit card, ama-akhawunti okonga nanoma ikuphi okunye akubuzayo amakhasimende. UYolisa uye acubungule izidingo zekhasimende ngaphambi kokuba alise kumuntu ofanele ongumxhumanisi ukuze lithole olunye usizo lobuchwepheshe.
“Isikhathi sethu sokuba matasa wukuphela kwenyanga nangesikhathi selantshi,” kusho uYolisa. Njengomuntu ongaphambili, uYolisa uyibona indima yakhe iyinselelo. “Kufanele ulwazi lwakho lwezamabhange uluthuthukise ukuze amakhasimende angalokothi acabange ukuya kwenye indawo. Ngizizwa ngenelisekile ekusizeni nasekwelulekeni amakhasimende, ngiwongele nemali.
“Kuyacaca ukuthi imali ibaluleke kakhulu kubantu ngakhoke kufanele siqinisekise amakhasimende ethu ukuthi imali yawo iphephile nokuthi athola izeluleko eziphambili zochwepheshe nosizo.
“Ngingathanda ukuba wumxhumanisi bese mhlawumbe ngiba yimenenja yegatsha, kodwa njengamanje ngiyakuthokozela ukuba la ngikhona. Ngithola isipiliyoni kanti ngihlale ngifunda okusha njalo.”
Amathuba kwezamabhange
Indima yezamabhange ibanzi kakhulu kanti inochunge olumangalisayo lwamathuba emisebenzi. Lokhu kubandakanya:
ulwazi lwezobuchwepheshe (information technology - IT); ukuthuthukiswa kwezokusebenzisana nabantu (human resource development - HRD); usizo lwezezimakethe (marketing); olwezezimali; olokubolekwa izimali; elokonga (treasury) nolwezomthetho.
Amazinga okungena kulo msebenzi wamabhange abandakanya: abango-teller; omabhalane abasiza amakhasimende; omabhalane bezokusingathwa komsebenzi; ukugcinwa kolwazi (data capture) nokuba ama-collection agent.
Shayela ibhange olithandayo ucingo ukuthola ukuthi ikuphi lapho bevame ukukhangisa khona izikhala zemisebenzi.
Izikhala zamatoho kwezemboni yezamabhange kungenzeka zibe khona kuma-agencies ezokuqasha. Uma ungumuntu owufanele lo msebenzi nesidingo sikhona, lena kungaba iyona ndlela yokungena kule mboni.
Izidingo zemfundo
Amabhange amaningi namuhla adinga abafaka izicelo zomsebenzi babe ne-diploma noma iziqu ezihambisana nendima yezomnotho. Ama-diploma ezezimakethe noma iziqu nawo angakubeka ethubeni uma ufisa ukuthatha umkhakha wezokuthengiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwezezimakethe embonini yezamabhange.
I-National Diploma In Banking nayo iyatholakala kwezinye izikhungo zemfundo.
Amabhange futhi angabaqasha abano-matric abazothola ukuqeqeshwa ngaphakathi kulo msebenzi. I-Maths noma i-accountancy yizona zifundo okudingeka ube nazo ku-matric.

Ungenza umsebenzi wakho usimame noma udicileke phansi ngendlela oziphatha ngayo ocingweni. Nakhu okufanele ukwenze nokungafanele... indaba ngu-Inkosazane Sithole
UCINGO yiyona into ebaluleke kakhulu ehhovisi - uma umsebenzi wakho ubandakanya ukusebenzisa ucingo, ufana nomuntu omele inkampani yakho emphakathini. Ukuthi abantu bayibuka kanjani inkampani yakho kulele kuwena.
Ukusebenzisa kahle ucingo kwenza nabaphathi bakuqaphele. Iphimbo okuyilo elikhuluma ocingweni yinto engayakhela isithunzi inkampani yakho noma kuyidicilele phansi.
Zama lezi zindlela zokusebenzisa ucingo nokuyizindlela ezifundiswa emakolishi aqeqesha abazokuba ngonobhala. Lokhu kungakwenza ukhushulelwe nemali...
Ukuphendula izingcingo
Unga...luyeki ucingo ehhovisi lukhale lungaphendulwa.
Lu...zame ukulibamba ngaphambi kokuba lukhale ngaphezu kwezikhathi ezintathu.
"Bingelela" bese usho igama lenkampani - nele-department yakho uma kuyimboni enkulu.
Ukuxhumana
Unga...zwakali ukhathele noma sengathi ujahile.
Ma...kube nokumamatheka ezwini lakho - kube sengathi ukhuluma nomuntu osendlini yinye nawe.
Ukwedlulisa izingcingo
Unga...mshiyi esikhaleni umuntu engazi noma usumxhumile
yini kulo muntu afuna
ukukhuluma naye.
Phe...ndula esicelweni somuntu
ngokuthi, "Ngizobona ukuthi uMr Mkhize uyatholakala yini. Ungangibambela?"
Uma oshayayo engakakutsheli igama lakhe, mbuze. "Ngicela ukwazi ukuthi ubani okhulumayo?"
Uma kudingeka ukuba oshayayo umbambise kancane, khuluma naye uxolise ngokumbambisa.
Ukusiza
Unga...sho ukuthi, "uMr Mkhize ubhizi ngeke akwazi ukukhuluma nawe" - lokhu kukhombisa ukuthi akabalulekile njengoba enganakwa. Ungasho futhi ukuthi, "Ngiyaxolisa uMiss Mchunu usaye ngasese" - ulwazi olungenasidingo.
Yi...sho uthi, "Ngiyaxolisa uMr Mkhize akekho, noma ngeke akwazi ukuthatha ucingo lwakho, "Ngiyaxolisa uMr Mkhize akekho."
Lusebenzise lolu lwazi ngendlela ezokuba lusizo kuwena. "Ngingakusiza, noma ngingamcela uMr Mkhize ukuba akushayele uma esekhululekile?" Lokhu kusho ukuthi ungaxazulula inkinga encane ngokushesha - nokuzokwenza ubukeke kahle kumphathi wakho.
Uma okade eshayile umthembisile ukuthi nizomshayela ucingo njengoba udaba lwakhe luyaphuthuma, qiniseka ukuthi lokho uyakwenza.
Ukuthatha imiyalezo
Unga...cabangeli ukuthi uzwa kahle ukuze udlulise umyalezo oyiwo.
Mfu...ndele umyalezo wakhe ukuze ubone ukuthi usuku, isikhathi, indawo, izibalo - konke kuyikho yini. Cela ukuba akutshele indlela abhalwa ngayo amagama ongawajwayele. Bekela umphathi wakho umyalezo edeskini.

EMVA kokudilizwa kwakhe ebhange ayesebenza kulona njengonobhala, uDoreen Ngcobo wasebenzisa ikhono lakhe lokupheka ohlelweni alubiza ngo "Plan B". Lokho kwaholela ekusungulweni kweD's Décor ephekela imicimbi emincane njengama-birthday kuye kwemikhulu ehlanganisa abantu abangu-1 500.
Uhlobisa indawo umcimbi ozobanjelwa kuyona apheke nokudla.
U-Doreen usefundise intsha yasendaweni ahlala kuyona ukupheka kanti ubuye aqashe yona imsize emicimbini yakhe.
Ngabe kumphatha kahle ukuziqasha? "Yebo!" kusho yena ehleka. "Lokho akungatshazwa! Ngiyawuthanda umsebenzi wami kanti angicabangi ukwenza omunye."
UKUQALA
U-Doreen uthi kufanele ube ngumuntu okuthandayo ukupheka nokwenza umsebenzi ngendlela egculisayo. Emva kwalokho, hlala phansi ubheke ukuthi abantu endaweni ohlala kuyona bayakudinga yini ukuphekelwa.
Kuhle nokuthola ukuqeqeshwa. Iningi lezikhungo zeFET (Further Education And Training) linazo izifundo zokupheka ongazenza ngokugcwele noma okwesikhashana.
"Kusemqoka nokwenza izifundo zamabhizinisi ukuze ufunde ngokuphathwa kwemali," kusho kweluleka uDoreen.
Qala ngokuncane onako ukhulise ibhizinisi lakho ngenzuzo oyenzile. Iphutha elikhulu abantu abalenzayo wukuthenga izinto eziningi ibhizinisi lingakasimami bagcine sebengene ezikweletini.
"Ibhizinisi lami ngaliqala ngezingilazi ezingu-30 namapuleti angu-50. Manje senginezingilazi ezingu-500, amapuleti angu-350 nezihlalo namatafula angu-100. Anginasikweleti," kusho uDoreen.
Kodwa uma usaqala udinga isitofu ne-freezer okusebenza kahle.
Uma unquma imali oyifuna ngomsebenzi wakho, akufanele ukhohlwe yizindleko zokuthenga izinto ezifana noshukela nogesi - uma uqhubeka uthola amakhasimende ugcina usunolwazi lokuthi uzobiza malini.
Ukwethembeka kulo msebenzi kubaluleke kakhulu. Uma ufuna ukuba ibhizinisi lakho liphumelele qiniseka ukugcina isikhathi. Uma ungathembekile emakhasimendeni akho ibhizinisi lakho liyafa.
UKUKHANGISA
Ukukhangisa ibhizinisi emaphephandabeni kuyabiza ekubeni zikhona ezinye izindlela ongakhangisa ngazo.
Uma ungenayo ikhomphyutha cela umngani onayo akubhalele izincwadi zokukhangisa uzibeke ehholo lomphakathi, emasuphamakethe, ema-library, emitholampilo naseposini.
"Kuhle nokuba namakhadi ebhizinisi. Awami ngiwashiya etafuleni uma kunemicimbi engiyiphekelayo," kusho uDoreen.
"Okunye, uma umsebenzi wakho uwenze kahle, abantu bazotshela abanye ngawe uthole amakhasimende."
INZUZO
Inzuzo yakho incika emcimbini owuphekelayo nasesibalweni semicimbi oyiphekela ngenyanga. Uma uthola imicimbi embalwa emincane, wenza phakathi kuka-R3 000 no-R5 000 ngenyanga, kube u-R10 000 kuye phezulu kwemikhulu.[z]
Ngeseluleko mayelana nokuqala ibhizinisi lakho, shayela abeSEDA (Small Business Development Agency) ku-0860-103-703; Web: www.seda.org.za.

Ngagcina ngosuku olulandela olokuthwala esokuba nguMiss South Africa ngo-1996. Kwaba yisibusiso ukuba nguMiss SA ngoba kwashintsha impilo yami.
Ukugcina kwami ukuhleka...
Ngihleka nsuku zonke ngoba ukuhleka kungukudla komphefumulo.
Isikhathi engagcina ngaso ukwenza umqombothi...

Ngumama wami. Uthando lwakhe luyigugu kimina ngoba uthando lukamama lwehlukile. Engiyikona ngiyikho ngenxa yakhe. Wayengumsizi wasezindlini owayezihlupha ngezingane zakhe. Akukho ayengangenzeli kona ngesikhathi ngisafunda e-boarding school.
Ukugcina kwami ukuzivocavoca...
Izolo. Ngiya ejimini kane ngesonto ngigijime ngempelasonto. Ngaqala ukugijima ngo-2004 ngiseseLondon.

Imoto engigcine ukuyilangazelela...

Iqhawe lokugcina engilitholile...

Iseluleko engigcine ukusikhipha...
"Zethembe uziqhenye ngoyikona." Vuselela ukuzethemba kwakho uyeke ukugxeka izimo odlule kuzona uma ungakutholi okufunayo. Baningi abaholi abazakhele igama bekhulele ebuphofini. Ikusasa lakho lisezandleni zakho.

iziqu e-University Of Manchester wangitholela nomfundaze kwa-Investec. Ngaqhubeka ngenza iMSc kwi-Economics, ngasebenza kwa-Investec eLondon iminyaka embalwa. [z]

Kungani kunakwa izinto ezincane
Asifune tende lapha!
Ngabe unephathi" Kungani ungagxumeki itende emgwaqweni" Izakhamuzi zaselokishini sezicikwa yilaba bantu abangenandaba nomthetho nokuzenza zimangale ukuthi kungani amaphoyisa angenzi lutho ngalokhu ukuqinisekisa ukugcinwa komthetho. Lokhu kungayihloniphi imithetho sekuthatha elinye igxathu...
OMUNYE umuntu wathi, "ukungahloniphi yisona sono esikhulu kunazo zonke," yikho lokho okucekela phansi isizwe. Ngamanye amazwi, akuzona izinto ezinkulu, hhayi ubugebengu obukhulu, okubukela phansi ukuzinza kwesimo sezwe, kodwa bonke labo abaphula imithetho emincane bephindelela.
Izakhamuzi zaseSoweto zingakufakazela lokhu ukuthi lezi zinto ezincane ziphazamisa kanjani.
Cishe njalo ngezimpelasonto uzothola ukuthi kukhona ogxumeke itende lephathi, elomshado noma lomngcwabo. Kuhle. Kodwa inkinga wukuthi bawagxumeka emgwaqweni osetshenziswa wumphakathi nokukhombisa ukungayikhathaleli imithetho kamasipala, nokuxakekisa abanye omakhelwane.
Omunye wezakhamizi wasilandisa ngesigameko lapho omunye umakhelwane onamatekisi amba khona umsele onqamula emgwaqweni ngenhloso yokuvimbela abanye abashayeli bezinye izimoto ekutheni izimoto zakhe zingaklwebhi amakhumbi akhe uma epakile.
"Omunye umshayeli wemoto owayengenalwazi ngalo msele, washayela imoto yakhe yaye yayongena kulo mgodi yalimala," kusho kukhumbula esinye isakhamuzi sikhombisa okukhulu ukudinwa.
Kukhona futhi omunye umnini womuzi owagxumeka itende phakathi nomgwaqo emshadweni wendodakazi yakhe.
"Lelo tende lama lapho izinsuku ezintathu zonke," kusho kukhumbula omunye womakhelwane. "Akazange ameme ngisho oyedwa womakhelwane emshadweni. Wasenza saxakeka ngento esasingazuzi lutho kuyona."
Imvume
U-Edna Mamonyane wamaphoyisa kamasipala eGoli uthi nakuba eqonda ukthi abantu bayaphoqeka ukugxumeka amatende emigwaqweni ngoba Joburg's Metro police says phezu kokuba eqonda ukuthi abantu bayaphoqeka ukugxumeka amatende emigwaqweni ngoba amajalidi abo mancane kakhulu, kodwa kufanele baqale entweni elula - ukukhombisa inhlonipho.
"Uma ingane yakho ishada kufanele ucele komakhelwane bakho imvume yokugxumeka itende emgwaqweni nokuyinto ekhombisa inhlonipho," kusho yena.
Wengeze wathi, ukugxumeka itende emgwaqweni kungafanele ulandele imithetho ethile.
"Kufanele uxhumane nekhansela langakini bese kubakhona i-petition esayinwe omakhelwane bakho bekunika imvume yokuligxumeka.
"Sifuna umphakathi wazi ukuthi uma uphambuka uzobhekana nomthetho.
"Uma wehluleka wukuhambisana nale mithetho, lokho kungaholela ekutheni umuntu ahlawule R1 000.
"Ukwenza isibonelo, zonke izicelo ziyocutshungulwa ngamaphoyisa kamasipala, kuthi lapho kutholakala ukuthi lowo mgwaqo usemzileni wamatekisi, lowo muntu angayitholi imvume," kusho uMamonyane.
"Iziphathimandla zethu zizosusa noma yiliphi itende eligxunyekwe ngaphandle kwemvumo nakuba zingeke zikwazi ukuba zibe khona kuyo yonke imigwaqo zikhathi zonke. Ngakhoke sicela izikhamuzi ukuba zisishayele ucingo uma kugxunyekwe amatende emigwaqweni phakathi kwezindlu, ngoba iziphathimandla zethu mhlawumbe kungenzeka zingawaboni. Ngeke sikuvumele ngempela ukuba izakhamuzi zizenzele ezikuthandayo,"
Abawuhloniphi umthetho
Kubonakala sengathi ukwesabisa ngokubahlawulisa akwenzi lutho ukunqanda laba bantu abangacabangi abaphula umthetho.
Uchwepheshe wezomthetho uphrofesa Shadrack Ghutto uthi iSouth Africa iphuma esikhathini esedlule esingesihle nokuyilapho imithetho yezwe yayenzelwe ukuphatha uhlobo oluthile ngendlela ehlukile.
Lokhu kungalingani okuyingxenye yomlando esibe nomphumela wokuba abanye abantu bangawuhloniphi umthetho nokugcinwa kwawo.
Wabexwayisa ngokuthi lokho akusiyo neze into abangazithethelela ngayo.
"Noma ngubani ongawuhloniphi umthetho uyithuluzi ezandleni zalabo abafuna ukubukela phansi umbuso," kusho yena.
"Njengokungenwa izidakamizwa, ukungagcinwa komthetho kuqala kancane - kube nokudideka lapha nalaphaya - ngesikhathi esifushane, lokho okuncane kudale okukhulu."
Mawabonakale
Oyi-urban consultant uNeil Fraser uthi, uma amaphoyisa kamasipala efuna ukuwuphoqelela umthetho, kufanele aqale akhombise ukusebenza ngokuzinikela kube yiwo akuvimbelayo lokhu.
"Umthetho ungaphoqelelwa kuphela uma amaphoyisa ebonakala emigwaqweni," kusho yena.
"Ukubonakala kwamaphoyisa emphakathini kwenza abantu basabe ukwenza ubugebengu, ngaleyo ndlela lehle izinga labo.
"Ngabe amaphoyisa kamasipala anakekela ngokwanele"" kusho kubuza yena.
"Sengike ngabona amaphoyisa amaningi kamasipala edolobheni ehamba ngezinyawo esemkhankasweni wawo. Lokho yinto enhle, kodwa kwathi ngisalinde irobhothi ukuba lishintshe, amatekisi ayemile ekhoneni nangaphesheya kwezimpambano zomgwaqo ehlisa abantu - konke lokho ekwenza phambi kwamaphoyisa kamasipala.
"Awakushayanga-ndiva lokho ngoba ayezitshela ukuthi aphumele ukuzohlawulisa abahamba ngezinyawo."
Okwezakhamuzi zaseSoweto... kubukeka sengathi kusazodingeka ukuba zilinde isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba iziphathimandla ziqale zibhekane nemithetho yabantu ababudedengu abangawazisi umthetho - njengabagxumeka amatende nabamba imisele enqamula imigwaqo. [z]

indaba nguForce Khashane noSteve Makhanya
Indlela yokulwa nobugebengu
BONA ZULU June 2008
EZOBU GEBENGU 1
USAKHUMBULA ilokishi lase-Alexandra lisabizwa nge "Dark City" - lelo gama alilitholanga ngoba lingenagesi ezitaladini kuphela. Ilokishi lase-Alex, Sebokeng namanye aseSoweto njenge-Orlando neNaledi, amalokishi ayebalwa kwayingozi kakhulu eSA.
Babububi ngendlela emangalisayo ubugebengu obabenzeka kulezo zindawo ngezikhathi zobandlululo.
Ngabe isimo sesingcono manje?
Impendulo kulowo mbuzo uma sifunda ngemibiko yezigameko zokweba, ezokubulala nokucekela phansi emaphephandabeni ethu - ithi "Cha!" .
Vula iTV noma umsakazo, uzozwa ngesihluku sokubulawa kwabantu.
Izwe lethu ligcwele igazi. Kodwa isimo asisibi kangako!
Khohlwa yimibiko yamaphepha uzwe uvo lwabantu ezitaladini uthole ukuthi yini abayenzayo ukuze balwe nalesi sihlava. Okumangaza kakhulu wukuthi umehluko okhona ukulezo zindawo ezazithathwa njengeziyizizinda zobugebengu.
Ngamafuphi nje, izibalo zikhomba ukuthi lehle kakhulu izinga lobugebengu e-Alexandra naseSebokeng.
Kukhona esingakufunda kulawa malokishi ngoba wukuzinikela nokubambisana komphakathi okuxosha izigebengu. U-Teddy Martin ongusihlalo weGreater Orlando Community Policing Forum (CPF), Ngoako Mashao onguKhomishana e-Orlando Police Station noKaputeni M.H. Mbhense bavumelana ngokuthi yileyo imfihlo yempumelelo yabo.
"I-Orlando ibihamba phambili eGauteng uma kukhulunywa ngokwehla kwezinga lokugetshengwa kwabantu ezitaladini kodwa manje sesiholwa iSebokeng," kusho uMartin. Akanankinga ngalokho "kuqhudelana" - kungcono kakhulu ukuqhudelana ngokuthi yiliphi ilokishi elingcono manje uma kukhulunywa ngobugebengu kunokuqhudelana ngokuthi yiliphi elinenkinga yabo. NgokukaChomane Chomane weLesedi FM, iNaledi nayo iyaphumelela ekulweni nobugebengu.
"Izinga lobugebengu lehle ngo-80% endaweni yethu," kusho lo msakazi owaba nesandla ekusungulweni kweCPF othi basebenza ngempumelelo ngenxa yokubambisana komphakathi.
Yiluphi lolu shintsho olwenzeke eminyakeni engu-14 yombuso wentando yeningi olwenze ukuba amalokishi afana nelase-Alex, Orlando neSebokeng kube ngaphephile?
Ukuphathwa kwamalokishi ngesihluku ngesikhathi semithetho yobandlululo kwenza ukuba imiphakathi ibumbane. Njengoba ubandlululo selwaphela, lowo moya wobumbano usekhona kanti abantu babambisene ekulweni nobugebengu.
"Ngangingazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngiyosebenza esiteshini samaphoyisa," kusho uTeddy Martin. "Sasizizonda iziteshi zamaphoyisa - kodwa manje senginehhovisi khona."
Uma esebenza ngaphandle kwesiteshi samaphoyisa esise-Orlando usiza ngokwakha izinhlelo zokukhuthaza ukwethembana nokusebenza ngokubambisana kwamaphoyisa nemiphakathi ehlukahlukene elokishini.
Ngabe balwa kanjani nobugebengu? U-Martin uphawula kanje: "Akubi amaphoyisa anamandla athe xaxa okusebenza emphakathini. Manje senza izinhlelo zokusebenza ngokubambisana nomphakathi.
"Siba nemihlangano nyanga zonke ukuze sizwe izikhalo zawo sibonisane nangokuthi yini esingayenza ukuze silungise amaphutha ethu.
"Umphakathi ukhombisa okukhulu ukuzinikela uma kukhulunywa ngokulwa nobugebengu," kuqhuba yena.
"Sinabantu besilisa nabesimame abavolontiyele ukuvuka ekuseni ngo-3 bahambe ezitaladini baphelezele abagibeli abagibela amatekisi, amabhasi nezitimela. Abaholi mali ngalokho."
Abantu abenza lo msebenzi bayaqeqeshwa kanti bayakwazi ukubopha abasolwa babayise esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze.
Okunye, umphakathi awuhlali usonge izandla ubukele amavolontiya ezikhandla evikela abantu.
Kweminye imiphakathi, lowo nalowo muzi unikela ngo-R10 wokuthengela amavolontiya iziphuzo nokudla.
Uma umphakathi usebenza ngokubambisana, "sisheshe sazi ukuthi izigebengu zicashephi," kusho uMartin.
Akuvamile uzwe kuthiwa kudunwe imoto e-Orlando. "Ngenxa yalokho maningi ama-scrapyards asevaliwe izigebengu ezaziwadayisela izimoto zokwebiwa," kusho uMartin.
"Abantu bakhathele wukuhlukunyezwa wubugebengu kanti kuyabathokozisa ukusisiza ukuze silwe nezinswelaboya. Abaphehli bodweshu abanandawo emalokishini."
Ugcizelela nephuzu lokuthi impumelelo yabo incike ekubandakanyeni umphakathi nokwakha izinhlaka zokulwa nobugebengu ezakhiwe amakomiti asebenza ngokubambisana nabaqaphi namaphoyisa.
NGOKUKAKAPUTENI Mbhense amacala ayinkinga kakhulu manje yilawo athinta udlame lwasemakhaya nokudlwengula. Kwathinta ukudlwengula, yindlala enomthelela ngoba odlwengulwayo ukhohliswa ngokuthenjiswa imali kanti umdlwenguli kuba wumuntu osuke aziwa - okusho ukuthi lelo cala alibikwa kalula.
U-Portia Tshepe, oyimenenja eDonaldson Community Centre (DOCC) e-Orlando uthi izinga lobugebengu lehle kakhulu kuleli lokishi.
"Ekuqaleni, wawungeke ubonakale ugqoke umgexo noma amacici abizayo ngoba wawuphucwa. Izimoto zazihlale zidunwa. Kodwa lokho akusekho," kusho yena.
"Izinhlelo zokufundisa umphakathi esiziqhuba eDOCC zenza ukuba intsha izethembe izizwe iyingxenye yomphakathi obumbene."
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, amadolobha amasha aseduze kwamalokishi noma kwemijondolo yiwona asehlushwa yizigebengu.
"Izigebengu zibalekela kulezo zindawo ezingagadwe muntu," kuchaza u-Oupa Thobejane, onguKhomanda wethimba eligada eVosloorus e-East Rand.
Uthi zingu-30 izindlu ezagqekezwa esikhathini esingaphansi kwenyanga eVosloorus Extension 28, okuyindawo entsha. "Sabopha abasolwa abayisithupha sathola amaTV angu-14," kusho yena.
Ngabe ukuba nabantu abaqaphe emphakathini kusho ukuzibambela umthetho ngezandla? Cha, ngokukaMartin, uKhomishana uMashao noKaputeni Mbhense.
"Asikukhuthazi lokho uma sinemihlangano," kusho uMashao.
Manje kubukeka sengathi labo abaxoshwa wubugebengu emalokishini sebefisa ukubuya.
"Ukugqekezelwa nokuphucwa izikhwama kwangibuyisela eDiepkloof," kusho uMamokgethi Segoathle ongusomabhizinisi owabaleka kule ndawo wathuthela eSunnyside okuyindawo esedolobheni lasePitoli.
"Angikaze ngibe nenkinga selokhu ngabuya." [z]
U-Teddy Martin, usihlalo weGreater Orlando Community Policing Forum.
Eminyakeni edlule, imiphakathi ehlala emalokishini yabambisana yalwa nobandlululo. Manje ihlangene ilwa nesinye isihlava esiyingozi ngendlela emangalisayo - ubugebengu. Kunendlela entsha "yezinhlaka zokuzivikela" esungulwe abantu ukuze izitaladi zabo ziphephe kanti ngazo basebenza ngokubambisana namaphoyisa kunokuthi bazibambele umthetho ngezandla. Laba bantu bayisibonelo esihle kithina sonke.
UKhomishana uNgoako Mashao, eyingxenye yohlelo lokuxhumana nomphakathi.

Abagada ezitaladini banikwa umfaniswano ohambisana nejakhethi, ibhulukwe, ikapisi namabhuzu. Banikwa nethoshi, ibhukwana elincane lokubhala isikhathi umsolwa enze ngaso icala, indawo necala, kanye no-ova wokucela usizo uma isimo sishubile.
BONA ZULU June 2008
ISIQALO
Xhumana nesiteshi samaphoyisa sangakini ubuze ukuthi banazo yini lezi zinhlaka (ukuze ungachithi isikhathi sakho uvule into evele isikhona). Uma zikhona, cela imininingwane yazo ucele ukusebenza nazo.
Qala ngeCommunity Safety Forum uye kwiCPF nama-neighbourhood watches, ukuze wesekwe nguKhomishana wamaphoyisa endawo noMnyango wezaseKhaya neminye iminyango kahulumeni. UNgqongqoshe uNqakula wathembisa ukuthi amaCommunity Safety Forums abhalisiwe azoxhaswa ngamahhovisi nemali yokukhokhela izindleko zawo. Buza ngalokhu ulufune lolu sizo uma kunesidingo.
Nika abantu izikhundla ezibafanele. Mabasebenzise amakhono abavele
benawo kunokuqala phansi ubaqeqeshe. Ngasohlangothini
lokusebenzisana namaphoyisa, khetha asezikhundleni eziphezulu
azokusiza uma ususebenza nawo.
Sebenzani ngokukhuthala uma seniqalile. Abantu bavame ukusungula izinhlaka zokulwisana nobugebengu ngomdlandla uma besaqala kodwa ubaphelele uma bengatholi mbiko noma benganconywa uma besebenze kahle.
Uma isiteshi samaphoyisa esisendaweni yangakini singabambisene nani, dlulisa udaba lwakho kwabangaphezulu - uMnyango wezokuPhepha koMphakathi nokuXhumana uzokusiza ukuze udaba lwakho lusukunyelwe.
Bhalela iziphathimandla zamaphoyisa uzihluphe uma ubona ukuthi udaba lwakho alusukunyelwa. Okunye, ncoma amaphoyisa uma ewenza kahle umsebenzi wawo.
IZELULEKO
Esakhula uTolbart Ngobese nabangani bakhe, babevame ukuphanga abantu ezitaladini zase-Orlando.
"Abantu sasibacuthela kusihlwa eziteshini zezitimela uma bephuma emsebenzini sibaphuce imali ukuze sithenge utshwala nogwayi," kusho yena.
Manje usesebenza nengalo yomthetho. "Ngathatha isinqumo sokuhlukana nobugebengu emva kokugwetshwa kwabangani bami iminyaka ejele."
Manje ungubaba nosomabhizinisi kanti "isipiliyoni" anaso senza ukuba kube lula ukubamba izigebengu.
Nalu ulwazi athanda ukulucobelela abanye ukuze bangadlali izigebengu:
Abesimame abaphuza ukuphuma emsebenzini bagibele izinto zokuthutha umphakathi kufanele bacele umuntu ozobaphelezela uma begoduka.
Ungahambi wedwa endaweni engenabantu.
Tshela umakhelwane omethembayo uma uzohamba izinsuku ezimbalwa ekhaya ukuze akugadele.
Qaphela uma uphuze utshwala - izigebengu zikuhlasela kalula.
OKUNYE OKUYICALA
Abazali abahlushwa yizingane noma abazukulu abafuna imali ngenkani kufanele bakubike lokho esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze. Lokho kuyicala kanti kwandile emalokishini nakwezinye izindawo.
IZINHLAKA EZIMQOKA
Ama-neighbourhood watches, community policing forums nama-community safety forums awagcini ngokusebenza ngokubambisana ukuze izigebengu zingacanasi nje kuphela kodwa abuye agade akhuthaze amaphoyisa okufanele avikele umphakathi.
AmaNeighbourhood watches:
Abantu abahlala kuleyo ndawo bayavumelana ngokuthi bazogada izephula-mthetho. Baxhumana bodwa babuye baxhumane namaphoyisa, bavolontiyele ukugada izitaladi kusihlwa kanti benza kube nzima ukuthi izigebengu zizicanasele.
AmaCommunity Policing Forums:
Ngamafuphi abizwa ngamaCPF. Zonke iziteshi zamaphoyisa ziphoqwe wumthetho ukuba ziwaseke, anekomiti elakhiwe yizakhamizi, izinhlangano zenkolo, izinhlangano zentsha, amaqembu ezemidlalo, yizinhlangano zamatekisi, amakhansela nosomabhizinisi abasebenzisa leso siteshi samaphoyisa, kanye neziphathimandla zamaphoyisa ezisebenzela kuleso siteshi.
AmaCPF avame ukumela wonke ama-neighbourhood watches asebenzisana nesiteshi samaphoyisa esibandakanyekayo.
I-Community Safety Forum:
Isebenza endaweni ebanzi kunamaCPF - kungenzeka isebenze ezindaweni ezisizwa yiziteshi zamaphoyisa ezinhlanu noma eziyisithupha - kanti yenza okungaphezu kokubamba izephula-mthetho. NgoMay ngonyaka odlule, uCharles Nqakula, uNgqongqoshe wezokuPhepha nokuVikela wathi lolu hlaka olusha luzonikwa amandla athe xaxa kunama-neighbourhood watches namaCPF.
Isebenzisana neminyango kahulumeni njengowezaseKhaya ukuze kugadwe abangena kuleli ngokungemthetho, isize noMnyango wezokuHlumeleliswa kweziMilo ukuze kuboniswane ngezinhlelo zokubuyiselwa kweziboshwa ezisemajele emphakathini uma seziqede izigwebo zazo ibuye isebenze noMnyango wezobuLungiswa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu banolwazi ngamalungelo abo.
- GAVIN FOSTER

BONA ZULU November 2008
SIYADUMAZA! Lena iyona ndlela esingasichaza ngayo isimo sebhola neminye imidlalo eSoweto. Sakhombisa okukhulu ukujabula ngesikhathi sinikwa igunya lokubamba imidlalo yeNdebe yoMhlaba ka-2010, kodwa akekho owazihlupha ngokuba kulungiswe isimo seqembu lethu lesizwe. I-Soweto iyona ndawo enhle kakhulu yokuqala sibheke sibone ukuthi konakele kuphi.
I-Soweto kufanele ngabe indawo ephakela kakhulu imidlalo eminingi ngamathalente amaningi. Kodwa njenganoma iyiphi indawo, umona nepolitiki sekube nomthelela omubi ngokungenelela kwezemidlalo kuleli lokishi elaba wukukhanya okuphambili emzabalazweni wenkululeko.
Maduze nje, ukwenza isibonelo, izikhulu zebhola zethuka kakhulu ukubona izindlu zakhiwe kwenye yezinkundla zezemidlalo endala eSoweto eyaziwa ngokuthi yiSputnik.
Kukule nkundla eseduze kwasehostela laseMeadowlands elidala lapho kwaqhamuka khona izihlabani zebhola ezifana no-Neo "City Late" Lichaba noRhyder Mofokeng.
"Akekho owake wasitshela ukuthi kuzokwakhiwa izindlu ezinkundleni zebhola," kusho oyisikhulu ebholeni lama-amisha uHenry Mchunu. "Savuka ekuseni ngelinye ilanga sabona sekumbiwe imisele. Lokhu kubulala umphakathi wethu kuncishe nezingane zethu ithuba lokudlala ibhola. Kwathi lapho sikhalaza kubakhi sithi asinayo enye indawo yokudlala umdlalo esiwuthandayo basibuza bathi: 'Nifuna indawo yokulala noma inkundla yebhola?'"
Kwaphela izinsuku ezingaphezu kwezinhlanu sizama ukuxoxisana noMnyango weziNdlu eGauteng mayelana nenkundla
yebhola iSputnik
kodwa
lokho akuzange kube yimpumelelo.
Sonke sasikholwa wukuthi kuzokuba nenkulu intuthuko kwemidlalo kwiSouth Africa eNtsha kodwa kwenzeka okwehlukile.
NGISHO ngabe uyakukholwa lokhu noma cha, uhulumeni wobandlululo kubukeka wenza lukhulu ukuthuthukisa amakhono kwezemidlalo - ikakhulu emazingeni asezikoleni.
Lokho kuyiqiniso ngendawo yaseSoweto nokuyilapho i-Altem Secondary e-Orlando East kwabonakala kulezo zinkundla izihlabani ezifana noJomo Sono, Kaizer Motaung, Percy "Chippa" Moloi no-Ephraim "Shakes" Mashaba baqala khona ukudlala ibhola.
Ngaleso sikhathi iSputnik nezinye izindawo e-Orlando, Moroka, Diepkloof, Senaoane, Mofolo, Naledi, Meadowlands, Pimville naseJabavu zazivame ukuba nemiqhudelwano yezikole nemidlalo yamaligi ama-amisha.
Namuhla, akusikho ukushabalala kwalezi zinkundla zebhola kuphela, kodwa nemidlalo yama-secondary nama-high school eyayiba ngoLwesithathu kanjalo nemidlalo yamakilabhu ama-amisha ngezimpelasonto ayisazidonsi izihlwele zababukeli njengoba kwakwenzeka.
Namaqembu ayelandelwa kakhulu awasekho - amaqembu afana no-Orlando Preston Brothers, Orlando Highlanders, Extension Gunners, Diepkloof Blue Spurs, Pimville Tiny Rockies, Zola Black Dragons, Moletsane Young Tigers, Meadowlands Darkies namanye amaningi.
UMBANGO wamandla okuphatha owaholela ekufeni kweSouth African National Football Association ngaphansi kukaGeorge Thabe nokuqubuka kweSouth African Football Association nakho kwafana nokunye ukufa ebholeni lama-amisha eSoweto nakwezinye izingxenye zezwe.
Izinhlangano ezifana noJohannesburg Bantu Football Association (JBFA) nazo zabhuntsha ekubeni zadlala indawo ebalulekile ekwakheni izihlabani ezifana noZacharia "Computer" Lamola noGeorge "Brains" Mchunu.
"Ukunyamalala komongameli ababephethe amakilabhu ama-amisha emalokishini kwalikhubaza kakhulu ibhola lethu," kusho uPhil Mogodi ongumphathi weSAFA-Soweto.
"Njengamanje sifuna ukuthuthukisa ibhola entsheni nokuba sinxuse abazali ukuba basisize ekuthuthukiseni amakhono."
Ukuvumile ukuthi ibhola lama-amisha libhekene nesikhathi esinzima. Kulokhu ugxeke amandla okuphatha alabo ababengomongameli bamakilabhu ama-amisha, ababengabaqeqeshi baphinde babe ngabanini bamaqembu nokuyinto eyayingahambi neze kahle.
"Baningi abadlali abanamakhono asalindele ukugqanyiswa eSoweto kodwa lokhu kukhutshazwe wukwentuleka kwezimali njengoba singalutholi usizo lwezimali kuSAFA," kusho yena.
Kudingeka ukuba azabalaze ekutholeni abaxhasi nezimali.
KWENZEKANI ezikoleni? "Izikole zethu azilidlali ibhola neminye imidlalo ngezinga elifanayo nalelo lesikhathi esedlule," kusho omunye wothishanhloko. "Akukho ukuzinikela. Othisha balindela ukukhokhelwa ngokusebenza isikhathi esengeziwe bese kuhlupheka izingane."
Phambilini nothisha babekhuthazwa ukuba basize abafundi ukuba bazibandakanye nezemidlalo ngisho nangale kwesikhathi sesikole, kodwa iSouth African Democratic Teachers Union yagcizelela ukuthi ezemidlalo kufanele zibanjwe kuphela ngesikhathi sesikole - ngaleyo ndlela kwaqala inkathazo.
"Kudala izikole zazifaka umdlandla ekutheni zenze isiqiniseko sokuthi amaqembu azo ezemidlalo ngawekhwalithi ephezulu, kodwa lokho manje akusenzeki," kusho kuvuma omunye uthishanhloko.
"Asisenaso isikhathi sokuhlela izinhlelo zezemidlalo. Sasikhiqiza amaqembu amahle kakhulu esikhathini esedlule ngoba imiNyango yezeMfundo neyezeMidlalo yayisisiza ekuhleleni uhlaka lwemidlalo yezikole, izifundo zokuqeqesha nokunika abantu ithuba lokuphatha emidlalweni yethu, thina sigxile kakhulu ekufundiseni ekilasini siphinde futhi sakhe amaqembu ethu emidlalweni ehlukene."
UPanyaza Lesufi woMnyango wezeMfundo ukuchithile lokho njengombhedo.
"Ezemidlalo ziyingxenye yezinhlelo zokwakha. Uma bethi ngeke bakwazi ukumelana nalokhu, kungani pho saba nesikole esaba nempumelelo engaka emqhudelwaneni weDanone Soccer saze sasimela phesheya?"
Kodwa ukuwa kwamazinga esikoleni akusho ukuthi bambalwa abadlali abanekhono abaqhamukayo. Okunye futhi wudaba lokuzihlonipha...
Owayengumdlali wasesiswini kwiBafana uLinda Buthelezi, ugxeka ukungadlali kahle kweqembu lethu lesizwe ngenxa yokungaziphathi ngenhlonipho kwabesizukulwane esisha sabadlali.
"Sasifundiswa inhlonipho ngisafunda esikoleni," kusho yena. Waphinde wagxeka izikhulu zebhola. "Zalibulala ibhola lethu ngokusiqashela izinhlanya zabaqeqeshi bokufika emakilabhini nasemazingeni kazwelonke. Sakhombisa ngoClive Barker ukuthi ikhono esinalo ekhaya, lingehlula umhlaba. Izikhulu zethu kufanele zibandakanye labo ababengabadlali kudala ekuthuthukisweni kwebhola.
"Labo ababengabadlali banamakhono nobuhlakani bokwakha abadlali abasebancane.
"Ungalindela kanjani ukuba ibhola lezikole libe nempumelelo uma izinhlangano eziphethe ibhola zingabi yisibonelo esihle?
"I-SAFA yiyo okufanele ngabe ingumkhomba ndlela wentuthuko itholele nezikole zethu abaxhasi."
Engxoxweni yomsakazo yakamumva, oyisekela mongameli weSAFA uDkt Irvin Khoza wathi inhlangano yebhola kazwelonke ayinayo imali eyanele yokusiza ngezimali zokuthuthukisa ibhola. [z]

Khuluma nomyeni wakho umtshele ukuthi le nto ikuphatha kanjani. Yizwa ngaye ukuthi yini ayicabanga ngesimo sempilo yakho yonke. Ngibona kukuhle nithole ukwelulekwa ningakazithathi izinyathelo ezilandelayo.
Ngingakweluleka nangokuthi khuluma nomuntu owazi kangcono ngesithembu. Ungakhuluma nomuntu omdala emndenini noma nenyanga? Ungafuna nosizo lwezomthetho ngokushayela iScorpion Legal Protection ku-0861-333-333. Kuzoba ngcono uma usuqoqe lonke ulwazi mayelana nesithembu.
Ungakhuluma nabanye besimame abasesithenjini uzwe ukuthi kunjani. Okunye okungakusiza wumkhuleko. Kodwa khumbula ukuthi isinqumo ngalolu daba kumele sithathwe nguwe - uyazi ukuthi yini ongayimela.
Zama nokubonana nodokotela mayelana nokungalangazeleli kwakho ucansi.
Umphathi odelelayo
Dear Sis Angie: Ngisebenzela umqashi odelelayo ohlala ethi abantu abanto yalutho bayizilima. Akalaleli kanti uma nixoxa uyakuphazamisa ngaphandle kokukunika ithuba lokubeka uvo lwakho.
Sicabanga ukuthi akwenzayo wukungafundiseki kodwa asazi ukuthi yini esizoyenza!
Janine, PE
Dear Janine: Ukuxhumana kungukhiye wempilo - amagama aziswana angamlimaza omunye umuntu kanti ukumkhuthaza kungamphilisa. Kungenzeka ukuthi umqashi wakho akanalo unya. Mhlawumbe akakwazi ukubeka inkulumo kahle uma ezwakalisa imibono yakhe.
Kungenzeka futhi ukuthi ukhule noma usebenze nabantu ababekhuluma naye ngalolo hlobo.
Yebo uqinisile - akwenzayo kukhomba ukungafundiseki nendelelo. Kodwa kukhona ongakufunda kumqashi wakho - ukukhetha amagama uma ukhuluma nomuntu ukuze ube ngumholi omuhle.
Ungakhuluma nomuntu ongundabazabantu enkampanini yenu, okungenzeka abe nendlela yokulungisa lesi simo.
Ngokuzayo ubokhumbula lawa mazwi kaSteve Biko uma uzwa umqashi wakho esebenzisa amagama angezwakali kahle: "Ngingumuntu njengawe. Ningavumi ububi bomunye umuntu bunenze umuntu omubi. Akufanele udikibaliswe abantu abanje ngoba kungenzeka uthole umngani omusha."
Isondlo sezingane
Dear Sis Angie: Ngingumama oneminyaka engu-27 onezingane ezintathu. Izingane zami ngazithola esokeni lami eselashona. Ngine-HIV kanti umndeni kamufi usola mina ngokufa kwakhe. Bayithola imali yakhe yempesheni lapho ayesebenza khona kodwa abafuni ukondla izingane. Ngenzenjani?
Masabata, Vryburg
Dear Masabata: Okokuqala, yimpilo yakho ebaluleke kakhulu.
Ngingakweluleka ngokuthi iya emtholampilo oseduze uthole ukwelashwa okudingayo. Uma usungcono, iya ehhovisi lokuthuthukiswa komphakathi eliseduze nawe ubhalise izingane ukuze zithole imali yesondlo. Kulona lelo hhovisi faka icala kusonhlalakahle umtshele ngodaba lomndeni wesoka lakho.
Ungaxhumana nabeLegal Aid Board ngoba nabo bangakusiza. Shayela ku-0861-053-425 (inombolo yamahhala) uzwe ukuthi likuphi ihhovisi labo eliseduze nawe.
Ubalulekile kuwena nasekusaseni lezingane zakho. Usonhlalakahle angakuhlelela ukuba uthole ukwelulekwa ukuze welapheke ubusiseke. [z]

Konke nge
Abantu bacabanga ukuthi iTB ihlasela amaphaphu kuphela kodwa eqinisweni ingasabalala nakwezinye izingxenye zomzimba. Sibheka izinhlobo ezihlukene zeTB
Iyini iTB?
I-TB yisifo esithathelanayo esivame ukuhlasela amaphaphu, kodwa ingaba kwezinye izingxenye zomzimba. I-TB isabalala emoyeni uma onayo ekhwehlela, ethimula noma efela amathe. NgokweWorld Health Organisation, abantu abacela kokokuthathu emhlabeni abanegciwane leTB kanti umuntu oyedwa ngomzuzwana ophathwa yizifo ezihambisana nalesi sifo.
Umuntu oyedwa kwabangu-10 onalezo zifo angaba neTB – okungathi uma iyekwa ingelashwa, ibulale abangaphezulu kwengxenye abanayo.
Yiziphi izimpawu zeTB?
■ Wukukhwehlela okungapheli.
■ Wukukhwehlela igazi.
■ Yimfiva nokujuluka ebusuku.
■ Wukwehla kwesisindo somzimba
■ Wukuqaqamba kwesifuba.
Ubani osengozini?
■ Yiziguli ezineHIV.
■ Abanesifo sikashukela.
■ Abantu abahlala ezindaweni eziminyene.
■ Yizingane nabadala.
■ Abasebenzisa izidakamizwa nabaphuzayo.
Yiziphi izinhlobo zeTB?
Kwi-TB sine-pulmonary tuberculosis, iTB esemaphashini, ne-extra pulmonary tuberculosis, iTB engaphandle kwamaphaphu, ngokukaDkt. Makgale Motlanthe, esaxoxa naye.
Uqhuba athi ingakabi khona iHIV, bangaphezulu kuka-80% ababeba neTB esemaphashini kuphela.
I-TB engaphakathi emaphashini
Zinhlanu izinhlobo zayo:
■ Primary TB pneumonia: Lolu wuhlobo olungajwayelekile oluvame ukuphatha iziguli ezinamasosha omzimba antekenteke, njengezingane nabadala. Luthathelana kakhulu.
■ Laryngeal TB: Ihlasela umphimbo. Nayo iyathathelana.
■ Cavitary TB: Lolu hlobo lunezimpawu ezifana nezeTB. Luvula izimbobo emaphashini kanti luthathelana kakhulu.
■ Miliary TB: Iphatha intsha, abadala nabanamasosha omzimba antekenteke. Ebaphethe basengozini yokuphathwa yimfiva eyingozi. I-X-ray yabo iveza okusazinhlamvu zerayisi emaphashini.
■ TB Pleurisy: Ihambisana nephika, ubuhlungu besifuba namanzi emaphashini.
I-TB engaphandle emaphashini
Kulezi zinhlobo zeTB izifo ziqala emaphashini zisabalalele egazini ukuze zihlasele izitho zomzimba:
■ Adrenal TB: Ihlasela indlala ebizwa nge-adrenal kuthikamezeke nokukhiqizeka kwama-hormone. Iziguli ezinalolu hlobo lweTB ziyaquleka noma ziphelelwe amandla.
■ Lymph node TB: Ihambisana nokuvuvukala kwama-lymph nodes. Ama-lymph nodes yiqoqo lama-cells atholakala emzimbeni. Asebenza njengezisefo zamagciwane kanti amqoka kakhulu ekusebenzeni kwamasosha omzimba.
■ Osteal TB: Ihlasela amathambo nokuyinto eholela ekuphukeni kwawo.
■ TB Peritonitis: Kule kumbondelana amanzi olwelwesini lwamathumbu, kuqaqambe kwesingezansi
■ TB Meningitis: Ihlasela ubuchopho kanti izimpawu zihambisana nokuqaqamba kwekhanda. Iyabulala uma ingelashwanga.
■ TB Arthritis: Ihlasela amalungu omzimba, ikakhulu ama-hips noma amadolo.
■ TB Pericarditis: Kugcwala amanzi enhliziyweni, kuthikamezeke ukusebenza kwayo.
Ngabe ziyelapheka ezinye izinhlobo zeTB?
Yebo. Ukutholakala kwekhambi elibizwa ngeRifampicin ekuqaleni kweminyaka yo-1970 kwenza kwaba lula ukwelashwa kwalesi sifo kwasuka ezinyangeni ezingu-24 kwaya kwezingu-6. Kodwa uDkt. Makgale wexwayisa ngokuthi iTB eba ngaphandle kwamaphaphu ayelapheki ngokushesha.
Kumqoka ukuphuza imithi ngaphansi kweso likadokotela.
Uma isiguli singayiphuzi kahle
imithi, sisengozini yokuphathwa yi “multiple drug resistance TB” engelapheki ngamakhambi ajwayelekile.
Kulolu hlobo kuphuzwa amakhambi amaningi kuphele izinyanga ezingu-9 noma ngaphezulu umuntu elashwa
uma isifo singaphandle emaphashini.[z]
