NGITHEMBA ukuthi uzongisiza. Ngineminyaka engu-30 kanti ngisebenza kahle. Ngiyaphana kanti ngisola ukuthi kukhona owangiloya ngoba imali yami ayihlali. Anginamuzi anginayo nemoto kodwa lezo zinto ngingazithenga ngoba ngihola kahle.
Esther J, Soweto
Dear Esther
Awuloyiwe neze. Isizathu esenza ukuthi imali yakho ingahlali ephaketheni lakho wukuthi uyayikhipha uyisebenzise.
Okokuqala okuzokusiza ukuze kuxazululeke le nkinga obhekene nayo wukwazi ukuthi yini oyenza ngemali yakho. Uma uhola, yiba ne-diary ozobhala kuyona okwenze ngemali. Bhala nemali yerenti kuye ezintweni ezincane ozithengayo.
Uma sewazi ukuthi imali yakho iyaphi, bhala uhlaka lokuthi umholo wakho olandelayo uzowusebenzisa kanjani.
Lokho kubizwa ngebhajethi. Uma usunebhajethi yakho, bambelela kuyona. Zibekele imigomo, njengokuthenga umuzi noma imoto, ukuze ukhuthazeke ubambelele kwibhajethi yakho.
Ngabe yini inkinga ?
Ngineminyaka engu-25. Ubaba washona umama enezinyanga ezintathu ekhulelwe mina. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi umama washada sasebenzisa isibongo sikasingamzali wami.
Ngaya enyuvesi ngo-2001, kodwa ngahlangabezana nezinkinga ezifundweni zami. Ngize ngaqeda ngo-2008. Njengamanje ngisebenzela inkampani yama-accountants kanti ngihola imali encane kabi.
Akungihambeli kahle nasothandweni. Ngisheshe ngihlukane nabesilisa engithandana nabo. Ngabe kukhona okushaya amanzi ngami? Ngabe ngijeziswa yidlozi likababa njengokusho kwabanye abantu?
Anonymous

Siyakuhalalisela! Ubalwa kwabambalwa ababusiswe ngokuthola imfundo nomsebenzi.
Njengathi sonke, nawe unezingqinamba okufanele udlule kuzona empilweni. Lezo zingqinamba yizona okufanele zikukhulise. Mhlawumbe kuzodingeka ukuba ubekezele ngoba isimo asisibi kangako empilweni yakho.

Maria L, Polokwane
Dear Maria
Zimbili izindlela zokuphendula umbuzo wakho. Eyokuqala elula - khuluma nodokotela. Uzokutshela ukuthi yini okufanele uyenze ukuze uwakhulise.
Kuzodingeka ukuba ahlinzwe ukuze abe makhulu kanti lokho kuyabiza. Indlela yesibili yokuphendula umbuzo wakho - sizokukhuthaza ngokuthi kuhle ucabange kahle kuqala ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo.
Sonke sinezitho emzimbeni wethu esingaphathekile kahle ngazo. Kukhona esikubheka sibone ukuthi akukuhle. Ukungakhululeki ngesimo umuntu ayisona kusihlupha kakhulu uma sisebasha. Usamukela uma usukhulile noma uma usunolwazi olusabalele ngempilo.
Kungenzeka ukuthi amabele akho awuwathandi ngoba kukhona owakugcona ngawo noma wakutshela ukuthi awamakhulu. Kungenzeka ukuthi lokho wakuzwa ngabangani noma ngesoka lakho.
Kodwa ungashintsha uzibongele ngokuba namabele amahle angenawo umdlavuza.
Okunye: funda ukubukisa ngokuhle emzimbeni wakho - kungaba yi-figure yakho noma isikhumba sakho.
Nakhu okufanele ukwazi Maria: umuhle ngoba wenziwe ngomfanekiso kaNKULUNKULU!

Ngizwelana kakhulu nawe. Okukwehlele kwehlela noma ngubani - kodwa uma usesimweni esinjengalesi kuba sengathi uwena kuphela emhlabeni obhekene naso.
Okokuqala kwamukele ukuthi uthando lwenu seluphelile - lo muntu usambiza ngentombi yakho kodwa akaseyona.
Siyazi ukuthi ukuhlukana kwenu ngeke ukwamukele kalula: kuzokwenzeka ucabange ukumshayela ucingo, kokunye uzizwe unomzwangedwa - konke lokhu kuhambisana nobuhlungu benhliziyo.
Ungajahi ukuthola omunye ozothandana naye kodwa hlangana nabazokwenza ukuthi ukhohlwe wusizi lwakho.
Ukungakwazi ukuphila ngaphandle komunye umuntu yikona okuxosha abazama ukusondela eduze kwakho.

Kwathi lapho uFortune eseneminyaka engu-11 waya eNgilandi lapho adlala khona eqenjini leTottenham Hotspur lamajuniya. Wagcina esayiniswe yiManchester United ngenxa yokudlala kwakhe kahle emuva kanti manje udlalela i-AFC Tubize yase-Italy.
IZINKANYEZI
Uzozithola uphuphuma uthando nokuyizindaba ezizojabulisa isithandwa sakho. Uma ungawedwana ungazama inhlanhla uthole umaqondana. Izinsuku zothando: 20, 21.
Othandana naye kungamjabulisa ukuzwa izinhlelo zakho zekusasa ngakhoke phumela obala. Uma ungawedwana ungajahi, uzomthola umaqondana. Izinsuku zothando: 22, 23.
Uma kukhona othandana naye, phumela obala ngemizwa yakho othandweni lwenu kube khona ukuxhumana. Izinsuku zothando: 24, 25.
Kunoma yiluphi uthando kuba khona izifundo ezifundwayo, ngakhoke khombisa omthandayo ukuthi unothando. Uma ungawedwana, ungasinqabi isimemo. Izinsuku zothando: 26, 27.
Yisikhathi esihle sokuzama ukubuyisela lelo langabi lothando othandweni. Kukuwena ukutshela umuntu omthandayo ukuthi uyamthanda uma ungawedwana. Izinsuku zothando: 1, 29.
Phumela obala ngemizwa yothando uma unesithandwa sakho ukuze uthando lwenu luhlale luvutha. Uma ungawedwana bekezela kuzolunga. Izinsuku zothando: 3, 31.
Uma ulangazelele ukuthola umaqondana, bheka izimpawu ozifunayo kumuntu omaziyo. Uma usothandweni ungavumi ukuxhashazwa. Izinsuku zothando: 5, 7.
Uthando olungena-migomo nokwamukelana yizinto ezikuwena nothandana naye. Wukwethembana nothando okuzoqinisekisa ukuthi isimo sihlala sinjalo. Izinsuku zothando: 8, 9.
Bekezela konke kuzolunga uma usothandweni. Sonke sihlangabezana nezinkinga othandweni kanti akukubi njengoba ucabanga. Izinsuku zothando: 10, 11.
Ungumuntu onothando kanti uzozakhela ugazi kulowo muntu omgaqele. Ungabi namahloni! Uma engakwemukeli, uyena ozolahlekelwa! Izinsuku zothando: 13, 14.
Yiba nobubele nozwelo ukuze othandana naye aziqhenye ngothando lwenu. Uma ungawedwana, lindela ukuthola umlayezo ovela kumuntu obalulekile. Izinsuku zothando: 15, 17.
Inhlanhla ikubhekile. Zitike ngalesi sikhathi esimnandi. Uma ungawedwana, qaphela abantu bangadlali ngawe. Kokunye kungcono ukuzihlalela wedwa. Izinsuku zothando: 18, 19.

UZuluboy oyisihlabani somculo we-hip-hop usithathe wasisa endaweni yangakubo lapho konke kwaqala khona
ILOKISHI LAMI, ISIHLABANI SAMI
UNGUBANI NGEMPELA UZuluboy
Wazalwa waqanjwa elikaMxolisi Majozi kodwa manje abalandeli bakhe emculweni bamazi ngelikaZuluboy. Abomndeni nabangani elokishini laseNtuzuma eKZN bambiza ngoMgi besusela kwelithi Mgingqeni.
O-anti bakhe uMaureen noZandile Majozi bamkhumbula njengomntwana owayesondelene kakhulu nomama wakhe.
"Sasibaningi sihlala endlini kangangoba kwakudingeka kwenziwe isu lokulala ebusuku ukuze wonke umuntu anethezeke. UMgi wayeqinisekisa ukuthi ulala eduze kukamama wakhe. Waqala ukulala yedwa esefunda ibanga lesiHlanu. Lokhu akuvamile kubantwana babafana nokuchaza uthando ayemthanda ngalo umama wakhe," kusho uMaureen.
Ongumngani nomakhelwane uThula Ndongo yena ukhumbula umfana owayezifela ngomculo nowayehlale ephazamisa abangani bakhe ekudlaleni ngenhloso yokubalalelisa iculo aliqambile.
Manje njengoba esengumculi we-hip-hop odumile, akumangazi nakancane. "Kuyangithokozisa ukumbona efeza amaphupho akhe," kusho uThula.
UBAMBELELE EMASIKWENI AKHE
Ukukhulela kwakhe eNtuzuma kumama wakhe uNonhlanhla Majozi, ugogo wakhe, o-anti nomalume kuchaza ngokusobala ukuthi inhlonipho wayifunda ekhaya.
U-anti wakhe uZandile yena uthe: "UMgi wazalelwa lapha. Kusukela ngosuku lokuqala ezelwe wakhuliswa ngenqubo yamasiko esiZulu. Nalapho eseya esikoleni esixube izinhlanga, senza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyasifunda isiZulu, samkhumbuza ukuthi ungubani."
Namanje sisezwa izindaba zokuthi lo mculi ozinze eGoli uyakwazi ukulwa ngezinduku, ukushaya indlamu nokuhlaba isilwane.
THINA SOBABILI
Ngo-1997 uZuluboy nomama wakhe baphuma emzini kagogo ukuyoziphilela ngokwabo.
Ubuhlungu obebufihlakele buyabonakala lapho sithatha izithombe zaleli khaya ake ahlala kulo nesithandwa senhliziyo yakhe esingunina owedlula emhlabeni ngo-2005. Ukuncokola kwaphela nya ethule ejulile umbona ukuthi uyacabanga.
"Umama wami wayesebenzela inkampani yomshwalensi ngaphambi kokuba adilizwe," kusho kukhumbula yena. "Emva kwalokho wazivulela ibhizinisi lakhe elingahambanga kahle. Kodwa ngenxa yokuthi wayekwazi ukusiphandela, asibanga nankinga yokulala singadlile futhi sasihlalisene kahle nomakhelwane," kusho yena ngokumamatheka okukhombisa ukwaneliseka.
UKUHLALA EMJONDOLO
"I-Sydenham nakuba beyibiza ngendawo yasemajalidini kodwa ifana nemijondolo," kusho yena singena emafulethini ake ahlala kuwo.
Abantu bakule ndawo babebhekene nezinselelo njengasemalokishini: "Kwakunabantu ababeziphilisa ngokudayisa izidakamizwa, kukhona namaqembu ezigelekeqe njengoba ubona nemibhalo ezindongeni."
Kwakuthi uma kade behambile baya kuma-nightclub nabangani, ngakusasa baxoxe ngezintombi abaziqabulile. Babetshelwa ngisho nangabadayisi bezidakamizwa ngokubaluleka kokuziphatha nokuqhubeka nesikole.
UZuluboy wayengumngani neningi labantu endaweni esakhula - sakubona lokho bemphakamisela izandla bembingelela.[z]
Indaba: Ntokozo Maseko
Izithombe: Solomon Mashakeni
Uthi ubuwazi?
Ngo-2004 abesizwe sakwaNgobese bathola imigede lapho abadala bakubo babehlala khona eminyakeni engaphezu kwengu-200 edlule eThaba Ntuzuma. Kumanje kunezinhlelo zokuguqula le migede ibe yindawo yokuheha abavakashi.
INtuzuma - yilokishi elakhiwa nguMkhandlu wedolobha leTheku ngeminyaka yo- 1970 - nokulenza kube ngelisanda kwakhiwa.
Yilokishi elithuthukayo okumanje linezikole ezingama-senior secondary ezingu-8, ama-primary angu-12, i-technical college eyodwa nesikhungo sothisha. Kukhona nesiteshi samaphoyisa, igaraji, umtholampilo, amahholo amabili omphakathi, isiteshi sezokucisha umlilo, umtapo wezincwadi, inkantolo, isikhungo samabhasi nezindawo eziningi zokuzithokozisa njenge-swimming pool, izinkundla zebhola neyethenisi.
1. UZuluboy ebonana nomakhelwane wakhe waseNtuzuma uThula Ndongo.
2. Ukhumbula ezibuhlungu zokushiywa ngumama wakhe emhlabeni.
3. Ifulethi ake walibiza ngekhaya.
4. Bajabulela ukumbona - o-anti bakhe uMaureen noZandile baseNtuzuma.
5. Nomakuphi lapho ehamba khona kule ndawo akhulela kuyona, abantu bayamazi.

Wakhela impumelelo
UPhemelo Ngcobo owayedlala kwiGenerations wenza umsebenzi wokuthenga izindlu aqashise ngazo
UDLALA indawo kaDkt. Lerato Thibela kwiHillside kuSABC 2. Ubuye athuthukise imikhiqizo yezinwele yakwaSof 'n' Free. Wazakhela igama kwezokulingisa enguKhensani kwiGenerations. Uma engadlali wenza imali ngebhizinisi lakhe lokuthenga izindlu azilungise.
Ukushiya kwiGenerations ngo-2002 kwenza wathatha ikhefu kwezokulingisa.
"Akuzwani nami ukuba yisihlabani seTV. Ukudlala emdlalweni ofana neGenerations, kwangidalela inkinga," kusho yena.
Impilo yakhe yashintsha ngesikhathi eqala ibhizinisi lakhe ngo-2003. Wabuye washada noMthandeni Ngcobo oyi-accountant kwi-IT and communications.
UPhemelo wenza izifundo zokukhangisa waqokwa njenge-accounts executive enkampanini yokukhangisa - esikhundleni sokugxila entweni ayeyazi.
"Imali engayithola kwiGenerations angiyisebenziselanga ukuphila impilo ephilwa osaziwayo kodwa ngayithatha ngayibeka," kusho yena.
Waqoka ukuqala ibhizinisi lokudayisa izindlu. Wathenga ifulethi elalinegumbi lokulala elilodwa eSandton eJozi. Kodwa esikhundleni sokuhlala kulona, waqashisa ngalo.
Ibhizinisi lakhe lihamba kahle ngenxa yokuhlela kwakhe izinto ngendlela efanele.
"Inani lefulethi lami lakhuphuka ngo-R200 000 ezinyangeni eziyisithupha," kusho yena ehleka. "Amafulethi ayeseduze kwelami ayedayisa ngokuphindwe kabili emalini elami elalidayisa ngayo.
Into emqoka kakhulu ayifunda kwaba wukulondoloza imali eyilondolozela isikhathi eside. Kumthathe iminyaka eyisithupha kuphela ukuthenga izindlu aqashise ngazo.
Izindlu uzilungisa zibe yilokho okufunwa amakhasimende akhe - kanti kukhona naqashisa ngazo kwabanezivumelwano zokusebenza eSA.
"Izindlu ezinhle engingasoze ngazithengela zona zilungele amakhasimende aphesheya. Kungiphatha kahle ukwenza okufunwa amakhasimende ami - nezindlu engiqashisa ngazo zisezingeni lempilo amakhasimende ami ahlala eLondon, Paris noma eNew York ayijwayele," kusho yena.
"Ngiqala ngokufaka izimpahla nokudingeka endlini engizoqashisa ngayo. Ngifaka imibhede emisha, amashidi, okhaphethi bohlobo oluphambili, izimpahla ezisebenza ngogesi, i-satellite TV, kube ne-Internet ngiqinisekise nokuthi kuphephile ngiqashe nabazohlanza izindlu nabazolungisa negceke. Amakhasimende ami afuna ukuthi konke kube sesimweni esihle."
UPhemelo noMthandeni abaphili impilo ephilwa amakhasimende abo. Uthi babona kungcono ukuthi baqashe njengoba kunenkinga yama-interest rates kunokuthi bathenge umuzi.
"Irenti yomuzi obiza u-R5-million ilingana nemali oyikhokhela umuzi obiza u-R2-million kanti uma ubona kungabalulekile ukuthenga umuzi ungaziqashela umuzi ozozihlalela kuwona."
UPhemelo noMthandeni ibhizinisi labo baliqhuba besizwa abammeli nama-accontants. Angabasiza kakhulu abadinga ulwazi ngokuphathwa kwezimali ngoba ugada isenti nesenti alisebenzisayo.
"Ngicabanga kaningi ngisho noma ngifuna ukuthenga iphakethe likaswidi leli," kusho yena ehleka.
Izinto azibusisa ngazo uPhemelo yizinto ezimsiza ebhizinisini lakhe kuphela - unemoto enhle, kanti kuyenzeka aye phesheya ayohlola ukuthi baliqhuba kanjani ibhizinisi lokudayisa izindlu.
"Ngizwana namabhizinisi avunisa izithelo ezinhle. Maningi amazwe ayencishwe amathuba kwezentuthuko esikhathini esidlule athuthukisa ingqalasizinda yawo manje ukuze umnotho wawo uphucuke. Izinkampani zibona kushibhile ukuqashela abazisebenzelayo imizi kunokuyithenga.
"Njengoba ngingakabi nesikhathi sokuthola abantwana - nokuyinto engihluphayo leyo - umsebenzi engiwenzayo ongijabulisayo nothatha isikhathi sami esiningi."
"Ngizimisele ngokuba ngithuthukise ibhizinisi lami ngilibeke kwelinye iqophelo ngaphambi kokuba ngiqale umndeni wami. Njengoba sengivuthiwe ngokomqondo, sengingakwazi ukubhekana nanoma iyiphi inselelo manje," kusho yena. [z]

I-formula ayisebenzisa ekuphumeleleni kwakhe ithi: impumelelo = uthando + nokuzethemba.
UConnie waphinde wengeza ukuthi abantu kufanele baqonde ukuthi le mboni kukuphi lapho iqine khona nalapho ixega khona, wagcizelela futhi ngokubaluleka kokweseka imikhiqizo yakuleli.
Kufanele uyikhethe ngobuhlakani indawo lapho isaluni yakho izokuba khona.
Ungathathi abangani ukuba bakusebenzele. Thola ochwepheshe uziqeqeshele abasebenzi bakho.
Ekilabhini yethu sizidumisa kakhulu ephathini ngoba sisebenza kanzima. Sahlela ukuba sengeze okumayelana nefeshini ukuze siphothule ingqikithi yethu yeziNwele noBuhle.” Kulokhu kulapho yazibonakalisa khona ilebuli yeSeventeen East. Ngesikhathi izingane eziningi ziphindela esikoleni, izingane ezikhubazekile zisuke zingazi ukuthi ikusasa liziphatheleni...
Badinga
USIZO
UMAMA uNosizwe Ziwele oneminyaka engu-58 ungumzali ongayedwana onendodakazi ekhubazekile kanti uyazi ukuthi kunzima kangakanani ukukhulisa ingane ekhubazekile elokishini.
UXolelwa, igama lendodakazi yakhe wazalwa enengalo nomlenze okhubazekile kanti akakwazi ukuhamba, ukuzifunza noma ukuzigeza. Bahlala eKhayelitsha eCape Town endlini enamagumbi amabili kanti akatholi xhaso ngokukhubazeka kwakhe.
Umama uNosizwe uthi uXolelwa akakwazanga ukufunda isikhathi eside esikoleni sabakhubazekile ngoba kwakubiza kakhulu. Akayedwa kule nkinga ngoba baningi abazali abangenawo amandla noma abangakwazi ukunika izingane zabo ezikhubazekile imfundo engcono.
Ngokwezibalo zikahulumeni, zingaphezulu kuka-260 000 izingane ezikhubazekile ezweni lonke ezingafundi. Ziyethusa lezi zibalo uma ubheka ukuthi izingane zinelungelo lokufunda.
Kodwa ngabe yini eyenziwayo ukusiza izingane ezinjengoXolelwa?
Impendulo kulowo mbuzo ayilula njengoba sicabanga.
Ekuqaleni kuka-2007, uhulumeni wenza izinhlelo zokufaka izingane ezingakhubazekile kakhulu "ezikoleni ezijwayelekile". Lezo zikole kwakufanele zibe nendawo yokuhamba ama-wheelchair ukwenza isibonelo.
Uhulumeni wabuye wathembisa ukuthi uzokwakha izikole "ezinezidingo" zezingane ezikhubazeke kakhulu ezweni lonke.
Kwakuhloswe ukuthi zibe ngu-30 izikole ezinjalo kodwa ngenxa yokuntuleka kwezimali, isibalo sazo sehliswa saba ngu-12 ngokukaMoses Simelane woMnyango wezeMfundo.
Kodwa inkinga enkulu wukuthi iningi lalezi zikole alinakho okudingekayo ukuze zisebenze kahle.
Okukhulu kunakho konke wukuthi bambalwa othisha abaqeqeshelwe ukufundisa izingane ezikhubazekile ngokukaSimmi Pillay ongumdidiyeli kwezokukhubazeka kwiSouth African Human Rights Commission (SAHRC).
U-Dave Balt, umongameli weNational Professional Teachers Organisation Of South Africa (Naptosa) uthi bakhala kuhulumeni ngokushoda kothisha.
I-Naptosa ithi isibalo sezingane okumele zifundiswe singaphezulu kwesothisha.
U-Balt uthi inhlangano yabo isalinde impendulo kuhulumeni.
U-Sandra Ambrose weDisabled Children's Action Group ukholwa wukuthi umgomo kahulumeni ubuye ungazikhathaleli izingane ezikhubazekile ezivalelwa emakhaya zihlukunyezwe.
Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo uLunga Ngqengelele uthi uhulumeni wenza okwanele ukusiza izingane ezikhubazekile ukuze zifunde.
Ukhala ngabazali abangazilethi izingane ezikoleni, noma abangaxhumani nosonhlalakahle ukuze babasize.
Ngokwalo mnyango, kunezinhlelo zokwakha izikole ezinazo zonke izidingo zabakhubazekile ukuze izingane zifunde ezikoleni ezakhelene nazo kunokuthi zifunde kude.
UNosipho Franse onguthishanhloko eTembaletu Special School eGugulethu, eCape Town ungomunye wabasiza izingane ezikhubazekile.
Lesi sikole sinabafundi abangu-185, bangu-166 abaxhaswe nguhulumeni ngemali.
Kodwa lesi sikole sisenenkinga yokuntula imali yokunikeza abafundi baso imfundo ekahle bathole nezidingo ezingaphezulu kokufunda. Phakathi kwezinkinga ababhekene nazo, kubalwa nenkinga yokungakwazi ukukhokhela abantu abazolungisa isikole noma ukuthenga ukudla nezinto zokuthutha abafundi ezanele ngokukaNosipho.
Ngeshwa, abazali abayingeni eyokuxhasa lesi sikole. "U-80% wabazali abanezingane ezikulesi sikole awusebenzi awunawo amandla okukhokha imali yesikole," kuqhuba yena.
I-SAHRC ikholwa wukuthi mukhulu umsebenzi okusafanele wenziwe, kusukela ekwaziseni abazali ngezindlela abangazisebenzisa ekukhuliseni izingane ezikhubazekile. "Iminyango yezemfundo kufanele isebenze ngokubambisana - kwenziwe izinguquko ngokushesha," kusho yena.
Okwamanje izingane ezikhubazekile zisancishwe imfundo nekusasa eliqhakazile.[z]

Indaba yamagama
UKUKHETHA igama lengane akuyona into elula. Isinqumo osithathayo njengomzali sizoba nomthelela enganeni yakho impilo yayo yonke, kanti igama oyinika lona yilo elizokuba yisibuko sayo. Njalo abazali lokhu bakuthola kungumsebenzi onzima ngoba maningi amagama abangakhetha kuwona.
Ziningi izinto ezingaba nomthelela ekukhetheni kwakho igama. Ukwenza isibonelo, inkolo yakho yiyo engakuhlahlela indlela kulokhu, noma abemithombo yezindaba, noma amasiko omndeni.
Nazi ezinye izeluleko ezingakusiza ngokuqanjwa kwamagama...
ONGAKWENZA
Ukukhetha amagama amahle: Lolu wuhlobo olukade lwaba khona nolusazoqhubeka. Ukwenza isibonelo: Bongani, Lebogang, Thabang, Noxolo.
Bheka ukuthi libizeka kanjani: Ngisho ngabe ukhetha liphi igama, libize kakhulu ukuze uzwe ukuthi libizeka kanjani.
Bheka ukuthi iziqalo zamagama (initials) zinjani: Bhala phansi igama nesibongo bese ubheka ukuthi ama-initials awezwakali yini kabi.
Faka impilo egameni elidala: Ukushintsha i-spelling ukuze amagama azwakale efana. Ukwenza isibonelo, uma ukhetha elithi Eric, intombazane ungayiqamba ngokuthi u-Erika.
Awoqobo: Kufanele ubone ukuthi igama ngeke yini liyidalele uhlevane ingane emphakathini ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.
Bambelela ezimpandeni zakho: I-SA inezilimi eziningi zesiNguni ongakhetha kuzo lapho uqamba ingane yakho igama. Lawa magama, akuwona nje amagama kuphela, kodwa amele izimpande nesiko lengane yakho ngokweqiniso.
OKUNGAFANELE UKWENZE
Uma uqamba ingane yakho ngolimi ongalujwayele, qiniseka ukuthi uyazi lichaza ukuthini lelo gama. Xhumana nabantu abaningi abakhuluma lolo limi, ungazicabangeli ngokwakho ukuthi lelo gama njengoba libizeka kamnandi, kusho ukuthi nencazelo yalo yinhle.
Izinhlobo zezimoto, izimpahla ezisebenza ngogesi, kanjalo nosaziwayo yizinto eziphelelwa yisikhathi, ekubeni ingane yakho izophila nalelo gama impilo yayo yonke.

Fundisa abancane amakhono okuphatha imali
IZINGANE kungaba yinto enhle ukuzifundisa ngokuphathwa kwemali zisakhula ukuze zisizakale lapho sezikhulile. Into yokuqala okufanele uyifundise ingane yakho wukonga nokuyi "khulisa" imali yayo. Ithengele isikoqokoqo ezoyifaka kusona. Ingayifaka mhlawumbe ngamasonto noma ngenyanga - leyo eyiphiwe mhlawumbe izihlobo noma ogogo nomkhulu.
Ukukhuthaza ingane yakho ukuba yongele mhlawumbe ukuthenga ithoyizi, noma iTV game kuzoyenza ikwazi ukuba nomqondo wokuzibekela izinhloso efuna ukuphumelela kuzo empilweni.
Uma ingane yakho isiqonda kangcono ukuthi kusho ukuthini ukonga, usungaqala uyikhulisele leyo mali ngokuba uyivulele i-akhawunti yasebhange, ukuze ithole inzuzo ngokonga.
Yichazele ngomehluko phakathi kwento 'efunekayo' 'neyisidingo' - "Njalo kungcono ukonga imali kunokuba uyisebenzise ezintweni ongazidingi."
Ukufundisa izingane zakho lokhu kuzokusiza ekukuvikeleni ekutheni ungazithengeli izinto ezibizayo nezinhle ezingazidingi, ngaleyo ndlela kusizakale umndeni wonke.
Izingane kumele zilawulwe abazali, ngakhoke ziyeke zisho ezikufisayo uma sekuziwa kwibhajethi yasendlini.
Uma zicela into ebizayo, zitshele ukuthi uzozisiza ukuba zongele leyo nto imali. Uma kukhona ezikucelayo ezitolo, ziyeke zikhethe phakathi kokubeka imali noma ziyidle ngokuthenga mhlawumbe lelo thoyizi elincane. Ukubeka imali kwengane yakho kuzoyenza ibe nolwazi lwezibalo ifunde nelinye ikhono lokuphatha imali.

Uma umama efika ekhaya nengane esanda kubelethwa, udinga ubaba ukuba amnike isikhathi sokuba alulame ngokomzimba nangokomoya.
Kukhona lowo muzwa wemvelo kunoma yimuphi umuntu ongumama ukuba anike ingane yakhe lonke uthando nokunakekela kulowo mntwana omusha. Lokhu akusho ukuthi mhlawumbe usehlubuke ubaba noma ezinye izingane. Ongumama omusha udinga lonke usizo nokwesekwa.

Nakuba obaba abasha beqonda kahle kamhlophe ukuthi ingane ithatha isikhathi esiningi sikamama, nabo bayakufuna ukunakwa. UMAMA OSEKHULILE
Umhlahlandlela wongakulindela lapho uthola umntwana usuneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-35 nangaphezulu
ABESIMAME abangaphezu kweminyaka engu-35 basengcupheni yokuba nezinkinga zokubeletha. Uma uthola ingane yokuqala emva kweminyaka engu-40, amazinga okukhubazeka makhulu - ngokusho koyi-obstetrician uDkt Magezi Hlongwane.
Njenganoma yimuphi umama okhulelwe, kufanele wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi uyaya kohlolwa ngudokotela noma emtholampilo ngezinsuku okufanele uye ngazo, uqiniseke ukuthi udla okunempilo ugweme ukukhathazeka. Ukunciphisa ukuphuza utshwala nokubhema kunciphisa izinkinga zempilo.
Ezinye izinkinga ongabhekana nazo uma ukhulelwe usumdala:
Ukuba nobunzima bokukhulelwa - noma yimuphi owesimame unamaqanda alinganiselwe nokuthi lapho kusuka eminyakeni eko-30, isibalo sawo sehle.
Uma uneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-35 futhi waba nenkinga yokuzabalazela ukukhulelwa izinyanga eziyisithupha, bonana nodokotela wakho. Usengcupheni yokuphuphunyelwa yisisu uma uneminyaka ephakathi kwengu-40 nengu-44 kanti uma ungaphezu kwengu-45, ingcuphe okuyo ingu-53%.
I-gestational diabetes - lolu hlobo lukashukela lujwayelekile kwabadala abakhulelwe kanti lungaba yingozi enganeni engakhula ikhubazekile isesesibelethweni.
I-high blood pressure - lokhu kungaba yingozi kakhulu kuwena nengane yakho uma kungalawuleki. Ungaphathwa yi-stroke noma isifo senhliziyo nengane yakho ikhule kancane noma izalwe ishaya isisindo esincane.
Uma ukhulelwe kubalulekile ukuphila endaweni lapho kungelula ukukhathazeka. Uma sekutholakele ukuthi une-high blood pressure qiniseka ukuthi uyayilandela imiyalelo kadokotela.
Ukubeletha ingane ngaphambi kwesikhathi - Ingane ezalwe ngaphambi kwamasonto angu-37 isuke izalwe ngaphambi kwesikhathi esifanele kanti iba nesisindo esincane. Ngokuyeka ukubhema nokuphuza ungehlisa amazinga okubeletha singakashayi isikhathi.
Ungadinga i-C-section - Izinkinga zokubeletha zivame ukufana komama abasuke bebeletha okokuqala ngqa beneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-35. Ungaphathwa yi-placenta previa - isimo lapho umzanyana uba sendaweni engafanele bese uvala umlomo wesibeletho.
Ukukhubazeka - Ingcuphe yokuba umntwana abe nokukhubazeka okufana ne-Down Syndrome iba nkulu lapho ukhula. Kodwake kuningi okungakunciphisa.[z]
Ngolunye ulwazi: www.pregnancy-info.com; www.mayoclinic.com

ILOBOLO
yizinkomo
ZEMALI
UMPHO LEBOGO ongumkhongi unendlela yokuqala ukuxoxisana ngelobolo. Ubeka inkomishi enamanzi etafuleni. Lokhu kungaphezulu kwamanzi asenkomishini ngokusho kwakhe. "Amanzi abuye abe yimpilo."
Ngokufanayo, ilobolo lisho okungaphezulu kwezinkomo noma imali. Liyindlela yokuhlanganisa imindeni emibili.
Kodwa kuvame ukuthi umndeni kamakoti ufune i-whisky, hhayi amanzi. Ngamanye amazwi, kuwona ilobolo alihlangene nokugcina usiko, liyindlela yokwakha imali.
"Ngokwami amanzi ayimpilo, i-whisky ingukufa," kusho uMpho.
Usiko aluhlali luyisiko. Ukuze luhlale lumile, luyaguquka. Kodwa kwenzekani uma luishintsha luba okunye - njengoKhisimusi osuphendulwe indlela yokumosha imali kunokuthi kukhunjulwe ukuzalwa kweNkosi uJesu?
Ngokwesiko, kwakulotsholwa ngezinkomo kube yinhloko yomndeni kamakoti ezamukela emva kwezingxoxo zamalobolo.
Ukwamukelwa kwalezi zinkomo kwakuba wuphawu lokwakha ubudlelwane obuhle phakathi kwemindeni yomibili kube yisiqiniseko sokuthi umakoti uzonakekelwa.
Ilobolo libuye lenze kube lula ukuthi abagananayo bathole izeluleko emindenini yomibili, kusho uMoses Twala weKara Heritage Institute.
Kodwa esikhathini samanje sekulotsholwa ngemali eningi.
Lolu siko olwaluluhle selwehliswe isithunzi. Emadolobheni nasemalokishini sekulotsholwa ngemali kunezinkomo ezihamba ngezinyawo.
UZwelibanzi Damba waseCape Town oneminyaka engu-29 unengoduso kanti uzolobola ngo- R40 000.
Ngeke alobole ngezinkomo ezihamba ngezinyawo ngoba ekhweni lakhe bahlala elokishini abanayo indawo yokufuya. "Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kuzolotsholwa ngeMercedes Benz noma idayimane elikhulu."
Kungenzeka ukuthi lezo zinsuku sezifikile ngoba abaningi ilobolo sebelithathisa okwebhizinisi kunokuthi libe yindlela yokuhlanganisa imindeni emibili ngokukaMpho Lebogo.
Uqhamuke nohlelo oluhle lwesivumelwano esibizwa ngeLobolo/Magadi Contract esihlanganisa imindeni emibili ngokosiko nangokomthetho.
UMpho uthi abazali bafuna imali enhle ngamadodakazi abo bebheka isimo sawo, ukuthi afunde kangakanani nokuthi anani.
"Ngiyazama ukubonisa amakhasimende ami ukuthi ngelobolo kusuke kuhloswe ukwakha ubudlelwane obuhle phakathi kwemindeni yomibili hhayi imali," kusho uMpho.
Kodwa izeluleko zakhe abanye abazizwa. Ucwaningo lweHuman Science Research Council luka-2005 lwaveza ukuthi abase-Africa abaningi bavumelana ngokuthi ilobolo liyimbangela yokuthi abantu bagcine bengashadanga. Noma kunjalo, ilobolo lisahlonishwa.
Emakhasimendeni kaMpho kwande abesilisa kanti bakholwa wukuthi kusemahlombe abo ukukhokha ilobolo. "Kodwa uma bebheka imali ebizwayo, babona kufana nokuthi leyo mali bayayilahla!" kusho yena.
Ngabe umndeni kamakoti usithatha kanjani isinqumo sokuthi akukhokhwe leyo mali oyifunayo? "Esikhathini esiningi kubhekwa ukuthi umakoti nomkhwenyana bafunde kangakanani kodwa kubhekwa kakhulu indoda," kusho uMpho.
UMpho uthi kubizwa phakathi kuka-R12 000 no-R25 000.
"Kodwa uma uya e-Eastern Cape naseGauteng uthola ukuthi kulotsholwa ngo-R40 000 kuya engxenyeni yesigidi," kusho yena.
Eminye imindeni ibheka ukuthi inkomo ibiza malini bese inquma inani.
Uma inkomo ibiza R3 000, leso samba basiphindaphinda ngesibalo sezinkomo abazozifuna kumkhwenyana.
Kodwa kubuye kungasizi ngoba izinkomo ziyashiyana ngokwamanani nangobukhulu. Inkunzi yenkomo (enkulu nebiza kakhulu kunezinye izinkomo) ibizelwa ubaba kamakoti.
UMpho uthi kungaba yinkinga
ukulobola ngemali.
Akekho umuntu ongamethemba uma kukhulunywa ngemali. "Abantu baba nomhobholo uma bebona imali," kusho yena. Uthola ukuthi imindeni ethinteka ezingxoxweni zamalobolo ayithembeki emalini ngoba ayikho into eba wubufakazi bokuthi kukhokhwe malini.
"Ngake ngabhekana nesimo lapho umalume kamkhwenyana ayefuna ukunika umndeni kamakoti ingxenye yelobolo elalibiziwe enye imali wafuna ukuba ingene ephaketheni lakhe," kusho uMpho.
Kokunye abakhongi babaleka nemali. Imali ingabuye ilahleke uma isikhishiwe isilinde ukuya ekhweni.
Pho akulotsholwa ngani nge-Internet noma ngesheke? "Lokho ngeke kube lula ngoba imali ingena kwi-account yomuntu oyedwa," kuchaza uMpho.
"Imindeni ayithembani kanti ngeke ithande ukuthi imali iwele ezandleni zomuntu ongathembekile."
Kodwa kukhona enye inkinga uma kungukuthi kubizwe imali enkulu.
"Abantu bashada becwile ezikweletini ngenxa yokubizwa kwemali enkulu," kusho uMpho.
Iningi labesilisa (nabesimame abasiza amasoka abo ekukhokhweni kwelobolo) liboleka imali ebhange ukuze kulotsholwe.
"Kokunye akupheli ngisho nonyaka abantu beshadile indoda isale inesikweleti semali okufanele iyikhokhe," kusho uMpho.
Ngabe yiliphi ikhambi? UMpho ukholwa wukuthi kungaba kuhle uma amabhange nezinkampani zemishwalense ziqhamuka nohlelo lokusiza abantu "ukuze bonge bavikele imali yabo."
Kodwa ubuye athi kumele kushintshwe nendlela ilobolo elithathwa ngayo. "Kumqoka ukuthi abantu bazi ukuthi ilobolo liyini," kusho yena.
"Uma sesazi ukuthi lolu wusiko olumele uBuntu, kuzophela ukuthi lube yindlela yokwakha imali." [z]
Indaba: Sbu Mpungose noBrenda Nkuna

Laliyindlela yokuhlanganisa imindeni, kodwa esikhathini samanje ilobolo seliphenduke indlela yokukhanda imali - ngenxa yalokho abantu bangena emshadweni becwile ezikweletini. Ngabe lokho kwamukelekile? Ngabe ilobolo selilahlekelwe yisithunzi? Sihlolisisa lolu daba oluyindida...
ISELULEKO SIKA-MPHO NGELOBOLO
Emindenini:
Yibani nolwazi lokuthi ilobolo lisho ukuthini ukuze nenze izinto ngokwethembeka. Khumbula: ilobolo alisiyo indlela yokwakha inzuzo ukuze uthenge impahla yasendlini noma uthole i- deposit yemoto.
Khulumani kabanzi namadodakazi enu ngokuthi yini elindelwe elobolweni.
Gadani izihlobo ezithanda imali nobaba abangabacabangeli abantu abathandanayo abajahe ukuthola imali.
Ungajahi ukusebenzisa imali yelobolo. Umshado uyabiza esikhathini samanje kanti ilobolo lingabasiza abashadikazi.
Kwabazoshada:
Kumqoka ukubonisana ngelobolo nangomshado ngaphambi kokuqhubeka kwezinto. Ngale kuzogwemeka ukungaboni ngaso linye.
Gwema ukuboleka imali yelobolo. Kungcono uyibeke.
Ilobolo aliqedwa. Imali esele ungayikhokha ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
Zama ukuthola isivumelwano selobolo ngoba sizokusiza uma kunokungaboni ngaso linye.
Uma ufuna usizo lochwepheshe ezingxoxweni zngelobolo shayela uMpho Lebogo ucingo kule nombolo: 076-129-6110. Lolu sizo uyalukhokhela.

Mubi, muhle ubuye ngezinkani - emva kweminyaka emibili engabonakali ngenxa yophrojusa ababengenandaba naye ngenxa yabantu ababethi ungumuntu olukhuni nokungelula ukusebenzisana naye
IMINYAKA emibili ayichitha engekho phambi kwamakhamera akubanga ngokuthanda, kusho uLiopelo Mphahle ehleka. Uthi ophrojusa babengamnakile ngoba wayengumuntu ozimele nokuyinto eyabenza bamthatha njengomuntu oyinkinga.
"Kwakuyinto engeyinhle," kusho lo mdlali wemidlalo yeshashalazi owazakhela ugazi kubantu bakuleli kwiBackstage noMuvhango. "Angizange ngithole izindawo eziphambili ngaleso sikhathi. Ngicabanga ukuthi kwakukhona ababekhuluma ngami kabi bethi ngingumuntu olukhuni ukusebenzisana nabanye nokuyinto eyumbhedo."
Kukhona owakholwa ukuthi akunjalo njengoba le ntokazi eneminyaka engu-25 isibuye ngezinkani kumaTV ethu kwiSABC 2 emdlalweni uMoferefere, lapho idlala indawo ephambili ngokubambisana noPatrick Shai.
ULiopelo uphinde ethule i-Afro Cafe noStone Seate weBongo Maffin nokuluhlelo olubahambisa emakilabhini nasemakhonsathini ebusuku phakathi nesonto.
"Akusibo bonke ophrojusa abacabanga ukuthi ngingumuntu olukhuni," kusho yena.
KwiMoferefere udlala indawo kaLesego okungunkosikazi ocebile, umyeni wakhe oyinkinsela futhi omdala kunaye onepulazi edolobheni laseFree State.
Basuka lapho kwadingeka ukuba uLesego njalo avuke ekuseni ngo-6 ukuze enze imisebenzi eminingi ekubeni enesizungu sempilo yasebusuku yaseGoli engubukhazikhazi.
"Ngidlala indawo yomuntu ongakwazi nakancane ukuphila impilo ephezulu. Ngiyazi iningi labantu liyakuthanda lokho, kodwa uma ngingekho phambi kwamakhamera, ngehlukile kuLesego," kusho uLiopelo.
Ukuxoxisana naye endaweni ebhizi njengeRosebank café, kwenza kubukeke sengathi ungumuntu owazalelwa ukuphila ntofontofo. Ngaphandle wayepake imoto yakhe entsha iZ4 engumphumela wokuphothula iziqephu ezingu-26 zeMoferefere. Ngemumva esitulweni ayehleli kusona kwakulenga isikhwama sakhe se-leather esimbala osasiliva esifana nobucwebe bakhe.
"Ngasebenza kanzima ukubuyela kwiTV. Kufanele uzethembe uma ungaphansi kwesimo esilula esingakufaka ezilingweni zokuxegelwa yisimilo ngakwezocansi."
"Ngiyabuthanda ubumnandi. Ubani owesimame ongabuthandi? Kodwa ngeke ngize ngizidayise ukuze ngiphile kahle. Ngisebenza nabesimame abakwenzayo lokho."
"Engazitshela kona wukuthi isithunzi sami nokuhlonipheka kubaluleke kakhulu."
ULiopelo uthandana nosomabhizinisi ahlangana naye ngonyaka odlule ngosizo lwabangani. Uthi le nsizwa esikhulile kunayo yiyo emnika izeluleko zakwezamabhizinisi.
Umsebenzi wakhe ohlelweni i-Afro Cafe umenza angasitholi isikhathi sokuphumula kanti uphinde axoxisane nabaculi abaphambili bakuleli naphesheya - njengo-Maxwell no-Oleta Adams kwiMacufe 2008 eBloemfontein ngo-October odlule.
Le ntokazi uma ithola isikhathi izihlalela nabomndeni wayo nabangani kanjalo nozakwabo esebenza nabo. Ichitha futhi isikhathi esiningi ivakasha.
Ngesikhathi kuzwakala amahlebezi okuthi akasenamali usefuna ukubuyela emidlalweni yeshashalazi, empeleni wayeseRio ebukela iBrazilian Grand Prix ne-agent yakhe uLisa Modisane futhi ezithengela.
"Ngiyathanda ukubukela iFormula One. Engikufisayo wukuya eMonte Carlo ngiyobuka iMonaco Grand Prix," kusho yena ehleka.
Njengamanje uhamba ngonyanyavu lwemoto enombala osasiliva. Usanda kubanjwa ehamba ngayo ngejubane eleqile ngesikhathi evakashele umndeni wakhe e-Eastern Cape, ngenhlanhla waphunyuka ethikithini.
"Ngisakujwayela ukushayela imoto enamandla njengeZ4. Ngesikhathi iphoyisa lomgwaqo lingibizela eceleni, ngavele ngazibonela ukuthi bengihamba ngesivinini esikhulu - ngavele ngenza uLesego angakwenza naye kuMoferefere - ngavele ngakhala.[z
Indaba: Doug Gordon

Liquketheni igama
U-Angie Diale uchaza ngokubaluleka kwegama lakho empilweni yakho
Igama oliqanjwe abazali bakho yilona elichaza ubuwena. Impilo yakho yakhiwa yindlela ophila ngayo nowamukela ngayo impilo.
Lokhu kuncike ezinkolelweni, nezinqubo esizincele kubazali, imfundo, inkolo, abangani, omakhelwane, nalokho ozikhethela ukukufunda empilweni.
Igama lami elithi Angeline lisho ukuba njengengilosi: ngabe lingumthwalo noma liyisibusiso?
Ngisakhula impilo yami yayilawulwa ngubaba okwakunguyena owayenqumela umndeni ukuthi yini okumele yenziwe, ukuthi siyakuphi esikhethela nabangani. Emzini wakhe udlame nenhlamba kwakuyinto yansuku zonke.
Okwehlukile kwakuyimpilo yesonto eyayifakwa ngumama owayekholwa futhi ezithobile. Lokhu kwasinika ukuthula ngoba wayengasivumeli isihluku sikababa.
Ngaleso sizathu kwadingeka ukuba kube yimina onakekela umfowethu omncane nomama uma udlame seluqala. Ngangimhlonipha engithanda ubaba (kwakuyimina kuphela indodakazi yakhe) - kuyena ngifuze umama wakhe ongasekho. Nakuba ngangimhlonipha, ngangiba nesibindi sokumkhombisa ukuthi angikuthandi ayekwenza.
Ugogo ngangimkhonze kakhulu eyisibonelo esihle kimina. Yonke into wayeyibheka ngokweNcwadi eNgcwele nokwaba nomphumela wokwakheka komqondo wami.
Kwakuthi lapho ngidiniwe noma ngilimele sengifuna nokulwa angibuze ukuthi:
"Ingelosi ibizokwenzenjani? Khumbula ukuthi uyingelosi."
Wukungikhumbuza kwakhe ukuthi ngiyingelosi okwangifundisa ukunakekela, ukuxolela ngibe nomthelela omuhle nakwabanye. Ugogo wangikhombisa ukuthi ngingabasiza kanjani abantu abangaboni ngaso linye bazwane.
Uma abantu besenkingeni kulimaza ingaphakathi labo, ngethuba engilinikiwe ngizozama ngibuyisele ukuzwana nentokozo kunoma yibuphi ubudlelwane.
Ngibonga ugogo ngalokhu, ngihlala ngibuka futhi ngithola okuhle kwabanye abantu bese ngizama ukwakhela kukhona nakuba ukukhula kwami kwakungekuhle, kodwa lokhu kwenza ngabuka impilo ngendlela enhle.
Igama lami laba yisibusiso futhi liseyisibusiso ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi izingelosi zimeleni futhi ngiyazama ukuphila ngobungcwele njengaleli gama. Wena?
lichazani igama lakho?
Wonke amagama achaza okuthize, uma ungazi ukuthi elakho lichaza ukuthini enza lokhu okulandelayo ukuze uzazi. Bhala phansi:
Buza abazali bakho kungani bakuqamba ngalelo gama.
Ucabanga ukuthi igama lakha ubuwena uma kunjalo kanjani?
Unamagama ngezilimi ezahlukene? Ngabe achaza izinto ezifanayo?
Buka abantu abadumile abanegama elifana nelakho. Kukhona yini enifana ngakho?
Uma ubungashintsha igama lakho, ubungakwenza lokho? Lingathini futhi kungani?
Uqanjwe ngegama lomunye wasemndenini wakho? Uma kunjalo, uyasazi isizathu?
Uke ube nengcindezi yokuphila ngokwegama lakho?
Ufisa sengathi igama lakho belingadumile, noma alijwayelekile? Uma kunjalo, kungani?
Iqiniso wukuthi amagama ethu achaza okuthize okubalulekile futhi ngokusebenzisa lokhu singazama ngayo yonke indlela ukwenza impilo yethu ibe yinhle sibe ngabantu abangcono.

UKUDLA kusemqoka empilweni yethu kanti ukukulondoloza ukuze kuhlale kufreshi wubuchwepheshe obunesikhathi busetshenziswa abantu. Izindlela zobuchwepheshe ezisetshenziswa namuhla zibandakanya: ukufakwa efrijini nakwi-freezer; ukufakwa emathinini; ukomiswa; freeze-drying, ukufakwa usawoti nokugqunyiswa.
Ukudla sikulondoloza ukuze sehlise amandla okusebenza kwegciwane elidala izifo, noma ukubulala igciwane liphele nya.
Konke ukudla kunamagciwane ngaphandle uma kubilisiwe ukuze kuqedwe wona noma kuvalelwe ezitsheni ezivaleka ngci. Igciwane eliphila ngokwemvelo obisini liyalubolisa ubisi emahoreni amabili kuya kwamathathu uma lungekho efrijini.
Ngokufaka ubisi efrijini usuke ungehlisi izinga lamagciwane asevele ekulona kodwa usuke wehlisa izinga lokudlondlobala kwawo ukuze ubisi lube freshi isonto elilodwa noma amabili.
l Ukufaka efrijini nakwi-freezer:
Le ndlela yokulondolozwa kokudla iyona esetshenziswa kakhulu. Ukufaka ukudla kwi-freezer akugcini ngokwehlisa izinga lamagciwane ekudleni kodwa kuqeda namandla awo.
Uku-freezer akubi namthelela ekunambithekeni kwenyama nasesimweni sayo, akunamthelela otheni kuma-vegetables kodwa kuyawenza umehluko ezithelweni ngoba zigcwala amanzi.
l Ukufaka emathinini: Kusukela cishe ngo-1825, ukufaka ukudla emathinini sekunike abantu indlela yokukulondoloza isikhathi eside.
Uma ukudla kusethinini, ukubilisela kulona ithini ukuze ubulale wonke amagciwane bese ulivala kahle (kungaba ngaphambi noma ngesikhathi amanzi ebila) ukuze amagciwane amasha angangeni ethinini.
Njengoba ukudla okusethinini kusuke kungenamagciwane, akuboli. Uma usulivulile ithini, amagciwane aphinda angene ahlasele ukudla. Kufanele ulifake efrijini emva kokulivula.
Ukudla singakufaka kunoma yisiphi isitsha esivaleka ngci. Ungakufaka kujeke oyingilazi ubilise bese uvala kahle. Ungakufaka nakwi-foil, noma ezikhwameni zepulasitiki nasemabhokisini.
Inkinga ngamathini, nesizathu esenza kube ngcono ukufaka ukudla kwi-freezer noma efrijini, wukuthi ukubilisela ukudla ethinini kushintsha ukunambitheka kwako nesimo sako (nomsoco otholakala kukona).
l Ukomisa: Ubisi oluyimpuphu, amasobho nososi, i-pasta nerayisi konke kuyizibonelo zokudla okonyisiwe.
l Freeze-drying: Lena yindlela eyisipesheli yokomisa esusa umswakama nengenzi mehluko ekunambithekeni kokudla kunendlela ejwayelekile yokomisa.
Ngale ndlela ukudla kuyaqandiswa kufakwe kwi-vacuum enamandla. Amanzi asekudleni ayacweba – angabi yiqhwa kodwa abe ngumhwamuko.
Le ndlela isetshenziswa uma kwenziwa ikhofi.
l Ukufaka usawoti: Le ndlela yayisetshenziswa emandulo kanti kuyona usawoti udonsa umswakama amagciwane angayitholi indawo yokungena.
l Ukugqumisa: Le ndlela, eyayisetshenziselwa ukulondoloza inyama, izithelo nama-vegetables, namuhla isetshenziselwa ukukhiqiza ama-pickles kuphela.
Uma kugqunyiswa kusetshenziswa usawoti, ohlanganiswa ne-acetic acid enjengo-vinegar. (I-acid ibuye yehlise izinga lamagciwane.)
l Ukubilisa: Ukubilisa ukudla kubulala amagciwane, ukudla kube freshi kahle kodwa kubuye kukwenze kunganambitheki kahle kwehlise nezinga lomsoco.
l Ukwenza ushizi: Abantu abazi ukuthi ushizi uyindlela yokulondoloza ubisi! [z]

Ukubala izindleko zaleyi misebenzi kungaba inkinga ngoba kukhona izinhlobo ezimbili zezindleko ezifanele zingene kulokhu kubala. Imishini ifanele ithengwe kuqala (izindleko zokuqhuba umsebenzi) bese kukhona izindleko zokuyisebenzisa futhi nokyiphatha.

Kanjalo-ke singasho ukuthi imali esetshenziswe ukuthenga ugandaganda ibolekiwe, bese inzalo (intelo) yemali yokuqhuba umsebenzi ifanele ingene ekubaleni kwezindleko zokulima ihektheli elilodwa.

Kungalahleka izinsuku eziningi zokusebenza lapho izulu lina futhi umhlabathi umanzi kakhulu ukusebenza.

Thina sonke sidinga ukuboleka imali ngesinye isikhathi – kakhulukazi ekulimeni kwamanje. Ngeqiniso, awukwazi ukuphatha ibhizinisi ngaphandle kokusebenzisa imali ebolekiwe. Inkinga kodwa ikhona – ungaboleki imali ibhizinisi lakho lizohluleka ukuyibuyisela. 



Khumbulani futhi, inani lemali ebolekiwe nesikhathi esithatha ukuyibuyisela leyo mali, intelo (izindleko) yaleyo mali iyakhuphuka sonke isikhathi. Kukhona izinto ezimbili lapho siboleka imali: 

Intelo (interest) – Lokhu kuyimali ebizwayo ukuboleka leyo mali. Ngokuvamekile kuyiphesentishi ngonyaka yale mali ebolekiwe. Inani lentelo liyashintsha njalo ngoba kukhona i-infleyinsheni noma umthetho kagavumente uyashintsha. 

Imali yokuqhuba umsebenzi (capital) – Lokhu kuyinani lemali oyibolekile maqondana nesichasiso sakho (business plan).

Okudingekwa indawo lapho uboleka khona

Ibhange noma elinye ibhizinisi elinikeza isikwenetu lizodinga okulandelayo kuqala:

Isu lebhizinisi (business plan) 

Amasu ebhizinisi aqonde kakhulukazi ukuthola imali ukuqhubekisa ibhizinisi. Isu lakho lifanele linalokhu okulandelayo: imigomo yakho, izinto ezibalulekile, indlela ibhizinisi lakho lihamba kanjani manje futhi lizosizakala kanjani ngaphambili uma uthola le mali ofuna ukuyiboleka. Kufanele ukhombise kahle ukuthi uzophatha kanjani le bhizinisi (umsebenzi) elisha futhi ukuthi unalo ikhono lokuphatha ibhizinisi.

Ukuhamba kwekheshi (cash flow) 

Ukuhamba kwekheshi kukhombisa ukungena nokuphuma kwemali ebhizinisini lakho. Lokhu kuzokhombisa inhlangano ezokuboleka imali ukuthi kungena malini ngenyanga ethile bese izobona ukuthi uzoba nekhono lokubuyisela imali ngaziphi izinyanga. Kubalulekile futhi ukunikeza yonke imininingwane mayelana nezimali zakho – noma iyaphi imali noma ivelaphi. Kuyinkohliso futhi uma unganikezi yonke imininingwane mayelana nezindaba zezimali zakho lapho ucela ukuboleka imali. 

Ukuvumelana nomthetho 34 wa-2005 obizwa ngokuthi (National Credit Act) 

Maqondana nalo mthetho amabhange awavunyelwa ukunikeza abantu isikwenete uma bazohluleka ukuyibuyisela leyo mali. Lokhu kuvikela ibhange futhi kuvikela loyo ofuna ukuboleka. Lapho ungakwazi ukubuyisela imali ebolekiwe bese ungaba’blacklisted’ njengomuntu ongakwazi ukuphinda ukuboleka imali noma kuphi. Akekho umuntu ofuna igama lakhe kulelo listi ngoba awazi ukuthi mhlawumbe uzodinga kusasa imali bese awukwazi ukuyiboleka. Lo mthetho usize amabhange lapho bekukhona ingozi enkulu ngezindaba zezimali ngo-2009 emhlabeni jikelele. Amabhange amaningi emhlabeni jikelele ashone phansi ngoba abaningi abantu ababoleke imali bahlulekile ukubuyisela leyo mali. I-National Credit Act ikhona ukuvikela abantu namabhange ukuthi bangakhokhi imali engekho. Isiza amabhange ngoba angeke abenezikwenete eziningi kakhulu. 



Amathiphu angakusiza

Kubalulekile ukuthi bonke abakhiqizi nabalimi baqashe umprofeshinali onobungcweti ngezindaba zezimali ekulimeni. Abalimi abakwazi ukwazi zonke izindaba ezihambelana nokuphatha izindaba zezimali sonke isikhathi. 

Kubalulekile futhi ukuthi bonke abalimi, njengabaphathi bamabhizinisi abasebenza ngemali ebolekiwe, bakhombise ukuthi bayathembeka isikhathi eside. Uma kukhona inking ngokubuyisela imali, kufanele kuxoxwe ngakho ngaphambi kwesikhathi ukuze bazwane ekugcineni. 

Zonke izinto ozithengayo ngemali ebolekiwe kusho ukuthi unethembo lokuphinda ukuyithola leyo mali kusasa – ufuna ikusebenzele. Kufanele umlimi azibuze ukuthi uneqiniso ukuthi uzophinda ayithole leyo mali. Kakhulukazi ngokwamanje abheke imakethe kahle, uma ecabanga ukutshala ummbila, ngentengiso ephansi nezindleko ezikhuphukayo, kuzombuyisela yini leyo mali ayibolekile futhi kuzobakhona inzuzo. Siyabona sonke ukuthi ngokwanje kukhona ummbila omningi kakhulu – kuzosizani-ke ukutshala futhi ummbila bese intengiso izophinda yehle uma kukhona umvuno omuhle ngo-2010 - 2011. Ngokucabanga kahle, kungabangcono ukungaboleki imali yokutshala ummbila. 

Ngokugcina

Izindaba zezimali zilukhuni futhi ziyinkinga njalo lapho uphatha ibhizinisi, kakhulukazi ekulimeni ngoba kungavela izingozi eziningi. Umlimi othile uzokhetha ukuba ngaphandle elungise ugandaganda, hhayi ukuhlala edeskini alwe namaphepha. Kodwa uma singazinaki kahle lezi zindaba zezimali, ngeke kubekhona ugandaganda noma ipulazi ekugcineni! Ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthola abantu abanolwazi abazokwazi ukusiza.

Isimo



Isicelo sokuba ngumkhoseli obaleke kwelakubo yenziwa ngumenzi wesicelo ukuba emukelwe njengodinga isiphephelo .



Ocela ukukhosela ngumuntu obaleke kwelakubo izwe ngenxa yokwesaba ukuhlukunyezwa , nakhona ofuna ukwamukelwa njengodinga isiphephelo . – kulesi simo eNingizimu Afrika. Umenzi wesicelo ngodinga ukukhosela ngesikhathi isicelo sakhe kusabhekwana naso.



Odinga ukukhosela unikezwa imvume engeke yavuselelwa yokukhosela endaweni okungenwa kuyo eNingizimu Afrika . Imvume ngeyezinsuku ezingu-14 nakhona igunyaza onayo ukubika endaweni eyamukela ababaleki ebizwa ngokuthi yi-Refugee Reception Office  eseduzane ukuze enze isicelo sodinga ukukhosela.



Umuntu odinga isiphephelo  onikezwe isimo sokuba ngodinga ukukhosela kanye nokuvikelwa ngokulandela umthetho obhekene nabadinga ukukhosela we-Refugee Act, 1998.



Ukuthola olunye ulwazi olunabile ngena kwi-website ethi uMnyango wezaseKhaya.

Kuprintwa imvume yodinga ukukhosela, isayinwe, ifakelwe isitembu ebese ikhishelwa odinga ukukhosela.
Imvume esebenza izinsuku ezingu-30, izovumela odinga ukukhosela ukuhlala eNingizimu Afrika isikhashana. Imvume inganwetshelwa ezinye izinsuku ezingu-30 ebese ezinyanga ezintathu.
Ngaphambi kokuba iphelele yisikhathi, imvume yodinga ukukhosela, odinga ukukhosela kumele abikwe kwabe-RRO, ukuze kuzoxoxiswana naye okwesibili, ingxoxo eqhutshwa yisikhulu esibizwa i-Refugee Status Determination Officer .
U-RSDO uyaqhubeka nokwahlulela udaba lwesicelo kanye nokuthatha isinqumo maqondana nesicelo sokukhosela.
Uma enikezwa imvume yokukhosela , odinga isiphephelo kumele enze isicelo se-ID smard card yodinga isiphephelok kunoma yiyiphi indawo ye-RRO ezinsukwini ezingu-15.

Isimo sokuba ngodinga isiphephelo sisebenza iminyaka emibili, kodwa odinga isiphephelo kumele abhale incwadi ecela ukubuyekezwa noma ukunwetshwa kwesimo sakhe sokumba ngodinga isiphephelo, ezinyangeni ezintathu ngemuva kokuba kuphele isikhathi saleyo mvume yodinga isiphephelo.

Byline: Jane McPherson, molaodi wa Lenaneotlhabollo la Balemi la Grain SA 



Go ka ba mabaka a mmalwa ao a go hlohleletšago go diriša naga yeo o ka e hwetšago. Kganyogo ya gago ya go lema e ka akaretša phišego ya go:



Tšweletša dijo go fepa ba lapa la gago;

Itlhagišetša ditseno; le 

Diriša nagatemo ye e hwetšagalago.



Temo e ama tšweletšo ya dijo le tlhale. Gore molemi a atlege o swanetše go ba le kwešišo ye e tsenelelago ya dibjalo, diruiwa, metšhene le taolo. 



Dibjalo 

Dikarolo tše di fapafapanago tša dibjalo di ka dirišwa kgwebong – medu (bjalo ka diborotlolo), matlakala (bjalo ka khabetšhe), dikenyo (bjalo ka diperekisi) goba peu (bjalo ka lehea). Dibjalo di ka dirišwa ke batho goba diruiwa ka sebopego sa tšona sa tlhago goba di ka fetošwa ditšweletšwa tša sebopego se sengwe. Go na le mehutahuta ya dibjalo yeo e bjalwago ka maikemišetšo a go e rekiša:

Mabele a go swana le lehea, sonoplomo, mabelethoro, matokomane le dinawasoya; 

Merogo ya go swana le matapola, ditamati, diborotlolo, dieie le dipete; 

Dikenyo tša senamune tša go swana le dinamune, diswiri le dinariki; 

Dikenyo tša go raša (deciduous fruits) – diapola, ditšheri, diperekisi le diapolekose;

Mafulo a go swana le bjang bja Eragrostis le Smutsvingergras, Lesereng le Seradella;

Dibjalo tše di tšweletšwago go dira dino tša go swana le teye le kofi;

Tlhale ya go swana le leokodi le flakese; le

Motšoko. 



Dinyakwa tša motheo tše di hlokegago gore dibjalo di mele ke mmu, meetse, borutho, seetša le phepo. Dibjalo ge di gola di na le medu, dikutu/dithito le matlakala. Dikarolo tše di šoma bjalo ka fapriki ye e thušago sebjalo go tšweletša peu (go tswala). 



Diruiwa 

Diruiwa tša mehutahuta di ruiwa go bopa methopo ya:

Maswi (dipudi goba dikgomo tše di gangwago);

Nama (dikgomo, dinku, dipudi le dikgogo tše di hlabjago);

Tlhale (dinku tša boya le masaeboko (Angora goats));

Matlalo le makgopaboya (pelts) (dinku tša karakule);

Mae (dikgogo tše di beelago); le

Kgogo (dipere, ditonki le dipholo tše di gogago didirišwa). 



Nneteng diruiwa di šoma bjalo ka difapriki tše nnyane ka go fetola tšeo di di jago (tšeo ka tlwaelo di tšweletšwago polaseng) go bopa ditšweletšwa tšeo di ruelwago tšona (nama, maswi, boya, bjalobjalo). Ka fao bontši bja ditiro tša polaseng bo swanetše go lebišwa tšweletšong ya dijo tša diruiwa (mohlala, motšweletši yo a ruago dikgomo tša nama nneteng go ka thwe ke motšweletši wa bjang, gobane ntle le bjang a ka se tšweletše nama ye a ka e rekišago). 



Motšweletši o swanetše go kgetha diruiwa tše a nyakago go di rua go ya ka dintlha tše di fapafapanago, go swana le mohuta wa polasa, klimate, kgetho ya motšweletši, mebaraka ya gae, bjalobjalo. A ka kgetha go tše di latelago: 

Dikgomo – tša maswi, tša nama goba tša kholapedi;

Dinku – tša nama, tša boya goba tša kholapedi;

Dipudi – tša maswi, masaeboko goba mohuta wa boer-goat;

Dikgogo – tše di beelago goba tše di hlabjago; le

Dipere le ditonki – kudu ka nepo ya go goga didirišwa. 



Metšhene 

Go phetha mešomo yohle polaseng ka diatla go ka tšea sebaka le gona go ka tura kudu. Nepo ya go diriša metšhene ke go godiša bokgoni – go phetha mešomo bokaone le gona ka lebelo. 



Mothopo wa enetši malebana le go goga didirišwa e ka ba dipholo, dipere, ditonki goba ditrekere. Dilo tše di ka šomišwa go goga didirišwa tša go lema, go bjala dibjalo, go fediša ngwang, go buna le go rwala goba go thota. Mokgwa wa go goga wo o kgethwago o tla sepelelana le methopo ya motšweletši le ge e ka ba bogolo le mohuta wa naga yeo a e lemago. 



Taolo 

Taolo e ka hlalošwa ka go re ke kopanyo ya dintlha tšohle tša tirišo ya methopo ye e hwetšagalago (naga, dibjalo, diruiwa, metšhene le tšhelete) go phethagatša dinepo tša tšweletšo ya dijo, tlhagišo ya ditseno goba tirišo ya naga ye e hwetšagalago. 



Gore mešomo ya polaseng e atlege methopo yohle ye e fapafapanago e swanetše go dirišwa ka botlalo – yona e akaretša tšhelete, batho, naga, dibjalo, diruiwa, metšhene le mebaraka. 



Taolo ya letlotlo le go ngwala rekoto ya lona (recordkeeping) ke karolo ye bohlokwa kudu ya taolo ya polasa mme se se swanetše go dirwa ka mehla le gona ka tlhokomelo ye kgolo. Ge o sa hwetše poelo polaseng o ka se kgone go kgotlelela lebaka le letelele ntle le ditseno go tšwa mothopong wo mongwe tšeo o ka thekgago polasa ka tšona. 



Re kgopela gore o lekole dipotšišo tše di latelago – ipotšiše potšišo ye nngwe le ye nngwe o nagane karabo ya yona ka potego. Ge o se na nnete mabapi le se o lekago go se phetha, go na le kgonagalo ye kgolo ya gore o ka se atlege – ge o sa tsebe fao o yago go ka se be bonolo go fihla fao o kganyogago!	



Dintlha tše di swanetšego go elwa hloko 

Dintlha tše di latelago di swanetše go elwa hloko pele ga ge molemi a kgetha dibjalo tše a nyakago go di bjala, diruiwa tše a nyakago go di rua, goba tšeo a nyakago go di kopanya (combinations).



Ditetelo tša motšweletši 

Ke lema ka lebaka lang?

Polasa e tlo ba mothopo o nnoši wa ditseno?

Batho ba ba tlogo iphediša ka poelo ya polasa ke ba bakae?

O tlo phetha mešomo yohle ka noši?

Ditšweletšwa di tlo dirišwa polaseng goba di tlo rekišwa?

O rata mohuta wo o itšego wa temo go feta wo mongwe (specific enterprise)?

O ka letela poelo efe mabapi le mešomo ya polaseng ya gago?

Na o hloka thuto efe kapa efe go kaonafatša tsebo le bokgoni bja gago mabapi le temo?



Bongnaga (land tenure)

Ke ka lebaka lang bongnaga bjo bo lotegilego bo lego bohlokwa?

O kgona go tsenela naga ka molao?

O ka hwetša naga bjang?

O mong wa naga ye o e lemago?

O leloko la sehlopha seo e lego mong wa naga yeo?

Ge o le leloko la sehlopha, na sehlopha seo se ngwadišitšwe bjalo ka boikemelamolaong (legal entity) bja mohuta mang?

Go na le molaotheo / bongwadišo bja bong bja trasete (trust deed) goba lengwalo la mohuta woo leo le laolago kamantšho ya maloko a sehlopha?

Go na le maloko a sehlopha ao a sa hlwego a kgatha tema mešomong ya polasa?

Go tlo diragalang ge maloko ao a se nago le kabelo mešomong a ka boela polaseng?

O na le tumelo ya go dula nageng ya setšhaba (tribal land)?

O na le kwano ya khiro ya molao (legal lease agreement)?

Lebaka la khiro (lease period) ke lefe?



Bogolo bja naga 

O kgona go tsenela (diriša) dihektare tše kae?

Phulo ya tlhago ke dihektare tše kae?

Mafulo a a theilwego ke dihektare tše kae?

Nagatemego ke dihektare tše kae?

Naga ye e nošetšwago ke dihektare tše kae?

Palomoka ya bofudišo (carrying capacity) bja polasa ke efe?



Tsenelo ya naga 

Naga e ka tsenelwa gabonolo ka tsela?

Ge ditšweletšwa tša gago di le boima (mabele goba bokaakang bjo bogolo bja merogo) dilori di tla kgona go di thota?

Naga e kgauswi le bodulabatho fao bohodu e lego bothata?

Naga e šireleditšwe ka legora le le tiilego?



Mehuta ya mmu 

Naga e akaretša mehuta efe ya mmu?

Bokaakang bja letsopa ke bofe?

Botebo bja mmu ke bofe?

Tshekamo ya mmu ke efe?



Pula ye e nago 

Bokaakang bja pula ye o ka e letelago ka ngwaga ke bofe?

O ka letela pula dikgweding dife?

Dikgwedi tšeo ka tlwaelo e lego tša komelelo ke dife?



Themperetšha

Na go hwetšwa tšhwane/šobane tikologong ya gago marega?

Tšhwane ya mathomo ya ngwaga o ka e letela kgweding efe?

Tšhwane ya mafelelo ya ngwaga o ka e letela kgweding efe?



Tirišo ya metšhene 

O na le ditrekere le didirišwa tše e lego tša gago?

O ka kgona go hira trekere le ditlhamo ge o se na le tša gago?

Ditlhamo tše o lebeletšego go di hira di tla hwetšagala ka nako ye o di nyakago goba o tlo di emela mola sehla se tšwela pele?

Go hira ditlhamo e tlo ba bokae?



Tsenelo ya mebaraka 

Go na le mmaraka fao o ka rekišago ditšweletšwa tša gago?

Bareki ba seo o nyakago go se tšweletša ke bomang?

O na le dikontraka le bareki bao?

Thekišo ya gonabjale ya seo o nyakago go se tšweletša ke efe?

Ditšweletšwa tša gago o tlo di fihliša bjang mmarakeng?

O kwešiša maemo a boleng (quality standards) a seo o nyakago go se tšweletša?

O na le boitemogelo bofe kapa bofe mabapi le dikontraka tša papatšo?



Tirišo ya nošetšo 

O kgona go tsenela meetse a go nošetša dibjalo?

O ingwadišitše le lekgotlameetse la gae go ba le tumelelo ya go diriša meetse?

O dumeletšwe go diriša meetse a makaakang?

O ngwadišitšwe go nošetša naga ye kaakang?

Ge o diriša meetse a a borilwego na petse ya gago e ngwadišitšwe?

Petse ya gago e kgona go ntšha meetse a makaakang (capacity of the borehole)?

Dinyakwameetse (water requirements) tša dibjalo tše o lebeletšego go di tšweletša ke dife?



Methopo ya letlotlo 

O akanya go bjala eng?

O tseba gore ditshenyegelothwii (direct costs) malebana le hektare e tlo ba dife (tisele, peu, monontšha, dibolayangwang, dibolayakhunkhwane, inšorense ya dibjalo)?

O tseba gore ditshenyegelokakaretšo (overhead costs) ka ngwaga ke dife (mohlakase, tswalo ya kadimo, ditefo le meputso, tokišo le tlhokomelo ya ditlhamo, bjalobjalo)?

O na le tšhelete ye e nyakegago?

O kgopetše kadimo?

Tswalo ye o tlogo e lefa mabapi le kadimo ke efe?

Tšhelete e tlo hwetšagala neng?

O kgona go rwalela dinyakwapšalo (inputs) polaseng?

O kgona go rwala ditšweletšwa go tloga polaseng go ya mmarakeng?

Ditshenyegelo mabapi le thwalo ke dife?

O akareditše ditshenyegelo tše peakanyong ya gago?

O tseba dinyakwapšalo tše di hlokegago go tšweletša dibjalo tše o di kgethago?

O ka reka dinyakwapšalo kae?

O tlo di rwala bjang?

Theko ya dinyakwapšalo tše e bjang ge e bapišwa le ya barekiši ba bangwe?

O tseba bokaakang bjo bo nyakegago bja senyakwapšalo se sengwe le se sengwe?

O phethile peakanyo ya gago ka tlhokomelo?



Bokgauswi bja legae 

Sebaka sa go tloga mo o dulago go ya nageng ye o e lemago ke sefe?

Ditshenyegelo tša gago mabapi le go ya polaseng le go boa e tlo ba dife?



Go hwetšagala ga polokelo ya mabele 

Ge o bunne mabele o tlo a boloka kae?

Ditshenyegelo mabapi le polokelo ke dife?

Mabele a ka bolokwa a na le monola wo mokaakang (moisture content)?

O tlo omiša mabele kae go fihla ge a akaretša bokaakang bjo bo nepagetšego bja monola?

O akanya go rekiša puno semeetseng goba o tlo e boloka wa emela thekišo ye kaone?



Tsenelo ya ditirelothušo 

O kgona go kgopela thušo go balemiši ba Kgoro ya Temo ba gae?

Batho ba bangwe bao ba ka go thušago ke bafe?

O kgona go ikgokaganya le batšweletšikgwebo ba gae bao ba ka dumelago go go thekga le go go thuša? 



Mekgwakakaretšo ya go lema ya gae 

Batšweletšikgwebo ba gae ba diriša mekgwa efe ya go lema?

O kgona go ikgokaganya le batšweletši ba gae go boledišana le bona ka dintlha tše bohlokwa?



Kgonego ya koketšamohola 

Go na le kgonego efe kapa efe ya go oketša mohola wa dibjalo tše o di tšweletšago?

ULWAZI LOMPHAKATHI MAYELANA NOMKHUKANE OWUPUBLIC INFORMATION ABOUT PANDEMIC INFLUENZA ENGUBHUBHANE i-A (H1N1) 2009
Igama elisemthethweni lesayensi lalesi sifo wumkhuhlane owubhubhane i-yi-Pandemic Influenza A (H1N1) 2009. WYaqala eMexico nase-MelikaUnited  States of America ngoMbasa-Ephreli kulo nyaka.  Ekuqaleni bewyayaziwa njengomkhuhlane wezingulube (i-swine flue) ngenxa yokuthi kwabe kucatshangelwa ukuthi wyaqala ngezingulube. Manje sekuyaqondwa ukuthi umsuka wayo uvela kubantu nasekuzinyonini.  Ngakho-ke, lesi sifookhu asihlangene kufa nakancaneakunalutho yokwenza nokudliwa kwenyama yengulube noma imikhiqizo yengulube.  Manje sewkubizwa nje kalula njengemmfuluwenza ewngubhubhane  noma uibizwe ngegama lawyo elisemthethweni i-A (H1N1) 2009.
Kusukela ngoMbasa kulo nyaka, leli gciwanevayirasi iseliisabalaele ngokushesha ekumazweni ayi-166. E-Afrika, kuze kube manje leli gciwane vayirasi ilisasisabalalele emazweni ayi-16 kuphela.  Ngesikhathi sokushicilelaalesi sikhathi sokubhala le ncwadi, leli gciwane vayirasi iseliisuleleke kuabantu    abangaphezu kwabayi -3000 ezweni lethu.yi-177 457 (abaqinisekiswe yizindlu zokuqhuba ucwaningo lwesayensi) emhlabeni wonke, phakathi kwabo osekufe abayi-1 457 abaqinisekisiwe. 
Ngemuva komhlangano wesine weKomidi Lwesimo Esiphuthumayosheshayo owawubanjwe ngomhla we-11 Juni 2009, iNhlangano Yomhlaba Yezempilo (i-WHO) yaphetha ngokuthi ikhratheriya yokuthatha lesi sifookhu kufa njengobhubhane lomhlaba seyanelisekile futhi uMnqondisi-Jikelele, uDkt Margret Chan, usesimemezelilegunyazile lesi simo njengobBhubhane (izinga lesi-6).  Kafushanelula lokhu kusho ukuthi lesi sifooku kufa sesikusabalalele emazweni akuzo zonke izifundandawo ze-WHO futhi lokhu kwenzeke ngokukhulu ukushesha. Kodwa-ke ngithanda ukugcizelela ukuthi  ukumenyezelwagunyazwa kobhuobhane akusho ukuthi lesi sifoukufa sikunamandla kakhulu.  Lokhu kusho ukuthi nje sikuyaqhubeka nokusabalalela yonke umhlaba wonkeindawo.
Ngomhla wesi-6 kuNtulikazi  i-WHO yachaza ukusabalalaqhubeka kwalolu bhubhane emazweni athintekayo kanye nasekumazweni amasha njengento ezokwenzeka noma kanjani okungavumeleki futhi engeke iokungavimbekei.  Ngenhlanhla, yize lokhu kunjaloe, iphinde yasho ukuthi abantu abaningi abasuleleketheleleke ngaele ligciwanevayirasi bazoba nezimpawu ezingatheniconywana.  Noma kunjaloYize njengabasebenzi bezempilo, bomhlaba jikelele nabalapha ekhaya,  sikhathazekile ngokufa kwabantu osekwenzekilekuvelile kuze kube manje  (okungama-0,8% emhlabeni nama-0,1% kuabantu abesulelekile eNingizimu  Afrika).  Igciwanevayirasi lisulelekaa kuabantu abaphakathi kweminyaka eyi-10 ukuya kwengama-29 – iningi labo ngabafundi noma ngabasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.
I-WHO yeluleke ngokuthi amazwe kuafanele agxile ekwehliseni umthelela walesiokhu sifokufa emiphakathini.  Ukwenza lokhu, ukuxhumana kahle kubalulekile.

Abantu abaningi emhlabeni banalezi zimpawu ezingathenicono futhi abadingi noma ngabe yikuphi ukwelashwa okukhethekile.  Ngakho-ke, abantu abanezimpawu ezingathenicono kufanele belashwe njengoba kulashwa imfuluwenza ejwayelekile. Kodwa-ke, laba bantu abalandelayo abanezimpawu ezingatheni kumele babonane nodokotela ngokusheshaHowever, the following people with mild symptoms must also see their doctor urgently:
abantu abanokugula okubi kwenhliziyo noma kwamaphaphu 
abeasimame abakhulelwe 
abantu abaphila ne-SANDULELA NGCULAZI kanye NENCGULAZIHIV ne-AIDS
abantu abanesifo sikaoshukela 
Izimpawu ezimaphakathingconywana zimbandakanya izimpawu ezingathenicono nezinye:
ukuphelelwa ngumoya
ubuhlungu esifubeni
ukuhlanza okunganqamuki
Ukuhanjiswa yisisu nezimpawu zokuphelelwaswela amanzi emzimbeni
Izimpawu ezimbi zimbandakanya izimpawu ezingathenicono nezimaphakathingconywana kanye nezinye
ubunzima bokuphefumula (inkingaukungakhoni youkuphefumula)
izindebe eziluhlaza, ulimi noma ezinye izingxenye zomzimba
ukufikelwa ukozela okukhuluisiyezi esikhulu nokuquleka
Noma ngabe ngubani onezimpawu ezimaphakathingconywana noma ezimbi kufanele afune aphinde athole ukwelashwa ngokushesha.
Ukuhlolelwa igciwanevayirasi
Ukuhlolwa okusemthethweni kwenziwa IisikKhungo Sikazwelonke Sezifo Ezithelelanayo esiseGauteng esesivule uphiko eNtshonalanga Kapa.  Ukuhlolwa kuzokwenziwa ngesincomo sikadokotela.  Iziguli ezidinga ukwelashwa ohlelweni lukahulumeni lwezempilo akufanele zicele ukuhlolwa kwasendlini yocwaningo lwesayensi ngokwabo on their own – ngudokotela wabo okumele enze leso sinqumoit is their doctor who must decide.  
Sesikuphawulile ukuthi kunokuhlolwa kwabantu abaningiWe note that there is mass testing okwenziwayo emkhakheni wezempilo wangasese, kodwa lokhu ayikuncomiakukhokona okufunwa yi-WHO. Odokotela kufanele baelaphe izimo ezisolekayo ngokweamigomoazinga yokusebenzaokwedlulisa ulwazi eahlinzekwe nguMnyango kaZzwelonke Wezempilo.
Ukwelashwa
Umshanguzo osetshenziswa kakhulu ukwelapha lo mkhuhlane kwelashwa onelungelo lokuzikhethela kona yi-Tamiflu.  KuIfanele inikezwe ngudokotela futhi inikwa labo: 
abanezimpawu ezingathenicono abasemikhakheniukuzihla ezikhethekile yabantu abasengozini yokusuleleka njengoba bebaliwe zishiwo ngenhla
abanezimpawu ezimaphakathingconnywana
abanezimpawu ezimbi
Ukwelashwa komuntu wonkeukawonke wonke nge-Tamflu kuzoholela esimwenikuqabeni sokuthi ungakokulapheki lo mkhuhlanea uma kusetshenziswa lo muthi futhi kungenza ukuthi ungasebenzi nakulabo ongahlenga izimpilo zabo. 
Ukuvalwa kwezikhungo
Ulwazi olutholakale emhlabeni wonke selukhombisilengukuthi ukuthi ukuvalwa kwezikole nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, izinxanxathela zezitoloamamoli okuthenga nezindawo zokusebenzela akusebenzi  ukunqandakusukela uekusabalalaeni kwalesi kosikufoa.  Kodwa esikhundleni salokho, lokhu kudalea ukuthikamezeka okukhulu emphakathininhlalweni.
Seluleka ukuthi  noma ngabe yimuphi umfundi, umfundisi  noma umsebenzi onezimpawu ezingathenigcono ukuba ahlale ekhaya. Uma bebaningi abafundi futhi/noma abafundisi abaphuthayo, isikhungo esithintekayo kuzofanele sithinte uMnyango Wezemfundo, ozothibe ngokuhlanganyela neziphathimandla zezempilo usululekea ngokufanele kwenziwe ukuqhubekela phambili.
Inhlanzeko elulaUkuphepha kwezempilo okujwayelekile  
Ngenxa yendlela lesi sifookhu kufa esiokubhebhetheka ngayo njengoba kushiwo phamphimbilini, kunconywa ukuthi kusetshenziswelokhu lezi zindlela ezilandelayo zenhlanzeko ekuphepha kwezempilo okulula okulandelayo kuyaphakanylulaiswa:
hlamba izandla ngensipho njalo
khweohlela noma uthimulele ekwiphephenia eliyithishu noma emkhonweni wengalo yakho
ungakhweohleleli ezandleni zakho noma ngabe sekwenjani, okungcono khweohlelelaa kwindololwane yakho
uma uphoqeleka ukuba ukhweohlelele ezandleni zakho, ungathinti lutho olufana nezibambo zeziminyango, amafasitela, ingaphezulu lamatafula noma izitsha zokudla kuze kube usuhlambe izandla zakho ngensipho
Uma unezimpawu ezingathenicono, hlala ekhaya futhi gwemanqanda ukuhlangana nabantu.
Ngifisa ukuniqinisekisa ukuthi ososayensi emhlabeni wonke benza konke okusemandleni emhlabeni wonke besebenzisana ne-WHO ukuzama ukuthola ikhambi. Uma konke kuhamba kahle, ikhambi elifana naleli kungenzeka lilingatholakalekhona ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo.

Izincazelo

Ukudobela ukuzilibazisa wokuthi abantu bahambe bayodoba izinhlanzi emanzini angewona ase South Africa bengaqonde ukuzithengisa. Ukuze ungenise izinhlanzi ezivela kwamanye amazwe uzingenisela ukuzilibazisa kuphela, kumele ufake isicelo sephomedi yokwenze njalo esikhishwa yigatsha eliphethe izindaba zenhlalo yendawo nezokuvakasha  noma isiphathimandla esikhethiwe. Izinhlanzi ezilandwe kwamanye amazwe okufanele zithengiswe kodwa kumele abantu bazidlele bona. Akekho umuntu ovunyelwe ukuthi angenise izinhlanzi zakwamanye amazwe ngaphandle kwephomedi yokwenze njalo. Faka isicelo esisha sephomedi yokudobela ukuzilibazisa emanzini angewona ase South Africa uma lena onayo isiphelelwe yisikhathi. Uma uhluleke ukuthobela lesimiso sephomedi, ingamiswa iphomedi yakho noma ihoxiswe.

Qaphela: Iphomedi yokudobela ukuzilibazisa emanzini angamelwe yi Department of Agriculture ayifaki izinhlanzi ezidotshwe emanzini ancwaba. Lezozinhlanzi zilawulwa yigatsha lezolimo. Izicelo zephomedi yokungenisa izinhlanzi ezidotshwe emanzini ancwaba zimikiswa egatsheni lezolimo. Yiloleligatsha elinikeza leyophomedi.

Lemithetho elandelayo yokuthibela ukungenisa izinhlanzi ibekiwe:

Izinhlanzi ezisohlwini lwesivumelwano sokuhweba ngezilwane ezisengozini yokungabe zisaba khona emhlabeni somhlaba wonke azivunyelwanga ukudotshwa.zilethwe e South Africa. Uma ufuna ulwazi olunzulu ngalenhlangano yiya ku http://www.cites.org .

Iphomedi yokudobela ukuzilibazisa emanzini angewona ase South Africa yokuthi abantu bazidlele nje iyaphela uma umuntu esebuyile kulelozwe bekayodoba khona.

Abantu abavunyelwe ukuthi beze nezinhlanzi eziphilayo.

usuku ozohamba ngalo nosuku ozobuya ngalo e South Africa

ungamikisa wean mathupha noma uwapose.

Kufanele sikhumbule njalo ukuthi umsebenzi wokulima uqonde ukuthola inzuzo ekugcineni. Kudingeka izimali eziningi ukuqala ukutshala ummbila. Izindleko zokukhiqiza ukudla okuzinhlamvana kuyinto ebalulekile kakhulu lapho uphatha umsebenzi wokulima. 



Kudingeka ukuthi sihlukanise izindleko ngezindlela ezimbili – izindleko eziqondile nezindleko ezingashintsha. 



Izindleko ezigijima ngaphezulu

Lokhu kuhambelanda nezindleko zokuphatha ibhizinisi lokulima epulazini ngokuphelele – kuyizindleko ezingakwazi ukubekwa ekutshaleni kwesithombo esithile. Lokhu kungaba izindleko zokuhlola amabhuku ezimali, izintelo zebhange, amaholo, ugesi, amalayisense, ukuphatha nokulungisa, inzalo yemali ebolikiwe, ukuphatha izimoto, izinto zokubhala, njll. Lezi zindleko zingehluka ngomlimi nangomlimi ngoba ubukhulu bamasimu abufani, inani lesikweletu alifani futhi abalimi abathile abaphathi ukulima ngendlela efanayo. 



Izindleko eziqondile nalezo ezishintshayo

Lezi zindleko zihambelana nenhlobo yesithombo esithile esitshalwayo. Lokhu kuhlanganisa izindleko ezifana nedizili, umanyolo, izimbewu (inhlwanyelo), amakhemkeli, ukuvuna, ukumaketha neholo labasebenzi. Kaningi lezi zindleko ehekhtelini elilodwa azehluki kakhulu, akunandaba ukuthi ulima ngendlela ethile noma utshala isithombo esithile, kucishe kufane. 



Kubalulekile ukuthi ucabange kahle ngezimali ngaphambi uqala ukutshala noma siphi isitshalo. Kungcono kakhulu ukuzilungisela ukutshala indawo engenkulu ngendlela efanelekile uqinise ukuthola umvuno omuhle. Izincazelo

Iphomede yokushayela kobungcweti yenzelwe abantu abafanele ukushayela izimoto zonhlobo ethize. Iphomede ikhishwa ngaphezu kwelayisensi ejwayelekile yokushayela. Iphomede yokushayela kobungcweti yenzelwe lezimoto ezilandelayo:

imoto ethwala izimpahla, nedonsa izimoto ezilimele noma ibhasi
izimoto ezinesisindo esingaphezu kuka 3 500 kg nezithwala abantu abangu 12 noma ngaphezulu.

Iminyaka ejutshiwe yezigaba zezimoto iyalandela:

imoto ethwala izimpahla – iminyaka engu 18
imoto ethwala abantu – iminyaka engu 21
imoto ethwala izimpahla eziyingozi – iminyaka engu 25.

Ungathola iphomede yokushayela kobungcweti uma unelayisensi:

esasebenza yokushayela leyonhlobo yemoto
upotsholwe ngudokodela wathi uphilile
unikezwe igunya yinhlangano yokufundisa evumelekile 
ungakaze waboshelwa ukushayela uphuzile, noma ushayela ubudlabha noma waboshelwa icala eliphathelene nokulwa
ilayisensi yakho ingakaze imiswe.

Kuyizinhlobo ezithile zamacala ezingenza ukuthi ungatholi iphomede yokushayela kobungcweti. Amacala osekuphele iminyaka emihlanu enzeka awazubhekwa.

Umshayeli noma umnikazi wemoto edinga iphomede yokushayela kobungcweti akafanele ukunikeza omunye umuntu ukuthi ashayele leyomoto engwaqweni womphakathi ngephandle uma lowomuntu anayo iphomede yokushayela kobungcweti yalolohlobo lwemoto.

Lingakanani ihetheli elilodwa futhi ngithola kanjani ubukhulu balo? 



- Kususwe esifundweni seGrain SA Technical Skills Development esibhalwe nguJane McPherson 



Kubalulekile ukwazi ukuthi ingakanani insimu ezotshalwa ngoba kufanele kulinganiswe kubalwe okulandelayo:

Inani ledizili, lezimbewu, umanyolo namakhemikhali elizodingeka kuleyo ndawo; 

Izindleko ezizobakhona ukutshala leyo ndawo; 

Inani lezitshalo ehektheleni; 

Inani lenshuwalense yemvuno; 

Inani lezindleko zabankontilaka, njll. 

 

Khumbula ukuthi ubukhulu behektheli bulingana nalokhu okulandelayo:

1 ha = 100 m X 100 m 

1 ha = 10 000 square meters (m2)

Uma ufuna ukubalela umlimi ubukhulu bamasimu akhe, yenza kanje: 



Isibonelo:

50 000 m2 = 5 ha

30 000 m2 = 3 ha 

160 000 m2 = 16 ha 



Ngokwamanje sekukhona izinto zama-elekthroniki njengeGPS ezisiza ukubala ubukhulu bamasimu ngokusebenzisa amasatellite, kodwa abaningi abanazo lezo zinto. Kodwa ungalandela umlayezo olandelayo ukuthola ubukhulu bamasimu. 



Ubukhulu besikhweli ibalwa kanje: 

Ubukhulu (Area) = Ubude (Length) X Ububanzi (Breadth) (A=L X B) 

Masithi ubude becele bulingana na2 m. 

Ubukhulu (A) = 2 m x 2 m 
A = 4 m2 



Ubukhulu besikhweli (unxande, izinhlangoti ezine) bubalwa kanje: 

Ubukhulu (Area) = Ubude (Length) X Ububanzi (Breadth) (A=L X B) 

Masithi ubude bonxande bulingana na4 m nobubanzi bulingana na2 m.

A = L X B 

A = 4 m X 2 m 

A = 8 m2 



Ubukhulu bonxantathu (izinhlangoti ezintathu) ubalwa kanje: 
 

(Ubukhulu) A = ½ Base (uhlangoti olungaphansi) X Height (ukujula kokuphakama) (1/2 B X H)

Masithi uhlangoti olungaphansi lulingana na2 m nokuphakama kulingana na3 m

A = (½ X 2 m) X 3 m

A = 1 m X 3 m 

A = 3 m2 
 

Uma usola ukuthi insimu yakho ingakanani futhi uhlulekile ukuthola omunye umuntu okwazi ukulinganisa kufanele uzenzela wena ngokwakho. Ungazama ukubala ubude besondo (imoto, iveni, ugandaganda noma ibhayisikili), beka ibala endaweni ethintene nomhlabathi esondweni bese ubala ukuthi lelo bala lithinta kangaki emhlabathini lapho ulihambisa eceleni kwensimu yakho. Uma uphinda inani lokujika kwesondo ngobude bokungaphandle kwesondo uzothola ubude bensimu. Phinda ukwenze lokhu kuwo amacala ensimu bese udweba isimo sensimu ephepheni. Lapho usutholile ukuthi isimo sensimu sinjani futhi amacala made kangakanani, ungasebenzisa okuphezulu ukuthola ukuthi insimu ingakanani. 



Amandla endle okuthwala izimphahla kuyini? Futhi ngidinga amahektheli amangaki ukufuya inkomo eyodwa? 



- Rural Development Service Technical Advice note 33



Kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zezimpahla ezifuywa edlelweni emapulazini – izinkomo zobisi, izinkomo zenyama, amahhashi, izimvu, izimbuzi, njll. Izimpahla zidla inani elithile njalo ngosuku (ubukhulu bemphahla kusho ukuthi idinga ukudla okungakanani). Ukuze siqonde ukuthi singafuya izimpahla ezingakanani endaweni ethile kufanele sazi ukuthi amandla edlelo elithile angakanani. Lokhu singakuthola ngoba kuqinisiwe ngesayensi ukuthi izindawo ezithile zinamandla athile. Kodwa lokhu kuyisikhombiso samandla ajwayelekile endaweni ethile kuphela ngoba isimo sedleko notshani obukhona akufani sonke isikhathi. Uma utshani abuzange bumile kahle, kuzodingeka indawo enkulu ukufuya inani lezimpahla elithile, uma utshani bumile kahle uzokwazi ukufuya inani lezimpahla eliphakeme kuleyo ndawo. Isibonelo: ezindaweni eziningi eFreyistata ngokujwayelekile ungafuya izimpahla ezinkulu ezingu-6 ehektheleni elilodwa (LSU).

Kufanele ngibe nani ukuba ilunga laseGrain South Africa? 



- Jane McPherson, umphathi wephrogramu elibizwa ngokuthi: Grain SA Farmer Development Programme 



Umuntu nomuntu ongumlimi noma okhiqiza ukudla uyakwazi ukujoyina iGrain South Africa. Kukhona izinhlobo ezahlukene zokuba ilunga lalo mhlangano, kodwa ngokwejwayelekile kukhona amalunga omnotho agcwele bese kukhona amalunga avela kumaqembu okufunda. Izintelo zokuba yilunga yilezi: R2,00 ngethani elikhiqizwayo, kodwa kudingeka R570 (inc VAT) uma ukhiqizo ungaphansi. 



Kukhona futhi amalunga avela kumaqembu okufunda abakhokha R10 kuphela ngonyaka. Uma kukhona abalimi abafuna ukujoyina sicela ukuthi bathintane nomlinganisi wephrovinsi oseduze – imininingwane mayelana nalabo bantu uzokuthola ekugcineni kwale ncwajana (Pula-Imvula) yethu. Amaqembu okufunda aqonde ukuhlanganoanjalo ukuze kuxoxwe ngezindaba eziphathelene nokulima nokukhiqhiza ukudla okuzinhlamvu. Futhi ukuba ilunga leqembu lokufunda kuzokuvulela indlela ukuya kuzo zonke izifundo zokuqeqesha ezinikezwa iGrain South Africa njalo ngonyaka.

Empeleni i-"design" imaqondana nomumo  kanye nendlela into ebonakala iyiyo  okukhanga iso. Amanye amadizayini abangelwa ngumsebenzi wento kanye amanye ngawobuhle bokuhlobisa.

Ngokhoke idizayini ingomumo , inhlobo, ukubukeka, iphatheni, umhlobiso, kanye nokuhleleka kwezingxenye ezehlukene  kwe-product noma i-article. Isibonelo, isibonelo idizayini yeringi  ivamise ukubonelela ubuhle bendlela ebukeka ngayo .

Kukhona izinhlobo ezimbili zamadizayini ezingabhaliswa , kodwa uma zihlangabezane nezidingo ezifakelwe lapha ngezansi:

Idizayini enhle ngendlela ebukeka ngayo 

kumele ibe ngentsha neqanjwe kabusha 
ibe nobuhle ngesheyiphu  wayo, ukuhleleka kahle kwezingxenye ezehlukene ; noma umhlobiso ; kanti futhi
kumele kwazeke ukuthi ikhiqizwe ngenqubo yezimboni .
Ibe yidizayini enomsebenzi ewenzayo 
kumele ibe ngentsha nengavamile;
kumele ibe nesheyiphu  noma ukuhleleka kwezingxenye  okubangelwa wumsebenzi wayo; kanti futhi
kumele kwazeke ukuthi ikhiqizwe ngenqubo yezimboni .

Ukuvikelwa kobuhle bendlela idizayini ebukeka ngayo  ngobeminyaka engu-15 kanti ukusebenza kwedizayini ngokweminyaka engu-10.

Ngisho noma kungaphoqelekile ukuthi kwenziwe ucwaningo lokuhlola ubusha nokuba ngeyokuqala idizayini, noma ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akukabi nenye idizayini efanayo noma ecishe ifane, ebhalisiwe ngaphambili, kungcono ukwenza kanjalo ngaphambi kokwenza isiceo sobhaliso . Ukufunisisa ngedizayini kungenziwa ehhovisi le-Design Registry ePitoli. Kumele kwenziwe ngumuntu qobo noma i-agent, efane nommeli wama-patent.

Uma idizayini isiyamukelwe njengentsha yabhaliswa , uzonikezwa isitifikedi sedizayini.

Amadizayini avuselelwa njalo eminyakeni emithathu.
