Byline: Imininingwane itholakale kuGrain SA Advanced Production Course

Photos:

Ezweni lethu elomile lapho sitshala ukudla okuzinhlamvu futhi sibheka imvula kuphela ukusilethela amanzi, kubalulekile kakhulu ukuthi umhlabathi ubenamandla ukulondoIoza umswakamo ukuze izitshalo zizokwazi ukudonsa lawo manzi – lokhu kuyinto enkulu lapho sibheka ukuthi umhlabathi othile unamandla amangakanani ukukhiqhiza ukudla. 

Kukhona futhi okunye esifanele sikuhlole uma sifuna ukuthola ukuthi amandla omhlabathi othile anjani: ukujula komhlabathi, inani lesidaka emhlabathini nokuhlolwa komhlabathi ngamakhemikeli. Kufanele izimpande zezitshalo zikwazi ukungena phansi emhlabathini ukuthola amanzi nokudla okudingekayo lapho zimila. 

Ngaphambi kokuthenga ipulazi noma ngaphambi kokuqinisa ukuthi ufuna ukwenzani ngamasimu akho, kufanele kuhloliswe amandla omhlabathi ukukhiqiza. Amandla omhlabathi azotholalakala uma ugubha imigodi ezindaweni ezikhethiweyo emasimini. Le migodi ivama kunobukhulu obulingana na-1m x 1m futhi nokjula okuya phansi okulingana na-1,2 m. Lapho sihlola le migodi, kuzositshela ukuthi kukhona izinhlobo zomhlabathi ezinjani kulelo pulazi. 

Ukuhlolwa kwenziwa kanje: ngena phakathi emgodini bese uthatha uthulusi ofana nommese ucezule umhlabathi usuke ngaphezulu uye ngaphansi, sonke isikhathi ubheka futhi ubhale phansi ukuthi isimo (uhlobo) somhlabathi sishintsha kanjani lapho wehlela phansi. 

Ungaqhubeka ukusebenzisa ijombolo elikhipha umhlabathi ngendlela ezokhombisa uhlobo lomhlabathi ekujuleni okuthile futhi ukuthola ukujula lapho izimpande zizokwazi ukungena khona, futhi kuzokhombisa ukuthi kukhona izinhla (izingqimbangqimba) ezilukhuni ngaphansi ezizovimba amandla omhlabathi ukukhiqiza. Lezi zinhla zingadalwa ngukulima ngokujula okufanayo njalonjalo noma kungaba udaka oluqinile noma kungaba amatshe azovimba ukuthi izimpande zimile kahle. 

Kungaba into enhle ukuthenga noma ukufunda ibhuku elibizwa ngokuthi:

Soil Classification – A binomial system for South Africa 

ISBN 0-621-10784-0 elingatholakala ku-: 

The research and Technology Manager 

Private Bag X79 

Pretoria 0001 

Ngokwejwayelekile indawo yokukhiqiza ethile izoba nezinhlobo zomhlabathi ezitholakala kuleyo ndawo kuphela. Umhlabathi onamandla amaningi ukukhiqiza awungeke ufane lapho uhlolwa ngendlela esiqhaze ngaphezulu ezindaweni ezahlukene, nezinhlobo zomhlabathi zingahluka, kodwa uma sibheka sihlanganisa lokhu nezinto njengesimo sezulu nokudla kwezitshalo okungaba khona kungasho ukuthi amandla alawo nalawo masimu aphakeme ezindaweni lezo nalezo. Lokhu kungasho ukuthi umhlabathi oyi-avalon onamandla amaningi ukukhiqiza amathani angu-3,5 nangaphezulu eTweespruit awukwazi ukulinganiswa nomhlabathi oyiHutton eViljoenskroon okhiqiza amathani ommbila angaphezu kwamathani angu-6 ngehektheli ngomnyaka omuhle. 

Ukuthola amandla omhlabathi angaba khona, kufanele kuhlolwe okulandelayo:

Ukujula komhlabathi lapho izimpande zingangena kalula; 

Izinhla ezilukhuni; 

Inani lemvula njalo ngonyaka; 

Amandla omhlabathi ukulondoloza umswakamo (amanzi); 

Amandla nenani lokudla elikhona emhlabathini.

Le ncwajana ngumshicilelo kaMeyi 2008 wePula-Imvula. Ngalesi sikhathi sonyaka eziningi izitshalo ezitshalwa ehlobo sezikhulile seziyavuthwa. Lokhu kusho ukuthi isitshalo asisadonsi ukudla emhlabathini. Nokho awusengakavuni ukudla okusemasimini, kuyisikhathi esihle sokucabanga ngohlobo lwesitshalo oqonda ukusitshala ngonyaka ozayo. 

Uyazi kahle ukuthi izitshalo zidinga ukudla okusemhlabathini ukuze zimile zikhiqize izinhlamvu. Lokhu kudla kudonswa yisitshalo emhlabathini. Mhlawumbe singathi ukuthi umhlabathi ufana nekhabethe lapho ubeka izinhlobo zokudla (groceries). Ngaphambi kokuya esitolo ukuthenga ukudla, kufanele ubheke ukuthi kusekhona ukudla okunjani kulelo khabethe – uma ungabheki, kungenzeka ukuthi uthenge ukudla okusekhona ukhohlwe ukuthenga lezo zinhlobo eziphelile. Ukuthatha amasampula omhlabathi kufana nokuyobheka ukuthi kusekhonani ekhabethini lokudla. Kubalulekile ukuthi uthathe amasampula omhlabathi manje ukuze uthole umphumela wokuhlolisisa kusekhona isikhathi okuzokusiza ukuhlanganisa isu elihle lokutshala ngonyaka ozayo. Uma unawo umphumela wamasampula uzokwazi ukuthi kudingeka umcako emasimini akho futhi kufanele uthele umanyolo onjani nongakanani ehektheleni elilodwa. 

Ukuthatha nokufaka ilebula elifanelekile emasampuleni omhlabathi 

Ukuthatha amasampula omhlabathi

Ngaphambi kokutshala isitshalo ensimini ethile, kubalulekile ukuthatha amasampula omhlabathi ukuze uqonde ukuthi yiziphi izinhlobo zikamanyolo ezifanele zithelwe ukuze uthole umvuno umuhle. Amasampula omhlabathi afanele athathwe ngendlela echazwa lapha:

Thatha inani lamasampula (kusuka ku-5 kuya ku-10, maqondana nobukhulu bensimu) emhlabathini wangaphezulu - 15 cm ngokujula.

Hlanganisa onke amasampula omhlabathi wangaphezulu owathathe ensimini ethile bese uthatha 1 kg kulomhlabathi ohlanganisiwe kube isampula lomhlabathi wangaphezulu.

Thatha inani lamasampula (kusuka ku-5 kuya ku-10, maqondana nobukhulu bensimu) emhlabathini wangaphansi – ukusuka ku-15 kuya ku-30 cm ngokujula.

Hlanganisa onke amasampula omhlabathi wangaphansi owathathe ensimini ethile bese uthatha 1 kg kulomhlabathi ohlanganisiwe kube isampula lomhlabathi wangaphansi.

Bhala kahle usuku (ideyiti) nenombolo elebuleni. Kulelo lebula kufanele kubekhona okulandelayo:

Igama lomlimi;

Igama lepulazi;

Ikheli leposi lomlimi – faka negama ledolobha; futhi

Inombolo lensimu (qinisa ukuthi unikeze onke amasimu akho inombolo, gcina irekhodi kwalokhu).

Hambisa amasampula elebhwini (laboratory) lapho azohlolwa khona. Uma ungazi kahle ukuthi kufanele uthumele amasampula akho, thintana nomhlanganisi mephrovinsi weGrain SA Farmer Development Programme (amagama neminingwane kusekugcineni kwale Pula-Imvula). 

Khumbula ukuthi uma kukhona izinhlobonhlobo zomhlabathi ezahlukene kakhulu ensimini eyodwa, kuzodingeka ukuthi unikeze lezo zindawo igama nenombolo elahlukile elebuleni – phatha amarekhodi kwalokhu futhi.

Izincazelo

Izinkonzo  kamasipala ayisisekelo amahala anikezwa nguHulumeni emizini ehluphekile ngaphandle kokukhokhelwa. Lezi zinkonzo  abandakanya amanzi, ugesi, izindlu zangasese kanye nokuchithwa kukadoti. Lezi zinkonzo  zinkezwa ngomasipala kanti abandakanya umthamo wesisekelo kagesi, amanzi, izindlu zangasese kodwa okwanele ukubonelela izidingo zokuqala zemizi ehluphekile. Kodwa, imigomo elawula inqubo yokunikezelwa kwezindlu zangasese kanye nokuchithwa kukadoti ayikaphethwa yiminyango kahulumeni eqendene nalokhu, okuwuMnyango wezaManzi namaHlathi , uMnyango wezesimo sendalo nezokuvakasha .

Amanzi ayisekelo sokuqala amahhala

Amanzi ayisisekelo sokuqala amahhala awumthamo we-6kl  amanzi ngenyanga kumuzi nomuzi. Lo mthamo ungahluka kumasipala nomasipala, kanti kumele uxhumane nomasipala wakini ngqo ukuthola ulwazi ngokuthi yini isevisi  yamanzi ayisisekelo sokuqala amahhala kumasipala wakini. Kumele ukhokhele amanzi owasebenzisayo angaphezulu komthamo ophakelwa mahhala.

Ugesi oyisisekelo sokuqala wamahhala

Umthamo kagesi oyisekelo sokuqala wamahhala ungu-50kWh kumuzi nomuzi ngenyanga kwinqubo ye-grid-energy system ngokuxhumana nayo kwi-website ethi: national electrification programme) Umthamo kagesi ulinganele ukukhanyisa, ukubilisa amanzi ngegedlela, uku-ayina, kanye nokusebenzisa ithelevishini yokumnyama nokumhlophe kanye nomsakazo .

Abasebenzisi benqubo yokuthenga ugesi abangakawusebenzisi ebizwa ngokuthi yi-pre-paid electricity meters, bazokwazi ukubona lapho ugesi usuphelile, nakhona kuzodingeka bathene omunye futhi. Abasebenzisi bakagesi abawukhokhela ekupheleni kwenyanga noma labo abasebenzisa inqubo ebizwa ngokuthi ama-credit meters, ngeke bakwazi ukubona lapho sebesebenzise onke amayunithi abo. Basoshajwa  ukusebenzisa ongaphezulu ekupheleni kwenyanga nenyanga.

Abasebenzisi bakagesi abangenawo ugesi wama-grid energy banganikezwa ugesi ongewona ama-grid enegy ngomasipala babo. Kumele uxhumane nomasipala wakini ukuthola ukuthi ngabe yiyiphi inhlobo yogesi eniwusebenzisayo.

Ukuthola ukuxhunyelwa ugesi namanzi endlini yakho noma endaweni yebhizinisi, xhumana nomasipala wakini, lapho onomuzi khona noma onebhizinisi khona.

Kwezinye izndawo, umphakeli kagesi kazwelonke okungu-ESKOM, uphakela ugesi ngokuqonde ngqo.

Izindlu zangasese zamahhala

Uhulumeni akakaqali ukusebenzisa inqubo yohlelo lwezindlu zangasese zamahhala. Umnyango wezaManzi wenza uhlaka lokunikezelwa kwezindlu zangasese zamahhala. Lapho isu seliphethiwe, ohulumeni bezindawo abanikeza ngezindlu zangasese bazokwazi ukusebenzisa lolu hlelo.

Ukuchithelwa udoti mahala

Uhulumeni akakaqali ukusebenzisa inqubo yohlelo lokuchithwa kukadoti lwamahhala. Umnyango wezesimo sendalo nezokuvakasha wenza uhlaka lokuchithwa kukadoti mahhala. Lapho isu seliphethiwe, ohulumeni bezindawo abenza imisebenzi yokuchithwa kukadoti bazokwazi ukusebenzisa lolu hlelo.

Ukukhokhela izinkonzo  kamasipala

Kukhona izindlela ezimbili zokukhokhokhela izinkonzo  kamasipala:

Ukukhokhela ama-akhawunti ngaphambi kokusebenzisa 

Ukukhokhela ama-akhawunti ngaphambi kokusebenzisa ugesi ukuthenga amayuniti angu  ngemali yakho kusho ukuthi uzosebenzisa kuphela amayunithi owakhokhele noma owathengile. Lapho ususebenzise onke amayunithi, kanti usadinga amanye, kuzomele uthenge amanye.

Ama-akhawunti othola izitatimende ngemuva kokusebenzisa 

Ama-akhawunti othola izitatimende ngemuva kokusebenzisa  asho ukuthi ungasebenzisa noma yimuphi umthamo kagesi namanzi. Umasipala wakini uzokuthumela isitatimende njalo ngenyanga esikhombisa umthamo kagesi noma amanzi owasebenzisile kanye nenani lemali okumele uyikhokhe.

Izincazelo

Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lomsebenzi wezimayini yidokhumende ekhishwa ngaboMnyango wezamaMinerali ne-Eneji okuyiwona okuvumelayo ukuthi uqhube umsebenzi wezimayini. Akukho muntu ovunyelwe ukuthi aqhube ibhizinisi lezimayini ngaphandle kokuthola imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini.

Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini ngeke yadluliselwa komunye. Imvume inenhloso yokulawula ukufunana namaminerali kanye nokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini ngokubonelela ezempilo nokuphepha, ukulawulwa kwesimo sendalo kanye nokumbiwa kwamaminerali ngendlela efanele.

Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini kumele isebenze ngokulandela leso sikhathi esichazwe kwimvume, kodwa esingeqi iminyaka emibili. Ingavuselelwa ezinye izikhathi zezihlandla ezintathu, kodwa isihlandla nesihlandla esisodwa ngeke saba ngaphezulu konyaka.

Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lemayini ingakhishwa kuphela uma:

leyo minerali okukhulunywa ngayo, ingambiwa isikhathi seminyaka emibili
indawo yokwenza ibhizinisi lemayini ingadluli kumamitha angu-1.5 m².

kungekho omunye umuntu onelungelo lokufunana namaminerali, ilungelo lokuqhuba ibhizinisi lemayini, imvume yokuqhuba umsebenzi wemayini, noma imvume yokugodla iminerali noma umhlaba.

Instructions: 

Folio strap: IPhrogramu Lokuthuthukisa Abalimi 

Byline: UJane McPherson, umphathi wePhrogramu leGrain SA Lokuthuthukisa Abalimi 

Grabber: Ukuthuthukisa kuhambelana nabantu – kuthintana nomuntu oyedwa. 

 

Lapha eNingizimu Afrika kukhona abalimi abaningi bezomnotho abanolwazi ukulima ngokwezomnotho, abakwazi ukukhiqiza noma siphi isitshalo noma ukufuya noma ziphi izimfuyo. Akukho ukusweleka kolwazi – manje sekudingeka ukuthi lolu lwazi luhanjiswe kulabo abalimi abansundu ukuze nabo bathole ikhono lokulima ngokwabo ngokuqhubeka. 



Izimiso zokuthuthukisa okuqinile nempilo eqinile emaphandleni zihambelana nokubheka izingcebo/izimpahla ezikhona ezingasetshenziswa ngumuntu oyedwa futhi nokwandisa ikhono laloyo muntu ukusebenzisa lezo mpahla. Lezi zimpahla ziyahluka, kungaba abantu, okwezomnotho, okwezomvelo, njll. Uma sifisa ukuthi ukuthuthuka kuqine, kufanele sisebenzise izinto ezikhona ezisetshenziswa ngabantu ukuthola ukudla nemali. Impilo engcono isho ukuthi uhola imali engcono, uphila kangcono, udla kangcono futhi usebenzisa izingcebo zemvelo ngendlela eqinisayo. Umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa wakhiwa ngaphezu kwamandla nezimpahla okusetshenziswa ngabantu. 

Izizathu zobumpofu ziyahluka, kodwa kukhona izinto ezifanayo njalo – iholo elincane, ukukhiqiza okuphansi nokusweleka kolwazi. 

Ukusweleka kolwazi netheknoloji elisha

Abantu abampofu bavama ukungathintani netheknoloji elisha nezindlela ezinsha zokukhiqiza ukudla, basaqhubeka ngezindlela ezindala ngoba abatholi ulwazi maqondana nezindlela ezinsha zokulima. Futhi kaningi abantu bayala ukushintsha ngoba besaba izinto ezinsha ezingaziwa. Bavama nje ukuqhubeka ngezindlela ezindala ngoba bayazi bekusebenza kahle. Khumbula ukuthi abazi ukuthi kukhona izindlela ezingcono ezinsha zokulima. Bazovama ukukhetha izindlela ezingenazo izingozi. Bangeke bazame ukutshala uhlobo olunye lwesitshalo ngoba bayesaba ukuthi umndeni awungeke ubenokudla kusasa. Ngala maphrogramu ethu ukuqeqesha nokuthuthukisa sivulela laba balimi umnyango ukuthintana nezindlela ezinsha zokulima, kodwa kufanele futhi sibavikele bangashoni phansi, ngoba uma bafeyila kungaletha ingozi ekudleni kwasekhaya. 



Ezinye izinto eziyinkinga

Kukhona futhi ezinye izinto ezenza ukuthi abantu bahlale babempofu, njengalokhu: ukomisa kwezulu, izifo, ukungenwa ngamanzi, ukubulalwa kwemithi, ukuguguleka komhlabathi, ubumpofu bomhlabathi nobumuncu bomhlabathi. Lapho usebenzisa iketanga kungenzeka ukuthi linwebeke ngoba lapho libamba khona emazinyweni ephuli eljjkayo njalo kuyadleka. Emva kwesikhathi sokusebenza kufanele iketanga liqiniswe ukuze lingehli emazinyweni lephuli. 



Indlela yokulinganisa amaketanga (Isithombe 9)

Beka insimbi eqondile phezu kwamasprokete amabili bese udonsa ingaphakathi leketanga phansi ukubona ukuthi liqine kangakanani. Uma kudingeka, qinisa noma xegisa iketanga ukuze ukuqina kweketanga kufike lapho kuvumelana nomlayezo ofike nomshini. 



Qaphela: Kungenzeka ukuthi amanye amazinyo amasprokete angalingani kahle nomphini. Ngakho-ke kufanele uhambise umphini kabili noma kathathu ukubona ukuthi ukuqina kweketanga kuyafana sonke isikhathi. Lapho usebenza ngamaketanga amade kungadingeka ukulinganisa ukuqina kweketanga ngesikali esidonsa iketanga eceleni ukuze sifike ekuqineni okufanelekile. 

Qaphela: Musa ukuzama ukushintsha ukuqina kwamaketanga lapho umshini usasebenza. 



Ukuhlanza amaketanga

Ukuhlanza amaketanga njalonjalo kuyinto elungile nokho ubona ukuthi asasebenza kahle. Landela lezi izinyathelo:

1: Susa iketanga kumasprokete;

2: Geza iketanga ngedizili;

3: Susa idizili bese ulalisa iketanga kuwoyela;

4: Phanyela iketanga (lilengise) ukuze uwoyela omningi usuke; 

5: Buyisela iketanga emshinini. 



Ukugcoba amaketanga

Kukhona izizathu ezine ezibalulekile zokugcoba amaketanga:

Kwehlisa ukudleka; 

Kuvimba ukuthomba nokushisa kakhulu; 

Kuvimba ukuthi amapini angaqini asebenze ngobunzima; futhi 

Kusiza lapho kufika umsebenzi onzima ongajwayelekile. 

Ukugcoba amaketanga kuyinto ebalulekile lapho ufuna ukuthi asebenze kahle isikhathi eside. Uma amaketanga ayoma avama ukuphela ngaphansi kwahora angu-200. Ukugcoba njalo kungenza ukuthi iketanga lisebenze kahle ngesikhathi eside esidlula kathathu esiya kuyishumi uma silinganiswa nesikhathi iketanga elomile lizosebenza ngaso. 



Ukuconsa uwoyela emaceleni kweketanga akuvami ukusebenza kahle. Kufanele uwoyela ungene kulezo zindawo zamabheringi ezisebenza kakhulu – bheka Isithombe 10. Kufanele uwoyela ungene kuzo zonke izindawo zeketanga. Kuzosiza uma uthela uwoyela ngesikhathi iketanga lisashisa bese ulihambisa isikhashana esincane. 



Amaketanga avama ukugcwala ngodoti nothuli nawo afenele athole uwoyela njalo. Uwoyela ohlangane nodoti eketangeni ungcono neketanga elinodoti owomile. 



Izindlela zokugcoba amaketanga

Ngezandla (Ithini likawoyela noma ibhulashi) 

Inkomishi eliconsayo 

Indishi elinowoyela lapho iketanga lihamba khona njalo 

Qaphela ukugcoba ngezandla kuvama ukulungela amaningi amakhonveya nemishini engenazo izinto eziningi ezisebenzayo. Imishini enezinto eziningi ezisebenzayo futhi ezigijima kakhulu nangokusinda idinga ukugcoba okuningi. 



Khumbula lokhu okulandelayo lapho ugcoba iketanga:

Gcoba njalonjalo – noma kukhona udoti nothuli; 

Uma umshini ugijima ngokushesha kufanele ugcobe kaningi 

Susa udoti nothuli ngaphambi kokugcoba; 

Kufanele uwoyela ungene phakathi kulezo zindawo iketanga lihlangana khona; 

Vikela iketanga ukuze lingahlani nezinto ezizolidalela ingozi; futhi 

Landela umlayezo womenzi womshini.

Obani abafanele benze umsebenzi epulazini lakho? 

Instructions: 

Folio strap: Ukwandisa ingcebo 

Byline: UJane McPherson, umphathi wephrogramu leGrain SA Lokuthuthukisa Abalimi 

Photo 1: Insimu “enhle ehlanzekile” kabhekilanga. 

    Photo 2: Insimu “embi engcolile” kabhekilanga. 

Ngokwamanje, ukuthuthukisa abalimi kuyinto enzima futhi kudinga ukukhuthaza nokuthembeka. Abalimi (abakhiqizi) babhekene nezinkinga ezihlukene njengalezi ezilandelayo: 

Ayikho into elula ekulimeni, futhi abalimi bacindezekile ukuphatha izinto eziningi ngoba kukhona izingozi eziningi ezingabavelela. 

Izindleko zokuqala ukutshala zakwamanje zenza ukuthi kubenzima ukuthola inzuzo ekulimeni kokudla okuzinhlamvu ezindaweni ezibheke imvula kuphela lapha eNingizimu Afrika. 

Intengiso yokudla okuzinhlamvu eyehlile yenza ukuthi ukuthola inzuzo ngale ndlela yokulima icindezekile. 

Izintela zemali ebolekiwe ziyakhuphuka futhi imali yokuthenga imishini iyamangaza. 

Nabo abalimi bezomnotho abalima isikhathi eside abanolwazi bayahlupheka – sizothini-ke ngalabo abalimi abasakhulayo? Nabo bahlupheka kakhulukazi. 

Uma sibheka lokhu okubhalwe ngaphezulu, kuyakhanya ukuthi umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa abalimi unzima. Ukuthola izimali zokukhikhiqiza kuyinkinga enkulu yalabo balimi. Kukhona abaningi abanawo umhlaba nemishini (eminye ayisaphili kahle), bayaqeqeshwa, bayafundiswa, bayasekelwa kodwa badinga imali. Imali yokuqala ukukhiqiza ikhuphuke ngendlela emangazayo – sikhuluma ngezimali eziya ku-R4 000 noma R5 000 ehektheleni elilodwa (akunandaba ukuthi utshala sitshalo sini).

Kule phrogramu yethu yokuthuthukisa abalimi besibhekene nezinkinga ezinsha. Izindawo ezinikeza isikwenetu zivame ukutshela abalimi ukusebenzisa abankontraktha ukulima nokutshala amasimu abo. Bekukhona izinkinga eziningi ngokusebenza ngale ndlela futhi sifundile ukuthi bekukhona izindleko eziningi.

Izithombe ozibonayo lapha zichaza konke esikhuluma ngakho ngokukhanya. Amasimu “amahle ahlanzekile” kabhekilanga yilawo masimu alinywe ngabalimi abasakhulayo ngemishini yabo. Amasimu “amabi angcolile” yilawa alinywe ngabankhontraktha. Kukhanya kahle ukuthi umkhiqizo wamasimu alinywe ngabankhontraktha uzobaphansi kwalawo masimu alinywe ngabalimi. Ngaphezu kwalokhu, ukuqasha unkhontraktha kwandisa kakhulu izindleko zokuqala ukutshala. 

Siyanicela ukuthi nizibuze lapho nibheka lezi zithombe – ngubani ofanele awenze umsebenzi wokulima, wena ongumkhiqizi noma unkhontraktha? Thina sicabanga ukuthi kuzobancgono ukuthuthukisa abalimi abasakhulayo ukuze bazokwazi ukwenza wonke umsebenzi wokulima ngokwabo.

IGrain SA – inhliziyo yomsebenzi wokukhiqiza ukudla okuzinhlamvu 

Instructions: 

Folio strap: Ukwandisa umnotho 

Byline: UJenny Mathews, umphathisihlalo wePhrogramu Lokuthuthukisa Abalimi leGrain SA 

IGrain SA liphatha iphrogramu Lokuthuthukisa Abalimi elisekelwa ngemali evela kuMaize Trust, iOil and Protein Seeds Development Trust, iSorghum Trust neWinter Cereals Trust, eliqonde ukunikeza abakhiqizi lapha eNingizimu Afrika ulwazi ngokubafundisa nokubasekela nokubasiza ngezindlela ezahlukene eziseduze nabo ezingatholakala kalula. 

Ngoba iGrain SA linethimu lezingcweti (izazi) elihamba phambili ngokunikeza ulwazi olukhuthele kubalimi abasakhulayo lapha eNingizimu Afrika,ngokwamanje bayaziwa ngokuthi bavele bahamba phambili ngokuthuthukisa abakhiqizi. Amalunga eGrain SA akholwa ukuthi lephrogramu lizosiza ukuguqukisa isimo sokulima ukuze abantu abasale emuva ngezikhathi ezidlule bathole ithuba manje lokusebenza ngokulingana nabanye emsebenzini wokukhiqiza ukudla okuzinhlamvu. Kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi siqonde kahle ukuthi iGrain SA liyini futhi linomsebenzi onjani ezokulimeni lapha eNingizimu Afrika. 



IGrain SA lingubani?

IGrain SA lingumhlangano ohlanganiswe ngentando futhi libhekene nomsebenzi wokukhiqiza ukudla okuzinhlamvu ezweni lethu nangaphesheya. Liqonde ukuthuthukisa bonke abakhiqizi bokudla okuzinhlamvu lapha eNingizimu Afrika. 



Bonke abakhiqizi abalimayo abasekela imigomo yeGrain SA bayakwazi ukujoyina lo mhlangano uma bakhokha izimali ezidingekayo. 



IGrain SA lenza umsebenzi onjani ekulimeni lapha eNingizimu Afrika?

IGSA lingumhlangano wezomthetho maqondana nezindaba zokukhiqiza ukudla okuzinhlamvu lapha ngaphesheya futhi likhulumela bonke abakhiqizi lapha eNingizimu Afrika ngendlela ezothuthukisa imisebenzi yabalimi lapha nangaphandle kwezwe lethu. 

IGrain SA lisebenza njengephoyisa kulo msebenzi wezokulima ukubheka izinyathelo nemithetho okungena kulo msebenzi ukuze likwazi ukuvikela amalunga alo. IGrain SA futhi libeka phansi imibuko yamalunga – nezindlela acabanga ngazo bese likuhambisa kugavumente ukuxazulula izinkinga nokuhlanganisa imithetho emisha.

Umgomo omkhulu weGrain SA uqonde ukuthola ukukhiqiza okufanelekile nokumaketha ukudla ngendlela elingene kulabo bonke abalimayo. Lo mhlangano usebenza njalo ukuhlangana nabanye abasebenza ezokulimeni ukuze bazokwazi ukuncintisana nabakhiqizi abakhulu emhlabeni jikelele njengeUSA neBrazil.

Umsebenzi weGrain SA wenziwa ngamaQembu eZingcweti Asebenzayo 

Kula maqembu kusebenza abantu abasebenzela iGrain SA, izingcweti nabakhiqizi abahlezi nabaphathi bomhlangano. Umsebenzi wabo uqonde ukwenza okulandelayo: 

Ukubheka ukuguquka kwemisebenzi yezokulima nokuhlangana namakomiti kagavumente ukuqinisa ukuthi wonke umsebenzi wenzeka ngendlela elingene, ezobasiza bonke abalimi abatshala ukudla okuzinhlamvu lapha emhlabeni wethu; 

Ukuhlola njalo izindleko zokuqala ukulima nezindleko zokutshala konke ukudla okuzinhlamvu; 

Ukubheka (ukuba iphoyisa) njalo ukuthi isimo semisebenzi nesimo sezinto ezinikezwayo kubakhiqizi sifanelekile; 

Ukuxoxela nokumela abakhiqizi kuma-agribhizinisi nabo bonke abanye abasebenza – ngokwezokulima nangokunikeza umhlaba ukudla; 

Ukufunda ukuthi ukumaketha emhlabeni jikelele kunjani futhi ukucindezela ugavumente esekele evikele abakhiqizi bokudla okuzinhlamvu ukuqinisa ukuthi bonke bancintisana ngendlela elingene; 

Ukuqinisa ukuthi ukufunda okuhambelana nokulima kuyaqhubeka lapha eNingizimu Afrika ukuze abalimi lapha banikezwe ulwazi olufanelekile mayelana netheknoloji elizobasiza ukuqhubeka ukuhamba nabo abahamba phambili ekulimeni; 

Ukuhlola isimo sezinto ezihambelana nokungenisa abalimi abasha nokwandisa amathuba abo okungena ekulimeni kokudla okuzinhlamvu nezindaweni lapho ukudla kungamaketha khona. Leli qembu futhi libheka umsebenzi wePgromu Lokuthuthukisa Abalimi. 

Kuyakhanya ukuthi iGrain SA alisekeli amalunga alo ngemali, kodwa linikeza ukusekela okudingekayo okuzosiza onke amalunga ngolwazi lapha ezweni lethu. Umsebenzi walo mhlangano uvulela abakhiqizi umnyango ukubhekisisa leyo nto abakwazi kuyenza kahle – ukutshala nokumaketha ukudla okuzinhlamvu! Kufanele ukuthi bonke abalimi bazi ukuthi iGrain SA linikeza okuningi okunye ngaphandle kokufundisa nokuqeqesha abalimi!



Bonke abalimi lapha eNingizimu Afrika bafanele bafise ukuba amalunga agcwele eGrain SA anamandla ukuvota. IGrain SA lingamehlo, izindlebe nemilomo yabakhiqizi bokudla okuzinhlamvu emsebenzini wezokulima edidene njalonjalo futhi ucindezelwa kakhulu yizinto ezingaphandle njengokuncintisana namamakethe angaphesheya. Nabalimi bezomnotho banenkinga ngokwamanje ukuncintisana nokuzimisa kule makethe lamanje – ngakho-ke kunzima kakhulu kubalimi abasakhulayo ukuzimisa kulo msebenzi wezokulima. Ngaphandle kokusekelwa ngumhlangano oqinile onolwazi njengeGrain SA, ukuvikela nokusekela nokuthuthuka kwabalimi bokudla okuzinhlamvu ezweni lethu kusengozini.

Izincazelo

Umthetho wobhaliso lokuzalwa nokushona i-Births and Deaths Registration Amendment Act, 1997, uchaza ukuthi ukuzalwa kwengane ephilayo kumele kubhaliswe kungakapheli izinsuku ezingu-30 izelwe.

Inothisi yokuzalwa kumele inikezwe abazali noma umnakekekeli osemthethweni, kanti uma umzali noma abazali bengakwazi ukwenza lokho, umuntu ocelwe ngomunye wabazali noma umnakekeli osemthethweni anganikeza inothisi.

Phezulu

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe

Fakela inothisi yokuzalwa kwifomu le-BI-24 kunoma yiliphi ihhovisi lezaseKhaya.
Umuntu ocelwe ukuth anikeze inothisi kumele abe nelungelo lokuthunywa elibhaliwe, okumele libandakanye izizathu zokuthi kungani abazali bengakwazi ukunikeza inothisi ngokwabo.
Uma ingane izalwe ngaphandle kweNingizimu Afrika kanti omunye wabazali eyisakhamuzi saseNingizimu Afrika ngesikhathi sokuzalwa kwengane, ukuzalwa kungafakelwa inothisi yakho kwiNxusa, iConsulate noma kunoma yiliphi ihhovisi lezaseKhaya eNingizimu Afrika.
Kwinothisi yokuzalwa enikezwa ngemuva kwezinsuku ezingu-30, kodwa ngaphambi kokuba ingane iqede unyaka, abazali noma umnakekeli osemthethweni kumele banikeze izizathu zokuthi kungani bengabhalisanga ezinsukwini ezingu-30 njengoba kudingwe wumthetho.
Uma abazali bengashadile nakhona befisa ukubhalisa ingane ngaphansi kwesibongo sikababa, ubaba kumele amukele ukuthi nguyena ubaba wayo , kwisikhala esibekelwe loko kwiFomu lokubhalisa ukuzalwa. Ubaba kumele abekhona lapho kubhaliswa ukuzalwa.

Usuku luka-25 Septhemba 2008, luzokunjulwa iFarmer Development Programme leGrain SA ngokuthi bekungusuku obeluyisipesheli, oluqhamileyo – usuku oluzokhunjulwa. 

Iphrogramu lokuthuthukisa abalimi liqonde ukuthuthukisa abalimi bezomnotho abansundu. Umbhidli obekhona eNAMPO ngo-25 Septhemba 2008, nawo ubeqonde futhi ukubonga labo balimi abazokwazi ukungena esikhundleni sabalimi bezomnotho ekulimeni jikelele. 

Indlela yokungena esikhundleni sabalimi bezomnotho inzima,azikho izinto ezenzeka kalula. Ukulima kuyinto eyinselele, kufana nokuthi ‘beka induku’ futhi inzuzo ivama ukubancinci. Laba balimi babesekelwa izisebenzi zeGSA Farmer Development Programme, nabanye abaningi abasemsebenzini wezokulima – amabhange, ama-agribusiness, izinkampani ezithengisa izinto zokuqala ukutshala nabanye abakhiqizi bezomnotho. 

Emva kweminyaka eminingi ukusekela abalimi ngeziqembu zokufunda, ngokuhlolwa ngezifundo zokukhombisa, ngezinsuku zabalimi, ngomncintiswano womlimi wonyaka, ngezifundo zokuqeqesha, ngokukhuluma nani emsakazweni, ngokucicisha iphephandaba “Pula/Imvula” njalo ngonyanga, sicabange ukuqala into ebizwa ngokuthi I-“Advanced Farmer Programme” ukunikeza isisekelo esiyisipesheli kubalimi abanekhono, abathanda ukulima, abakhombisa ukuthi bafisa ukuqhubekela phambili. Abaningi abalimi ababongwayo kuleli dili bebamalunga e-“Advanced Farmer Programme”. Kodwa kukhona abanye abasebenze nathi kuleli phrogramu isikhathi eside, asisakwazi ukubasiza ngokuthuthuka ngoba sebafikile lapho: bangabakhiqizi bezomnotho. 

Sicabange ukuthi kuzoba into enhle ukuvusa into ezobizwa ngokuthi i-250 Ton Club ukubonga labo abakhiqize ukudla okuzinhlamvu okungaphezu kwamathani angu-250 ngonyaka, futhi abasondele ngokubizwa “abalimi bezomnotho”. Abaningi abalimi labo bazoba malunga ephrogramu lethu ngonyaka olodwa nje, kodwa sifisa ukubonga ukuthuthuka kwabo. 

Iphrogramu lokuthuthukisa abalimi selihambe iminyaka eminingi, futhi iGrain Trusts, kakhulukazi iMaize Trust ingenise imali eningi ukusekela ukuthuthuka kwalabo balimi. Kuyinto efudumazisa inhlinziyo ukubona ukuthi sekukhona abalimi abangu-8 abaphumelel ukuba abakhiqizi bezomnotho. Futhi bekukhona abanye abalimi abangu-28 ababonakale ukuthi baqonde ukuya lapho. Sibamemile ukuba amalunga e250 Ton Club. Kukhona izigaba ezahlukene ku250 Ton Club, kodwa sekukhona abalimi abane abakhiqiza amathani angaphezu kwa-1000, abayisikhombisa abakhiqiza amathani angaphezu kwa-500, futhi abangu-21 abakhiqiza amathani angaphezu kwa-250. Siqonde ukwenza leli dili njalo ngonyaka futhi sibhekela phambili ukuthi sizothi ‘Halala!” kubanye abalimi ngo-2009.

Izincazelo
Ukuze ufaneleke kulolu hlelo, kumele ube yilunga lemiphakathi eyayicikelwe phansi ngesikhathi esedlule (okusho ama-Afrika, amaKhaladi noma amaNdiya)
ubeneminyaka angu-18 noma engaphezulu kwayo ube nenhloso yokusebenzisa umhlaba ngenhloso yezolimo kuphela ube nenhloso yokulima ngokuphelele ungabe sesikhundleni sikahulumeni uzimisele ukungenela uhlelo loqeqesho ngemuva kokuthola umhlaba ube kwisimo sokufaka esivivaneni nawe nibe nihleleke kahle, uma nenza isicelo njengeqembu nokuba ne-akhawunti yebhangi.
Abalimi abaphumelelayo, abafisa ukukhulisa imisebenzi yabo yolimo, bangenza izicelo zemixhaso (zosiso lwamagranti), kodwa inani eliphelele lwemali yosizo ngeke yaba ngaphezulu kwenani lika-R100 000. Ezinye izimali zokuqala noma zokukhulisa umsebenzi wolimo, kumele zicelwe kumabhenki.
Umxhaso (usizo lwegranti) yohlelo lwe-LRAD, alubuyiselwa (alukhokhelwa) njengemali-mboleko. Kusetshenziswa ifomyula (indlela ethize) ukubala ukuthi umuntu oyedwa uthola malini. Ukuze ufaneleke ukuthola umxhaso (imali yosizo lwegranti) ka-R20 000, kumele ube nemali ozoyifakela nawe engu-R5 000. Lokhu okufakelayo akudingekile ukuthi kuze kube yimali engukheshi, kungaba yimishini yokulima, imfuyo noma enye impahla (asset) yezolimo. Ngisho nabasebenzi imbala, bangafakelwa kuprojekthi njengokuthela kwakho esivivaneni somxhaso wohlelo lwezolimo.

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Khomba umhlaba ofisa ukuwuthenga. Kokunye, ungaba usunawo umhlaba, ofana nomhlaba ohlanganyelwe womphakathi.
Thintana noMnyango wezoLimo noma isikhulu somlimisi endaweni yangakini ukwenza isicelo somxhaso (sosizo lwegranti).
Fakela okulandelayo kanye nesicelo:
o isiphakamiso sokuthi umhlaba uzosetshenziswa kanjani noma iplani yokulima (i-proposal yeprojekthi)
o ukukhetha ukuthenga nesivumelwano senani lentengo, uma niqasha ngenhloso yokuthenga o uhla lwamalunga omuzi noma amalunge eqembu, uma nihlongoza ukuthola umhlaba njengeqembu o isiqinisekiso sokuthi udaba lwetayitela lucacile, akukho abenze isicelo sokukhalazela ukubuyiselwa lowo mhlaba, umhlaba ubhaliswe ngegama lomthengisi, kanye nokuthi inani lentengo yomhlaba alikho ngaphezulu kwenani lentengo ezimakethe (market price)
o ubufakazi bokuthi insalela yemali edingekayo ikhona (okungaba yimali yenu, noma isivumelwano semali-mboleko)

Izincazelo

Inqubo yezezindlu zabantu , yindlela kahulumeni yokusiza ngezindlu esekela amakhaya afisa ukuthuthukisa imixhaso yawo yamasabsidi ngokuzakhela izindlu noma ngokugqugquzelana ngokwabo ukuzakhela amakhaya abo.

Inqubo isiza ukuthi abafuna ukuzuza basungule inhlangano yokusekela kwezezindlu ezobasiza ngokuba nosizo kwinhlangano, ezobuthekniki kanye nezokuphatha. Usizo lubandakanya uqeqesho kanye nokwelulekwa kwabazuzayo ukuzakhela amakhaya abo.

Le ndlela itholakala njengeprojekthi kubazuzi, ngokuhlanganisa, ukwenza izikhungo kanye namasabsidi amaprojekthi. Nangaphezu kwalokho, ibuye itholakale ezindaweni zasemakhaya lapho khona abantu abanelungelo lokusebenzisa nokuhlala kumhlaba  abakuwo.

Ngabe isebenza kanjani le nqubo yezezindlu zabantu iPeople's Housing Process?

Le nqubo yenza ukuthi usebenzise usizo lwesabsidi ukuzakhela indlu yakho. Ngenxa yokuthi usizo kwezobutheknikhali  bubaluleke kakhulu kule nqubo, wonke umuntu obamba iqhaza kwinqubo, kumele abe nenhlangano esekelanayo. Le nhlangano isiza ngosekelo lobutheknikhali  ukuqinisekisa ukuthi indlu yakhiwe ngendlela efanele.

Abantu abazakhela izindlu ngokwabo noma abagqugquzelela ukwakhiwa kwezindlu zabo, bangakha izindlu ezinkulu ngemali encane.

Inqubo yezezindlu zabantu iPeople's Housing Process isiza kokulandelayo:

ukonga ngezindleko zabasebenzi ngokuthi abantu bayazakhela okunye ngokwabo noma ngokuthola usizo emindenini yabo, komakhelwane, kubangani kanye nabanye abangasizana nani
ukugwema ukukhokha inzalo  kwabamakontilaki okwakha, kanye
nokuthuthukisa izinqumo.

Ukuze ukwazi ukungena kule nqubo, kumele ube:

Ngoshadile noma onohlalisana naye, noma ube nabancikile ngokwezimali.
Ube yisakhamuzi esisemthethweni saseNingizimu Afrika.
Ube ngumuntu omdala ngokwanele okwaziyo ukungenela ikontraki. Lokhu kusho ukuthi kumele ube ngumuntu oneminyaka engaphezu kwengu-21 noma ushadile, nakhona ube ngophile kahle engqondweni
Ube nomholo womndeni ongaphansi kuka-R3 500.
Ningabi ngabathole usizo lwesabsidi yokuthenga indlu kuHulumeni ngesikhathi esedlule.
Ube ngumuntu ofuna ubunikazi bendlu okokuqala ngqa.

Qaphela ukuthi kumele ungenele ikontraki ngokusekelwa yinhlangano esemthethweni  Inhlangano esekelayo izosiza ngolwazi lobuchwepheshe  kanye nakwezokuphatha.

KU-BONTLE (17) ukungadli ngendlela kwaqala njengento yokwehlisa isisindo somzimba elungiselela i-matric dance. Ekuseni wayeziphuzela ikhofi, ngelantshi adle iqanda elibilisiwe ne-apula, ebusuku kube wu-lettice noshizi. Lokhu kwamsebenzela kahle waqhubeka nako, kwaze kwaba uyaquleka ngelinye ilanga.
Ngesikhathi u-Akhona (18) ethola ukuthi umngani wakhe omkhulu wayedla noma yini ayeyifuna kodwa engakhuluphali wabona ukuthi kungakuhle naye emva kokudla akuphalaze.
UBontle une-anorexia nervosa kanti u-Akhona une-bulimia nervosa.
Ababulali ababili
Zimbili izinhlobo ezijwayelekile zokungadli ngokuyikho i-anorexia ne-bulimia. I-Anorexia yenzeka cishe emantombazaneni amancane nakwabesimame abancane kanti ibonakala ngokuba lowo muntu abe nomuzwa wokwesaba ukukhuluphala.
Uma umuntu ene-anorexia, akadli nakuba ezokwehla ngesisindo ngendlela eyingozi, yena akaziboni ezacile. Uma intombazane ene-anorexia izibuka esibukweni, noma izicabanga, izibona ikhuluphele kunesidingo sokwehla ngomzimba.
I-Bulimia yehlukile kancane kune-anorexia, ngoba umuntu one-bulimia akakugwemi ukudla, udla kakhulu kodwa abuye akukhiphe ngokukuphalaza noma asebenzise amaphilisi okuhlambulula isisu. Njenge-anorexia, i-bulimia nayo iphatha abantu besimame abancane nabasebasha.
Ukubukeka komzimba
Ukubukeka komzimba kubalulekile. Kusukela ebuncaneni, amantombazane afundiswa ngokubaluleka kwawo nokuyinto encika ekubukekeni kwawo.
Amaningi asabela ukuthi ukukhuluphala akuthola uma engena esigabeni sokukhula yinto yaphakade.
Aba nokwesaba azame nokuba akuqede ukukhuluphala ngoba engenalwazi lokuthi uma ushintsho ngokomzimba lunqamuka, isisindo sawo sizoma ndawonye ngaphandle kwesidingo sokuba anciphise ukudla.
Ukuqala izindlela zokungadli kahle zisasuka phansi, kubandakanya ukungabi nokuzethemba; ukunganeliseki ngomzimba wakho, umzimba ongamile kahle (uzizwe ukhuluphele) nokulwela ukuba nomzimba omuhle; umlando womndeni wokukhathazeka; izinkinga ezinzima zomndeni; umlando wokuhlukumezeka ngokocansi noma ingcindezi yangakwezemidlalo.
Ukuzaca kakhulu kungakulimaza.
Ukuzilambisa kungabeka impilo yakho engcupheni yokufa.
Uma intombazane izace kakhulu, kungenzeka ingabi nawo amafutha anele ukuze izitho zayo zomzimba zihlale ziphilile.
Umuntu one-anorexia angenza umonakalo enhliziyweni yakhe, esibindini nasezinsweni. Yonke into esemzimbeni wakhe iyehla, idale nokwehla kwezinga le-blood pressure, ukushaya kwemithambo, izinga lokuphefumula ahlale egodola.
Amanye amantombazane azilambisa kakhulu, angazithola esenqanyukelwa ama-period awo. I-Anaemia nokuvuvukala kwamajoyinti yizinto ezijwayelekile, njengamathambo aphukayo.
I-Anorexia ingenza izinwele nezinzipho kungabi nampilo, kuze kuholele esifweni sendlala nokufa imbala.
Abantu abane-bulimia bavame ukuphathwa yisisu, singahleleki kahle, umqhubukusho, umphimbo obuhlungu noma kube ngukulimala esiswini nasezinsweni ngenxa yokuphalaza.
Amazinyo abo angabola ngenxa yama-acid esisu afinyelela emlonyeni lapho bephalaza.
Njengamantombazane ane-anorexia, ane-bulimia nawo anganqanyukelwa ama-period awo, ahanjiswe yisisu aze alahlekelwe yi-mineral ebalulekile i-potassium, abe nezinkinga zenhliziyo ezingaholela ekufeni imbala.
Khulula umzimba wakho
Isinyathelo esinzima kakhulu wukuvuma nokukwamukela ukuthi unenkinga yokungahleleki kwendlela odla ngayo, wesabe ukufuna usizo.
Usizo lukhona, ngakhoke ungakuvumeli ukuphila nale nkinga.
Thanda lo mzimba onawo
Iqiniso wukuthi, bambalwa abantu abanemizimba emihle. Uma umuntu engadaliwe wamuhle, lowo muntu kufanele akwamukele lokho afunde ukuthanda umzimba wakhe njengoba unjalo.
Thanda umzimba wakho uwunakekele.
Enza uhlu lwazo zonke izinto umzimba wakho okwazi ukuzenza. Uwufunde njalo wengeze okunye.
Qaphela ukuthi yini umzimba
wakho ongayenza nsuku zonke. Khumbula yilona thuluzi lempilo yakho, hhayi into yokuhlobisa.
Enza uhlu lwabantu obakhonzile: abantu abanempumelelo nababa negalelo empilweni yakho, emphakathini noma emhlabeni.

Njengomzali, kufanele uqaphele ushintsho ezindleleni zokudla zomntwana wakho. Njengoba ukungakuvumi lokhu kuvame ukuba yingxenye yale nkinga, usizo lokwelashwa kungenzeka lufike ngokuphoqelela komunye womndeni.
Khumbula, ukungenelela kulokhu kungahlenga impilo yomntwana wakho. Uma usola ukuthi umntwana wakho unenkinga yokungadli ngendlela eyiyo, mfunele usizo lokwelashwa ngokushesha.
Ukuziphatha okukhombisa ukuthi ingane yakho inazo izindlela zokungadli ngokuyikho:
Ayilambi noma ayithandi ukudla nomndeni.
Idla kakhulu kodwa ayikhuluphali.
Isebenzisa amaphilisi okuhlambulula isisu noma ama-water pills.
Ukuzilolonga ngokwedlulele noma ukuhlale icabanga ngesisindo somzimba.
Ukuhlale ivakashela e-bathroom emva kokudla - kungenzeka ivule amanzi ukuze ungezwakali umsindo wokuphalaza kwayo.

Isicelo semvume yokuba ngumkhoseli obaleke kwelakubo
Isimo
Isicelo sokuba ngumkhoseli obaleke kwelakubo yenziwa ngumenzi wesicelo ukuba emukelwe njengodinga isiphephelo (refugee).
Ocela ukukhosela ngumuntu obaleke kwelakubo izwe ngenxa yokwesaba ukuhlukunyezwa (kwezenhlalo, kwezamasiko, kwezepolitiki, kwezenkolo ngisho nakwezomnotho), nakhona ofuna ukwamukelwa njengodinga isiphephelo (refugee). - kulesi simo eNingizimu Afrika. Umenzi wesicelo ngodinga ukukhosela ngesikhathi isicelo sakhe kusabhekwana naso.
Odinga ukukhosela unikezwa imvume engeke yavuselelwa yokukhosela endaweni okungenwa kuyo eNingizimu Afrika (emngceleni womhlaba, esikhumulweni sezindiza noma esikhumulweni semikhumbi). Imvume ngeyezinsuku ezingu-14 nakhona igunyaza onayo ukubika endaweni eyamukela ababaleki ebizwa ngokuthi yi-Refugee Reception Office (RRO) eseduzane ukuze enze isicelo sodinga ukukhosela.
Umuntu odinga isiphephelo (refugee) onikezwe isimo sokuba ngodinga ukukhosela kanye nokuvikelwa ngokulandela umthetho obhekene nabadinga ukukhosela we-Refugee Act, 1998.
Ukuthola olunye ulwazi olunabile ngena kwi-website ethi uMnyango wezaseKhaya.
Inqubo okumele ilandelwe
Odinga ukukhosela, ufaka isicelo ngokwakhe endaweni efanele ye-RRO, lapho okwenziwa khona okulandelayo:
Umenzi wesicelo uyahlolwa kuqala
Kuthatha izigxivizo zeminwe yomenzi wesicelo
Kutholwa umtoliki (uma kunesidingo)
Kuprintwa imvume yodinga ukukhosela, isayinwe, ifakelwe isitembu ebese ikhishelwa odinga ukukhosela.
Imvume esebenza izinsuku ezingu-30, izovumela odinga ukukhosela ukuhlala eNingizimu Afrika isikhashana. Imvume inganwetshelwa ezinye izinsuku ezingu-30 ebese ezinyanga ezintathu.
U-RSDO uyaqhubeka nokwahlulela udaba lwesicelo kanye nokuthatha isinqumo maqondana nesicelo sokukhosela.
Isimo sokuba ngodinga isiphephelo sisebenza iminyaka emibili, kodwa odinga isiphephelo kumele abhale incwadi ecela ukubuyekezwa noma ukunwetshwa kwesimo sakhe sokumba ngodinga isiphephelo, ezinyangeni ezintathu ngemuva kokuba kuphele isikhathi saleyo mvume yodinga isiphephelo.

BONA – August 2005
Ezemisebenzi
IMBONI yamabhange isishintshe kakhulu kule minyaka eyedlule. Sezadlula lezo zinsuku lapho imenenja yebhange yayingabonwa.
Namuhla izimenenja seziyazibambela zisize amakhasimende nokuyinto eziyibeka phambili. Imisebenzi yasebhange isiyibhizinisi elinokuncintisana okukhulu kanti amabhange amakhulu anemikhankaso emikhulu yezokuthengisa neyezezimakethe eqhubekayo ukuze bathole amakhasimende amasha futhi bathembeke kuwo.
Indima yezamabhange ibanzi kanti ibandakanya, abantu, izinhlangano nabamabhizinisi. Imisebenzi eyenziwayo ibandakanya ama-credit cards, ama-akhawunti okonga nawamasheke, imali yokusiza ekuthengeni izimoto, imali-mboleko yezindlu, imali-mboleko yabafundi, nokusebenzisa ibhange nge-Internet.
UBONA uxoxisane nabanye babasebenzi ebhange lakwa-ABSA eThekwini abazinike isikhathi besitshela ukuthi kunjani ukuba yingxenye yezamabhange.
Oyimenenja jikelele uThemba Mathe usebe kule mboni yezamabhange iminyaka engu-18 kanti ziningi izinguquko asezibonile. “Ezinsukwini zakudala abantu babesaba ukuza ebhange bazobonana nemenenja yebhange.
“Manje amabhange asebonile ukuthi ikhasimende yinkosi. Njengebhange siyazama ukubhekela zonke izidingo kanjalo nokuvala igebe lezizukulwane.”
UXolani Mthembu uyimenenja yethimba lezabokuthengisa lamabhange angomahamba-nendlwana KwaZulu Natal. Waqala umsebenzi wakhe e-ABSA njengomabhalane emva kokuphothula u-matric wakhe ngo-1995.
UXolani wasungula uhlelo lwakhe lomsebenzi evakashela izikole ngenhloso yokufaka abafundi kwezamabhange. “Ngabona ukuthi kubalulekile ukufunda ngokusebenzisa ibhange kusukela ebuncaneni.”
Ukuzimisela nokuzinikela kukaXolani kwasheshe kwathela izithelo. Uhlelo lomsebenzi wakhe lokuqala lwaba yimpumelelo kangangoba manje usephethe ithimba labezokuthengisa elivakashela ezikoleni nasemabhizinisini KwaZulu Natal lithuthukisa umsebenzi webhange labo linike nosizo lwamabhange angomahamba-nendlwana.
Ongumabhalane wosizo lwamakhasimende uYolisa Bukaphi usebe embonini yezamabhange isikhathi esingaphansi konyaka. UYolisa wakwazi ukuba athole izifundo ze-industrial psychology ayezenza ngeposi. Umsebenzi wakhe ubandakanya ukusiza amakhasimende emibuzweni anayo. Lokhu kubandakanya ukufaka izicelo zama-bond, ama-credit card, ama-akhawunti okonga nanoma ikuphi okunye akubuzayo amakhasimende. UYolisa uye acubungule izidingo zekhasimende ngaphambi kokuba alise kumuntu ofanele ongumxhumanisi ukuze lithole olunye usizo lobuchwepheshe.
“Isikhathi sethu sokuba matasa wukuphela kwenyanga nangesikhathi selantshi,” kusho uYolisa. Njengomuntu ongaphambili, uYolisa uyibona indima yakhe iyinselelo. “Kufanele ulwazi lwakho lwezamabhange uluthuthukise ukuze amakhasimende angalokothi acabange ukuya kwenye indawo. Ngizizwa ngenelisekile ekusizeni nasekwelulekeni amakhasimende, ngiwongele nemali.
“Kuyacaca ukuthi imali ibaluleke kakhulu kubantu ngakhoke kufanele siqinisekise amakhasimende ethu ukuthi imali yawo iphephile nokuthi athola izeluleko eziphambili zochwepheshe nosizo.
“Ngingathanda ukuba wumxhumanisi bese mhlawumbe ngiba yimenenja yegatsha, kodwa njengamanje ngiyakuthokozela ukuba la ngikhona. Ngithola isipiliyoni kanti ngihlale ngifunda okusha njalo.”
Amathuba kwezamabhange
Indima yezamabhange ibanzi kakhulu kanti inochunge olumangalisayo lwamathuba emisebenzi. Lokhu kubandakanya:
ulwazi lwezobuchwepheshe (information technology - IT); ukuthuthukiswa kwezokusebenzisana nabantu (human resource development - HRD); usizo lwezezimakethe (marketing); olwezezimali; olokubolekwa izimali; elokonga (treasury) nolwezomthetho.
Amazinga okungena kulo msebenzi wamabhange abandakanya: abango-teller; omabhalane abasiza amakhasimende; omabhalane bezokusingathwa komsebenzi; ukugcinwa kolwazi (data capture) nokuba ama-collection agent.
Shayela ibhange olithandayo ucingo ukuthola ukuthi ikuphi lapho bevame ukukhangisa khona izikhala zemisebenzi.
Izikhala zamatoho kwezemboni yezamabhange kungenzeka zibe khona kuma-agencies ezokuqasha. Uma ungumuntu owufanele lo msebenzi nesidingo sikhona, lena kungaba iyona ndlela yokungena kule mboni.
Izidingo zemfundo
Amabhange amaningi namuhla adinga abafaka izicelo zomsebenzi babe ne-diploma noma iziqu ezihambisana nendima yezomnotho. Ama-diploma ezezimakethe noma iziqu nawo angakubeka ethubeni uma ufisa ukuthatha umkhakha wezokuthengiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwezezimakethe embonini yezamabhange.
I-National Diploma In Banking nayo iyatholakala kwezinye izikhungo zemfundo.
Amabhange futhi angabaqasha abano-matric abazothola ukuqeqeshwa ngaphakathi kulo msebenzi. I-Maths noma i-accountancy yizona zifundo okudingeka ube nazo ku-matric.

SIBULALA izingane ezingaphezu kwezingu-1 000 eSouth Africa ngonyaka ngenxa yephutha. AbeRed Cross War Memorial Children's Hospital eCape Town, ukwenza isibonelo, belapha izingane ezingaphezu kuka-10 000 ngonyaka ngenxa yokwethuka - lesi yisibhedlela esisodwa edolobheni elilodwa.
Nsuku zonke izingane zethu zilengela engozini yokufa emigwaqweni kanjalo nasemakhaya nokuyinto esingaphezu kwezigigaba ezenzeka ezindaweni ezifana nezaseVietnam, China naseKorea, ngokwabeWorld Health Organisation. Okwamanje azikabikho izibalo emazweni angomakhelwane.
Lezi zibalo ziyakhombisa futhi ngokusho kukaphrofesa Sebastian Van As, ongumqondisi wabeChild Accident Prevention Foundation of SA (CAPFSA), ukuthi lapha eSA izingane eziningi zisemathubeni cishe alishumi okuba zilimale kunengane eyodwa eGermany nokuyizwe elinakekela izingane. Kodwa futhi ukholwa wukuthi kusekuningi okungenziwa ukwenza ngcono lesi simo.
Kunini lapho izingane zethu zifa khona"
Eyodwa ingane kwezintathu ezifa ngengozi zisuke zisemgwaqweni.
"Emalokishini ngokuvamile azikho izindawo ezakhelwe ukudlala kwezingane," kusho uVan As. "Kokunye alukho ngisho unqenqema lomgwaqo, ngisho namasango ukuze izingane zihlale zingaphakathi emakhaya. Ngaleyo ndlela zidlala ezitaladini nokuyilapho amatekisi ehla enyuka ngesikhulu isivinini.
"Kodwa izingane zeminyaka engaphansi kwengu-8 yizo ezisengozini ngoba azikakhuli ngokomqondo ukubhekana nezingozi zomgwaqo ngokwazo - ngisho ngabe zitsheliwe. Kungakho kungafanele zibe semnyango ngaphandle kokubhasojwa.
"Awucabange ukuthi kujwayeleke kanjani ukubona ingane yeminyaka emihlanu iziyaluzela yodwa emgwaqweni. Uma kwenzeka ishayiswa yimoto noma yisitimela, ngeke uyisole leyo ngane, lokhu akusiyo ingozi kodwa kudalwa wukunganakwa."
Enye eyodwa ezinganeni ezingu-12 ezifa ngengozi kufanele ngabe ziphephile ngaphakathi ezimotweni - kodwa ngenxa yokuthi cishe ezine kwezinhlanu, zisuke zingawafakile amabhande, ngokusho kukaVan As.
"Okubuhlungu kakhulu kunakho konke, abazali abacabanga ukuthi bangazivikela izingane zabo ngokuba bazigone. Ngisho ngabe uhamba ngo-50km/h ngesikhathi ushayisa, ukushayisa okungaba namandla angu-1 000kg kungayibulala ingane yakho. Akekho ongabamba ingane ngaphansi kwaleso simo."
Ngoba ikhanda lomntwana yilona elisinda kunomzimba wakhe omncane, kulula ukuba lishayeke kwi-dashboard noma phansi kuqala. Ngaleyo ndlela izingane yizona ezisengcupheni enkulu yokulimala kanzima emakhanda ngaphezu kwabantu abadala lapho kwenzeka ingozi yomgwaqo.
Yini ebulala izingane zethu"
u Amanzi adala ukufa enganeni eyodwa kweziyisithupha ezifa ngengozi. "Ingane encane ingafa buthule ngemizuzwana engu-30 emanzini angu-4cm," kusho uVan As.
u Ukusha nakho kubulala eyodwa kweziyisithupha.
"Umbulali omkhulu yimililo edalwa amalangabi avulekile nezitofu, kodwa eziningi zilimala emakhaya - cishe ezine kwezinhlanu zishiswa wuketshezi olushisayo," kusho uVan As.
"Kukhona futhi idlanzana elincane elishiswa wugesi, nokuyilapho izintambo zixhunywe ngokungemthetho."
u Okokugcina, kunezingane ezilimala odlameni lwasekhaya lapho omdala edonsa isibhamu. Ingane yaseCape Town isengcupheni engamathuba angu-25 ukulimala odlameni kunengane yaseBirmingham eNgilandi.
"Siphila emphakathini wodlame onezigelekeqe ezingadubula izinhlamvu ezingu-2 000 ngenyanga," kusho uphrofesa Van As.
"Angikuboni kuyingozi ukuthi ingane ingadubuleka, kodwa kubi ukuba thina sikuvumele lokhu ukuba kwenzeke."
Izingane eS Africa zihlale zisengozini ngoba zihlala ezindaweni eziyingozi ezisuke zenzelwe abantu abadala.
"Izingane zethu ziyahlupheka ngoba ukuhlangana kwesizukulwane esidala nesisha negebe elikhulu kwabadla izambane likapondo nabahluphekayo, likhulu kakhulu," kusho uVan As.
"Sinemijondolo eminingi eduze kwemigwaqo emikhulu naseduze kolayini besitimela, kanjalo nezinye izinkinga ezidalwa wukuhlupheka nokuhlala ngokuminyana kwabantu besebenzisa izitofu zikapharafina noma izindawo zokudlala ezinosimende."
Kodwa futhi akufanele samukele ukwehlulwa yilezi zinto eziyingozi, ngokusho kukaVan As. Singasebenzisa amaqembu abhekele umphakathi ngemizamo yokuthola isixazululo esizosebenzela izingane zakuleli. Ngaphezu kwalokho, nathi singazibhekela izingane zethu...
Siza ingane yakho isinde kubabulali bakuleli
Izingane ezingaphezu kweminyaka emine ubudala zisengcupheni yokufa okudalwa wukulimala kunokudalwa yizifo. Kodwa uphrofesa uVan As wabe-CAPFSA, uthi izingozi eziningi yilezi ezisuke zingagwemeka ngoba ezingamaphesenti angu-70 zenzeka emakhaya.
Ukuze sikwenze lokho kufanele sizinikele futhi sizibophezele ekubhasobheni izingane zethu nasekuzifundiseni imithetho yokuphepha ukuze zizivikele lapho zikhula. Ngisho ngabe kusekhaya noma ngaphandle, izingane zeminyaka engaphansi kwengu-8 ngeke kulindeleke ukuba zizinakekele - noma zinakekele ezinye - ngoba imiqondo yazo ayikavuthwa ngokwanele ukubhekana naleso simo.
Thola isikhathi sokuba uhlanganyele nabanye omama, ngisho ngabe nimatasa kangakanani, nishintshane ekubhekeni izingane.
Nanka amasu anganisiza avela kuphrofesa Van As nabeCAPFSA:
INGOZI 1: Izimoto yizo ezibulala kakhulu izingane eSA, uma zihamba ngezinyawo noma zingabagibeli. Ingxenye yokuthathu kokune yezingane zaseKhayelitsha ezingeniswa esibhedlela iRed Cross Hospital eCape Town, ukwenza isibonelo, zisuke zishayiswe yizimoto.
Into ongayenza: Fundisa zonke izingane imithetho yemigwaqo. Khumbula noma iyiphi ingane eneminyaka engaphansi kwengu-8 kufanele ibhasojwe uma ihamba emgwaqweni. Qiniseka ukuthi ingane yakho idlala endaweni ebiyelwe enesango ukuze ingayi emgwaqweni.
INGOZI 2: Ukufa ngokuminza kuthatha imizuzwana, kanti amanzi akhona noma yikuphi - emakhaya emabhakedeni, emaxhaphozini, emadamini, emifuleni nakuma-swimming pools. Ingane eyodwa kweziyisithupha ifa ngengozi yokuminza ngokusho kwabeCAPFSA. Lezo ezisengozini kakhulu ezeminyaka ephakathi kowodwa nengu-8 ezingakwazi ukubhukuda.
Into ongayenza: Njalo zigade izingane eduze kwamanzi, futhi ungazishiyi zodwa kubhavu. Amabhakede awahlale evaliwe.
Fundisa izingane ukuthi zingabhukudi emifuleni zingadlali futhi eduze kwemifula ngoba kungenzeka ziphonseke phakathi.
Izingane ezinezinyanga ezingu-12 zingakufunda ukubhukuda, ngakhoke zama ukuzifundisa. Uma usebenza endaweni yomuntu one-swimming pool, ungayivumeli ingane yakho isondele khona uma i-swimming pool ingamboziwe ngenethi.
INGOZI 3: Cishe izingane ezingu-500 ngonyaka zelashelwa ukusha esibhedlela sezingane iRed Cross Children's Hospital. Kodwa lesi sibalo singedlulela ezweni lonkana njengoba iyinye kweziyisikhombisa efa ngomlilo.
Into ongayenza: Njalo cisha amakhandlela, izibani zikapharafini, ama-heater nezitofu uma usulala. Gcina omentshisi nezinto eziluketshezi ezivuthayo, kude nezingane. Izingane azingasondeli emlilweni ngoba zizosha. Ungabhemi ekameleni ngoba imililo eminingi idalwa wugwayi lapho obhemayo eselele. Ungazomisi izingubo ezimanzi phambi komlilo noma nge-heater. Ungafaki izinto eziningi emapulakini ngoba lokho kungadala umlilo.
INGOZI 4: Izingane zeminyaka engaphansi kwemihlanu yizo ezisengcupheni kakhulu yokusha ngoba lokhu imvama kwenzeka emakhaya. Ezine kwezinhlanu zisuke zishiswe wuketshezi olushisayi. Ngakhoke qaphela kakhulu ekhishini.
Amapulaki odongeni ayingozi ekubeni izingane ziyathanda ukushutheka iminwe yazo.
Into ongayenza: Sebenzisa amapuleti angemumva esitofini. Izivalo zamabhodwe mazibheke emumva ukuze izingane zingawadonsi. Beka izinkomishi ezinokushisayo phakathi nendawo etafuleni. Esikhundleni sendwangu yetafula kungcono usebenzise ama-table mats.
Iketela malibe nentambo emfishane ukuze izingane zingalidonsi. Ungashiyi i-ayina eshisayo yodwa. Uma ubizwa wucingo noma kukhona ongqongqozayo, yicishe uyibeke endaweni ephephile kuqala. Njalo hlola amanzi ukuthi ashisa kangakanani ngaphambi kokufaka ingane yakho kubhavu.
INGOZI 5: Izingane zeminyaka esuka kowodwa kuya kwemine, yizo ezisengcupheni yokudla ushevu ngoba ziyathanda ukuthinta noma yini eseduze kwazo nokufaka izinto emlomeni. Zingaphezu kuka-500 izingane ngonyaka eRed Cross Children's Hospital ezelashelwa ukudla ubuthi ngokuphuza imithi yokuhlanza indlu, ukudla imithi yokubulala amagundane neyokubulala ukhula engadini.
Into ongayenza: Okuhle ongakwenza wukufaka okhiye emakhabetheni lapho ufake khona upharafini, izinto zokuhlanza indlu, ezokubulala izinambuzane nezingubuthi bokuhlanza indlu. Uma ungakabafaki okhiye, zibeke emashalofini aphezulu lapho izingane zingeke zifinyelele khona.
Neziqedaphunga zingaba yingozi ezinganeni, ngakhoke zibeke lapho zingeke zizibone khona izingane.
Thenga upharafini osezintweni izingane ezingeke zikwazi ukuzivula. Ngisho ngabe lezi zinto zibiza kakhulu kodwa zingcono ngoba zingaphephisa impilo yengane yakho. Ukufaka upharafini emabhodleleni eziphuzo kungayingozi ezinganeni nakwabadala njengoba izigigaba ze-Accident & Emergency zikukhombisa lokhu.
INGOZI 6: Izingane ezingaphansi konyaka ziyakhwingxeka. Cishe izigigaba ezingu-800 ngonyaka, zezingane ezelashwa esibhedlela sezingane sodwa iRed Cross Hospital. Njalo ngonyaka, ezingaphezu kwezingu-100 ziyafa.
Into ongayenza: Ungayishiyi yodwa ingane ukuba izifunze. Amadamu ungawafaki ezintambeni ezinde ngoba izingane ziyathanda ukufaka izinto emlomeni bese zikhwingxeka - izinto ezifana nemali, ubhontshisi, izinkinobho no-pin. Gcina izikhwama zikapulasitiki, izintambo kude kunezingane. Izingane ezineminyaka engaphansi kwemihlanu ungaziniki amakinati. Fundisa izingane ukuba zingahambi noma zigijime uma zidla.
INGOZI 7: Esibhedlela iRed Cross Hospital yodwa, ngonyaka zingu-2 000 izingane ezelashelwa izingozi zokuwa - emibhedeni, ezitebhisini nasezindaweni zokudlala. Izingane ezincane kakhulu, zisengcupheni yokulimala ekhanda, ikakhulu ezingaphansi konyaka.
Izindawo zokudlala izingane eziningi eSA ziyingozi ngoba zikhonkiwe ukuze zingabi nodaka. Kufanele kube khona omata be-rubber ukuze zingalimali lapho ziwa, kodwa notshani noma isihlabathi kungasiza, ngokusho kukaphrofesa Van As.
Into ongayenza: Ingane enezinyanga ezingaphansi kwezintathu ungayishiyi yodwa noma uyibeke embhedeni ophakeme. Kufanele ufake izinsimbi zokuyivikela ukuze ingawi embhedeni ophakeme. Izingane zeminyaka engaphansi kwemihlanu ungazivumeli zilale embhedeni ophezulu.
Gwema izindawo ezishelelelayo phansi noma omata abangabambeleli phansi. Vikela ingane emakhoneni etafula.
Bhasobha amafasitela. Celani ikhansela lendawo ukuba kwenziwe indawo ephephile yokudlala izingane.
INGOZI 8: Ukusikeka kuyingozi kuzo zonke izingane zeminyaka yonke.
Into ongayenza: Ngaphandle kokususa amagilazi afile, izitsha nama-tiles, kufanele futhi ubeke amagilazi, imibese nezikele lapho izingane zingeke zifinyelele khona.
Fundisa izingane ukuba zingagijimi noma zingahambi nezinto ezicijile - ikakhulu amapeni emlonyeni - nokuba zibhekise imimese nezikele phansi uma ziziphethe lezi zinto. Beka ama-razor emashalofini aphezulu ahlala izingilazi ne-ceramic. Lahla amathoyizi aphukile.[z]

AZI AMALUNGELO AKHO
Kule nyanga: ongakwenza uma bekuphoqa ukukhokhela umuntu isikweletu (funda ngaphambi kokusayina)
NGISIZENI! NGISENKINGENI YEZIMALI
Umngani wami wayefuna ukuthenga imoto. Ngenxa yomlando wakhe wokukweleta kwadingeka athole umuntu ozokuba ngufakazi ngemali-mboleko ayifunayo. Wangicela ukuba ngimsayinele incwadi yenkampani yemali ayekweleta kuyo. Le ncwadi yayiyinde ibhalwe ngamagama amancane. Angiyifundanga kahle ngaphambi kokuyisayina.
Emva kwalokho, umngani wami walahlekelwa wumsebenzi nemoto yadliwa.
Inkampani yemali isingithumelele incwadi ithi ngasayina njenge "surety" yomngani wami ngakhoke nginesibopho salesi sikweletu. Le nkampani ifuna ngikhokhe yonke imali esele ekweletwa wumngani wami. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ngizokube sengikhokhela imoto engekho nomngani wami angenayo.
Le nkampani yemali yangitshela ukuthi izimisele ngokwamukela imali engu-R1 900 ngenyanga - ne-interest yemali esele. Ngeshwa angikwazi ukukhokha leyo mali. Ngicela usizo!
ISELULEKO SOFEZELA
Incwadi osuke uyisayinile yaziwa ngokuthi yi"deed of suretyship". Ukuyisayina kwakho kukwenza ube yi-"surety" yomngani wakho.
Lena ngenye yezindlela izinkampani zemali ezizama ukuzivikela ngazo uma zibolekisa ngezimali.
Uma umuntu abamboleka imali (umngani wakho) esehluleka wukuyikhokha, owavuma ngokusayina isibophezelo sesikweletu kumele akhokhe - okunguwe.
Kungakuhle wenze lokhu okulandelayo:
1 YAZI INTO OYIKHOKHELAYO
Cela isitatimende esinemininingwane yonke yemali efuneka kuwena (Unelungelo lokukwenza lokho ngokusemthethweni.)
2 XOXA NABO
Yichazele izinkinga zakho obhekene nazo le nkampani yemali bese ubacela ukuba bavume ukuba ukhokhe isamba esincane kunaleso zinyanga zonke - ozokwazi ukusimela.

IZWE LAMA- CHEETAH
ELASE-BLOEMFONTEIN lasungulwa ngokusemthethweni njengenqaba ngo-1846 nguHenry Warden owayephethe umbutho wezempi waseBritain. Leli gama lisho “izimbali zasentwasahlobo” noma “umthombo wezimbali.” Igama lesiSuthu laleli dolobha lithi Mangaung, okusho “indawo yama-cheetah.”
Leli dolobha liyikhaya labantu abangaphezulu kuka-350 000 kanti yilapho iSupreme Court Of Appeal yaseSA itholakala khona.
I-Free State Stadium nezakhiwo zezemidlalo eziyizungezile kudlalelwa kuyona kakhulu kuleli dolobha nakulesi sifundazwe. Imidlalo ye-2010 FIFA World Cup iyodlalelwa kule nkundla.
Le nkundla ibuye ibe yinkundla yeBloemfontein Celtic neFree State Cheetahs eyawina iCurrie Cup ngo-2005, yadlala i-draw kwi-final ka-2006 yaphinda yawina ngo-2007.

IMPILO IMNANDI
U-BRENDA FASSIE wazalelwa kwaLanga, eCape Town, ngoNovember 3, 1964. Wayengumagcino ebantwaneni abangu-9 kanti waqala ukusiza abazali bakhe ngemali ayeyithola ngokuculela izivakashi. Ngo-1981, eneminyaka engu-16, waya eSoweto eyofuna amadlelo aluhlaza njengomculi.
U-Brenda wajoyina iJoy wagcina esecula phambili kwiBrenda And The Big Dudes. Baduma ngezingoma ezazithi Weekend Special, Too Late For Mama nezinye.
Amahlazo ayelokhu ezwakala njalo ngoBrenda esacula. Ngo-1995 watholakala ehhotela nesidumbu sikaPoppie Sihlahla ayethandana naye okwasolakala ukuthi wabulawa yizidakamizwa. U-Brenda naye wayephuma engena emitholampilo esiza abasebenzisa izidakamizwa.
Baningi abaculi abathi uBrenda waba yisibonelo esihle kubona emculweni.
Ama-albhamu akhe ayethola ama-multi-platinum eSouth Africa.
Ngo-April 26, 2004, uBrenda waquleka esekhaya lakhe. Washona ngoMay 9 engakaze aphaphame. Ukuhlolwa kwesidumbu kwaveza ukuthi waqulekiswa wukusebenzisa i-cocaine ngokweqile.
YUMMY!
KUNAMAZWE adla izintuthane namaqanda azo. Amaqanda ezinhlobo ezimbili zezintuthane ayisidlo saseMexico esibizwa nge-escamoles. I-kilogram lala maqanda libiza u-R400 ngoba atholakala ngezikhathi ezithile zonyaka kanti awatholakali kalula.
Kwelase-India, nakulo lonke elaseBurma nelaseThailand, i-paste eyenziwe ngentuthane ebizwa nge-green weaver isevwa no-curry.
Sikhumbula...u
Iqembu abalandeli balo abalazi ngelePhunya Sele Sele naMasokolara lasungulwa ngo-1969 njengeMangaung United. Ngo-1984, usomabhizinisi uPetros Molemela wathenga leli qembu washintsha igama lalo labizwa ngeBloemfontein Celtic (elisusela kwiGlasgow Celtic).
NgoNovember 2001, emva kokudlala kwePhunya Sele Sele ehlathini, uMolemela wadayisela uJimmy Augousti owayedlala kwiCeltic amasheya akhe. Emva kweminyaka emithathu iCeltic idlala ehlathini, yabuyela kwiPSL ngesizini ka-2003/04 emva kokuba ngoshampeni bakaFirst Division.
Leli qembu libalwa kwanothe kakhulu kanti iSiwelele, abalandeli beCeltic, banomfutho omangalisayo!

NGENHLA: UThabo Mdluli wethula uhlelo lweGospel Stars noSheila.
BANINGI abantu abangosomabhizinisi abenza izinto eziningi ngesikhathi esisodwa. Abekho abafuna ukugxila entweni eyodwa. U-Sheila Silindile Maseko, obukeka ephumelela usuku nosuku ubalwa kulabo bantu.
"Ngisheshe ngikhathale kanti yilokho okwenza ngihlale ngibheka okusha engingakwenza," kusho loMC obuye abe nenkampani yakhe yokuphrojusa.
"Konke engikwenzayo ngikubona kubalulekile," kuqhuba yena ngesikhathi ebuzwa ukuthi uzenza kanjani izinto eziningi kanye kanye. "Uma uNkulunkulu evuma, ngingathanda ukuthatha umhlalaphansi sengineminyaka engu-35."
Phezu kwezinto azenzayo uSheila, ubuye ethule uhlelo lweGospel Stars noThabo Mdluli kuSABC 2.
Ubuye abe yimenenja yenkampani yemithi.
Nakuba ezikhandla ngale ndlela uSheila uthi: "Lude ukhalo engisazoluhamba. Angikafinyeleli ezinjongweni zami."
Ngabe uyihlanganisa kanjani le mpilo ayiphilayo nomndeni wakhe"
"Umsebenzi ubalulekile kodwa isikhathi somndeni wami ngiyohlale nginaso," kusho uSheila. "Umndeni wami uyasiqonda isimo sami. Uyangixhasa ngoba isikhathi esisichitha sindawonye asithikanyezwa amabhizinisi engiwenzayo."
U-Sheila ophokophelele impumelelo empilweni yakhe uthi lumhlaba umxhwele kakhulu uhlelo lweGospel Stars.
"SinamaPop Stars nama-Idols, manje sekuyisikhathi seGospel Stars," kusho yena. "Baningi abantu abakhonze umculo woKholo kanti leli yithuba lokuba abantu abasha baveze amakhono abo kwiTV.
"Ngalolu hlelo kuhloswe ukuvumbulula amathalente amasha hhayi ukuba abantu bacule njengabantu esesibazi.
"Kule-show asibatsheli abantu ukuthi abahambe bagcinephi, sikwamukela ngisho noma uzozibhalela ingoma yakho," kuqhuba uSheila.
"Sizitshela ukuthi bonke abantu abangenela lo mncintiswano bangamaKhrestu afuna ukufakaza ngoJesu kodwa lokho asikusebenzisi njengomgomo kwabawungenelayo."
U-Sheila ukhulele emndenini ongamaKholwa kodwa uthi isinqumo sokwamukela uJesu njengeNkosi noMsindisi usithathe ngo-1999.
Bonke abantu ubathathisa okwabafowabo nodadewabo ngisho noma bengewona amaKholwa kanti uyavuma ukuthi ukuba yiKholwa akulula uma uyisihlabani.
"Abantu bayayicubungulisisa impilo yakho kanti bahlale bekubhekile uma okwenzayo kuphikisana nokushoyo. Ngikholwa wukuthi okwenzayo kwenze ngokuzicabangela. Ukholo lwakho lunike isikhathi sokuvuthwa," kusho yena.
"Angisho ukuthi ukuya emaphathini kuhle noma kubi - kodwa ngichaza ukuthi ziphathe kahle. Kufanele uqine."
Yile nkolelo emenza aphumelele empilweni. "Konke empilweni kuyajulukelwa. Akukho okutholakala kalula.
"Akube khona okwenzayo ngempilo yakho kanti qala njengamanje, ngisho noma ungaya e-library uyofunda. Yiba yisibonelo esihle kuwena ufunde ngamaphutha akho." [z]

Uma umfishane, ulula ngesisindo uwathanda amahhashi, lona wumsebenzi wakho...
KWESIKHULU: “Ayikho into eyedlula umuzwa wokuwina,” kusho ujokhi uDenny Smith.
UJOKHI uDenny Smith akasazi nokwazi ukuthi usewine imijaho emingaki kule minyaka engu-8 eyedlule. Akukhumbulayo wukuthi wawukhetha kanjani lo msebenzi onezinselelo. “Umalume wami wayethanda ukuyobuka amahhashi egijima. Ngangi-mncane kakhulu kuneminyaka yami wase ethi umsebenzi wokuba wuJokhi ungangifanela - namike ngabona kungcono ukuba ngiwuzame.
“Ngafaka isicelo kwabeRacing And Equestrian Academy eSummerveld, eduze neTheku. Emva kokuhlolwa amasonto amabili bangemukela.
“Ngangesaba ngesikhathi ngigibela okokuqala ehhashini, kodwa ngasheshe ngajwayela ngaba nothando lwamahhashi. Lapha saqale safundiswa ngamahhashi asemadala angasagijimi, kwathi emva kwezinyanga ezingu-18 sayoqeqeshelwa enkundleni lapho egijima khona. “Kwathi lapho sebebona ukuthi sesikulungele, saqala saqhudelana nabanye. Umjaho wami wokuqala wawungoJune 16, 1998. Ayikho into engayijabulela njengaleyo nakuba ngingawinanga. Unyaka wami wokuqala wawunzima kakhulu ngoba phela kudingeka uwine ukuze waziwe. Ngesikhathi ngiwina umjaho okokuqala ngajabula kakhulu.
“Kusukela lapho, sengiwine cishe imijaho engaphezu kwengu-100. Kimina ayikho into edlula injabulo yokuwina. Ukuwina kukwenza uzethembe.”
UDenny useke wajaha eDubai, Mauritius, Qatar, Bahrain naseKenya.
“Ngizama ukuthola isipiliyoni njengoba ngisebenza phesheya, kodwa ngizimisele ngokubuyela eSouth Africa sengizozinza uma ithuba liqhamuka,” kusho yena.
Amathuba omsebenzi
“Umsebenzi wojokhi uthandeka kakhulu,” kusho u-Eureka Sewpersadh oyi-marketer kwabeRacing And Equestrian Academy ehhovisi labo elikhulu eThekwini.
“Iningi lojokhi lizitholela imali enhle lapha naphesheya. Kuhlale kunesidingo esikhulu sojokhi abaphambili. Njengamanje baningi ojokhi abaqeqeshwa eSouth Africa abenza kahle kakhulu eHong Kong.”
Kufanele ube ngumuntu onjani
Umsebenzi wojokhi udinga ukusebenza kanzima kanti kusetshenzwa amahora amade - ukuqeqeshwa kuvame ukuqala ekuseni ngo-4.
Ukuqeqeshwa
I-Racing And Equestrian Academy yisona sikhungo kuphela lapha ezweni lapho kuqeqeshwa khona abazoba ngojokhi.
Lesi sikhungo siyefana ne-boarding school ezimele, kanti kuso kulandelwa uhlelo lwezemfundo kodwa olugxile ikakhulu ekugitshelweni kwamahhashi.
Ngalesi sikhathi, abafundi baqala ukufundiswa ukugibela amahhhashi nokuyinto edonsa iminyaka emihlanu ngaphambi kokuba babe wojokhi abangochwepheshe.
Abafundela lo msebenzi bangaphansi kwabeRacing And Equestrian Academy kanti emva kokuqeqeshwa bathola amalayisensi okugibela agunyazwe ngabeNational Horseracing Authority of South Africa.
Kulabo ongabafanele lo msebenzi wobujokhi, kodwa abanothando lwamahhhashi, akhona amanye amathuba. Ukwenza isibonelo, bangaba ama-work riders, abaqeqeshi noma ama-stud farm managers.
Ungaqeqeshelwa futhi ukuba wugulumi (onakekela amahhashi) ngaphansi kwabeNational Groom School.
Izinga ngokwemfundo
Uhlelo lokukhethwa kwabo lunzima kanti abafaka izicelo kufanele kube ngabeminyaka engu-15-17 mhlawumbe abanebanga lemfundo uGrade 9. Usayizi nesisindo kubalulekile, kanjalo nokuziphatha kofake isicelo, ukuzinikela kwakhe nomlando womndeni wakhe (ngokosayizi womzimba).
Ongakuhola
Abaqeqeshelwa lo msebenzi basayina ikontileka yeminyaka emihlanu nalesi sikhungo, kodwa futhi le kontileka bangayelula uma abangama-instructors bebona ukuthi abakakulungeli ukuba ngojokhi abangochwepheshe.
Baqala ukuhola imali lapho beqala ukugibela emijahweni. Kukhona futhi nemali abayitholayo eyingxenye yesiteki lapho bewina.
Imali yabo ibekwa kwi-trust account babakhokhele yona isiyisamba esikhulu.
Imali iyehluka kanti ingasuka ku-R5 000 kuye ku-R30 000. Imali etholwa ngujokhi onguchwepheshe oqeqeshiwe yona iphezulu. Abanye bazisebenza ngokwabo bathole cishe kusuka ku-R12 000 kuya ku-R70 000 kungakabanjwa lutho emholweni, emva kwalokho ziningi izindleko ababhekana nazo.[z]

UKUZIFIHLA kukaMzekezeke kwamenza ‘waphenyeka izinqe’ ngesikhathi evela enkantolo yaseRandburg kulandela ukuxabana nowesimame eSandton Square. I-mask ayeyifaka esazakhela udumo emculweni we-kwaito, kubukeka isiyaphelelwa yisikhathi.
Ngamlinda cishe isikhathi esingaphezu kwehora enkampanini yakhe yokuqopha e-Auckland Park.
Le nsizwa engomunye wabasunguli beTS Records futhi eyayinguDJ weYFM neyayingumethuli wohlelo iFriends Like These uSibusiso Leope odume ngelikaS’bu, yafika yangixhawula yathi: “Ngiyaxolisa, bese ngikhohliwe ukuthi sihlele ukubonana.”
Njengoba eseshiye phansi esiteshini iYFM, usegxile kakhulu emsebenzini wakhe wokuqopha.
“Ngesikhathi imenenja entsha yesiteshi uBondo Ntuli eqokwa, wafika nezinguquko nokuchaza ukuthi ngangizosuka ohlelweni luka-3pm - 6pm ngihlehlele kweluka-6pm - 9pm.
“Kodwa okunye okwakungikhathazile wuzakwethu owayekade eshayela uhlelo luka-6pm - 9pm ngoba kuyena akufananga nakimi enginayo enye indlela yokuziphilisa, uhlelo lwakhe yiyonanto kuphela eyayimphilisa.”
Kodwa uS’bu wakwazi ukuvuka azithathe. Usanda kuqashwa Okhozini FM ukuba ashayele uhlelo lwasekuseni, kanti iCD yakhe ayikhipha ngonyaka odlule iY-Lens ayisusele ohlelweni lwakhe ayelushayela kwiY-fm isanda kuthengisa ifinyelele ezingeni le-platinum. Le-CD ingenye yagaqele umklomelo we-song of the year kumaSAMA kulo nyaka.
Ngokwakhe uS’bu uthi uhlelo lwantambama yilona hlelo okwakungolwakhe. “Ngalusebenzela kanzima lolo hlelo. Ngangivame ukwenza elaphakathi nobusuku kuze kube sekuseni ngentathakusa ngesikhathi ngiqala kwiYFM ngasebenza ngakhuphuka kusuka lapho.
PHEZU kokudaluleka kwemfihlo yakhe kulandela ukuvela kwakhe enkantolo, kodwa akaphumeli obala uma umbuza ukuthi ngabe nguye yini uMzekezeke - isihlabani se-kwaito nosaziwayo weTV. Kwenzeka kanjani ukuba ngesikhathi uMzekezeke esememezela ukugcina kwakhe ukubonakala emphakathini ecula kwaqondana nesikhathi lapho uS’bu onguDJ ememezela ukushiya kwakhe kwiYmf?
Kule mibuzo uS’bu wavele waphela yinsini. “Kusho ukuthi kwaqondana.”
Kungani nasungula uMzekezeke? “Sethula uMzekezeke kwezomculo ngoba sasifuna ukuba labo bantu abacabanga ukuthi ayikho into abangayenza ngenxa yokungakwazi ukukhuluma isiNgisi, noma bengenazo izingubo ezinhle zokugqoka, babone ukuthi ayisebenzi into enjalo,” kusho yena.
“Umqondo ekusunguleni uMzekezeke kwakungukukhuthaza ukuzithemba kubantu.”
US’bu uthi uMzekezeke kwakuqondwe ukuba akhiphe i-albhamu eyodwa kuphela, kodwa wadonsa amehlo abaningi kangangoba inkampani yokuqopha yabona ukuthi ayikho into engayenza yaqhubeka yakhipha enye i-albhamu.
“Kodwa uMzekezeke maduze nje uzoba nohlelo lwakhe azolushayela kwiSABC 1,” esho echaza ukuthi abeTS sebebone kungcono babuye bazibandakanye nakuma-shows eTV.
Lolu hlelo lwakhe iSifuna Ukwazi kuzoba ngelokuqala kulo msebenzi wabo. Luzobe ludingida izinto ezifana noBlack Economic Empowerment.
“Uma ubuza abantu ukuthi iyini iBEE, bakutshela ukuthi abantu abahamba ngezimoto eziphezulu,” kusho uS’bu.
“Le-show yiyo ezokwazi ukukhanyisela umphakathi ngezinto ezinjalo.”
U’SBU wakhulela eThembisa eWela Mlambo nokwathi emva kwalokho wayohlala eHospital View eDaveyton. Wakhuliswa wugogo wakhe behlala bebaningi endlini yaselokishini kunabashana nabazala abangu-8, kodwa manje usezithengele indlu kanokusho enyakatho neGoli.
Njengoba manje esenendawo enkulu evulekile, lo somabhizinisi osemncane uchitha isikhathi sakhe ekhaya nabangani noma ezidlalela amaTV games.
“Lokho ngikwenza uma ngingasebenzi noma ngingaphromothi abaculi besitebela sami,” kusho uSbu.
US’bu waphasa u-matric wakhe eCentral Secondary School ePitoli ngo-1993, waqhubeka wayokwenza i-electrical engineering eWits Technikon.
Waqla ukuzibonakalisa ngesikhathi esebenzela isiteshi somphakathi eThembisa nokuyilapho enza uhlelo lwantambama kwaze kwaba nguJuly 2000. Ngesikhathi esebenza njenge-technician yakwaTelkom ngo-August ngawo lowo nyaka, uLeope wathola umsebenzi kwiYfm. Wayenguphrojusa futhi engumethuli wohlelo olwalubizwa ngokuthi yiBeauty And The Beast.
“Ukusungula inkampani yokuqopha kwakulokhu kuyiphupho lami kusukela ngisemncane.” KwiYFM kulapho ahlangana khona nabambisene naye ebhizinisini uThembinkosi Nciza, odume ngelikaTK.
Empeleni uNciza owabonisana noS’bu ngokuba basungule inkampani yokuqopha - nokwaholela ekusungulweni kweTS Records.
Akuzange kube buhlungu ukuthi ukusungulwa kwenkampani yokuqopha kwaba yisikhathi esifanayo lapho uMzekezeke aqala ukuzakhela igama ebiza abasakazi beYFM abakhulumise emoyeni kodwa bona bengazi ukuthi basemoyeni. [z]

Ngaphambi koku-tweezer amashiya kufanele uqale uwenze ame ngendlela oyifunayo.
■ Beka i-eyeliner pencil (noma into efana nayo) incike ngaphandle kwekhala lakho nangaphakathi ekhoneni leso lakho. Yimake le ndawo ngoba kulapho amashiya akho kufanele aqale khona.
■ Gcina ipensela lincike ekhaleni lakho libheke phezulu. Lihambise liqondane neso lakho. Phinda wenze umaka futhi ngoba lapha kulapho amashiya akho egqame kahle khona. Manje landela ipensela kuye kufike ekhoneni elingaphandle kweso lakho. Lapha kulapho amashiya akho kufanele agcine khona.
Uku-tweezer
1. Usebenzisa isixubho esidala, qala ekhoneni elingaphakathi ubhrashele amashiya ngenhla ulandela omaki obenzile. Bhrasha noma yiziphi izinwele eziwela ngaphandle. Lezo yizinwele okufanele uzisuse.
2. Usebenzisa i-eyebrow pencil ensundu, dweba umugqa ngaphezulu kwamashiya.
3. Qala ukhiphe izinwele ofuna ukuzisusa (izinwele ongazifuni) usebenzisa ama-tweezer. Donsa isikhumba sakho siqine usidonsele ohlangothini lokukhula kwezinwele zakho. Ukwenza isibonelo, uma wenza ishiya lakho langakwesokudla, donsa isikhumba esiseduze kweshiya langakwesokudla. Khipha unwele olulodwa ngesikhathi, uqiniseke ukuthi ulukhipha kusukela phansi esihlokweni. Donsa izinwele ngokulandela indlela ezime ngayo, uzihlusule ngokushesha.
4. Emva koku-tweezer bhrasha amashiya ame ngendlela ofuna ngayo. Abhekise phezulu nangaphandle.
5. Kancane gcwalisa amashiya akho nge-brow pencil usebenzisa umbala omesha izinwele namashiya akho.

I-website iyimizamo ebalulekile yokungenela nokusiza ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izakhamizi zikwazi ukuxhumana nohulumeni.
Abasebenzisi okuqondiswe kubo, yizakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika kuzo zonke izingxenye zezwe, amabhizinisi akhona manje nawekusasa aseNingizimu Afrika kanye nezinhlangano nezakhamizi noma izinhlangano zakwamanye amazwe ezidinga izinkonzo kuhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika.
Ulwazi ngezinkonzo (ngamasevisi) kahulumeni
I-website iqukethe ulwazi ngezinkonzo zikahulumeni ezinikezwa nguhulumeni emkhakheni kazwelonke.
Ulwazi lwezinkonzo luhlelwe ngezinkonzo zemikhakha emithathu:
Izinkonzo (amasevisi) kubantu: Izinkonzo (amasevisi) ezakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika, ahlelwe ngokulandela okwenzekayo empilweni
Izinkonzo (amasevisi) ezinhlanganweni: Izinkonzo (amasevisi) aqondene nezinhlangano kanye namabhizinisi
Izinkonzo (amasevisi) kubantu bamazwe angaphandle: ulwazi oluqondene nezakhamizi zakwamanye amazwe ezidinga izinkonzo eziqondene nazo kuhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika.
Omunye nomunye wale mikhakha, uphinde wahlelwa ngendlela ehambisana nezinto ezenzeka empilweni ngokulandelana kwazo izinto ezenzeka kwimpilo yesakhamuzi noma yebhizinisi. Izinto ezenzeka empilweni ziphinde zahlelwa ngokulandela izigaba zempilo.
Ulwazi kwinkonzo nenkonzo luhlelwe ngokulandela imikhakha eyisikhombisa ebalulekile, okuyilena: izincazelo, izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe, imithetho nemigomo, amazinga okwenziwa komsebenzi nesikhathi sokwenziwa komsebenzi, izindleko, amafomu okumele agcwaliswe kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana.
Ulwazi oluhambelanayo
Ngenxa yokuthi ulwazi lwaqala lwabhalwa nge-English (ngesiNgisi) kwathi emuva kwalokho lwaseluhunyushelwa kwezinye izilwimi. Ulwazi ngezinkonzo kwezinye izilwimi lufakelwa kwi-website ngemuva kokuba seluhunyushiwe.
Sebenzisa ikhasi elithi xhumana nathi ukuphawula noma ukubuza nge-website yeziNkonzo zikaHulumeni.
Imephu ye-website, ihlinzeka ngezithombe nemifanekiso yokuhleleka kwe-website. Ihleleke ukusuka phansi ukuya phezulu, lokhu okubeka ulwazi kwi-website ngemikhakha nemikhakha yezihloko ezithile. Lokhu kusiza ukuthi ukwazi ukubona kahle nokuqondisisa kahle ukuhleleka nengqikithi ekuqethwe yi-website.
Ikhasi lokuqala libeka uhla lwezinkonzo ezifinyeleleka kakhulu. Lezi zindawo zokungena zisiza ukufinyelela kwizinkonzo ezinhlanu eziphezulu ezivakashelwa ngabasebenzisi. Uhla lubekwa nokuhlelwa ngokubonelela amanani amakhasi avakashelwe.
Ukuxhunyaniswa namanye ama-website angaphandle, nakho kukhonjisiwe ngamagama athi 'ukuxhunyaniswa kwangaphandle - kuvula kwelinye ifasitela' elizovela kwibhokisana, uma i-cursor yakho ihanjiswa phezu kwalokho kuxhunyaniswa. I-website izovula kwelinye ifasitela lokuhamba-hamba kwamanye ama-website.
Le-website izohlala ifakelwa ulwazi olusha njalo. Umgomo wethu ukunikezela ngolwazi njalo lapho lubakhona. Kodwake abenzi nabathuthukisi be-website yeziNkonzo zikaHulumeni ngeke banikeza isiqiniseko ngokuthi ulwazi lwamanye ama-website esixhumanisana nawo olushicilelwe lapha luzoba ngolwangaleso sikhathi. Bheka kwiziMo neMibandela, kupharagrafu 4.3.
Ubunikazi bolwazi
Ulwazi luhleleke ikakhulukazi kule-website ngendlela ye-HTML. Kodwake amanye amadokhumende ayatholakala ngohlobo lwe-PDF (isibonelo, Imithetho, amafomu), anikezelwa ngale ndlela ukuthi ahlale eyinhlobo okumele abe ngayo ukuhleleka nokwendlaleka kwawo.
Kokunye kuthatha isikhathi eside ukuvula amadokhumende e-PDF. Kulesi simo, sincoma ukuthi amadokhumende uwethule kwikhompyutha yakho ebese uwavulela khona.

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Abaqashi kumele bagcwalise ingxenye yokuqala noma isigaba A sefomu u W.Cl.2.
Abaqashi kumele badabule isigaba B sefomu u W.Cl.2 balinikeze udokodela noma isibhedlela ngokushesha emva kokwenzeka kwengozi.
Abaqashi kumele bathumele isigaba A sefomu u W.Cl.2 kubesikhwama sesincephezelo ngokushesha emva kokwenzeka kwengozi.
Abaqashi abangalindi isigaba B sefomu ukuthi sigcwaliswe ngudokodela anduba bafake isicelo sokuncephezelwa. Bazathi bangalithola isigaba B sefomu elivela kudokodela, bese balidlulisela phambili.
Abaqashi kumele bakhokhele umsebenzi imali yesincephezelo yezinyanga ezintathu zokuqala emva kokwenzeka kwengozi. Abesikhwama sesincephezelo bazombuyisela imali yakhe umqashi ngaloku.
Uma umsebenzi engeke akwazi ukubuyela emsebenzini masishane, abaqashi kumele bathole amaripoti esimo sesigulane (W.Cl.5) kudokodela bawuthumele kubesikhwama sesincephezelo njalo nganyanga.
Uma umsebenzi ebuyela emsebenzini, abaqashi kumele bathumele iripoti yokubuyela emsebenzini (W.Cl.6), kanye neripoti yokugcina (W.Cl.5) kubesikhwama sesincephezelo.
