INDODA edume emhlabeni ngele "Nkosi uTut" yayingumbusi ogama lakhe lalinguNebkheperure Tutankhamun owabusa kwelaseGibhithe phakathi kuka-1324 BC-1333 BC. Saba sincane kakhulu isikhathi asibusa ngoba wabusa iminyaka engu-11 kuphela - kanti okwenza ukuba uTutankhamun adume wukuthi isidumbu sakhe esatholakala eValley Of The Kings satholakala sisekahle.
Ukutholakala kwaso ngo-1923 sitholwa nguHoward Carter kwaba yindaba esematheni kwabezindaba kwenza ukuba abantu babe nomdlandla wokuzwa ngomlando weGibhithe.
Abacwaninga ngokwenzeka mandulo abanasiqiniseko sokuthi bangobani abazali bakaTutankhamun kodwa abaningi bavumelana ngokuthi wayeyindodana yeNkosi u-Akhenaten noKiya, owayengomunye wamakhosikazi enkosi. UTutankhamun wayeneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye ngesikhathi eba yinkosi kanti abeluleki bakhe babeholwa yindoda eyayibizwa ngo-Ay.
U-Akhenaten wavala indawo yezithixo zaseGibhithe ngesithixo esasithandwa nguye. Leso sithixo sasibizwa ngo "Aten" kanti igama aqanjwa ngalo ezelwe uTutankhamun kwakunguTutankhaten, okusho ukuthi "Aten othandekayo."
Kwathi lapho lo mbusi eseneminyaka engu-11, waqeda isigwebo sokudingisa izithixo ezindala washintsha negama lakhe. Lokho kwamenza waba yintandokazi kubantu wakha amathempeli amaningi awanikela esithixweni selanga esingu-Amun-Ra (Tutankhamun ochaza u "Amun othandekayo").
Emva kokukhothama kwakhe uTutankhamun abantu baseGibhithe bayikhohlwa indaba yakhe kwaze kwaba sekuqaleni kwe-20th Century.
Ithuna lakhe alaziwanga ukuthi likuphi. Lagqitshwa amatshe amanye amathuna. Kwabuye kwakhiwa nezindlu phezu kwethuna lakhe.
Ithuna lakhe
U-Howard Carter ongusolwazi wezemilando waseBritain ozinze eGibhithe wathola ithuna likaTutankhamun eThe Valley Of The Kings ngomhlaka 4 November, 1922.
U-Carter waxhumana noLord Carnarvon owayengumsizi wakhe ngoNovember 26 ngalowo nyaka kanti la madoda aba ngabantu bokuqala abangena ethuneni likaTutankhamun emva kweminyaka engaphezulu kwengu-3 000.
Ngomhlaka 16 February, 1923, emva kwamasonto ambalwa kumbiwa ngokucophelela, uCarter wathola ibhokisi likaTutankhamun elalihlotshisiwe.
Imbangela yokukhothama kwakhe
Kwaphela isikhathi eside imbangela yokukhothama kukaTutankhamun ingaziwa nokuwudaba olwasusa enkulu inkulumo-mpikiswano.
Ngabe le nkosi yakhothama ineminyaka emingaki" Ngabe yakhothama ngokugula noma ngokubulawa"
Isidumbu sakhe sahlolwa yithimba likaHoward Carter ekuqaleni kweminyaka yo-1920 kodwa okuyikona ababekujahe kakhulu kwakungubucwebe angcwatshwa ehlobe ngabo.
Kwadingeka ukuba basike isidumbu sakhe ukuze basuse ubucwebe obabunamathele kusona.
Isidumbu sakhe sabuyiselwa engcwabeni ngo-1926 sekwenziwe amaX-ray amathathu. I-X-ray yokuqala yenziwa ngo-1968 e-University of Liverpool, eyesibili yenziwa ngo-1978 e-University yaseMichigan kanti eyesithathu yenziwa yithimba lososayensi baseGibhithe ngo-2005, okuyithimba elaliholwa nguDokotela uZahi Hawass.
Ama-X-ray ka-1968 aveza indawo engumgodi ngemuva ogebhezini lwekhanda lakhe okucatshangwa ukuthi lowo mgodi wadalwa wukushaywa ekhanda.
Kungenzeka ukuthi walimala ngengozi kanti kwabuye kwaba nezinsolo zokuthi lo mbusi wasocongwa.
Abaningi basola ukuthi uTutankhamun wasocongwa ngu-Ay owabusa emva kwakhe.
Okusha
Ngesikhathi kuhlolwa isidumbu sikaTutankhamun ngo-2005, akutholakalanga ngozi ngemuva ekhanda lakhe. Umgodi owawubonakala ekhanda wavulwa abomisa isidumbu sakhe emva kokukhothama kwakhe.
Kwabuye kwatholakala nokuthi wayephuke kabi emlenzeni wangakwesobunxele...
Kuningi okwafundwa abantu ngempilo yakhe. Kusolwa ukuthi wakhothama eneminyaka engu-19. Wayephila kahle engakhombisi zimpawu zokugula noma zokungondleki kahle ekukhuleni kwakhe.
Wayelingene ngokomzimba ubude bakhe bungu-170cm.
Imidwebo yakhe eminingi imveza enekhanda elide kanti kungenzeka ukuthi lokho kwakuyinto eyayilufuzo engakhombi kukhubazeka.
Ososayensi baseGibhithe bagcina bevumelene ngokuthi uTutankhamun wabulawa wukumila kwesilonda esingapholi emlenzeni wakhe emva kokuphuka kwawo enqoleni yezempi.
Ukutholakala kwethuna lakhe kwaba yingqayizivele, isidumbu sakhe esasisaphelele sasinobucwebe obuhle kanti konke lokhu kukhomba ukuthi le nkosi iluphawu lweGibhithe uqobo.
Omunye usosayensi wabhala wamchaza kanje: "inkosi yaseGibhithe abantu ababengenalwazi olugcwele ngayo." [z]

Ukonyiswa kwesidumbu
Isidumbu esonyiswayo asiboli kanti siqholwa ngamakhemikhali, somiswe noma sibekwe endaweni engenamoya.
EMandulo kwelaseGibhithe kwakonyiswa izidumbu zabantu abadumile kanti lokho kwakwenziwa ngenxa yezizathu ezithile.
Kule ndawo babekholwa wukuthi isidumbu siyikhaya lomuntu elimqoka empilweni ayiphila engasekho. Uma umuntu esefile, isidumbu sasivulwa kwesingezansi kukhishwe konke okungaphakathi.
Emva kwalokho isidumbu sasigcotshwa ngokuthile okuzokwenza ukuba sisheshe some singaboli.

UKUFAKA
amagoli
Yinto engangatshazwa ukuthi siyabadinga abantu abazokwazi ukufaka amagoli ezweni lethu - nakhu obaba abangasiza ngako ukuze lokho kwenzeke
UKUZE ube ngumgadli ovelele, kufanele uqeqesheke kahle. Okusho ukuthi kuzodingeka ukuba nizilolonge njalo nendodana yakho, yisize ifunde ukukhahlela ibhola liye lapho ifuna liye khona imizuzu engu-30 kuya kwengu-45 - uma nithatha isikhathi esingaphezulu kwalokho, indodana yakho izokhathala ingakunaki enikwenzayo.
Kubalulekile ukuphindaphinda enikwenzayo, kusho ungqondongqondo wethu uMike "Sporo" Mangena. Le ndlela yokuziqeqesha kufanele niyiphinde okungenani kathathu ngesonto kuze kugcine sekuyinto indodana yakho eyenza kalula ngokukaMike.
Uma niqala, beka izitini ezimbili ukugqagqana kwazo kube amagxathu amane. Lezo zitini yizona ezizoba amapali wena ube ngunozinti ufundise indodana yakho konke okumele ikwazi ukuze ibe ngomunye wabagadli abavelele esibadinga kakhulu. [z]
Indaba: Force Khashane
Izithombe:Shaun Smith
UKUQEQESHEKA EBHOLENI
Abafana abancane bavunyelwe ukukha ibhola ngezinyawo uma bezidlalela. Lokho kungagcina sekungumkhuba omubi uma kungalungiswa ngokushesha. Baningi abagadli abahluleka wukufaka amagoli ngenxa yokukha ibhola ngonyawo, ibhola abalishaya liphume phezu kwamapali noma lihlale ezandleni zikanozinti. Ibhola ulikha ngonyawo uma uyeka olunye unyawo luhlale ngemuva uma ukhahlela. Njengoba sibonile, olunye unyawo kufanele lume luqondane nebhola uma ukhahlela.
UKUQALA
1UKUKHETHA INDAWO. Umfana wakho kufanele aqale ajwayele ukukhetha indawo ibhola okufanele liye kuyona uma efuna ukufaka igoli kunokuthi alikhahlele ngokunganaki ngethemba lokuthi lizozingenela nje.
Khetha indawo ozofaka kuyona ibhola emva kwalokho amehlo angasuki ebholeni.
2UNYAWO. Unyawo olubeke ebholeni kufanele lubheke lapho ibhola lizoya khona. Uma lubheke kwenye indawo, uzogeja ibhola lingangeni.
3LIKHAHLELE LIHAMBE PHANSI. Ukuze ibhola lihambele phansi, okhahlelayo kufanele agobele ngaphambili uma ekhahlela. Unyawo ame ngalo maluqondane nebhola.
Qiniseka ukuthi indodana yakho ayigobeli ngemuva uma ikhahlela ngoba ibhola lizophakama.
UMduduzi Ndlovu noNhlakanipho indodana yakhe eneminyaka engu-12.

Izincazelo
I-fish processing establishment (FPE) kungaba yimoto, umkhumbi, isakhiwo noma indawo lapho okukhiqizwa khona i-substance noma i-article yezinhlanzi. I-substance ingakhiqizwa nganoma yiyiphi indlela efana nokusika, ukuhlinza, ukuhlukanisa izingxenye, ukuhlanza, ukuqoqa nokuhlela (sorting) ukusika uqweqwe (lining) kanye nokwenza okuvimbela ukuvunda kwezinhlanzi (preserving fish). Ukwenza lomsebenzi kungabandakanya indawo lapho izinhlanzi ezifakelwa khona emathinini, ezipakelwa khona, ezomiswa khona, ezikhishwa amathumbu nokwangaphakathi, ezifakelwa khona usawoti (itswayi), eziqandiswa khona ngo-ayisi (iced), ezibandiswa khona, ezomiswa khona ngokuqandiswa (frozen) noma eziproseswa khona ukuze zithengiswe eNingizimu Afrika noma ngaphandle kwayo.

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Yenza kuphela isicelo selungelo lokudweba lapho kunesimemo esishichilelwa kuGazethi kaHulumeni.
Funda ngokucophelela, uqondisise kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi wenelisa izidingo nemibandela yesicelo.
Gcwalisa, usayine kanye nokufakele ifomu lesicelo elihambisana namadokhumende asekelayo aqinisekisiwe, kanye nemali yesicelo engabuyiselwa emuva.

Izincazelo
Lomsebenzi uchaza indlela yokuthatha izinyathelo nokuqalisa uhlelo lokulamulela noma lokuvikela ukuhlukubezwa kwabantu abadala. Kunezindlela ezehlukahlukene zokuhlukubezeka abantu abadala bazithola bebhekene nazo. Nazi ziyalandela:
Ukuhlukubezeka okuthintana nomzimba: Noma ngayisiphi isenzo esinomphumela wokulimala noma ukufa komuntu omdala. Njengokumshaya ngampama, ukushaya nangenqindi, ukumshova, ukuphatha nje ngokudlubulundela, ukumsika ngomese, ukusebenzisa amakhemikhali noma indluzula ukumvimbela ukuthi enze utho, ukusebenzisa imithi engeyona noma eyeqile, noma ngayisiphi isenzo esibanga ukulimala, ukungaphatheki kahle komzimba, ukumphuzisa amaphilisi amlalisayo noma abanga ukufa.
Ukuhlukubezeka ngokwecansi: Noma ngayisiphi isenzo esinomphumela wokusebenzisa umuntu omdala abe yisigcila socansi noma ukuzithokozisa ngokwecansi ngomuntu omdala ngaphandle kolwazi lwakhe,nokuqondisisa kwakhe noma imvume yakhe.
Ukuhlukubezeka ngokwenqondo, ngemizwa noma ngezinkulumo: Indlela ephindaphidiweyo yokuphatha umuntu omdala kabi, ngehlazo okubangela ukuthi inqondo yomuntu omdala ingasebenzi kahle nomoya wakhe uphatheke kabi akhathazeke. Njengokumkhumbisa ukungamukeleki, ukumkhipha inyumbazana, ukumqindezela okuthile, ukumcisha uthando, nokuthuthuka kwenqondo, ukumbiza ngamaganyana angathokozisi, ukumenza inhlekisa, ukumethwesa amaqadlana angasile nokuhlala ubheke okuthile kuyena.
Ukuhlukubezeka ngasezimalini noma ukunqhaphaza ngezomnotho: Ukusebenzisa imali yomuntu omdalla yegranti, impahla yakhe, izinto zakhe azikhonzile noma imali yakhe ngokungekho emthethweni nome ngaphandle kwemvumo yakhe nolwazi lwakhe ukuthi kuzokwenzekani noma anganeliswa yilesenzo.
Ukungamkhathaleli: ukungamnakekeli ungamnikezi izidingo ezibalulekile ezigcina umzimba nenqondo. Njengokumncisha ukudla, ukuthokomala indawo yokuhlala izimpahla zokwembhatha, imithi yokwelapha, ukungamngcini ajabulile anomdlandla azikhathalele.
Ukumncisha amalungelo oluntu (ukwephula umthetho): Ukumephuca umuntu omdala, amalungelo oluntu njengokumnikeza inhlonipho, isithunzi sakhe, ukumnikeza ingasese lakhe ukumvumela azicabangele akufunayo akholwe akufunayo, abeke umbono wakhe, azikhulumele ngomlomo wakhe ngendlela ayithandayo aye lapho afuna ukuya khona. Njengobuthakathi (ikakhulu abesifazane asebabadala baziphatha njengabantu asebakhulile bese abantu bacabanga ukuthi bayathakatha) loku kunomphumela wokuthi babizwe ngokuthi bangabathakathi, bakhishwe inyumbazana, balinyazwe noma babulawe.
Noma ngangubani obona ukungakhathalelwa komuntu omdala noma ukugcilazwa kwakhe noma ukungaphathwa kahle komuntu omdala, noma umuntu onesizathu sokusola ukuthi lenzizinto ezibaliwe ziyenzeka noma sezenzekile.

Uma umuntu obikayo angunonhlalakahle ovele asebenza ngazo lezindaba, kumele aqhubeke nophenyo anikeze umbiko obhaliwe ophelele kwihhovisi lentuthuko lezenhlalakahle angakapheli amaviki amane.
Uma umuntu obikayo angeyena unonhlalakahle, kungumsebenzi womphathi omkhulu wononhlalakahle wehhovisi lentuthuko lezenhlalakahle ukuthi anikeze umuntu ofanele ukuthienze lomsebenzi alindele umbiko angakapheli amaviki amane.
Uma ukuhlukubeza kuphathelene nekhaya labadala, noma inhlangano okungeyona kahulumeni, noma inhlangano yomphakathi, unonhlalakahle kwelinye ihhovisi elikhweshelene naleyondawo kumele asebenze loludaba.
Uma isimo kungesona esichazwa lapha ngaphezulu, thola isifiso somuntu ohlukubezwayo. Ungqongqoshe wentuthuko kwezenhlalakahle, noma ilungu likhansela enkulu kumele ligunyaze omunye umuntu ukuthi alekelele.

eneLemon Sauce
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 20 imizuzu
Isikhathi Sokukubhaka: 35 imizuzu
Kuphuma ikhekhe elilodwa
375ml (1½ izinkomishi) ufulawa
4ml (¾ i-teaspoon) i-cinnamon emahhadla
4ml (¾ i-teaspoon) i-ginger emahhadla
2,5ml (½ i-teaspoon) i-baking powder
2,5ml (½ i-teaspoon) i-bicarbonate of soda
125ml (½ inkomishi) ibhotela noma imajarini
60ml (¼ inkomishi) ushukela onsundu
1 iqanda
125ml (½ inkomishi) i-golden syrup
125ml (½ inkomishi) amanzi
ikhasi likalamula eliyimisweswe lokuhlobisa
Lemon Sauce
170ml (2/3 inkomishi) ushukela
20ml (4 ama-teaspoon) ikhasi likalamula eligreythiwe
60ml (¼ inkomishi) ujusi kalamula
2 okweqanda okuphuzi okushayiwe
100ml (2/5 inkomishi) ibhotela noma imajarini eqotshiwe
60ml (¼ inkomishi) iNESTLÉ Dessert Cream, NESTLÉ IDEAL Evaporated Milk noma iNESTLÉ IDEAL Low Fat Evaporated Milk
1. Shisisa uhhavini ngo-180ºC. Gcobisa ithini eliyindilinga elingu-22cm ulibeke eceleni.
2. Endishini hlanganisa ufulawa, i-cinnamon, i-ginger, u-baking powder ne-bicarbonate of soda ukubeke eceleni.
3. Kwenye indishi, shaya ibhotela imizuzwana engu-30. Faka ushukela ukushaye kube namabhamuza. Faka iqanda ne-syrup, ukushaye umzuzu owodwa.
4. Faka ingxube kafulawa neyamanzi ngokwahlukana engxubeni yebhotela. Kushaye kancane kuhlangane kahle. Thela inhlama ethinini eligcotshiwe.
5. Bhaka imizuzu engu-35-40. Kupholisele kwi-wire rack imizuzu engu-30 bese ukukhipha ethinini.
6. I-Lemon Sauce. Epanini hlanganisa ushukela, ikhasi likalamula nojusi kalamula. Govuza ukubeke esitofini esingashisi kakhulu. Govuza umzuzu owodwa.
7. Susa emlilweni. Thela kokweqanda okumhlophe. Phindisela ingxube epanini.
8. Govuza imizuzu engu-2 ukupheke esitofini esingashisi kakhulu. Faka ibhotela kancane kancane ugovuze kuze kuncibilike.
9. Faka iNESTLÉ IDEAL Evaporated Milk, NESTLÉ IDEAL Low Fat Evaporated Milk noma iNESTLÉ Dessert Cream. Seva kufudumele noma uthele ekhekheni elipholisiwe. Hlobisa ngekhasi likalamula.
Ukubhaka ikhekhe ozolibeka
Bhaka iGinger Cake njengoba kuchaziwe. Yipholisele kwi-rack ungakayikhiphi ethinini. Emva kwalokho yikhiphe ethinini uyimboze uyibeke izinsuku ezingu-3. Uma uzoyibeka isikhathi eside, yifake ethinini elivaleka ngci. Yigcine kwi-freezer izinyanga ezingu-3. I-sauce. Yenza isosi kalamula njengoba kuchaziwe. Yipholise. Yifake esitsheni esivalwayo. Yiqandise izinsuku ezingu-3. Uma ususeva, fudumeza isosi epanini. Govuza wehlise umlilo kuze kufudumale.[z]

Sixoxisana noPabi Moloi
indaba nguDOMINICK SEGOATLE noPATRICIA McCRACKEN; izithombe: PETER WHITFIELD
i-make-up nezinwele FAITH SEUOE; i-styling: MARINA WALSH; ukudidiyela PATRICIA McCRACKEN
U-PABI uqale ukubonakala kwiTV eneminyaka emithathu - lokho kwadalwa wukuthi uyazikhulumela. Manje useneminyaka engu-21 kanti ukukhuluma kuseyinto yakhe. Njengamanje ushayela uhlelo iMorning After The Night Before kwiMetro FM ngemiGqibelo nangamaSonto phakathi kuka-6 no-9 ekuseni kanti into uyibeka ngembaba uma ekhuluma.
Uyilokhu osuke ukuzwa emsakazweni.
"Ngangisebenzela esinye isiteshi sokusakaza kanti kwenzeka ngasakaza ngiphuma kudokotela wamazinyo ngolunye usuku. Umlomo wami wawuvuvukele ngikhala ngesimo engangikusona. Ngaleso sikhathi uLeo, ongumphathi wezinhlelo zeMetro wayengilalele wangithanda kwaba wukujoyina kwami iMetro FM lokho," kusho yena.
"Ngikukhonzile ukusebenzela iSABC. Ifinyelela ezweni lonke. Ungakwazi ukuxhumana nabantu abaseCape Town!"
Umama kaPabi nguNana Moloi, owayeyisihlabani seTV ngeminyaka yo-1980 - kodwa uPabi uthi ukhule ngendlela ejwayelekile. "Yize noma kwakuke kube khona isikhathi lapho umama wayesebenza khona kanzima ngingamboni kalula," kuqhuba uPabi. Umama wakhe umkhulise ngendlela ekahle!
"Wangitshela ukuthi angingaluthwa woklebe abangophrojusa kwiTV abafuna ukuya nawe ocansini ukuze uthole umsebenzi," kusho uPabi.
Ngokusho kwakhe le mboni ayisibo ubukhazikhazi abasha abacabanga ukuthi iyibona - kuningi okwenzeka kuyona okungekuhle.
"Umenywa emaphathini uthole kukuningi okwenzeka kuwona - kukhona nabahlalela ukukunika lonke uhlobo lwezidakamizwa notshwala.
"Ungaphuma endleleni uma ungafundi ukuzithiba wenze okholelwa kukona."
Ngonyaka odlule uPabi wethula amaSouth African Music Awards noTumisho Masha weSidingo.
"Nganginovalo kanti ngobusuku obandulela obama-awards ngangingakhumbuli nokukodwa okwakumele ngikusho kuwona," kusho uPabi.
"Ngasizwa ukuba khona kukaTumisho owangenza ngakhululeka ngoba yena usevuthiwe kulezi zinto."
U-Pabi uhlose ukuqopha iCD yakhe manje noma-ke athole uhlelo azolusakaza phakathi nezinsuku - "kungaba olwasekuseni noma ntambama," kusho yena.
"Into engingathanda ukuyenza ngempela ukushayela i-top 20. Kungangijabulisa kakhulu lokho."
Uma sikhuluma "ngamaphupho," anawo, umuntu onjani afisa ukuzwana naye"
"Umuntu onjengoZola noSnoop Dogg - kuZola ngithanda ukukhalipha nokuzikhulumela kwakhe kanti uSnoop ngingathanda ukubonakala naye emaphathini," kusho uPabi.
Hlobo luni lwemoto athanda ukuyishayela"
"Ngithanda izimoto ezinkulu njengama- 4x4!"
Indawo afisa ukuya kuyona"
"Ngifisa ukuya eMoza- mbique, kodwa indawo engilangazelele ukuya kuyona yiseRio De Janeiro eBrazil. Ngiyaluthanda ulwandle kanti ayikho into emnandi njengokuvuka ekuseni ugijime olwandle.
"Ngiyazwana nokuvakasha ngihlangane nabantu."
Zonke lezi zinto asezibalile - kubandakanya nokucula - uzophumelela kuzona uPabi ngoba uthi ubusisekile.
"Sake sakhuluma nogogo ngokubusiseka kwami. Baningi abantu abasha abangawutholi umsebenzi. Kunzima kakhulu kubona.
"Abantu abasha kumele babe nomqondo osabalele umhlaba bangawuthathisi okwendawo embi. Akufanele baphelelwe yithemba.
"Uma beya kuma-interview abazethembe babe nesibindi!"
UPabi unomfowabo oneminyaka emithathu. Uhlala kubo kanti ekhaya bahlale bemncokolisa ngokuthi kufanele asheshe ashade ukuze athole abantwana abazodlala nomfowabo.

UPabi uthi isitayela sokugqoka azwana naso "isipansula sabesimame - ama-All Stars namateku kanye namabhulukwe, kodwa ngeke nginqabe uma kukhona umsiki wengqephu ofuna ukungenzela imfashini ephambili!"
Ngesikhathi elinganisa izingubo ayezozigqoka simthwebula izithombe, wathi usazama ukujwayela indlela entsha abukeka ngayo. Akakholwa uma ebona izimpahla ezingosayizi abancane asezigqoka nobuhle bezingubo ayengeke azilokothe phambilini.
"Kwakunzima - ngangichitha amahora amathathu ekuseni nantambama ejimini izinyanga ezingu-8. Ngangingenaye umlolongi. Manje ngizizwa nginempilo nomdlandla. Sengenza izinto engangingazi ukuthi ngiyoke ngizenze esikhathini esedlule," kusho yena.[z]

Izincazelo
Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lomsebenzi wezimayini yidokhumende ekhishwa ngaboMnyango wezamaMinerali ne-Eneji okuyiwona okuvumelayo ukuthi uqhube umsebenzi wezimayini. Akukho muntu ovunyelwe ukuthi aqhube ibhizinisi lezimayini ngaphandle kokuthola imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini.
Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini ngeke yadluliselwa komunye. Imvume inenhloso yokulawula ukufunana namaminerali kanye nokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini ngokubonelela ezempilo nokuphepha, ukulawulwa kwesimo sendalo kanye nokumbiwa kwamaminerali ngendlela efanele.
Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezimayini kumele isebenze ngokulandela leso sikhathi esichazwe kwimvume, kodwa esingeqi iminyaka emibili. Ingavuselelwa ezinye izikhathi zezihlandla ezintathu, kodwa isihlandla nesihlandla esisodwa ngeke saba ngaphezulu konyaka.
Imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lemayini ingakhishwa kuphela uma:
leyo minerali okukhulunywa ngayo, ingambiwa isikhathi seminyaka emibili indawo yokwenza ibhizinisi lemayini ingadluli kumamitha angu-1.5 m².
kungekho omunye umuntu onelungelo lokufunana namaminerali, ilungelo lokuqhuba ibhizinisi lemayini, imvume yokuqhuba umsebenzi wemayini, noma imvume yokugodla iminerali noma umhlaba.
Phezulu
Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Yenza isicelo kuMininjela weRijini (Regional Manager) woMnyango wezamaMinerali ne-Eneji kwirijini lapho kutholakala khona lowo mhlaba.
Umininjela weRijini uzokwamukela isicelo uma zonke izidingo kuhlangatshezwane nazo.
Uma isicelo sakho sesamukelwe, uMininjela weRijini uzokucela ukuthi ufakele uhlelo iplani yokunakekelwa kwesimo sendalo, kanye nokuxhumana nomnikazi womhlaba kanye nabakuwo ngokomthetho legal occupier, kanye nabanye abathintekayo.
Fakela umbiko wokukhulumisana kuMininjela ezinsukwini ezingu-30.
Ungqongqoshe uzokhipha imvume uma zonke izidingo kuhlangatshezwane nazo.

fIHLA amabala!
1. INDLELA YOKUQALA
Kuhle ukuqala ngobuso obuhlanzekile bese usebenzisa i-cleanser,
i-toner ne-moisturiser efanele isikhumba sakho.
UNthato Mashishi owenza umsebenzi wokuphaqula izihlabani uthi kubalulekile ukuthola i-concealer ne-foundation eyiyo.
Kunemibono ehlukene ngokuthi mhlawumbe kufanele uqale nge-foundation noma i-concealer, kodwa uNthato ugunyaza ukuqala nge-foundation.
Khetha i-foundation efana ncamashi nombala wesikhumba sakho. Kufanele ikwazi ukwenza isikhumba sakho siphefumule hhayi ukuvala izimbobo.
Khetha i-foundation enesivikeli selanga i-UV protection engenawo amakha nefanele isikhumba esizwelayo.
2. I-BASE
Faka i-foundation endaweni enokukhanya - kungakuhle kube ukukhanya kwendalo.
Ukuze ubukeke ngokwendalo, faka ekhanyayo kuya kwephakathi nendawo ezidlathini, esiphongweni nasesilevini.
Gwema ukufaka i-foundation eningi ngoba umphumela walokho wukubukeka sengathi yi-mask. Faka ama-layer e-foundation ethe xaxa ezindaweni ezithile ezidinga ukumbozwa kakhulu.
Uma usufika ngasemhlathini qiniseka ukuthi uyifaka kancane i-foundation kodwa ihlangane.
Iseluleko: Ungayifaki i-foundation ezokwenza isikhumba sakho singakwazi ukuphefumula. Faka i-concealer lapho kukhona izisihla kuphela.
3. UKUFAKA I-CONCEALER
Qala ngokufaka i-concealer kulezo zindawo ezinenkinga kubandakanya amabala amnyama ngasemehlweni. Faka amachashazi ambalwa e-concealer ngaphansi kwamehlo, bese kuthi ngomunywe ophakathi uyimbambathele esikhumbeni (hhayi ukuyigcoba).
Uma unezibazi ungafaka i-concealer esakhilimu ngebhulashi noma nge-earbud.
Uma kudingeka ukuba ufihle amabala amnyama, qiniseka ukuthi usebenzisa i-concealer ekhanyayo kune-foundation yakho.
4. AMANYE AMASU
Ungenza ukuba izindawo ezinezinkinga zinganakeki ngokuvuselela ezinye izindawo zobuso, njengamehlo, izihlathi noma izindebe. Nakhu okufanele ukukhumbule:
■ Uma unezindawo eziyizibazi ezimnyama eduze kwamehlo, amehlo amnyama azoyenza le nkinga yedlulele. Gwema ukusebenzisa i-eyeliner emnyama, kugcona nokusebenzisa imibala ensundu.
■ Uma ufaka i-blush, lokhokwenze ngokucophelela. Uma unezinduna noma izisihla kuma-cheeks, kungenzeka ungasebenzisi i-blush ngoba ingagqamisa leyo ndawo eyinkinga. [z]

Viva Mbilwi! Viva!
Ezweni lonke kukhalwa ngokuthi wukushoda kwezinsiza-kufunda okwenza ukuba imiphumela yebanga leshumi ingagculisi. Kodwa emaphandleni kwelakwaVenda, kukhona isikole esingakholelwa ekubekeni izaba. Sekuphele iminyaka engu-20 iMbilwi Secondary School ikhipha imiphumela emihle yebanga leshumi. UNEVILLE MAAKANA ulibangise eThohoyandou eyozwa ukuthi yini imfihlo yalesi sikole…
BABENGENAYO i-library ne-laboratory kanti nezindlu zangasese zazingekho esimweni esihle ngaphambi kukaMarch 2006, kodwa eminyakeni engu-20 edlule iMbilwi Secondary School eThohoyandou eLimpopo isikhiphe imiphumela yebanga leshumi emihle.
Ekupheleni kuka-2007, bangu-117 abafundi abaphase i-maths ku-higher grade. Zingu-13 kuphela izikole ezenze lokhu zaze zafakwa kwi-100 Club kaNaledi Pandor onguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo.
Uhlelo lwe-100 Club lwasungulwa ngo-2006 ukukhuphula izinga lokuphaswa kwe-maths ku-higher grade. Izikole ezikule-club zithola u-R25 000 ovela kwaFirst National Bank no-R25 000 ovela eMnyangweni wezeMfundo.
I-Mbilwi Secondary School enezifundo ze-maths nesayensi yathola o-distinction abangu-177 ngonyaka odlule.
UBONA wavakashela lesi sikole uyothola ukuthi iyini imfihlo yaso.
“Njalo ngesonto sivakashelwa abantu abasuke befuna ukwazi ukuthi impumelelo yethu ilele kuphi,” kusho uNditsheni Ramugondo onguthishanhloko .
Odongeni ehhovisi lakhe kulenga izitifiketi kanti kukhona nezinkomishi ezingaphezulu kuka-80 eziwinwe yisikole sakhe.
Ukuzinikela
“Kulesi sikole, othisha nabafundi bayazikhandla,” kusho yena. Ukuzikhandla kuzala impumelelo kanti nokusebenza kothisha, abafundi kanjalo nabazali ngokubambisana kuyasiza.
Akekho umfundi okumele enze isifundo ku-standard grade kanti kumele kushaye u-August ama-syllabus eseqediwe – lokho kubanika ithuba lokubukeza izifundo.
Uma isikole sesiphumile, abafundi bahlala imizuzu engu-80 betadisha.
“Othisha abasalele ngemuva kwi-syllabus bangasebenzisa leso sikhathi ukukhava izifundo kanti nabafundi bathola ithuba lokusizwa ezifundweni zabo,” kuchaza uRamugondo.
Njengoba lesi sikole sidume ngokukhipha amamaki amahle kwi-maths nesayensi eLimpopo, siheha abafundi abaliqhamukisa eMpumalanga naseGauteng.
Ngesikhathi kuvulwa izikole kulo nyaka, uRamugondo uthi kwadingeka ukuba aphindisele emuva abafundi abangaphezulu kuka-500 ngenxa yokushoda kwamakilasi.
Lesi sikole sinabafundi abangu- 1 785 abampintshene emakilasini angu-31.
“Akufundisi izinsiza-kufunda,” kusho uRamugondo. “Angikaze ngiyibone ikhomphyutha noma i-library ingena ekilasini ifundisa.
“Udinga abafundi abafuna ukufunda nothisha abawukhuthalele umsebenzi wabo ukuze uphumelele.”
Impumelelo
Omunye wabafundi abaphasa ngamalengiso eMbilwi ngonyaka odlule nguTshimangadzo Rakhuhu oneminyaka engu-18 owathola o-distinction abahlanu waphasa kahle i-maths nesayensi.
Manje wenza i-actuarial science e-University Of Cape Town kanti uthi wakhuthala phezu kokukhulela kwakhe ebuphofini behlala endlini encane.
“Ngangitadishela ekhishini,” kusho yena.
U-Ronald Shikhitha ofundisa i-maths uthi baphumeleliswa wukubhala ama-test nokusebenzisa amaphepha emibuzo amadala.
“Kulesi sikole othisha nabafundi benza okufanele bakwenze,” kuqhuba yena.
U-Thelma Tshilande (17), owenza uGrade 12, uthi abafundi bayancintisana, akekho umfundi ofuna ukuhlulwa omunye. “Kodwa lokho kuhle. Sonke sisebenza ngokuzinikela ukuze igama leMbilwi lihlale lilihle,” kusho yena.
U-Ethel Shavhani ongumzali owakhelene nalesi sikole uthi uRamugondo uyisibonelo esihle.
“Ufika kuqala ekuseni, agcine ukuhamba ntambama,” kusho yena.
U-Aaron Motsoaledi onguNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo eLimpopo waphawula kanjena emva kokuvakashela lesi sikole ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka: “Kukhona izikole ezingenzi neze kahle kodwa emva kokuvakashela eMbilwi uyalwethemba uhlelo lwezemfundo nothisha.
“IMbilwi iwumthombo wethemba osogwadule losizi.”

Leyo naleyo ngane inokuthile engakwenzela umhlaba
Yisikhathi sekhefu eMbilwi.
▲U-Thelma Tshilande (kwesobunxele) noBooi Mpho bese-laboratory esanda kwakhiwa.
Indoda eneqhinga
Uyisibonelo esihle…
UNditsheni Ramugondo wathola iziqu zeB. Sc ne-University Education Diploma eNyuvesi yaseFort Hare ngo-1984. Njengamanje wenza iMBA eManagement College Of South Africa.
Wayefundisa ekolishi ngaphambi kokuba nguthishanhloko waseMbilwi Secondary School ngo-1992.
Uma ephawula ngesimo sezemfundo eSA, uRamugondo uthi ukungakheki kwezimilo kubafundi nokungaqeqesheki kahle kothisha kuyakhathaza.
“Ngicabanga ukuthi sigxila kakhulu emiphumeleni kaGrade 12. Esinye sezizathu esenza ukuba abafundi bafeyile kuGrade 12 wukuthi amabanga aphansi awanakwa kakhulu,” kusho yena.
“Ngeke ulindele ukuthi abafundi baphase uGrade 12 kalula bengazange baphekwe kahle emabangeni aphansi.”
Uthi eminyakeni engu-22 enguthisha, ufunde ukuthi akekho umfundi ongahlakaniphile.
“Leyo naleyo ngane inokuthile engakwenzela umhlaba.” kusho yena. “Thina njengothisha kufanele sizisize ukuze zicije amakhono namathalente azo.”
Yimuphi omunye umsebenzi angathanda ukuwenza ngaphandle kokuba nguthishanhloko?
“Awukho. Ngiwuthanda kakhulu umsebenzi wami. Engikuthanda kakhulu ngawo wukuthi ngishintsha izimpilo zabantu,” kusho yena. “Eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo ngiyazi ukuthi iningi labafundi bami liyobe lihola imali ephindaphindeke ka-10 kulena engiyiholayo. Ngiziqhenya kakhulu ngalokho!” [z]

Fundisa izingane zakho kahle
Siza ingane yakho ithole abangani iqhubeke nempilo ezweni...
nihlanganiselwe nguPRIMROSE WILLIAMS
isithombe nguCLIVE THOMPSON
BONKE abazali sebake bahlangabezana nesimo sokuphoxeka lapho uthola ukuthi ingane yabo idelelile yaphoxa waze wafisa ukuthi umhlaba uvuleke ungene. Izingane azizalwanga nezindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha, futhi azizalwanga nezindlela ezimbi zokuziphatha - kufanele zifundiswe.
Nakuba sehlukile ngokwamasiko, kodwa kukhona ezinye izindlela zokuziphatha ezaziwa umhlaba wonke ukuthi yizindlela ezinhle...
4 Ngiyacela, ngiyabonga, ngicela uxolo: Izingane kufanele zifundiswe lamagama. Igama elithi "ta" cishe ebunganeni yilo eliyisisekelo salesi sifundo esibalulekile.
4 Ukwazisa abanye: Fundisa ingane yakho ngobubele, ukuthi banakekelwa kanjani abanye abantu nokuba ibe lusizo kwabadingayo. Ifundise ukuthi ingakhombi noma igqolozele, ihleke, igcone abantu bezinye izinhlanga, namasiko abo noma labo abangenamathuba, abakhubazekile ngisho ngabe babukeka ngokungajwayelekile. Ingabeki izici ngoba lokho kubuhlungu.
4 Ukuhlonipha impahla yabanye abantu: Fundisa ingane yakho ukuhlonipha imizi yabanye abantu, izimpahla nokunye. Uma kukhona izingane zakho ezikubolekile, kufanele zazi ukuthi kumele kubuyiselwe emva kokukusebenzisa kukuleso simo okuthathwe kukuso.
4 Ukuhlonipha impilo yangasese yabanye abantu: Lokhu kusho ukungqongqoza emnyango ulinde kuze kuthiwe 'ngena', kusho ukuthi ungavuli iminyango yamawodilophi nama-drawer abanye abantu; ungafundi izincwadi zabanye abantu, futhi ungalaleli izindaba zabanye abantu.
4 Ukuhlonipha abantu abadala: Akufuneki ukubiza abantu abadala ngamagama. Uma zingekho izihlalo ezingenamuntu, fundisa ingane yakho ukuba isukumele abantu abadala.
4 Ukuhlonipha abaphathi: Ukuze uthisha enze umsebenzi omuhle, kufanele ahlonishwe abafundi. Izingane kufanele zifunde futhi ukuthi akukuhle ukumemeza noma ukukhuluma ngendelelo kubantu abadala nabantu nje bonkana.
4 Ukwethembeka: Ukuxolisa ezinganeni yinto enzima, kodwa kuyisifundo esihle sokwethembeka. Uma zivuma ukuthi zenzeni, zitshele ukuthi ubuzophoxeka ukuba bezingalivumi iphutha lazo.
Akufani
Kwabanye ukuzotha kwenza kubukeke sengathi ingane iyisidenga, umuntu onguvuma zonke. Kule minyaka yakamuva, sekufana nento enhle eyamukelekile emphakathini ukufundisa izingane ukuba zithole amathuba.
Yebo, kuyinto enhle ukuba izingane zikwazi ukwamukela isimo, zizethembe nokuba zikwazi ukuzikhulumela uma nje lokho kungeke kuzenze zingabi nesizotha noma indlela enhle yokuzihlonipha.
Kufanele uqale nini
Kusukela ebuncaneni, into uJabu ayizwayo nayibonayo kanjalo nayenzayo, ngakhoke izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha kufanele zifundiswe ngesikhathi ingane yakho isiqala ukukuqonda okushoyo.
Yiba yisibonelo
"Enzani njengoba ngisho, nanjengoba ngenza," iyona ndlela yokufundisa izingane ukuzithoba. Ngeke ulindele izingane zakho ukuthi zikhombise izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha uma wena ungesona isibonelo esihle kuzona, izingane izinto eziningi zizifunda ekhaya. Isibonelo sabazali sokuba bathobelane bathobele ngisho izingane yinto ebalulekile.
Ncoma izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha
Ukuncoma kufundisa lukhulu. Tshela izingane zakho ukuthi uziqhenya kangakanani uma uzibona zinokuzithoba. Kubalulekile lokhu ukwenze ngesikhathi zisezincane usazifundisa inhlonipho, kodwa nezingane esezikhulile kufanele uhlale uzincoma ngendlela eziziphethe ngayo.
Ungalokhu uzitshela kuphela uma zenze izinto ezingalungile. Ngaleyo ndlela, kusho ukuthi uqala ukuzinaka lapho kukhona okungalungile ezikwenzile. Uma izingane zakho kukhona into engalungile eziyenzile, ungazigxeki, kodwa zitshele ngesizotha iyiphi indlela engcono yokuyenza leyo nto. Ungalokothi nakancane ingane uyithethisele iphutha layo emphakathini.
Ukuthetha nakho akuyona indlela enhle yokuziphatha.
Lindela izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha
Izindlela ezimbi zokuziphatha zingafaka izingane zakho otakwini. Wonke umuntu uyazithanda izingane eziziphatha kahle ezihloniphayo kodwa hhayi ezidelelayo. Ukuzenyeza wumphumela wezinkinga ezifana nokuba abantu bagweme ingane yakho. Ngakhoke alukho usizo olwenzela ingane yakho uma uyivumela ikhombisa ukungahloniphi nezindlela ezimbi zokuziphatha.
Lindela izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha, lindela izingane zakho ukuba zisebenzise izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha ezafundiswa zona. Thembeka uphoqelele ukuba kubuse izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha nsuku zonke. Ungavumeli izinto zingenziwa nangelilodwa ilanga. Bakhumbuze ukuze esikhathini esizayo ukuthokozele ukubabona sebeyizintokazi nezinsizwa eziziphethe kahle.

Izincazelo
Imvume yokusebenza yidokhumende esemthethweni enikeza abantu ababuya ngaphandle ilungelo lokusebenza nanoma yiyiphi inhlangano eNingizimu Afrika. Imvume yokusebenza inikezwa abantu ababuya ngaphandle kuphela.
Phezulu
Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Abenzi bezicelo zayo yonke inhlobo yemvume yokusebenza kumele bafakele izicelo kumahhovisi abameli bamazwe eNingizimu Afrika abangaphandle (diplomatic representative office), kuzwe umenzi wesicelo asuka kulo, noma ehhovisi lerijini (lesifunda) loMnyango lapho umenzi wesicelo azoqashwa kulo.
Fakela okulandelayo:
o ipasipoti esebenzayo ezinsukwini ezingu-30 eRiphabliki o isitifikedi sokugonywa esidingeka ngokulandela umthetho o imibiko yempilo kanye neyezama-x-ray (medical and radiological reports). Lokhu akudingekile kwizingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-12 kanye nabesimame abakhulelwe akumele babenalo mbiko weze-x-ray o isitifikedi somshado (uma ushadile), iafidavithi (incwadi efungelwe ngokomthetho), isitifikedi sokushona (uma owakwakhe eshonile) noma incwadi yedivosi o izitifikedi zokuzalwa zezingane ezihambisana nomenzi wesicelo o isitifikedi samaphoyisa sokuba msulwa (clearance certificate) somenzi wesicelo sawo onke amazwe umenzi wesicelo kanye nowakwakhe abahlale kuwo, ukusukela kwiminyaka engu-18, kanye nezingane ezincike kuye ezineminyaka engu-18 ukuya kwephezulu, ezizobe zinomenzi wesicelo eRiphabliki o isitifikedi sogonyo lwesifo se-yellow fever uma uzohamba noma unenhloso yokuhamba udlule endaweni evamise ukuba nesifo se-yellow fever.

Izincazelo
Izingxenye zezitshalo ezisetshenziswa ukwandisa ezingakaze zithengiswe eNingizimu Afrika isikhathi esingaphezulu konyaka.
Zikwisimo sezinhlobo zesihlahla, noma umvini, izingxenye ezisetshenziswa ukwandisa, ezingekho kwelinye izwe, ngokuhweba noma kwimiphakathi esikhathini esingaphezulu kweminyaka eyisithupha, noma kwisimo sanoma yiyiphi inhlobo yesitshalo, kwiminyaka emine.
o kumele zibe ngezihlukene kwezinye ngendlela ecacile kunenye inhlobo ecishe ifane nalena o kumele ibesabuyunifomu, okusho ukuthi zonke izitshalo ezitshalwa ngasikhathi sinye kumele zibukeke zifana kanti futhi zibe ngezezinhlobo efanayo (same characteristics).
o kumele kube ngezizinzile (stable), izitshalo zohlobo oluthile, ngemuva kokutshalwa kaningi-ningi (repeated cultivation), kumele zihlale zisefana nezitshalo zakudala.
Phezulu
Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Uma uhlobo lwesitshalo lukwithebuli, kuzofuneka ufakele okulandelayo:
o izimali ezibekiwe okumele zikhokhelwe isicelo nohlolo o imbewu noma izinqanyana ezisetshenziselwa ukwandisa izitshalo o isigunyaziso esibhaliwe somnikazi, uma ungeyena umtshali owandisayo, inhlobo ekhethiwe noma yathuthukiswa.
Sicela ucacise kwi-questionnaire (kuhla lwemibuzo) ukuthi lenhlobo kumele iqhathaniswe naziphi izinhlobo ezaziwayo eNingizimu Afrika, izinhlobo ezintsha kumele ziqhathaniswe ukubona ukwehluka kwazo.
Ungenza isicelo sovikelo lwesikhashana senhlobo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi inhlobo ivikelwe ngaleso sikhathi sokuhlolwa. Kumele unikeze isibopho esibhaliwe sokuzimisela ukuthi ngeke uthengise (ngaphandle kwenhloso yokwandisa noma ukulinga - testing), noma yiziphi izinqanyana zokwandisa (propagating material) zenhlobo yesitshalo ehlolwayo kuze kufinyelele lapho lonke uhlolo seluphethiwe kanti amalungelo okwandisa isitshalo esinikeziwe. Kunconywa ukuthi kube novikelo lwesikhashana kwizitshalo lapho kwenziwa izinhlobo zohlolo ezithatha isikhathi esingaphezulu konyaka.
Uma uhla lohlobo lukhona kwinhlobo yesitshalo eyenzelwa isicelo samalungelo okwandiswa kwesitshalo, fakela izicelo kanye-kanye ukuze wonke isikhathi nemali.

■ 1 x 150g iphakethe lama-marshmallows
■ 1 x 200g iphakethe lamaMarie Biscuits
■ izinduku zama-lollipop noma ama-skewers
■ 1 inkomishi (250ml) i-icing sugar
■ 1 isipuni (15ml) amanzi abilayo
■ amathonsi ambalwa e-food colouring (ethandwa nguwe), uswidi omncane njengama-Smarties, Jelly Tots noma
ama-Astros
1. Beka amaMarie Biscuits amane kwi-dinner plate. Beka i-marshmallow phakathi nendawo kwi-marshmallow ngayinye. Beka iMicrowave ezingeni eliphezulu imizuzwana engu-15 noma ama-marshmallows aze akhukhumale. Beka iMarie Biscuit lesibili phezulu, ulicindezele phansi ukwenza i-sandwich nge-marshmallow. Qhubeka kuze kube wonke amabhisikidi asesebenzile.
2. Enkomishini hlanganisa ndawonye i-icing sugar namanzi abilayo. Faka i-food colouring.
3. Usebenzisa isikele sika kuma-marshmallow asele izingcezu ezinhlanu. Ngenhla ebhisikidini ngalinye hlela kahle izingcezu zama-marshmallow ngaphezulu ukwenza izimbali. Beka uswidi omncane phakathi nendawo embalini ngayinye.
Kubiza: R21
Kuphuma angu-14
Spicy Easter Carrot Cake
■ 2 izinkomishi (500ml) i-self-raising flour
■ 2 izinkomishi (500ml) ushukela onsundu
■ 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) usawoti
■ 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) i-ground cinnamon
■ 1 inkomishi (250ml) i-wholewheat flour
■ 1 1/2 izinkomishi (375ml) uwoyela noma imajarini encibilikisiwe
■ 3 amaqanda ashayiwe
■ 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) i-vanilla essence
■ 3 izinkomishi (750ml) ukherothi ogreythiwe
■ 1 inkomishi (250ml) amakinati agxotshiwe
■ i-icing sugar yokubhuqa
1. Endishini hlanganisa ndawonye izithako ezomile.
2. Kujeke hlanganisa ndawonye uwoyela, amaqanda ne-vanilla essence bese ukufaka ezithakweni ezomile bese ukushayisisa. Faka phakathi ukherothi namakinati ethinini lokubhaka elingu-23cm esinqeni.
3. Kubhake kuhhavini oshisiswe ngezinga elingu-160oC imizuzu engu-80-90 noma imfoloko oyifake phakathi nendawo ize iphume ingenalutho lapho uyikhipha.
4. Kuphendule ukupholise. Kubhuqe nge-icing sugar.

USIYABONGA Nkosi okhulele eMndozo eNewcastle indawo esenyakatho yaKwaZulu-Natal, ukhule abantu bemtshela ukuthi udlalisa okwengqalabutho yeBafana Bafana eyayidlala esiswini kwiChiefs uDoctor Khumalo. Yilokho okwamnika ugqozi lo mdlali kwamakha ukuze ahambe ezinyathelweni zeqhawe lakhe.
“Nami ngikhule ngidlala ibhola ezitaladini elokishini nase-primary,” kusho yena. “Ngiqale ukudlala kuma-amesha kwi-Eleven Aces, ngaya nakwiRiverview Spurs eyayidlala kwiVodacom League ngaphambi kokujoyina iGreen Vultures.”
EsekwiVultures ithalente lakhe labonwa ababebheka amakhono kwi-Orlando Pirates.
“Emva kwamasizini amabili ngikhuhla ibhentshi kwiPirates, ngacikeka ngajoyina iBloemfontein Celtic eyayidlala kuMvela Golden League ngaleso sikhathi,” kusho uNkosi.
UNkosi odlala ngemuva kwabagadli unekhono lokukhanda amagoli abuye awafake – kanti ijezi alifakayo lingunombolo 15 njengelikaDoctor Khumalo.
“Ijezi elingunombolo 15 ngaqala ukuligqoka ngisadlala kuma-amesha. Libaluleke kakhulu kimina,” kusho uNkosi.
UNkosi usezakhele elikhulu igama kusukela iCeltic yashaya iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates emidlalweni yokuhlunga kwiSAA Super 8. Nakho lokho kubuye kumdalele enye ingcindezi ngokusho kwakhe.
“Ngiba nenye inkinga ngoba amaqembu esisuke sidlala nawo ahlela imidlalo yawo egade mina. Kodwa kubuye kungithokozise ngoba kusho ukuthi abantu bayayibona indlela engidlala ngayo.”
Lolu daba silubhale uNkosi esefake amagoli amabili kule sizini. Igoli lokuqala walifaka bebhekene neClassic eTembisa elinye walifaka bedlala neChiefs kwiSAA Supa 8 quarter-final eFNB Stadium.
Kodwa igoli angasoze alikhohlwa empilweni yakhe yilelo alifaka bedlala neWits University ngesizini edlule okuyilona elenza ukuba iCeltic idlale kwiligi.
Lo mdlali sesike sambona nakwiBafana Bafana kanti umdlalo wakhe wokuqala wawudlala emqhudelwaneni weGold Cup iqembu lesizwe lidlala neMexico, Jamaica nePanama.
“Ngangisekhaya ngesikhathi bengishayela ucingo bengibiza. Ngamangala kodwa ngangikulungele ukulisebenzisa lelo thuba,” kusho yena.”
Yibhola elibalulekile kuNkosi kanti akafune kubuswa wudumo alutholayo.
“Udumo alungisanganisi. Ngokwami ngibona luselude ukhalo kanti kumele ngigxile kwengikwenzayo,” kusho yena.
“Injongo yami enkulu manje eyokuyodlala phesheya ngimele nezwe lami kwiWorld Cup ngo-2010.”
UNkosi wakhuliswa ngugogo wakhe uMaria Thwala.
“Sasiyisikhombisa ekhaya kanti ugogo usikhulise kahle. Ubuphofu ngangingabuzweli sisakhula,” kusho yena”[z]

Inkulu iyabiza, kanti lapha eSA kumanje iHummer H3 yimoto enesithunzi - nokuyindlela yokukhombisa umuntu wonke ukuthi - sekufike abakhulu
KULIQINISO ukuthi labo abathanda ukugqama, lena iyona moto abayithandayo - kodwa futhi izinto eziningi esizizwayo ezishiwo ngeHummer azilona iqiniso. Siyakusiza ukuze ukwazi ukwehlukanisa iqiniso emangeni.
Make sibheke usayizi, abanye bathi iHummer inkulu ekuhambeni emigwaqweni.
Lokhu akusilo iqiniso. I-Hummer inkulu kodwa i-H3, eyenziwa ePort Elizabeth, ayinkulu njengaleyo engu-ngqo yezempi yakwelaseMelika neH2.
Empeleni iH3 yakwaGeneral Motors incanyana kuneLand Rover Discovery ibe ncane kakhulu kuneMercedes-Benz GL neML series, iToyota Land Cruiser, i-Audi Q7, iJeep Grand Cherokee neRange Rover ukubala nje ezimbalwa.
Iwudla kanjani iHummer uphethiloli? Impendulo ilele kusayizi wephakethe lakho. Ngokujwayelekile iH3 ingadla ngaphansi kwamalitha angu-15 ebangeni elingu 100km.
Kodwa amanye ama-4X4 amakhulu akhona asebenzisa amalitha angu-25 ebangeni elingu-100km nokuyinani eliphindeke kabili kunalelo leHummer.
Njengoba sichazile ukuthi uma ungeke umelane nophethiloli, kuyacaca ngeke uyimele nemoto.
Injani ekubizeni? Nakuba bebaningi abayithandayo, kodwa imali yayo engu-“R1 million” ivele ibaqede amandla. Kodwa iqiniso wukuthi iHummer ayibizi kakhulu. Iningi lethu lididanisa iHummer H3 kunenkudlwana futhi ebizayo iH2 okuyimoto engakaze ilethwe ngokusemthethweni eSA.
I-H3 idayisa phakathi kuka-R393 000 noR480 000, (nokuncika ekutheni singakanani isaphulelo ongasithola). Ibiza njengama-4X4 – kodwa futhi ibiza kancane kunezimoto eziningi.
ESIKUPHAWULILE
Make sikutshele ngesikuthandile nesingakuthandanga ngeHummer H3.
ý U-gearbox
Uma siqala ngokungekuhle singathi, u-gearbox oyi-four-speed automatic ngeke usisebenzele thina. Igiya eliphezulu liphakeme kakhulu kanti elesithathu liphansi kakhulu - ngakhoke imoto izwakala sengathi isegiyeni elingafanele njalo. Eyi-five noma six-speed auto gearbox ingangcono.
ý Injini
Injini yeHummer engu-five-cylinder 3,7 litre ayinawo amandla amakhulu kodwa ingaye ifinyelele ku-100km ngehora cishe esikhathini esingu-10,5 seconds. Ijubane layo eliphezulu lingu-156km ngehora.
þ Ukubukeka kwayo
Yinhle impela, yenziwe ngekhwalithi ephezulu kanti nomsindo wokuduma uphansi awuyizwa noma isihamba endaweni evulekile. Inazo zonke izinto ongazicabanga - i-aircon, ABS brakes, airbags, sound system, izihlalo ezisebenza ngogesi, izibuko ezisebenza ngogesi ne-traction control.
þ Iyabambelela
Uma unesifiso sokuyizwa ezintabeni zase-Eastern Cape noma KwaZulu-Natal kulapho uzobona ukuthi iyabambelela emgwaqweni. Ukuma kwayo ngaphambili kuchaza ukuthi ama-bumper ayo ngeke athinte phansi ezintabeni eziphakeme.
þ Ukubukeka
Ngisho ngabe ungayimela noma cha, iHummer ngenye yezimoto ezinhle engakhombisi nje kuphela ukuthi “usufike qathatha”, kodwa futhi iluphawu olukhombisa ukuthi usendleleni ebange esicongweni sempumelelo.[z]
Indaba: Gavin Foster
Uma ungeke ukwazi ukume-lana nophe-thiloli, ngeke umelane nemoto
INDLELA...
Yoku-booster imoto
Thola kuqala ukuthi yini ebulale ibhethri yakho. Uma kwenzekile futhi washiya amalambu ekhanya, kungenzeka yehlelwe amandla. Uma kungenjalo, bheka amanzi ukuthi akwi-level efanele yini. Uma ephansi, agcwalise - namanzi ompompi angakusiza uma engekho lawo ebhethri.
Uma kwenzeka ibhethri iklayekile ivuza, ungalokothi uyidumise ngokuxhuma izintambo - thenga ibhethri entsha.
Uku-booster imoto:
1. Paka enye imoto isondele nebhethri kweyakho. Izimoto mazingathintani. Qiniseka ukuthi ama-ignition ezimoto zombili acishiwe namagiya aku-neutral. Cisha zonke izinto ngaphakathi.
2. Xhuma intambo ebomvu ku-positive (+) ebhethrini yemoto engadumi olunye uhlangothi uluxhume ku-positive wenye ibhethri.
3. Xhuma intambo emnyama ku-negative webhethri (-) kwenye ibhethri. Olunye uhlangothi luxhume endaweni eyinsimbi emotweni. (Lokhu kuzonciphisa amathuba okuba kugqamuke umlilo ebhethrini.) Gudluka ngasendaweni enophethiloli, ungabhemi, qiniseka ukuthi izintambo azithintani.
4. Dumisa injini yenye imoto uyiyeke idume imizuzu embalwa. Bheka ukuthi i-hooter yemoto yakho iyasebenza yini.
5. Dumisa injini yemoto yakho (okuyimoto enebhethri efile).
6. Khanyisa wonke ama-lights nama-indicators ukuze kugwemeke umlilo lapho usuzikhipha izintambo.
7. Khipha zonke izinto ngendlela obuzixhume ngayo.
▲Ukunciphisa amathuba omlilo, i-negative cable kufanele uyifake enjinini kunokuyixhuma kwi-negative yebhethri efile.

Bingelela uNyaka oMusha ngezinkophe ezikhangayo usebenzisa ithuluzi elibalulekile lochwepheshe bezobuhle i-mascara...
KWAKHA umqondo ukuba kube khona izinhlobo ezimbili zama-mascara - ejwayelekile neyi-waterproof, kunjalo? Empeleni ziyisithupha. Bheka lezi zinhlobo ukuze ubone ukuthi iyiphi ekufanele:
■ Eyelulayo: Lena iyona edumile ngoba ngokufaka eningi ezinkopheni zakho, ikakhulu ekugcineni, izenza zeluleke.
■ Izenza zibe zinkulu: Le mascara yenza izinkophe zigqame zibe lugqinsi zibonakale kalula.
■ Eziphothekile: Le mascara ihambisana nebhrashi kodwa uma ungafuni ukukuthenga lokhu, ungazenza ubukeke ngendlela efanayo lapho usebenzisa i-eyelash curler (R9,95, Dischem Stores).
■ E-Waterproof: Lena ayingenwa amanzi. Akufanele uyifake nsuku zonke.
Iseluleko: Ukuvikela izinkophe zingaphuki, zigcobe ngoVaselina ngaphambi kokuyolala njalo ebusuku.
■ Engenamabhamuza: Le-mascara inendawo yokugcoba ebanzi kunokujwayelekile nokuyinto ekwenza ukwazi ukugcoba indawo enkulu.
■ Iyazondla: Ezinye izindawo ze-mascara zokugcoba zinamasayidi amabili - elimnyama nelimhlophe. I-mascara emhlophe yiyo efakwa kuqala ukuze izondle, izenze zibe zinde futhi ziqine.
Faka i-mascara njengochwepheshe ngezindlela ezintathu ezilula
1. Phendula isonjwana le-mascara kusuka kwesobunxele kuya kwesokudla uvale amehlo. I-mascara izokwenza izinkophe zakho zibukeke zizinde.
2. Hambisa isonjwana phezu kwezinkophe zakho.
3. Vala iso elilodwa. Sondeza isonjwana le-mascara ngakwelinye iso bese ulihambisa ezinkopheni ukuze kusuke amabhamuza.[z]

KUPHUKE IREKHODI!
Isibalo samaqembu angenele iWorld Cup ka-2010 sephule irekhodi eledlule njengoba yayingenelwe amaqembu angu-199 ngo-2002.
USUKU lokugcina lokungenela iWorld Cup ka2010 kwakungumhlaka 15 March 2007. Ngaleli langa, amalungu angu-204 eFIFA kwangu-208 ayesesayinile. IBhutan, Brunei, Laos Philippines behluleka wukubhalisa, kodwa iBhutan yavunyelwa ukuba ingene ngomzuzu wokugcina ngesikhathi kuxoshwa iPapua New Guinea.
Lokho kwakuseyisiqalo. Okwalandela kwaba yimiqhudelwano yokuhlunga eyayisezindaweni eziyisithupha zeFIFA - Africa, Asia, North and Central America and Caribbean, South America, Oceania nase-Europe.
Njengoba sizobona ku-2010, imizuliswano yokuhlunga ikhipha amaqembu ambalwa emazweni ahlukene. Ukuqhathwa kwamaqembu azodlala kwiWorld Cup ka-2010 kwenziwa eThekwini ngomhlaka 25 November 2007.
Le draw yayibandakanya amalungu eFIFA angu-156 kusukela kwangu-205 angenele nayehlukaniswe ngalolu hlobo…
UEFA: 53 abangenela; CAF: 48 abangenela; AFC: 20; kwiCONCACAF: 35.
Ayibanga khona i-draw yeCONMEBOL, njengoba wonke amalungu angu-10 ayedlala kwi-group eyodwa ukuqhathwa kwawo kwafana nokwemizuliswano ayekuyo ngo-2006.
Indlela eyayisetshenziswa iyehluka kanti konke kuzobe sekulungile phakathi kukaSeptember noNovember 2009.
Ezindaweni ezingu-32 ezikhona kule World Cup ka-2010, bheka i-map ngezansi ubone ukuthi kuzohamba kanjani...
North, Central American neCaribbean (CONCACAF)
35 amaqembu alwela izindawo ezintathu noma ezine ukuze adlale kuma-play-off kanye ne-South America.
Imizuliswano emibili yokuhlunga (okungenzeka idlalwe engxenyeni yokuqala yonyaka ka-2008) izokwehlisa isibalo samaqembu angenile angu-35 siye sifinyelele ku-24 kuze kufinyelele kwangu-12. Emva kwalokho kuzokuba khona ama-group ama-semi-final amathathu azokwakhiwa amaqembu amane nokuzothi amabili okuqala kuleyo-group edlulela kufayineli yamaqembu ayisithupha kuleyo-group ngo-2009.

Abawinile nabafinyelele kumafayineli kulama-group amabili amaqembu amahlanu ayodlala kusukela ngo-November 2008 kuya ku-September 2009, kuthi amaqembu angu-two third adlale ama-play off ngo-October 2009 eqhudelana ne-Oceania sekuhlungwa okokugcina.
Imithetho yama-group yalo mqhudelwano
Imithetho isishintshile kusukela ngo-2006.
Kuyo yonke imiqhudelwano yama-group, owinile uthola amaphuzu amathathu, elilodwa uma edlale ngokulingana (draw), kuthi ohluliwe angatholi lutho.
Uma amaqembu ebambene ngamaphuzu sekuyoqalwa ngokubheka umehluko phakathi kwamagoli kuyo yonke imidlalo yama-group bese kubhekwa ukuthi ubani ofake amagoli amaningi kuyo yonke imidlalo yama-group.
Uma kwenzeka futhi ukuthi amaqembu asalingana bese kusetshenziswa lezi zindlela:
l inombolo yamaphuzu aphezulu emidlalweni emaqenjini alinganayo;
l umehluko kumagoli emidlalweni ephakathi kwamaqembu abambene;
l isibalo esikhulu samagoli afakiwe emidlalweni emaqenjini abambene.
Uma kwenzeka ukuthi lawa maqembu asalingana, kuyodlalwa kuma-play-off enkundleni engavuni muntu (kube nesikhathi esengeziwe kanjalo nokukhahlelwa kwama-penalty uma kunesidingo) lokho kuyokwenzeka uma uFIFA ubona ukuthi lowo mdlalo ungangena ngaphansi kwekhalenda yemidlalo yamazwe omhlaba.
Ukube le mithetho yayisebenza ngo-2006, lokho kwakuyokwenza ukuba kungene iNigeria esikhundleni se-Angola.

Kusukela lapho isibalo samaqembu angenela lo mqhudelwano sesenyuke kakhulu - kusukela kwangu-16 phakathi kuka-1934 no-1978 kuya ku-24 phakathi kuka-1982 no-1994 kuya ku-32 kusukela ngo-1998.

Bekuvame ukuba kube nezindawo ezimbili ezisuke “zibekelwe” izwe okuyilo okusuke kudlalelwa kulo lo mqhudelwano, enye kube ngeyalabo ababekade bengoshampeni ngokwedlule. Lokhu sekushintshile njengoba umqhudelwano weWorld Cup ka-2006 kwaba ngowokuqala ukuthi lubonakale khona lolo shintsho lokuba abaphethe indebe indawo yabo ingaqinisekiswa - abawina ngo-2002 iBrazil yaphumelela ukungenela umqhudelwano ka-2006 ngokuba ibe phezulu kwi-group yabo.[z]

Udansela injabulo
Yini embi nge-ballet? NgokukaTumi Mokgope ayikho into embi - kanti uzimisele ngokushintsha indlela abantu abawuthatha ngayo lo mdanso ngokucabanga ukuthi yinto ‘yabamhlophe’…
U-ITUMELENG Mokgope ngomunye wabadansi bakuleli abanesiphiwo esimangalisayo kwi-ballet. Okunye akwenzayo wukwethula izifundo kulabo abathintwa yisifo se-AIDS ngezindlela ezehlukene nokuyinto ayenza njalo ngamasonto.
Endaweni yaseDiepkloof eSoweto, uTumi wenza umsebenzi oncomeka kakhulu eRena le Lona Creative Centre for Aids Orphans. Ufundisa umdanso we-ballet ezinganeni zeminyaka esukela kwengu-6 kuya kwengu-16.
Akuwona neze umsebenzi olula kumuntu odansa emazingeni aphezulu emhlabeni.
“Ungumuntu olungile onobubele okwaziyo ukunakekela abanye abantu kanti futhi ungomunye wabadansi abambalwa abazimisele ngokwedlulisela ulwazi lwabo emphakathini,” kusho ongumqondisi wabeSouth African Ballet Theatre uKaren Beukes.
Imvelaphi yakhe!
UTumi wakhulela e-Acornhoek edolobheni azalelwa kulona i-Lowveld.
Emva kwalokho, umndeni wakhe wathuthela eSoweto - kodwa uTumi wayechitha isikhathi sakhe samaholidi eLowveld.
Umfowabo kaTumi uyi-tour guide kanti ujwayele ukuletha amaqembu abavakashi eLowveld. “Sonke sisaxhumene nale ndawo ekubeni nezimpande zethu zikuyona,” kusho uTumi.
UTumi uvumile ukuthi ukhathele yimpilo yasedolobheni. “Abantu base-Acornhoek bangabantu abazithobile nabazibeke phansi. Akudingeki size sigqoke kakhulu uma silapha. Ngiyawuthanda umoya onjalo.”
Izinselelo
Uphumele obala ngezinselelo okwadingeka ukuba abhekane nazo emsebenzini wakhe wokuba ngumdansi we-ballet.
“Umdanso we-ballet ukwenza uzihloniphe futhi ukunike nenselelo yokuhamba, yokukhuluma neyokuba yilowo muntu abantu abaningi abangamqondi nokungelula ukumqaphela,” kusho yena.
“Abaningi i-ballet bayithatha njengento ‘yabamhlophe’.”
UTumi ulinganise indlela amaMasai ezweni laseKenya ama ngayo nagxuma ngayo njengendlela efanayo neyeminyakazo yomdanso we-ballet nokuthi kuyathokozisa ukubona indlela lokhu okuxhumana ngayo.
Isimo uTumi ayebhekene naso empilweni yakhe nesamhlukumeza kakhulu emoyeni yiso esamholela ekutheni aze azibandakanye nomdanso we-ballet.
“Ngadutshulwa emlenzeni ngesikhathi sitelekela ubandlululo ngeminyaka yo-1980 udokotela wangitshela ukuthi kufanele ngihlale nginyakazisa umlenze wami ukuze uqine,” kusho yena.
“Ngenhlanhla nginesihlobo esisemdansweni esabuka sabona ukuthi i-ballet ingangisiza ngomlenze wami. Okunye okwalandela lapho kungumlando.”
Izingqinamba
UTumi waqala ukuzakhela igama ngokuba azibonakalise njengomunye wabadansi abamnyama abanempumelelo emangalisayo eSouth Africa. Uthi abantu badinga ukushintsha ukucabanga kwabo ukuze bakwazi ukuzisondeza kwi-ballet.
“Kungani abantu bakhonze ama-cellphone namakhomphyutha ngaphandle kokuzibuza ukuthi okwabamhlophe noma okwabaseMelika kodwa bagxeke i-ballet?” kusho kubuza yena.
UTumi wayeyilungu elaba ngumsunguli weSoweto Dance Theatre ngokubambisana noLucky Diale, Carly Dibakwane, Ellington Mazibuko kanjalo nongasekho uJackie Semela.
Empumelelweni yakhe singabala nomfundaze awuthola ngo-1996 wokuyofunda unyaka owodwa esikoleni somdanso esidume umhlaba wonke iRambert Dance School eWest London.
Ngesikhathi esesePlayhouse Dance Company eThekwini, uTumi wenza umdanso ayewudansa yedwa nokungumdanso ayehlonipha ngawo okaMadiba ubaba uNelson Mandela. UTumi lo mdanso wamwinisa imiklomelo emibili ye-Vita Awards.
Kodwa kule nsizwa akusikho ukuthola imiklomelo okubalulekile. Kumphula umoya ukuzwa izindaba ngobunzima bezingane zaseRena le Lona Centre nokuyinto esimkhuthaze ukuba azisize zibone ukuthi yena yini aseyizuzile ngomdanso we-ballet - injabulo, ukukwazi ukuzisungulela izinto, ukuzihlonipha kanye nomsebenzi osukhombise enkulu intuthuko kulesi sikhathi seminyaka engamashumi amabili. Ukukhuluphala
nokukhulelwa
UKUKHULELWA
NGABE NGIKHULUPHELE?
U-Preethi Mistri uthi ukuze wazi ukuthi ukhuluphele, kufanele wenze lokho odokotela nochwepheshe bokudla okunempilo abakubiza ngeBody Mass Index (BMI).
Uyibala kanje:
1. Phindaphinda ubude bakho (ngamamitha). Isibonelo, uma ubude bakho bungu-1,6m, kuzoba ngu-1,6 x 1,6 = 2,56.
2. Hlukanisa isisindo sakho (ngama-kilo) ngesamba ositholile. Isibonelo, uma isisindo sakho singu-110kg, kuzoba ngu-110/2,56.
3. Impendulo ngu-42,9. Wenze ube yinani eliphelele elizokunika iBMI ka-43.
I-BMI ka-25 kuya ku-30 isho ukuthi ukhuluphele kanti uPreethi uthi engaphezulu kuka-30 isho ukuthi ukhuluphele ngokweqile.
Izinto okumele uzazi uma ungumama okhulelwe nokhuluphele
UKUKHULELWA kushintsha umzimba wakho, kanti uma ukhuluphele ukhulelwe lezo zinguquko zingaba yinselelo enkulu. UDkt. Tom Mokaya, owelapha izifo zabesimame uthi zimbili izinto abesimame abakhuluphele okumele baziqaphele uma bekhulelwe:
I-GESTATIONAL DIABETES
Lolu wuhlobo lwesifo sikashukela oluphatha abesimame abakhulelwe bengakaze babe nalo phambilini, luphela emva kokubeletha.
Lungenza ukuba ingane ibe nkulu ungakwazi ukubeletha ngendlela ejwayelekile ngokukaDkt. Mokaya.
I-HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE
Udokotela Mokaya uthi ukukhuluphala kwandisa amathuba okuba ne-high blood pressure uma ukhulelwe.
Ngenxa yalokho ungaba nesifo sokuwa uphathwe yizinso, konakale isibindi namaphaphu.
Uma iBP yakho ikhuphuka ngesikhathi ubeletha, ungaphathwa yi-stroke ingane yakho ingalitholi kahle igazi, kudingeke ukuba uhlinzwe ngokushesha.
Sukuma ngokushesha
Uma ukhuluphele bonana nesisebenzi sezempilo ngokushesha uma uthola ukuthi ukhulelwe uqinisekise ukuthi uhlolwa ushukela, iBP nomchamo ngokukaDkt. Mokaya.
Lokhu kuhlolwa kuzokhomba ukuthi uphila kanjani uma usukhulelwe ngokuchaza kwakhe.
Gada isisindo sakho
Nakuba abesimame abanesisindo esikahle isisindo sabo singakhuphuka sibe phakathi kuka-11kg no-16kg uma bekhulelwe, uDkt. Mokaya wexwayisa ngokuthi akufanele sibe ngaphezululu kuka-15kg.
Kodwa uPreethi uthi ungazami ukwehlisa isisindo uma ukhulelwe.
"Wukudla ukudla okunomsoco okumqoka kakhulu uma ukhulelwe," kusho yena.
Ukudla okunempilo
U-Preethi unalezi zeluleko ezilandelayo mayelana nokudla ngendlela efanele:
Nciphisa ekudleni okunosawoti, okuthosiwe nokunamafutha, okunoshukela (njengoshokoledi, amabhisikidi, amakhekhe no-ice-cream).
Zama ukuxuba ukudla okwakha umzimba nokunika amandla. (bheka i-panel yethu yoKudla Okukahle)
Yidla ukudla okungamaqoqwana amancane njalo.
Zivocavoce
Kuthiwa kuhle ukunyakazisa umzimba ngokuhamba - kodwa ochwepheshe bathi khuluma nodokotela wakho kuqala.
Imithi
Ukuvakashela emtholampilo kumqoka uma ukhuluphele ngoba isisindo sakho singagadwa unikwe imithi efanele uma kunesidingo. [z]
Indaba: Ntokozo Maseko
UKUDLA OKUKAHLE
U-Preethi Mistri onguchwepheshe wokudla okunomsoco unalezi zeluleko:
Abesimame abakhulelwe badinga ukudla okwakha umzimba okunjengenyama, inhlanzi
nobhontshisi owonyisiwe.
Kuhlanganise nokudla okunika amandla okunjengepapa, irayisi, isitambu namazambane
noma ipapa nenkukhu.
Ungakhohlwa yizithelo nemifino ebomvu, eluhlaza ne-orange enjengethanga, i-squash, isipinashi, ukherothi, u-green beans ne- cauliflower.
Uyayidinga ne-calcium esemikhiqizweni yezidlo zase-dairy ezinjengamasi.
UKUBHEKANA NABASEBENZI BEZEMPILO
Njengowesimame okhulelwe kujwayelekile ukugada ukuthi izidingo zakho ziyabhekelwa uthola nokuhlonishwa ngokwe-pregnancy.about.com. Ungakhohlwa yilesi seluleko ukuze unikwe isithunzi esikufanele uma ubhekene nabahlengikazi kanye nodokotela abanempatho embi:
Khuluma ngezinto ezikuphatha kabi kunokulinda kuze kwenzeke into embi ngaphambi kokuthatha izinyathelo.
Uma ukhombisa umhlengikazi noma udokotela ukuthi awunamahloni ngesisindo sakho kuzoba lula ukuthi bakhulume nawe ngaso.
Uma ubona ukuthi uzosaba ukukhuluma nabahlengikazi basemtholampilo, hamba nomuntu ozokusiza. Angakunika isibindi aqinisekise ukuthi okhala ngako bayakuzwa abasebenzi bezempilo.
Thembela emalungelweni akho. Ungawabekezeleli amagama aziswana afana nathi "s'dudla" noma "mafutha". Cela ukusizwa omunye umhlengikazi noma ucele u-supervisor uma ungaphathwanga kahle.

Ukudla ngemizuzu
STUFFED BRINJALS WITH VEGETABLES AND MINCED MEAT
* 2 ubhrinjolo
* 1 isipuni (15ml) uwoyela
* 1 u-anyanisi oqotshiwe
* 1 isigaxa sikagaligi ogayiwe
* 1 utamatisi oqotshiwe
* 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) i-paprika
* 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) u-curry powder
* 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) ushukela
* 100g i-minced meat
* 1/2 x 375g ithini le-vegetable curry
* ushizi wokunonga ogreythiwe iCheddar
1. Sika ubhrinjolo phakathi ngokwehla kwawo. Ngesipuni kopolota okungaphakathi ukubeke eceleni.
2. Epanini thosa u-anyanisi nogaligi imizuzu engu-3. Bondela phakathi utamatisi, izinongo noshukela. Kupheke imizuzu emihlanu ulokhu ukugovuza.
3. Faka okukhiphe kubhrinjolo ne-minced meat ukupheke imizuzu engu-10. Faka i-vegetable curry ukubonde ukupheke imizuzu emihlanu. Kugudluze emlilweni.
4. Faka ingxube ngesipuni kumagobolondo kabhrinjolo, emiphethweni awo ugcobe uwoyela. Abeke kwi-baking tray. Bhaka kuhhavini ongu-180°C imizuzu engu-25-30 kuze kuphekeke kube nsunjwana ngenhla. Kunonge ngoshizi.
Kwanela ababili
Ezinye izindlela
■ Inkukhu eqotshiwe ingasetshenziswa njenge-filling.
■ Utamatisi ungasetshenziswa esikhundleni sikabhrinjolo.

VEGETABLE SAMOOSAS
Samoosas
* 4 amashidi e-phyllo pastry
* uwoyela wokubhrasha
Filling
* 2 amazambane acwecwiwe abiliswa abhucwa
* 1 inkomishi (250ml) i-sweetcorn esethinini
* 1 x 375g ithini le-vegetable curry
* usawoti nophepha
1. Ebhodini elinofulawa, sika ishidi lenhlama ye-phyllo ngokulehlisa imicu emine (cishe 8cm x 25cm). Kubhrashe kancane ngowoyela.
2. Endishini hlanganisa izithako ze-filling.
3. Beka umucu we-pastry ebhodini elinofulawa. Goqa ikhona langakwesokudla phansi lifinyelele kwelosobunxele ukwakha unxantathu. Goqa ikhona eliphansi langakwesobunxele uligoqele kwi-pastry. Lokhu kuzokwakha iphakeshana kwesobunxele kwi-filling. Faka 1 isipuni (15ml) i-filling kulelo phakeshana uqhubeke ukugoqe kuze kuba ishidi le-pastry lisebenze lonke nephakeshana lavaleka.
Manzisa isayidi langaphansi, uthambise -i-pastry ngamanzi amancane bese ucindezela kahle kancane ukuze uvale iphakethe.
4. Kubeke kwi-baking tray ukubhrashe ngowoyela. Kubhake kuhhavini ongu-180°C imizuzu engu-10-15 noma kuze kube nsunjwana.
Kwanela abangu-3
Iseluleko
■ Sebenza uqede ngeshidi elilodwa le-phyllo pastry ngesikhathi. Mboza amanye amashidi asele ngendwangu eswakeme ukuvikela ukoma.
Izitshalo zibalulekile ekudleni okunempilo. Ezisemathinini azinambitheki nje kuphela, kodwa zigcwele konke okuhle
VEGETABLE PIE

* 1 x 375g ithini le-vegetable curry

UZWAKALA njengomuntu onokuzisola lapho uvuma kudadewenu ukuthi izinto azikuhambeli kahle nomyeni wakho omusha.
Uyamtshela ukuthi uzama kanjani ukulawula impilo yakho umyeni wakho kodwa udadewenu angakukholwa. Avele athi kuwena unenhlanhla yokuba nowesilisa okuthanda ngaleyo ndlela.
Uyavuma kumngani wakho ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle othandweni lakho avele akukhombise izibazi ezisemzimbeni wakhe azenziwa wumyeni wakhe...

Ungakukholwa lokho. Ngisho ngabe uphathini wakho akakushayi, kodwa nenkulumo iyawuphula umoya. Lokhu kungaholela ekukhathazekeni nakwezinye izinkinga eziningi.

Abafundi bazoyikhumbula indaba esayibhala ngoFebruary ngamabhokisi omngcwabo ahlukile aqhakambisa amasiko ehlukene nenziwa yinkampani yaseBronkhorspruit ephethwe nguBeau Brummel. Kulolo daba kwachazwa futhi nangesifiso sakhe sokuthi uma esefile angcwatshwe enqunu esongwe ngesikhumba senkomo kukhona nezangoma. UBeau uphinde wasithumelela lokhu kwakamuva ngesifiso sakhe...
ABANGUNI baseGreat Lakes babengcwaba abantu babo besongwe ngesikhumba senkomo. Ababeyizifiki zabacindezeli babengcwaba ngamabhokisi nokuyinto esenzeka.
Ngifuna ukungcwatshwa nginqunu ngisongwe ngesikhumba senkomo. Kodwa ngemithetho yakuleli, lokhu akukho emthethweni.
Sengimbhalele uPallo Jordan, nginxusa uNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko ukuba akweseke lokhu.
Kodwa-ke ukubuyisa amasiko akwelase-Africa kwezokungcwaba nokuvumela bonke abantu baseSouth Africa (abaMnyama nabaMhlophe) ukuba bangcwatshwe benqunu ngesikhumba senkomo kuyahambisana nombono kaMongameli uMbeki wokuziGqaja ekubeni ngama-Africa i-African Renaissance.
Abaphathi bathi imizimba esongwe ngesikhumba mayibe semabhokisini ngaphambi kokungcwatshwa. Lena indlela endala yokucabanga kwabacindezeli okumele ishintshe.

Izincazelo
Ilungelo lokufunana nomcebo wamamaminerali, yivume evumela inkampani noma umuntu siqu ukwenza i-survey noma ukuphenyisisa ngendawo yomhlaba ngenhloso yokubona indawo ethize enamaminerali noma engaba namaminerali. Noma ngubani omunye umuntu ofuna ukwenza isicelo selungelo lokufunana nomcebo wamaminerali, kumele afakele isicelo ehhovisi lika-Regional Manager lapho umhlaba okhona.
Ilungelo lokufunana nomcebo wamaminerali lisebenza iminyaka emihlanu, kodwa ngemuva kokuphela kweminyaka emihlanu, umenzi wesicelo angacela imvuselelo yelungelo lokufunana nomcebo wamaminerali yesikhathi esingekho ngaphezulu kweminyaka emithathu.
Ilungelo lokufunana nomcebo wamaminerali lizonikezwa uma uhlangabezane nezidingo ezilandelayo:
Umenzi wesicelo unezimali ezenele kanye nekhono lokuqhuba umsebenzi wokufunana nomcebo wamaminerali ukufinyelela kwizinga eliphezulu
Iplani yezezimali ihambisana nomsebenzi wokufunana nomcebo wezimali waso sonke leso sikhathi.
Uma kungeke kwaba nokungcoliswa komoya nendalo noma ukulinyazwa kwesimo sendalo okuzokwenzeka ngomsebenzi wokufunana nomcebo wamaminerali.
Uma kungekho omunye umuntu onelungelo lokufunana nomcebo wamaminerali, ilungelo lokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezemayini, imvume yokuqhuba ibhizinisi lezezimayini, noma imvume yokugodla leyo minerali noma umhlaba.

Isitshulu

Amadombolo
* 2 izinkomishi (500ml) i-cake flour

INDLELA YOKUKWENZA
1. Isitshulu. Epanini, shisa uwoyela uthose inyama. Yikhiphe epanini uyigcine ifudumele.

4. Amadombolo. Endishini hlanganisa izithako ezomile. Vula isikhala phakathi nendawo uthele amanzi uxove kube yinhlama ethambile.

Zitholele imali
ngokudla
UBONA nabeFood For Fun And Funds bakukhombisa ukuthi ungazenzela kanjani imali ngokudla
UYAZI ukuthi ungaphumelela. Unalo ikhono - uzimisele. Okudingayo wulwazi oluncane oluzokusiza uzisungulele ibhizinisi ekhishini lakho.
UBONA nabeGolden Cloud noNestlé bakulethela iFood For Fun And Funds nokuyilapho ochwepheshe bezokukhombisa ukuthi ungazakhela kanjani imali ngokupheka.
KUZOKWENZEKA KANJANI
Kulezi zinyanga ezingu-12 ezilandelayo ephephabhukwini lakho uBONA sizobe sinicobelela amaresiphi azonisiza ukuba nizenzele okumnandi eningazidayisela kona. Lawa maresiphi aseke ahlolwa ngochwepheshe bethu kanti futhi enziwe ngokwekhwalithi ephambili ngomqondo wokwenzela abantu abaningi.
Akwanele ukuba ngumpheki onohlonze nje kuphela. Uma ufuna ukuthengisa imikhiqizo yakho, kufanele ube nolwazi lwebhizinisi futhi ukuthi ungalisungula kanjani. Uchwepheshe uLluwellyn Diedricks uzonisiza nikwazi ukudweba i-business plan, nasukusunguleni ibhizinisi kusukela ekuqaleni kuze kube uzenzela inzuzo ngokulimaketha.
Ungalisika lolu lwazi ebhukwini uzigcinele lona.
AMA-WORKSHOP
Ekuhambveni konyaka, kuzokuba nama-workshop ayisithupha azobanjelwa eGold Reef City eGoli. Lapha abapheki abangochwepheshe bayonikhombisa ungayenza kanjani imikhiqizo yokudla ongazidayisela yona. Niyophinde nithole amakhophi amaresiphi enizobe niwakhonjisiwe nezinhlobonhlobo zemikhiqizo yeGolden Cloud neyakwaNestlé.

AGCINE EFRESHI
Ukugcina ukudla kufreshi, kufake ezitsheni ezivaleka ngci ezingawufaki umoya, ezingangenisi amanzi, umhwamuko, amafutha namaphunga.
Zintathu izitsha ongakhetha kuzona, nokuyinto encika kukudla ofuna ukukugcina:
Izikhwama
Lezi zilula ukusetshenziswa kanti zifanele ngisho ngabe izinto ezime kanjani. Kufanele ukhishwe wonke umoya esikhwameni ngaphambi kokusivala. Ungalokothi usebenzise izikhwama zikapulasitiki wase-supermarket - zilula kakhulu, azihlanzekile kanti kokunye zenziwa ngezinto ezingubuthi.
I-Tin foil ne-clingfilm
Lokhu ungakusebenzisa ekusongeni ukudla bese uvala nge-tape enamathelayo.
Izitsha zepulasitiki
Cishe yilona hlobo lwezitsha ezikahle. Zinkulu, ukuze ukwazi ukusebenzisa enye indawo ekhabetheni lakho, efrijini noma kwi-freezer, sebenzisa lezo eziyizikwele.
Uma ufaka ukudla, okunephunga elinamandla, ndlala i-foil kuqala. Lokhu kwenza iphunga lingabambeleli nesitsha sigezeke kalula.
Velela kulo nyaka ka-2009!
Lolu wuchunge lokuqala lwezindaba esihlose ngazo ukusiza abafundi bakaBONA bakwazi ukuzisungulela amabhizinisi abo noma bathuthukise lawo osekuvele banawo.
Masiqale ngokubheka izinto ezintathu eziwumgogodla ezidingwa yinoma iliphi ibhizinisi ukuze lisimame.
Abantu abaningi baye babone ukuphatha ibhizinisi elincane nokubheka izimali nokuqhamuka nezindlela zokulimaketha kuyinto ebenza besabe.
Kodwa lokho akudingeki kube njalo. Cabanga ngethoshi. Lihlukanise ukuze ubone ukuthi linezingxenye ezintathu: amabhethri, ithoshi uqobo (ishubhu ngamanye amazwi), nokukhanya kwelambu.
Manje cabanga ngebhizinisi:
AMABHETHRI
Ithoshi lidinga amabhethri ukuze lisebenze, ngakhoke ibhizinisi elinempumelelo lidinga umthombo onamandla ekuphatheni. Ekuhambeni kwesikhathi sizodingida ukuthi ungaba kanjani nalawo mandla nokuthi ungawasebenzisa kanjani ngendlela enobuhlakani nokuba angapheleli ezintweni ezingenamsebenzi.
ITHOSHI
Ngalokhu sichaza into ehlanganisa zonke izinto. Ithoshi liyinsimbi noma ishubhu eliyipulasitiki, uma sikhuluma ngebhizinisi, sikhuluma ngendlela owenza ngayo izinto. Sizobe futhi sidingida izindlela ezinhle zokuphatha, ukugcina amarekhodi ezindleko zakho nokuthi uyimaketha kanjani imikhiqizo yakho.
UKUKHANYA KWALO
Okokugcina yilambu elikhipha ukukhanya. Esinye sezisho zami engisithandayo wukuthi: “Ibhizinisi alinandaba nebhizinisi”. Kufanele ssazi ukuthi ibhizinisi yinto ozoziphilisa ngayo.
Ngabe lokhu kusho ukuthini empeleni? Cabanga ngokukhanya kwelambu lethoshi. Alizikhanyiseli ngokwalo, kodwa likhanyisela bonke abanye abantu abaseduze.
Osomabhizinisi banethuba lokuba banciphise ububha nendlala ezweni lethu. Ngikholwa wukuthi akusilo ilungelo lethu njengosomabhizinisi ukuba sigqame, kodwa yisibopho sethu. Kufanele sibe yisibani esikhanyisela labo abaseduze kwethu. Ngizimisele ngokunibona nivelela ku-2009.
Lluwellyn Diedericks

Uma ingane yakho inobunzima ekuphefumuleni noma esifubeni buza udokotela wakho noma umhlengikazi ukuthi akusiyo yini i-asthma - kusho uDkt Mike Levin wezifo zabantwana e-University of Cape Town.
"I-asthma yisifo esivame kakhulu ezinganeni zaseSA - eyodwa kwezingu-10 isuke inayo. Nasemaphandleni lokhu sekuvamile ekubeni kwakungenjalo," kusho yena.
"Sekutholakele ukuthi ukubulawa yi-asthma kuvame ezindaweni zemiphakathi ehluphekayo - kanti iSA ingeyesihlanu emazweni anesibalo esiphezulu kwababulawa yi-asthma emhlabeni. Ngakhoke ngeWorld Asthma Day ngomhlaka 2 May khuthaza ukuhlolelwa lesi sifo - ngoba imithi yokuselapha ikhona kwabayidingayo."
Yeka ukubhema
Lena iyonanto okufanele ikubuse emqondweni ngale Anti-Tobacco Month okuyinyanga kaMay. Ngesikhathi idolobha elincane laseMelika livala ukubhema kuzo zonke izindawo zomphakathi, isibhedlela sendawo sakhombisa ukuthi izinga lokuhlaselwa yisifo senhliziyo laba ngu-60 percent ezinyangeni zokuqala ezingu-6. Ngesikhathi lo mthetho uhoxiswa, izinga lesifo senhliziyo lakhuphuka futhi ngokushesha.

UMnyango weMfundo uzimisele ngokuku-lungisa lokhu ngase-kupheleni konyaka ozayo, kodwa ama-primary school angu-10 angahlomula ngokuwina izinkundla zebhola ezibiza ngaphezu kuka-R1 million emncintiswaneni oxhaswe ngabakwa-Omo ovala ekupheleni kukaMay.

Zithande mama!
NgeMother's Day imindeni kufanele ikhuthaze omama ukuba banakekele izimpilo zabo ukuze baphile isikhathi eside.
"Iningi labesimame seliyakunakekela ukuhlola amabele ukuthi awanazigaxa yini," kusho udokotela wezithinta ucansi waseCape Town u-Alan Alperstein, "kodwa bambalwa abaziyo ukuthi kufanele babheke nabakudlayo bazivocavoce. ezentengiso
NAKUBA ubisi lungabalulekile kakhulu ezinganeni ezisanda kuzalwa njengoba lubalulekile ezinganeni esezikhulile, kodwa lusadlala indima ebalulekile ekukhuleni kwazo. Kungakhoke ochwepheshe bezempilo begunyaza izingxenye ezimbili kuya kwezintathu (400-600ml) zobisi ngosuku.
Ngalokhu emqondweni, abakwaPurity sebelethe iPurity Growing-up Milk yezingane ezisanda kuzalwa kusukela onyakeni owodwa kuya kwemithathu, nokuyiyo enika izakhamzimba eziningi ngaphezu kobisi lwenkomo. Esinye isakhamzimba esengeziwe sitholakala ngendlela yamavithamini, ama-minerals nama-fatty acids abalulekile - kanti aqinisekisa ukuthi izingxenye ezimbili ngosuku zizonika amaphesenti angu-50 ezidingo zosuku zamaphrotheni, i-calcium, ama-vitamin A, C, E, B2, B12 ne-pantothenic acid.
AbakwaPurity sebephinde babhekana nenkinga evamile ye-anaemia ngokwengeza u-vitamin C ukuze usize ngokumunceka kwe-iron. Ama-fatty acids engeziwe asiza ekuthuthukiseni umqondo nokwenyusa izinga lokubona emehlweni, ekubeni i-calcium engeziwe yenza amathambo namazinyo aphilile.[z]

Izincazelo
Umele ukuthi uthole incwadi yokugunyaza uma ufuna ukwenza loku okulandelayo ukuthenga imoto entsha noma ese isebenzile kwamanye amazwe, ukuthenga imoto yezimpahla noma inqola edonswa ngenye nokwakha noma ukuguqula kancane imoto.
Umele ukuthi ube nencwadi yokugunyaza noma imoto yakhiwe kuleli noma yakhiwe kwelinye izwe. Izinhlobo zezimoto okudingeka incwadi yokugunyaza kuzona:
izimoto, amabhasi kanye nezithuthuthu izimoto ezithwala izimpahla (amaloli namaveni)
izinqola ezidoswa ngemuva kwezimoto izimoto eziyisipesheli nje ngoJibha ohambayo, ogandaganda nezimoto zokuvuna.
Zonke izimoto, noma zakhiwe lapha eMzansi noma kwamanye amazwe kumele zilandele amazinga abekwe ngumthetho wezinqola ezihamba emgwaqweni kazwelonke ka 1996. abathenga izimoto ngaphandle kwaleli kumele baveze ubufakazi bokuthi zilandele amazinga abekwe ngumthetho wezinqola ezihamba emgwaqweni kazwelonke ka 1996 babuse e SABS okuyondawo ebhekene namazinga okwenziwa kwemisebenzi eMzansi.
Isixwayiso: ifomu ligcwaliswa ngumuntu imoto ibhaliswe ngaye.

Izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe
Gcwalisa amafomu uthumele nalamaphepha alandelayo:
o ikhophi yomazisi o incwadi yamandla okumela uma ngabe yinkampani noma yinhlangano enkulu o iafidaviti evela kumaphoyisa aseMzansi uma kuyimoto eyakhiwe. Loku kefanele kufake phakathi nenombholo yenjini, neyechesi, nemininingwane yonke yomsebenzi owenziwe nokuthi izinsimbi zitholakale kuphi.
o nesitifiketi semvume yamaphoyisa o nesitifiketi semvume yokuthi imoto ihambe emgwaqweni o nesitifiketi sesisindo semoto o izithombe ezimbili zemoto.

noma yimuphi umuntu (ngaphandle kwenkampani, noma umuntu okhishiwe phansi kwezibopho zokukhokha intela yesikhashana) othola ingeniso (income) kodwa elingewona umholo (remuneration)
Lapho inkampani ingakadonsi intela yabasebenzi kudayirektha, ngeke akwazi ukubonelela leyo ntela yomsebenzi lapho ebalela imali yentela okumele ikhokhelwe.
Umuntu okumele akhokhele intela yesikhashana, kumele kuthi kungakapheli izinsuku ezingu-30 ngemuva kokuba efanele ayikhokhe, enze isicelo ngokubhala, isicelo sobhaliso (serejistreshini) ehhovisi legatsha le-SARS eliseduzane. Ukuhluleka ukwenza njalo, kuyoba nomphumela wokukhokhiswa inzalo (i-interest) kanye nama-penalty ngokukhokha sekwedlule isikhathi, kanye nenye futhi intela ehambisana namafomu okukhokhelwa kwentela ngokukhokha kamuva sekwedlule isikhathi.
Abantu abalandelayo asikho isidingo sokuthi bakhokhe intela yesikhashana (provisional tax):
noma yimuphi umuntu ingeniso (income) lakhe elitholakala ngomholo kuphela noma yimuphi umuntu ingeniso lakhe elingeqi ngaphezu kwenani lomkhawulo wokukhokhwa kwentela elibekiwe (tax threshold), okuyinani elingu-R40 000 kubantu abangaphansi kweminyaka engu-65 ubudala, kanye nenani lika-R65 000 kubantu abaneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-65 ubudala noma yimuphi umuntu othola ingeniso lezimali ezitshaliwe elingeqi ku-R16 500, ngaphandle kwengeniso elitholakaka kumholo, kubantu abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-65 ubudala noma u-R24 500 kubantu abaneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-65 ubudala. Inzalo ebuya kwizimali ezitshalwa ngaphandle (interest) kanye nezimali zamasheya (dividends), bakhishwa ngaphansi kwesibopho ukufikela kumkhawulo ka-R2 500 kuzo zonke izibopho noma yimuphi umuntu oneminyaka engu-65 ubudala noma ngaphezulu kwayo, uyakhishwa kwisibopho sokukhokhela intela yesikhashana, uma:
o ingeniso lemali ekhokhelwa intela kunyaka wentela lingeqi kwinani lika-R80 000, nakhona libandakanya umholo, impesheni, inzalo (interest) kanye nezimali zamasheya (dividends) noma ingeniso elibuya kwizimali zerente kanti futhi o yena engeyena udayirektha wenkampani yangasese noma ilunga le-close corporation kanti futhi o yena engaqhubi noma yiliphi ibhizinisi.
