BONA ZULU - June 2007
UKUVAKASHELA elaseSouth Africa kufanele kube yinto eyigugu onyakeni wanoma yimuphi umculi, kodwa akusikho lokho kuphela okwenza abantu bathi u-2007 uzoba wunyaka omuhle kuMary J Bilge. Kulo nyaka iCD yakhe eshisa izikhotha ethi The Breakthrough yakhethwa kumaGrammy ayisishiyagalombili. KumaGrammy okwakungaka-49 wathola imiklomelo yeBest Female R&B Vocal Performance noweBest R&B Song, ngengoma ethi Be Without You, noweBest R&B Album.
"Kuyisibusiso lokhu okungehlelayo. Kuhle ukwazi ukuthi ngisaqhubeka nomculo," kusho yena.
"Kunabaculi abakhipha ama-albhamu amabili noma eyodwa emva kwalokho banyamalale. Liningi ithalente lapha phandle kodwa ubani owaziyo ukuthi kwenziwa yini ukuthi omunye aphumelele omunye angaphumeleli" Ubani owaziyo ukuthi leyo mpumelelo izothatha isikhathi esingakanani"
"Kwi-Breakthrough ngicula ngobunzima engidlule kubona."
Impilo kaBlige ibinzima, udlule ebuphofini, ezidakamizweni nasekuhlukunyezweni ngokocansi.
Indawo embi
Wazalelwa eBronx eNew York ngomhlaka 11 January 1971 kanti wayeneminyaka emine ngesikhathi ubaba wakhe owayecula i-jazz eshiya umama wabo uCora.
Wadalula ukuthi wanukubezwa ngumuntu owayengumngani womndeni wakubo eneminyaka emihlanu. Wayeka isikole ngenxa yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa.
Impilo yayinzima lapho babehlala khona. "Ngangilwa njalo. Kwakufanele uzilwele ukuze ungabanjwa inkunzi.
"Ukukhulela endaweni eyingozi kufana nokuhlala nenqwaba yezinkalankala. Uma uzama ukubaleka, ziyakucindezela zikuvimbele."
Emculweni wangena engazelele. Wayeneminyaka engu-17 ngesikhathi eqala ukubamba amatoho. Wayekuthanda nokucwala izinwele zabangani bakhe.
Ngolunye usuku ezihlalele nabangani bakhe e-mall, bamcela ukuba acule kwi-karaoke aqophe ingoma ka-Anita Baker ethi Rapture. Emva kwalokho umama wakhe wathatha i-tape wayinika isoka lakhe elayidlulisela kumngani walo, lowo mngani wayidlulisela kwabe-Uptown Records...
Ukungazifezi izethembiso
UMary wasayina ikontileka kwathi ngo-1992 wakhipha iCD ethi What's The 411". U-Sean "Puffy" Combs wafaka isandla kuleyo CD kanti izingoma ezithi You Remind Me nethi Real Love zaphuma phambili kwezeR&B.
Emva kwalokho akazange akuthole ukuphumula. Wayethwetshulwa izithombe, abonakale emphakathini, abe nezingxoxo, athwebule izithombe zama-video, athuthukise ama-albhamu akhe emsakazweni abuye ahambe ecula nabaculi abanjengoBobby Brown neBoyz II Men.
Kwezwakala amahlebezi okuthi uMary akafiki uma kufanele athwetshulwe izithombe nokuthi wayengabonakali uma kufanele azilolonge noma abambe izingxoxo.
Namuhla uthi uma ekhumbula lezo zinsuku "zokungazifezi izethembiso" aphatheke kabi. Kodwa uthi kufanele kusolwe nethimba elalimphethe ngalokho.
"Abantu babethatha izinqumo ngami kodwa ngangingakwenzi engangingahambisani nako."
Yilokho okubuhlungu ngemboni yomculo kanti abalandeli abakwazi. "Kufanele ukhokhe yonke imali inkampani yokurekhoda eyisebenzisile ngawe ngaphambi kokuba uthole eyakho," kusho uMary.
"Ngangisebenza kanzima kodwa kokunye imali ngingayitholi. Lokho kwakungiphatha kabi."
Manje izinto sezishintshile. "Sengingasho ukuthi ngingusomabhizinisi. Ngiyakwazi ukuphatha impilo yami kanti akekho umuntu ongamethemba uma kukhulunywa ngemali yakho nempilo yakho."
Washintsha
NgoNovember 1994 wakhipha iCD ethi My Life nayo eyaphrojuswa nguCombs owayeseyimenenja yakhe. Njengoba nesihloko sayo sisho, izingoma ezikuyona zigxile empilweni yakhe.
Wavuma ukuthi nakuba ayedumile, wayenenkinga yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa, ephuza utshwala egqilazekile nesoka lakhe limhlukumeza.
Ngo1995, uMary waqopha ingoma ethi Not Gon' Cry eyathola i-platinum. Yabhalwa yabuye yaphrojuswa nguBabyface kanti iyezwakala kwiWaiting To Exhale. Wathola iGrammy yakhe yokuqala nge-I'll Be There for You/You're All I Need to Get By, ingoma ayeyicula neMethod Man.
Abantu babethi iphimbo lakhe lifana nelika-Aretha Franklin kanti lokho bakusho emva kokuzwa iCD ayikhipha ngo-1999 ethi Mary.
Kuleyo CD yakhe wayecula nabaculi abanjengo-Elton John (owayedlala upiyano emucwini othi Deep Inside, owawunamagama ayecashunwe emucwini ka-Elton owaduma ngeminyaka yo-1970 owawuthi (Bennie And The Jets), Eric Clapton (Give Me You), Lauryn Hill (owabhala waphrojusa, wabuye wacula kwi-All That I Can Say) - kanye no-Aretha Franklin.
Akasakwenzi okubi
Ngo-August 28, 2001, abakwaMCA bakhipha i-albhamu kaMary yesihlanu ethi No More Drama. Ingoma yokuqala ekule-albhamu ethi Family Affair, eyaphrojuswa nguDr. Dre, yaba ngeyokuqala kwiBillboard Hot 100, lapho yahlala khona amasonto ayisithupha elandelana.
Isihloko sayo sasibeka isithombe ngempilo kaMary eyayinokuthula kanti imicu ethi Where I've Been nothi Flying Away, ikhuluma ngokunqoba nokuzalwa kwakhe kabusha.
"Uma kufika isikhathi sokukhathala okwenzayo usuke usubona ukuthi ubani isitha sakho nokuthi kusuke kunguwe uqobo," kusho uMary.
"Ave kungelula ukuvuma amaphutha akho kodwa kuhle ngoba ekugcineni impilo yami yaqoqeka. Sengiyakwazi ukubona lapho nginenkinga khona ngikubone futhi nokubaluleka kokuba ngilungise leyo nkinga."
Kwakusemqoka ukuba angapheli amandla ngoba i-albhamu yakhe eyalandela, esihloko sithi Love & Life, yagxekwa kakhulu. Nakuba le CD yakhe yagcina ithole i-platinum, abantu babengajahi neze ukuyithenga. I-Breakthrough eyakhishwa ngoDecember 2005 yathengwa ubuthaphuthaphu yaba yiCD yeR&B eculwa ngumuntu wesimame eyaqhuba kahle esontweni lokuqala ikhishiwe.
U-Mary ushade noKendu Isaacs kanti emicwini yakhe efana nethi Can't Hide From Luv, Be Without You, I Found My Everything uthola umlayezo omayelana nothando nokusho ukuthi uhleli kahle emshadweni wakhe.
Usafuna impumelelo
Umyeni wakhe nguyena owehlukanisa uMary notshwala emva kokuba emnqumele ugwayi katiki wathi uzomshiya uma eqhubeka nokufika ekhaya edakiwe. Bashada ngoDecember 7, 2003 kanti bahlala nezingane zikaKendu ezintathu azithola kwayeshade naye esikhathini esedlule. Akanazingane kanti uthi kungenzeka agcine ezitholile.
Ebuzwa ukuthi yiziphi izinhloso zakhe, uMary waphendula kanjena: "Ngifuna ukucula kuphela. Ngizocula kuze kuphele izwi lami. Uma liphela, ngiyoba nguphrojusa.
"Ngisayilambele impumelelo. Abantu babelahle ithemba ngami. Manje ngihlonishwa abancane nabadala ngenxa yomculo wami. Ngiyaziqhenya ngalokho. Abantu kufanele bazi ukuthi ngiyafana nabo nami ngiyabuzwela ubuhlungu," kusho uMary. [z]
Seyadlula iminyaka yokuziphatha kabi kuMary kanti manje useyisibonelo esihle kubalandeli bakhe.
Nakuba uMary J Blige esewine amaGrammy wazakhela negama emculweni we-hip-hop/soul ziningi izingqinamba adlula kuzona acula ngazo emculweni wakhe. Noma edlule kulezo zinhlungu, ukwazile ukulwa waze waphumelela...
Ekuqaleni babembiza ngo- "Aretha Franklin omusha," uMary owagcina esenza ezibukwayo eshaya ngesakhe isitayela emculweni.

Sixoxisane noJudith Sephuma
Uyaziqhenya ngemvelaphi yakhe
U-JUDITH SEPHUMA ocula i-jazz usewine imiklomelo eminingi wahambela amazwe ngamazwe ecula kodwa uthi usakhuthazwa yizintaba zangakubo eLimpopo.
"Izwe lethu linothe kakhulu kodwa asikwazi lokho," kusho yena. "ElaseLimpopo lihle, liluhlaza cwe kanti linokuthula. Sengithathe isinqumo sokuchitha isikhathi sami ngizitika ngobuhle balo kanti ngiyazi ukuthi lobo buhle balo ngizobuqhakambisa emculweni wami."
Ukuvakashela kwakhe eMagoebaskloof nomyeni wakhe kwamkhumbuza izinsuku zakudala bevakasha nomndeni wakubo esemncane.
"Njalo ngonyaka u-anti nomalume babesilanda sigibele emotweni siye khona. Ngithole ukuthi manje sekukuhle kakhulu kuleya ndawo njengoba sisanda kuyivakashela."
Ayikho into uJudith engamniki umqondo wokuba acule ngayo.
"Angibeki isithombe esigcwele ngento engicula ngayo ngoba angifuni kube sengathi ngithinta izinto zabantu. Kodwa konke engitshelwa kona noma engikubonayo ngikuzwe nsuku zonke kuyangikhuthaza.
"Ngiphila ngengoma. Ngicabanga ngesiPedi ngibhale ngaso. Yilokho okungiphumelelisayo," kusho yena.
Ngesikhathi sixoxisana naye wayegqoke i-jean ne-top. Wayengayifakile i-make-up izinwele zakhe eziphothiwe engazibophile.
Wawungeke usho ukuthi sixoxisana nomculi osehlabene njengaye - ungowesimame onomoya omuhle okuzwakala noma ekhuluma ngokukhula kwakhe ukuthi ukhuliswe kahle kanti akakhohlwa yizingane zakhe.
Umndeni
Uma eqamba izingoma uzihlola ngezingane zakhe.
"Izingoma kufanele ziculeke. Uma izingane zami zikwazi ukucula kanye nami, ziyizwa into engicula ngayo, ngisuke ngazi ukuthi ibambe ngako. Ngike ngidlale ingoma emotweni kanti uma zingayithandi zivele zithi, 'Ma, akekho umuntu ongathenga into enje.'"
Le ntokazi iyaxhuga emva kokuhlinzwa kwayo onyaweni.
"Uyazi," kusho yena, "udokotela wathi ngizoba ngcono. Nginezingane kanti izinhlungu engizizwa manje ziwubala kunalezo ozizwa uma ebeletha. Amadoda awazi lutho!"
U-Judith wathuthela eGoli ngo-1992 kodwa akapheli kubo ePolokwane.
Unabantwana abane kanti owokugcina unezinyanga ezinhlanu. Yena nomyeni wakhe uSiphiwe Mhlabi ongumthwebuli-wezithombe bayazama ukushintsha izinhlelo zabo ukuze bathole isikhathi abazosichitha nezingane.
Ukudlala
U-Judith wazalelwa eVenda umndeni wakubo wathuthela ePolokwane esemncane. "Engikukhumbulayo esasikwenza sisakhula wukuthi sasikhonze ukudlala nomfowethu nodadewethu kanye nezinye izingane. Sasivame ukudlala ibhola neminye imidlalo.
"Ngisakhumbula nokuthi sasidlala obhuqwini. Sisafunda sasincintisana ukuze kutholakale ukuthi yimuphi umfaniswano o-ayinwe kahle nezicathulo ezipholishwe kahle kodwa ekugcineni sonke sasingcoliswa wubhuqu."
U-Judith uthi esakhula wayengahlangani nabantu.
"Ngangingavunyelwe ukubukela iTV, kanti ngaphandle kwalokho, ukuyibuka kwakungeke kube lula ngoba i-battery yayibuye iphele. Sasivele silalele umsakazo.
"Njengoba ngazalelwa eVenda, ngikwazi nokukhuluma isiVenda, mina nomama sasivame ukuqopha izingoma zeRadio Venda."
Ngabe yilezo zikhathi ayezichitha eqopha estudiyo ezamnika ugqozi lokucula"
"Cha. Lokho kwenzeka sengiseGoli. Abantu basePolokwane umculo babengawuthathisa okwento ongayifundela. Umculo wawugcina ukuwuzwa emsakazweni. Yayingekho indawo yokuwufundela."
U-Judith uyaziqhenya ngemvelaphi yakhe kodwa akafihli ukuthi kukhona izinto angazithandi ngendawo yakubo. "Abantu bakhona basadla ngoludala kanti lokho angikuthandi neze," kusho yena.
Abaculi abasafufusa abanikwa amathuba anele.
"Lokho kuyamangaza ngoba kuthi uma ususedolobheni ususebenza kule mboni yomculo, uhlangane nabaculi abakutshela ukuthi baliqhamukisa eLimpopo. Ithalente likhona kodwa amathuba awekho.
"Ngabe angisiye lo muntu enginguye namuhla ukuba angikhulelanga kule ndawo engakhulela kuyona . Abanye abantu balibukela phansi elaseLimpopo.
"Kukhona abantu baseLimpopo engibaziyo okuthi uma ubuza ukuthi baliqhamukisaphi bathi baliqhamukisa eCape Town.
"Umama angangishaya uma engangizwa ngisho into efana naleyo." [z]

UNONTOBEKO Mpaxa oneminyaka engu-41 futhi ongumama ongayedwana wayeyishoshozela lezombusazwe esengumfundi ngeminyaka yo-1980. Kwadingeka ukuba abeke eceleni amaphupho akhe okufundela ubudokotela weqa umngcele wayoqeqeshelwa ukuba yisosha loMkhonto weSizwe.
Emva kwalokho wajoyina iSANDF – lapho athola khona ukuthi umzabalazo wakhe awukapheli.
“Ngabe ngiqamba amanga uma ngithi ukukhushulwa kwami kwiSANDF kwaba yinto elula. Ukuba sembuthweni wezempi wumsebenzi othathwa njengowabesilisa. Nami-ke emva kokudidiyelwa kwemibutho, kwadingeka ukuba ngiyilwele indawo yami.”
UNontobeko wayengakuthandi ukuba ahlale ehhovisi afake i-uniform yamasosha kodwa wayefuna ukuba yisosha elizolwa.
Njengamanje njengoba le ntokazi isingu-Colonel wokuqala wesimame ngaphansi kombutho weSANDF lapho kuqeqeshwa khona amasosha ePort Elizabeth - uMpaxa uphethe izinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zamasosha asezikhungweni ezise-Eastern Cape – kubandakanya nalezo ezaziyizabelo.
Ngonyaka odlule, le ntokazi edume ikakhulu kozakwabo besilisa ngokuthi ngu-“Iron Lady” yalungiselela ithimba lamasosha elaba yimpumelelo enkulu eSudan lapho lalibhekele khona ukuthula.
Emva kwezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili ezingenazigameko ezitheni, leli thimba labuyela ekhaya.
Nakuba uMpaxa engesiye owesimame ongu-Colonel wokuqala kodwa ungowokuqala ukuphatha i-battalion elwayo.
UMPAXA wazalelwa wakhulela emaphandleni aseTranskei kanti waqala ukuqonda ngesimo sezombusazwe ngeminyaka yo-1980 ngesikhathi umama wakhe uNokufika wayemthumela ku-anti wakhe eKhayelitsha eCape Town ngamaholidi esikole.
“Ngaqala ukuya eCape Town ngisemncane ngineminyaka engu-13 ngenza uStandard Six. Eminyakeni edlule ngakha ubungani nentsha yezombusazwe.
“Kwakuthi lapho esephelile amaholidi, ngibuyele eMount Frere ngiyoqhubeka nokufunda.”
Ukungqubuzana namaphoyisa eKhayelitsha kwaphetha ngokuba aye emngceleni nasekudingisweni.
“Ngangibaleka ngiyocasha emalokishini aseKapa emva kokuba negalelo ekuqhubeni umzabalazo eKhayelitsha.
“Lapho ngangicashe khona kwahlasela amadoda afike adubula kodwa ngaphuma ngiphila. Ngangazi ukuthi kwakufanele ngife ngalelo langa, ngakhoke ngapakisha izimpahla zami ngalibhekisa eBotswana.”
Ekungaphumeleleni kwezifiso zakhe zokuba wudokotela, uMpaxa owayeneminyaka engu-19 weqa umngcele ngo-1989 egqoke umfaniswana wesikole walibangisa eGaberone, nokuyilapho afike waba ngumbaleki wakwelinye izwe.
Baqale bamvalela ejele, emva kwalokho wayiswa enkanjini eseBotswana ngaphambi kokuba adluliselwe eZambia.
Emva kwalokho wayiswa e-Uganda, nokuyilapho aqeqeshwa khona njengesosha leMK.
“Ukuqeqeshelwa ezempi kwakunzima, kodwa ngikufuna ukuba yisosha, ngabekezela kanye nabesilisa ukuze ngilwe ngelinye ilanga ngivikele abantu bakithi.”
Ngo-1993 wabuyela eSouth Africa ngokuphelele waqala waziqeqesha noMbutho wezokuVikela waseTranskei. Emva kokhetho luka-1994, waya kwabophiko lwezempi eWallmansthal ePitoli, nokuyilapho iMK, Apla neSADF babedidiyelwa ndawonye kwiSANDF.
Nakuba kwakunzima ekuqaleni, kukhona ukungathembani - uMpaxa uthi wabambelela kwayekholelwa kukho.
Ubuhlakani nokuziphatha kahle yikho okwenza uMpaxa aqashelwe ukuqeqesha amanye amasosha ngaphansi kohlelo lokuhlunga.
“Emva kwalo msebenzi, ngenqaba ukushintshelwa ngaphandle kwalesi sikhungo sokuqeqesha.”
Waze wakhalaza kowayengu-Ngqongqoshe wezokuVikela uJoe Modise.
UJoe Modise wasizwa kahle isikhalo sakhe wamkhuthaza wameseka.
EMINYAKENI eyisithupha eyalandela, wasebenzela eGoli, ePort Elizabeth naseGrahamstown ngaphambi kokuqokelwa ukuba ngu-commander weMthatha Infantry Battalion – nokuyilapho ayephethe abesilisa ababengaphezu kuka-1 000 ngo-2001.
“Usiko lwakwaXhosa alubaphathi abesimame ngokulinganayo, nokwathi lapho abantu sebengazi, bangihlonipha,” kusho yena.
“Ngiyakulwela ukuqeqesha amasosha azinikele ngoba ukungaphumeleli kwawo kungaba wukwehluleka kwami. Angikuthandi ukwehluleka.”
Kukhulu ukwesekwa akuthola emasosheni akhe. Omunye wezikhulu eziphethe, uhlale emlethela izimbali ezinsukwini ezithile ukuze aqhakazise ihhovisi lakhe. Umsebenzi wokuba yisosha uwenza awushintshanise nowokuba wumzali ongayedwana endodakazini yakhe uThabisa (10). UMpaxa uphinde asithole isikhathi sokwenza izifundo zakhe zeB.Comm – azoziphothula kulo nyaka.
“Ngisho nasembuthweni wezempi siyadinga ukuthuthukisa ulwazi. Imfundo yisona sikhali,” kusho yena. [z]

ABASIZI BABAQEQESHI:
Yini umsebenzi wabo?
Ngabe bangabantu abafuna ukudicilela abanye phansi okufanele babhekwe? Ngabe mhlawumbe umsebenzi wabo wukuhlela ama-traffic cones ejimini? Iqiniso wukuthi, abasizi babaqeqeshi bangaphezu kwama-“ball boys” kanti negalelo labo lingasiza ekuthuthukiseni iqembu liphumelele – uma bengazami ukubukela phansi imizamo yomqeqeshi omkhulu
EZISEMATHENI
KUKHONA labo abathi abasizi babaqeqeshi kuhle ukuba khona kwabo uma udinga abantu abazoqoqa izingubo zabadlali noma abazohlela ama-traffic cones ejimini.
Ziningi izindaba ngabasizi babaqeqeshi esezidale ukungathokozi emaqenjini abo.
Ukwenza isibonelo, ngesikhathi uMuhsin Ertugral eqala ukuqeqesha iChiefs kwakunamahhebezi okuthi abasizi bakhe uDoctor Khumalo no-Ace Khuse babenukeka ngokuthi bakhuthaza abanye babadlali ukuba badlale kabi kwaze kwaba uMuhsin Ertugral uyaxoshwa ukuze babe sethubeni lokuphatha.
Lawo kwakungamampunge - kumanje u-Ertugral usebuyile kwiChiefs kanti noKhumalo noKhuse basekhona.
Ngo-2004 owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates u-Innocent Mayoyo wayengumsizi kaTrott Moloto kwiMaritzburg United washiya phansi emva kwezinsolo zikaTrott zokuphatha ngesandla esiqinile nokungabikho kokutusa igalelo lakhe eqenjini.
Yiliphi ngempela igalelo lomsizi womqeqeshi ebholeni?
Umqeqeshi singamfanisa nojenene, kuthi abasizi bakhe sibafanise nezinduna ezibhekene nokuthi izinqumo zikajenene ziyenzeka yini nokuthi abadlali sebekulindele yini ukukhipha umsebenzi enkundleni.
Umsizi womqeqeshi ngumuntu osebenzisana nomqeqeshi, ngokusho kukaTed Dumitru owayengumqeqeshi weChiefs owayiwinisa izicoco zeligi ezimbili.
Uma umqeqeshi edinga umsizi, uye akhethe ngokubhekela umkhakha othile - njengokudlala kwabadlali basemumva. Ngale ndlela, ulwazi olutholakalayo eqenjini luyakhula, kusho uDumitru okumanje useyi “technical advisor” kwiSundowns.
Iqembu lisuke libhekene nobunzima obukhulu uma abasizi bomqeqeshi bebona sengathi sebengaphatha.
UPitso Mosimane owayengumsizi kaDumitru ngesikhathi iBafana iyingxenye ye-Africa Cup Of Nations ka-2006 e-Egypt uthi umsizi womqeqeshi ongameseki umqeqeshi usuke ehluleka ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe.
Okunye akubalulile wukuba umsizi womqeqeshi abheke amakhono amasha nokuyinto umqeqeshi angeke akwazi ukuba nesikhathi sayo.
Uma futhi kwenzeka ukuba umqeqeshi angaphumeleli ukuba semdlalweni, umsizi wakhe kufanele ukuba aqiniseke ukuthi wonke umuntu uhambisa ngokohlelo lomqeqeshi.
“Leso kusuke kungesiso isikhathi sethuba lokwenza izinto ngendlela yakho,” kusho yena.
“Umsizi womqeqeshi kufanele avikele umqeqeshi ameseke ezinqumweni azithathayo. Uma engeke akwenze lokho kungadingeka ukuba ashiye phansi eqenjini.”
NjengoDumitru, uMosimane ukholwa wukuthi iqembu lisuke selehlulwe lingakangeni enkundleni uma abasizi babaqeqeshi bengathembekile. “Abasizi babaqeqeshi bangaba ngabantu abadla abaqeqeshi izithende. Abanye bangenza noma yini ukudicilela umqeqeshi phansi,” kusho uMosimane.
Abasizi babaqeqeshi nabo bayingxenye yawo wonke umsebenzi, kusho u-Ian Palmer owayengumgadli kwi-Orlando Pirates ngeminyaka yo-1980 nosebuyile kulo leli qembu njengesekela lomqeqeshi uRudi Krol.
“Umsizi womqeqeshi usebenzisana ngokubambisana nomqeqeshi ekubhekeni indlela abadlali abadlala ngayo. Uma umqeqeshi efuna ukuba umsizi wakhe agxile emkhakheni othile, uyakwenza lokho,” kusho uPalmer.
“Sonke sinemibono eyehlukene ukuthi ibhola kumele lidlalwe kanjani, kodwa ekugcineni umuntu onezwi elizwakalayo wumqeqeshi,” kusho u-Ian Palmer.
Emva kancane kokuxoxisana noPalmer sezwa ukuthi usehlele ukuthi esule kulandela ukungaboni ngaso linye nomqeqeshi omkhulu uKrol.
Omunye umthombo uthi uKrol unuka uPalmer ngokuhlwayela imbewu embi kubadlali. Omunye uthi uPalmer akasakwazi ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisana nale ndoda “elikhuni” njengoKrol. UPitso Mosimane yena unethemba elikhulu.
Njengoba ake aba ngumqeqeshi omkhulu weBafana isikhashana emva kwesikhathi eside eqeqesha ngempumelelo iSupersport, uPitso uvele abahleke labo abacabanga ukuthi ukuba ngumsizi wabaqeqeshi beBafana abafana noCarlos Parreira noJoel Santana kwakhe wukwehliswa esikhundleni.
“Lokhu kukhulu kakhulu. Njengamanje sisemazingeni amazwe omhlaba nokuyilapho izinga lilikhulu ngaphezu kwebhola lalapha ekhaya. Kukhulu engikufundayo kuSantana njengoba kukuningi futhi engakufunda kuParreira.”
Mhlawumbe lena iyona into ebalulekile umsizi womqeqeshi adinga ukuba ayiqaphele ekuzakheleni igama ekuqeqesheni.
Ukuba ngumsizi womqeqeshi eqenjini leBafana kunezakho izinselelo ezehlukile. “Ngokuvamile ngumqeqeshi ogxekwayo lapho izinto zingahambi kahle, kodwa kwehlukile ngeBafana. Uma yehlulwa abantu bagxeka mina ngokunika umqeqeshi ulwazi olungelona”, kusho uMosimane.[z]

isithombe nguCLIVE THOMPSON
BONKE abazali sebake bahlangabezana nesimo sokuphoxeka lapho uthola ukuthi ingane yabo idelelile yaphoxa waze wafisa ukuthi umhlaba uvuleke ungene. Izingane azizalwanga nezindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha, futhi azizalwanga nezindlela ezimbi zokuziphatha - kufanele zifundiswe.
Nakuba sehlukile ngokwamasiko, kodwa kukhona ezinye izindlela zokuziphatha ezaziwa umhlaba wonke ukuthi yizindlela ezinhle...
4 Ngiyacela, ngiyabonga, ngicela uxolo: Izingane kufanele zifundiswe lamagama. Igama elithi "ta" cishe ebunganeni yilo eliyisisekelo salesi sifundo esibalulekile.
4 Ukwazisa abanye: Fundisa ingane yakho ngobubele, ukuthi banakekelwa kanjani abanye abantu nokuba ibe lusizo kwabadingayo. Ifundise ukuthi ingakhombi noma igqolozele, ihleke, igcone abantu bezinye izinhlanga, namasiko abo noma labo abangenamathuba, abakhubazekile ngisho ngabe babukeka ngokungajwayelekile. Ingabeki izici ngoba lokho kubuhlungu.
4 Ukuhlonipha impahla yabanye abantu: Fundisa ingane yakho ukuhlonipha imizi yabanye abantu, izimpahla nokunye. Uma kukhona izingane zakho ezikubolekile, kufanele zazi ukuthi kumele kubuyiselwe emva kokukusebenzisa kukuleso simo okuthathwe kukuso.
4 Ukuhlonipha impilo yangasese yabanye abantu: Lokhu kusho ukungqongqoza emnyango ulinde kuze kuthiwe 'ngena', kusho ukuthi ungavuli iminyango yamawodilophi nama-drawer abanye abantu; ungafundi izincwadi zabanye abantu, futhi ungalaleli izindaba zabanye abantu.
4 Ukuhlonipha abantu abadala: Akufuneki ukubiza abantu abadala ngamagama. Uma zingekho izihlalo ezingenamuntu, fundisa ingane yakho ukuba isukumele abantu abadala.
4 Ukuhlonipha abaphathi: Ukuze uthisha enze umsebenzi omuhle, kufanele ahlonishwe abafundi. Izingane kufanele zifunde futhi ukuthi akukuhle ukumemeza noma ukukhuluma ngendelelo kubantu abadala nabantu nje bonkana.
4 Ukwethembeka: Ukuxolisa ezinganeni yinto enzima, kodwa kuyisifundo esihle sokwethembeka. Uma zivuma ukuthi zenzeni, zitshele ukuthi ubuzophoxeka ukuba bezingalivumi iphutha lazo.
Akufani
Kwabanye ukuzotha kwenza kubukeke sengathi ingane iyisidenga, umuntu onguvuma zonke. Kule minyaka yakamuva, sekufana nento enhle eyamukelekile emphakathini ukufundisa izingane ukuba zithole amathuba.
Yebo, kuyinto enhle ukuba izingane zikwazi ukwamukela isimo, zizethembe nokuba zikwazi ukuzikhulumela uma nje lokho kungeke kuzenze zingabi nesizotha noma indlela enhle yokuzihlonipha.
Kufanele uqale nini
Kusukela ebuncaneni, into uJabu ayizwayo nayibonayo kanjalo nayenzayo, ngakhoke izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha kufanele zifundiswe ngesikhathi ingane yakho isiqala ukukuqonda okushoyo.
Yiba yisibonelo
"Enzani njengoba ngisho, nanjengoba ngenza," iyona ndlela yokufundisa izingane ukuzithoba. Ngeke ulindele izingane zakho ukuthi zikhombise izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha uma wena ungesona isibonelo esihle kuzona, izingane izinto eziningi zizifunda ekhaya. Isibonelo sabazali sokuba bathobelane bathobele ngisho izingane yinto ebalulekile.
Ncoma izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha
Ukuncoma kufundisa lukhulu. Tshela izingane zakho ukuthi uziqhenya kangakanani uma uzibona zinokuzithoba. Kubalulekile lokhu ukwenze ngesikhathi zisezincane usazifundisa inhlonipho, kodwa nezingane esezikhulile kufanele uhlale uzincoma ngendlela eziziphethe ngayo.
Ungalokhu uzitshela kuphela uma zenze izinto ezingalungile. Ngaleyo ndlela, kusho ukuthi uqala ukuzinaka lapho kukhona okungalungile ezikwenzile. Uma izingane zakho kukhona into engalungile eziyenzile, ungazigxeki, kodwa zitshele ngesizotha iyiphi indlela engcono yokuyenza leyo nto. Ungalokothi nakancane ingane uyithethisele iphutha layo emphakathini.
Ukuthetha nakho akuyona indlela enhle yokuziphatha.
Lindela izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha
Izindlela ezimbi zokuziphatha zingafaka izingane zakho otakwini. Wonke umuntu uyazithanda izingane eziziphatha kahle ezihloniphayo kodwa hhayi ezidelelayo. Ukuzenyeza wumphumela wezinkinga ezifana nokuba abantu bagweme ingane yakho. Ngakhoke alukho usizo olwenzela ingane yakho uma uyivumela ikhombisa ukungahloniphi nezindlela ezimbi zokuziphatha.
Lindela izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha, lindela izingane zakho ukuba zisebenzise izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha ezafundiswa zona. Thembeka uphoqelele ukuba kubuse izindlela ezinhle zokuziphatha nsuku zonke. Ungavumeli izinto zingenziwa nangelilodwa ilanga. Bakhumbuze ukuze esikhathini esizayo ukuthokozele ukubabona sebeyizintokazi nezinsizwa eziziphethe kahle.

Amstel’s
Spicy Chicken
SIPHEKA NEZIHLABANI
Intatheli yethu yezokudla uNtwenhle Mpanza uxoxisane no-Amstel Makwane oyilungu leqembu lomculo i-3Sum, nokunguye osicobelela ngokuconsisa amathe akuthandayo!
U-AMSTEL EKUDLENI
■ Ukudla engithanda ukukuphekela isoka lami - yisobho laseNigeria okuthiwa yi-egusi (melon seed) ne-lasagne.
■ Angisoze ngakudla ukudla kwamaShayina. Ngiyakwesaba.
■ Into engajwayelekile engake ngayidla - yinhlanzi emnyama yaseCongo.
■ Ukudla okuthandwa wumama - usu namanqina enkomo.
■ Ukube imali ayisiso isithiyo ngabe ngizidlela ama-Cherries no-cream kwabansundu bezambane likapondo!
OKUDINGAYO
* 2 izipuni (30ml) uwoyela
* 1 u-anyanisi oqotshiwe
* 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) u-curry powder
* 1/2 i-teaspoon (2,5ml) i-paprika
* 1 i-teaspoon (5ml) i-cumin
* 1 utamatisi oqotshiwe
* 1/4 uphepha oluhlaza oqotshiwe
* 4 amathanga enkukhu
* 2 izinkomishi (500ml) i-chicken stock
INDLELA YOKUKWENZA
1. Epanini shisa uwoyela uthose u-anyanisi imizuzu engu-3 uze ube nsunjwana.
2. Faka u-curry powder, i-paprika, i-cumin, utamatisi, uphepha oluhlaza nenkukhu. Kupheke imizuzu emihlanu ulokhu ukugovuza inkukhu ize inindeke yonke nge-curry paste.
3. Faka i-stock, upheke ngomlilo okahle imizuzu engu-30 i-gravy ize ishube.
4. Kuseve nama-veg nerayisi.[z]
Isithombe: Peter Whitfield

Ama-bread rolls
amhlophe
INHLAMA YESINKWA ESIMHLOPHE
Le nhlama ungayisebenzisela ukwenza olofu besinkwa esimhlophe noma ama-
rolls ame ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene, ufake ama-fillings noma ama-toppings amaningi.
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 45 imizuzu
Kuphuma ulofu owodwa
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
* I-Glaze
* 1 iqanda
* 15ml (1 isipuni) amanzi
* ibinzana likasawoti
1. Inhlama. Endishini, sefa ufulawa, ushukela nosawoti. Faka i-yeast yodwa eceleni. (Usawoti akufanele uhlangane ne-yeast ngoba ubulala izikhukhumalisi ezikwi-yeast.)
2. Ebhodweni, ncibilikisa imajarini, faka ubisi ugovuze kube ntukuntuku. (Izinga lokushisa elilungele i-yeast ukuze ikhukhumale ngu-27°C. Ayikhukhumali uma kushisa kakhulu.
3. Vula isikhala phakathi nendawo kufulawa, faka ingxube yobisi. Hlanganisa kuthambe inhlama. Faka ufulawa uma inhlama isimanzi.
4. Thululela inhlama ebhodini elivuvuzelwe ngofulawa, udove imizuzu engu-10.
5. Mboza nge-clingwrap egcotshisiwe. Beka endaweni efudumele ukuyeke kukhukhumale ngokuphindaphindiwe.
6. Endaweni evuvuzelwe ngofulawa, phinda udove inhlama. Mboza nge-clingwrap egcotshisiwe ukuyeke kukhukhumale imizuzu engu-10.
7. Yenza inhlama ibe ngulofu noma ama-bread rolls.
8. I-Glaze. Kujeke, shaya amaqanda, amanzi nosawoti. Brasha i-glaze enhlameni. Mboza nge-clingwrap uyeke inhlama iphindaphindeke.
9. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200°C imizuzu engu-45. Kupholise.
BREAD ROLLS
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 20 imizuzu
Kuphuma angu-12
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
1. Landela iresiphi yenhlama emhlophe kuze kufike ku-Step 5.
2. Yenza ama-rolls angu-12 alinganayo. Endaweni evuvuzelwe ngofulawa, ndlala uphisi ngamunye wenhlama ube yibhola, mbambatha ngeminwe ukuze indawo engaphansi ishelele. Beka ethreyini lokubhaka eligcotshisiwe, cindezela uyeke kukhukhumale ngokuphindwe kabili.
3. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200°C imizuzu engu-20.
AMA-Toppings
Vuvuzela i-sesame seeds noma i-black poppy seeds ngaphezulu emva kokucwebezelisa nge-glaze. Uma ufuna ama-rolls ayisitayela sasePutukezi sebenzisa isikele usike okumise okukanxantathu ngaphezulu kuma-rolls ukubhuqe kufulawa.
Portuguese Loaf
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 20 imizuzu
Kuphuma olofu ababili
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
* ufulawa wokubhuqa
1. Landela iresiphi yenhlama emhlophe kuze kufike kuStep 5.
2. Endaweni evuvuzelwe ngofulawa, hlukanisa inhlama kabili, kwenze kumise okombhonxo. Ungakakumbozi, vula ngesihloko sommbese izikhala ezintathu noma ezine ezimise okukanxantathu uzivundlise ngaphezulu, wenze iphethini yo-nought neyeziphambano. Bhuqa ngofulawa.
3. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200°C imizuzu engu-20.
Olive Loaf
Isikhathi Sokukulungisa: 1 ihora
Isikhathi Sokubhaka: 35 imizuzu
Kuphuma olofu ababili
* 625g i-white bread flour
* 40g ushukela
* 5ml (1 i-teaspoon) usawoti
* 10g i-instant yeast
* 65g imajarini noma ibhotela
* 500ml (2 izinkomishi) ubisi
* 100g ama-olives aqotshiwe akhishwe izinhlamvu
Glaze
* 1 iqanda elishayiwe
* ibinzana likasawoti
* 30ml (2 izipuni) amanzi abandayo
1. Landela iresiphi yenhlama emhlophe kufike kuStep 4.
2. Hlukanisa inhlama ibe ama-portion amane alinganayo. Sebenzisa i-rolling pin enofulawa undlale i-portion ngayinye imise okombhonxo olugqinsi olungu-25mm. Cindezela ama-olives enhlameni.
3. Goqa inhlama, ucindezele amachopho. Beka ethreyini lokubhaka eligcotshisiwe, amachopho owacindezele abe ngaphansi.
4. I-Glaze. Kujeke, shaya iqanda, usawoti, namanzi, brasha kulofu. Kubeke endaweni efudumele kuze kuphindaphindeke kabili.
5. Bhaka kuhhavini oshisiswe ngo-200˚C imizuzu engu-35. Mbambatha i-crust ngommbese. Uma ulofu usulungile uzozwakala sengathi awunalutho. Kupholisele kwi-wire rack. [z]
Olive Loaf
Akekho umuntu ongasithandi isinkwa esifreshi esibhakiwe. UBONA neFood For Fun And Funds bazokukhombisa ukuthi ungazakhela kanjani imali ngesinkwa
BREAD ROLLS
INDLELA YOKUBONA UKUTHI UQHUBA KANJANI
Kulolu shicilelo sicubungula izinto ezinhlanu okumele uzibheke uma ufuna ukuthola ukuthi inkampani yakho iqhuba kanjani – ukhuphule nenzuzo yakho. Lokhu kuthathise okweresiphi ofaka kuyona izithako ngezikalo ezithile uma ubhaka ikhekhe. Yile “resiphi” ezosikhombisa ukuthi inzuzo sizoyenza kanjani. Manje ake sibheke “izithako” zethu:
1 UKUKHANGISA: Uchitha isikhathi esingakanani uma ufuna amakhasimende amasha? Yimiphi imizamo oyenzayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayanda abantu abezwa ngemikhiqizo yakho? Ukutshela abanye ukuthi abatshele abanye ngayo kuyasiza kodwa kungalilimaza ibhizinisi lakho uma ulinda abanye abantu ukuba kube yibona abakhuluma ngemikhiqizo yakho. Impumelelo ilele ekutholeni amasu amahle okwazisa abantu ngemikhiqizo yakho. Enye yezindlela ezinganakiwe futhi engabizi kakhulu yokwenza lokho eyokucela amakhasimende akho akuyalele abantu ongabatshela ngemikhiqizo yakho.
2 UKUSHINTSHA: Le ndlela ayivamile ukusetshenziswa abanamabhizinisi amancane. Ukubheka ukuthi bangaki abantu abashintsha umwondo bangagcini ngokubona noma ukuzwa ngomkhiqizo wakho kodwa bagcine ngokuwuthenga kuyindlela enhle yokubona ukuthi uwukhangisa kanjani. Enye indlela yokwenza lokhu wukufaka indali kuleyo naleyo ndlela okhetha ukukhangisa ngayo. Uma abantu bethenga lokho okusendalini uzokwazi ukuthi iyiphi indlela yokukhangisa ekusebenzelayo. Kungenzeka, ukwenza isibonelo, uthole ukuthi ukukhipha amapheshana kungcono kunokukhangisa ephephandabeni lomphakathi.
3 AMAKHASIMENDE: Laba bantu yibona abathenga baphindelele. Bayakusiza bakukhangisele imikhiqizo yakho ngokutshela abanye ngayo. Qiniseka ukuthi ubabonga ngokubanika isaphulelo esiyisipesheli uma bethenga okwesithathu. Akubizi ukugcina ikhasimende elithokozile kunokuhlala ufuna amasha.
4OKUTHENGIWE: Enye indlela yokubheka ukuthi uqhuba kanjani eyokuthola ukuthi ikhasimende ngalinye lithenga ngamalini. Ungakwazi ukukhuphula lelo nani elithenga ngalo. Ukwenza isibonelo, ama-cupcakes akho wadayise nokokusula umlomo okuyisipesheli. Amakhasimende akho azocabanga ukuthi athola okuningi ngemali yawo athenge kakhulu.
5IMALI OYITHOLAYO: Bheka imali oyithola ungakazisusi izindleko zakho. Lokhu ukwenzela ukukhuphula imali oyithola inyanga nenyanga, kodwa qaphela – maningi amabhizinisi ajaha ukubheka imali ayitholile kunokubheka inzuzo ayenzayo. Maningi amabhizinisi enza imali enkulu kodwa inzuzo ingabikhona, qiniseka ukuthi ubheka izindleko
zakho zonke.
Lluwellyn Diedericks

HLANGANYELA nathi ekuseni sizitike ngobumnandi, sihleke sitomotwe. UBONA nabakwaPond’s bahlangene ukuze bakunike ithuba eliyingqayizivele!
Akekho umuntu ongafuni ukubukeka kahle kodwa kokunye asazi ukuthi sizoqalaphi. Uzofundiswa ngokubaluleka kokubukeka kahle nokuzethemba, nokuthi ungalubuyisela kanjani uthando nesivuthevuthe othandweni lwakho.
Le workshop izokhombisa ukuthi ukunakekelwa kwesikhumba nokugqoka ube sesitayeleni kungenza muphi umehluko ekubukekeni kwakho, kanti kuyobe kukhona nochwepheshe wezothando oyokweluleka abesimame ngokuthi bangakhululeka kanjani ngokomqondo empilweni yabo.
Izikhulumi: U-Sbu Mpungose, umhleli kaBONA uzokhuluma ngongaba nako kwi-wardrobe yakho.
U-Ali Murray ongumeluleki kwezothando uzokweluleka abesimame ngokulawula impilo yabo othandweni.
Abacwali bakwaPond’s bayokhombisa ngokusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo yabo uthole nethuba lokuyisebenzisa.

Indawo: Southern Sun Grayston, Sandton, eGoli

Ningafiki nezingane. Imali ekhokhwayo kumele ikhokhwe zingakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa zokusebenza ubhukile. Ayikho imali eyobuyiswa. [z]
